name: One Month Free, Do a Virtual Tour Today! 1bd/1ba
body:
AVA Nob Hill is a new type of living space in San Francisco that apartment caters to a community experience in addition to your own personal space. Just minutes from downtown and South of Market and Mission District, there are always fresh adventures to embark on. Colombini Bistro, Café Royale, The Outsiders, Union Square Park and Landmark Theatres Lumiere are just a few local destinations and delicacies you'll love in this chic neighborhood.

 Our studios and 1- and 2-bedroom Nob Hill apartments feature an urban-inspired design that extends beyond your walls and throughout the entire community. There's the outdoor space with lava heat and lobby lounge-both with free Wi-Fi – -perfect for you to hang with friends or unwind alone. We also have a spectacular fitness center and dog run on-site, ensuring you'll never have to go far to do the things you love.

-Lounge
-Controlled Access
-On-site maintenance
-Hard-Surface Flooring
-Parking
-Patio/ Balcony
-Package Acceptance
-Barbecue
-Pet Friendly
-Views
-WiFi
-Fully-equipped kitchen

Visit www.avalon-communities.com/ava-nob-hill to learn more.

THE CONTACT
Elena Hamner | Leasing Agent


Mosser Companies
www.mosserliving.com

Nestled between Nob Hill, Union Square, and the Tenderloin, Lower Nob Hill evokes both the elegance of Nob Hill and the hipness of the Tenderloin, and it is dotted with edgy art galleries and bohemian coffee shops. For foodies, hip eateries and casual cocktail lounges can be found on every block. Gourmet groceries can be found a block away at Sutter Fine Foods, and Heart of the City Farmers Market is a twice weekly event, located nearby. Minutes from Union Square and the Financial District, Lower Nob Hill is a commuters dream, from the iconic California Street Cable Car, to cross town Muni buses, and Civic Center BART and Metro station.

Walking Score: 99
Biking Score: 75
Transit Score: 1000

THE APARTMENT
Within the breathtaking facade of 952 Sutter Street are renovated luxury apartments that combine elegant period details with posh modern amenities. This remarkable residential building is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. 

This 2 Bedroom apartment is comfortable and sumptuous- featuring a freshly renovated chef's kitchen and an exquisitely restored bath featuring state-of-the-art fixtures and appliances, gorgeous marble counters and crisp modern cabinetry. Each unit offers charmingly unique vintage details throughout, including gorgeous hardwood floors, wainscoted walls, original doors with brass hardware, tall double-hung windows, crown moldings and coffered ceilings. 

-Sleek Chef's kitchen with dishwasher, built-in microwave and floor-to-ceiling cabinets
-Upgraded Lighting Fixtures 
-In-Unit Washer/Dryer
-Spacious Closets
-Shared Yard/Patio 
-Renovated Bathroom with Tiled Shower Over Bath
-Pet Friendly
-No Parking
-Utilities Not Included

body:
Spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bath, unfurnished apartment.

• Full-size Dishwasher 
• Hardwood bedroom floors
• Insulated glass windows 
• New cellular living room blinds
• Walk-in closet plus extra hall closet
• Lots of natural light

Building amenities include:
• One Parking space 
• Laundry in building
• Fully Retrofitted Building
• Shuttle stops and freeways nearby

The location in Noe Valley is ideal with grocery stores, shops and restaurants close by. Shuttle stops to the south bay are just a block or two away, public transportation (BART, Muni, J Church) and freeway entrances to both 101 and 280 are also nearby for an easy commute. 

Rent: $3000 a month with parking included, security deposit 1.5x rent, 12 month lease.

This unit is non-smoking and no pets are allowed.

body:

Contemporary one bedroom condo centrally located in SoMa / Downtown San Francisco, known for its excellent museums, tech headquarters and restaurants.
Enjoy a great kitchen, roof deck with gas grill and panoramic city views.

Location

name: Spacious Studio w/Patio | APPLY TODAY & GET 1 MONTH FREE!!!!
body:
Welcome Home To Windsor at Dogpatch!

Call  show contact info
 or Visit www.windsoratdogpatch.com

**1 MONTH FREE!!! LIMITED TIME ONLY!!! 12 MONTH LEASE TERM REQUIRED, OAC, ON SELECT APARTMENTS, TERMS & CONDITIONS APPLY**

Apt #: 234
Floor Plan S4
Available Date: NOW
Size: 463 sq ft
Best Rate: $2480/mo for 12 months
*PRICING & AVAILABILITY SUBJECT TO CHANGE DAILY*

Full Sized Washer and Dryers
Dishwasher
Electric Range
Stainless Steel Appliances

Welcome to Windsor at Dogpatch. Situated in the heart of the historic Dogpatch neighborhood of San Francisco, our community brings modern living to the storied streets and waterfront that launched a city. Our modern pet-friendly studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartments are designed to accommodate all needs. Whether you are an ambitious professional or an innovative artist, you work-from-home or commute, whether you have a cheerful child or a faithful furry friend, we have an abode that’s just right for you.

From a ditch-your-gym-membership fitness center with stretching room and a commercial kitchen-meets-bar-meets-resident lounge to a rooftop deck with bay and city views–we have amenities to keep you comfortable, inspired, and carefree. Not to mention the trendy in-home finishes such as the GE stainless-steel appliances and washer/dryer sets or the Google Fiber and Wave G internet. Some floor plans have private balconies or patios, so you can always be surrounded by  the sights and sounds of San Francisco.

Our location’s convenient access to major roads like I-80, I-280, and US-101 and ideal location near the 23rd Street Muni Rail and 22nd Street Caltrain stops, brings you closer to anywhere you want to be. Nearby employers include UCSF, Kaiser Permanente and Pinterest. The neighborhood offers a myriad of restaurants, bars and coffee shops that are easily accessible. AT&T Park as well as Chase Center, soon to be home of the Golden State Warriors, are only a few of the many nearby attractions.

Features
- Ceramic Tiled Tub/Showers 
- Quartz Countertops 
- Controlled Access Entries
- High Speed Internet Fiber in Every Apartment 
- Wood-laminate Flooring Living/Dining Area 
- Walk-In Closets*

- Full-Size In-Unit Washer and Dryer 
- Energy Star Stainless Steel Appliances 
- Open Concept Kitchen 
- Juliet Balconies* 
- Triple Pane Windows
- Carpeted Bedrooms 
- Downtown City Views*

- 100% Non-Smoking Community 
- Studio, One, Two and Three Bedroom Apartments 
- Walk to the new Chase Arena
- Enclosed Parking Garage with Controlled Access 
- Online Portal for Rent Payment and Maintenance Requests 
- Professional On-Site Staff

- Walk Score - 84, Very Walkable; Transit Score - 75, Rider's Paradise; Bike Score - 91, Biker's Paradise

- Laundry Lockers 
- State-of-the-Art Fitness Center, Indoor/Outdoor Fitness, Fully Stocked Fitness Center

- Easy Freeway, Muni and Caltrain Access 

Pet Policy

name: 2 bedroom, 2 bath with offer at Avalon Mission Bay
body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.
 
 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. On-site retail, including Chase Bank and Bark Avenue Doggy Daycare, along with nearby Safeway, Bluxome Street Winery, Lucky Strike, and Alexander's Steakhouse, puts shopping, dining, and entertainment within reach.Rent: $4170Bedrooms: 2Bathrooms: 2Apartment Features:8th FloorCommunity Amenities:WiFiWood Floors*High-speed InternetPatio/ Balcony*ConciergeViews*ParkingCall us! show contact info

name: 4 bed 2 bath charming updated condo w/ parking optional
body:
Video tour available for safety due to COVID-19.

Large updated house perfect for a group or a family! Easy walk to the N Judah (or take one of the company shuttles around the corner). Vibrant neighborhood between nopa, haight ashbury and lower haight, and castro just down the street. Block away from Buena Vista and Panhandle.

Sunny living room with an open kitchen and dining nook (already comes with a dining table if you want!). All bedrooms of varying sizes - 1 quite large to 1 on the smaller size. There are 2 bathrooms - one is attached to the master bedroom and the second is in the hallway. This allows for the place to be occupied by 2-4 people, or couples!

Wooden floor throughout and updated kitchen and bathrooms. In-unit washer/dryer. Private stoop (stairs) to hang out, and small back patio for grilling! Large garden in front for gardening only. There's a dedicated garage (not tandem) available at 250/month additional. You can park 1 car inside and 2 outside!

Owner pays water+garbage, tenant pays gas+electric. Require refundable security deposit 1.5x rent to move in. Flexible move-in date. 1 year lease minimum.

name: Convertible Studio Inquire Today! LIMITED TIME ONLY! 1 MONTH FREE!!!
body:
Welcome Home To Windsor at Dogpatch!

 or Visit www.windsoratdogpatch.com

Full Sized Washer and Dryers
Dishwasher
Electric Range
Stainless Steel Appliances

Welcome to Windsor at Dogpatch. Situated in the heart of the historic Dogpatch neighborhood of San Francisco, our community brings modern living to the storied streets and waterfront that launched a city. Our modern pet-friendly studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartments are designed to accommodate all needs. Whether you are an ambitious professional or an innovative artist, you work-from-home or commute, whether you have a cheerful child or a faithful furry friend, we have an abode that’s just right for you.

From a ditch-your-gym-membership fitness center with stretching room and a commercial kitchen-meets-bar-meets-resident lounge to a rooftop deck with bay and city views–we have amenities to keep you comfortable, inspired, and carefree. Not to mention the trendy in-home finishes such as the GE stainless-steel appliances and washer/dryer sets or the Google Fiber and Wave G internet. Some floor plans have private balconies or patios, so you can always be surrounded by  the sights and sounds of San Francisco.

Our location’s convenient access to major roads like I-80, I-280, and US-101 and ideal location near the 23rd Street Muni Rail and 22nd Street Caltrain stops, brings you closer to anywhere you want to be. Nearby employers include UCSF, Kaiser Permanente and Pinterest. The neighborhood offers a myriad of restaurants, bars and coffee shops that are easily accessible. AT&T Park as well as Chase Center, soon to be home of the Golden State Warriors, are only a few of the many nearby attractions.

Features

name: Two Bedroom Russian Hill Flat Coming Soon!
body:
We are proud to offer a two bedroom, one bath flat in the trendy Russian Hill neighborhood. This apartment retains the charm of a classic San Francisco flat with modern upgraded conveniences. Original wainscoting leads you through the apartment to the main living area. A renovated kitchen features classic light wood cabinets with granite counters and custom tiled back-splash lit by modern recessed lighting. The dining area opens up to a level out deck and a marble fireplace ties both the kitchen and living areas together. The full bathroom with refinished claw foot tub, and tiled floors is a pleasing retreat. At approximately 1,100 square feet this property is centrally located adjacent to Chinatown, North Beach and Fisherman’s Wharf; transportation options include a quarter block walk to the Mason Street cable car line, walking distance to Muni and Washington Square; a convenient pick-up point for private transportation. Neighborhood eateries of every flavor abound. Additional features include:
* Stainless Steel Appliances
* Custom Paint Throughout
* Natural Light
* Carpet and Hardwood Flooring
* Private entry
* Washer and Dryer In Unit
* Gas Heating
* Individual Water Heater
* Covered garage for small vehicle available for an additional fee
* Centrally located a short distance from the Financial District, North Beach, and Fisherman’s Wharf, Chinatown
* Great Public Transit Options: https://www.sfmta.com/
* Walk Score of 100! http://www.walkscore.com/get-score.php?street=871+vallejo%2C+san+francisco+ca&go=Go
* https://www.sfgate.com/neighborhoods/sf/russianhill/
* https://thebolditalic.com/why-i-love-living-in-russian-hill-the-bold-italic-san-francisco-e4a972fdb178

body:

Large locking walk-in storage closet in garage. Laundry in garage. Adjacent to Panhandle Park, steps to Divisadero Corridor restaurants, cafes, shops.

• Beautiful hardwood floors and warm natural light throughout

Walkscore of 96, “Walkers Paradise”

name: Classic, 1 bed, 1-bath apartment in San Francisco, CA
body:
1200 Treat Avenue Unit APT 7, San Francisco, CA 94110, United States

Discount / Promo: Limited Edition Promo.
Sign the lease on or before April 15th to receive $650 Move in discount on your first full month's rent!

(For interested applicants, please provide a mobile number for listing inquiries.)

Classic, 1 bed, 1-bath, apartment in the neighborhood of Mission District in San Francisco. Within the area are parks, accessible public transportation, playground, and shared pool.

With a Victorian exterior building design, this charming interior is unfurnished and features hardwood and tile floors. A kitchen that includes fine wood cabinets and drawers, glossy granite countertops, and appliances such as a refrigerator, oven/range, and garbage disposal. The unit also has a living room and gas heating installed. Feel free to use the shared washer and dryer for your laundry needs.

Tenant’s responsibilities are electricity, gas, cleaning, sewage, cable, and internet. Landlord will handle the water and garbage.

Sounds great? Book a showing now and experience digital application at no cost, online payments, and efficient 24/7 maintenance support. Choose from a variety of tours - Self-Tours, Guided Tours, or 3D Virtual Tours. Enjoy this and more when you book today!

Additional Details:
On-street parking is available.

Pets are negotiable.

Smoking is not allowed.

Nearby Parks: Garfield Square, Bernal Park, Precita Park, and 23 & Treat St. Park.

The property’s Walkscore is 97/100, Transit Score is 85/100, and Bikescore is 86/100. This area is a Walker’s Paradise – daily errands do not require a car as they can easily be accomplished on foot. Excellent transit – public transportation is convenient for most trips.

This top floor, newly-renovated three bedroom, two bathroom flat is located in the highly desired Castro District just steps from local shops, grocery stores and some of San Francisco's best restaurants! This large home features an expansive formal dining room, updated kitchen with breakfast nook, living room, two standard bedrooms and one with master suite. Enjoy hardwood floors and original period details throughout! The property features a shared back yard with the two other building tenants. There is a storage unit available at the property and offered included in the rent. Sorry, there is no parking available. 

635A Castro has a WalkScore of 97 out of 100. This location is a walker's paradise so daily errands do not require a car. Easy walking distance to:
Mollie Stones, Whole Foods, Safeway grocery stores
Six minute walk from Castro metro station and the F line
Dolores Park
Mission District
Multiple restaurants and coffee shops
Multiple bars and nightlife options nearby but not directly adjacent or on the same block


Lease Terms:
One-year lease, water and garbage included in the rent. This is a non-smoking home. Pets considered with prior owner approval.

Corey Eckert, VP of Leasing & Broker

Come check out these views! On a clear day you can see all the way to the East Bay hills from the shared roof top deck. This 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment offers everything you would expect from living in Upper Market. The open concept living/kitchen space offers oversized windows and letting in lots of natural light. The petite kitchen offers newer appliances, stone counter tops and modern cabinets. The large bedroom has new wall-to wall carpet, two great sized closets one being a sliding door closet and views from the large floor to ceiling window. The bathroom is bright and features a newer tiled shower and modern fixtures. This comfortable space makes a great place to call home!

3500 Market is an impressive hill top building. Its lobby was built around exposed rocks in the hill giving this property an impressive first impression!

THE NEIGHBORHOOD: Castro / Upper Market

name: Old World Charm! Renovated! Amazing Location!
body:
FURNISHED!  Hardwood floors throughout, lots of natural light, living room and a gracious formal dining room.  Classic architectural details and high ceilings!  Renovated kitchen with top of the line stainless steel appliances.  Lots of counter and storage space and a walk-in pantry that provides additional storage.  Granite countertops, dishwasher and a beautiful Thermador stove with a pot filler. This kitchen will please all chef's!  Washer/Dryer right outside the kitchen.

Large master suite with beautifully renovated bathroom.  Large tub, shower and marble tile throughout the en suite bathroom.  Second bedroom also has its own bathroom with a stall shower.  The guest half bathroom is in the hallway. The third room would work well as an office/den.  This truly feels like a home with your own entrance.  92 Walk Score!

Additional Lease Terms:
This condo is FURNISHED. Lease term minimum of 6 months. Security deposit is 1.5 times monthly rent. $40.00 application fee per applicant. Proof of income required. Tenant pays all utilities except Water & Trash. Cats and Small Dogs considered with additional deposit.

A little More About Pacific Heights: 
When Hollywood wants to film a chase scene, Pacific Heights is where it comes for cinematic thrills. Some of the oldest, grandest, and largest homes in the city can be found in highly affluent Pacific Heights, which features an ample stock of Victorians, Edwardians, Mission Revivals, and homes in the style of French chateaus. Some of the former baronial mansions now serve as elite private schools, including San Francisco University High School, Drew School, Town School For Boys, and Convent of the Sacred Heart (in the former Flood Mansion). 

Pacific Heights has gorgeous parks, playgrounds, and, bounded by the Presidio, easy access to open space and miles of hiking, running, and biking trails. The main shopping district can be found on Fillmore Street, which runs north and south through Pacific Heights and is home to some of the city's chicest boutiques and choicest restaurants. 

CONTACT:
SUSAN LUCAS

name: The perfect Two Bedroom is waiting for you at One Henry Adams!
body:
Live in this stunning two bedroom two bath apartment home! This strategic floor plan allows for a gorgeous layout and ample living space. Please visit our website for our most recent availability!

Welcome home to One Henry Adams! Located in San Francisco's newest emerging neighborhood, surrounded by brownstone buildings, with a New York, SoHo vibe!

A stunning rooftop terrace with skyline views, a 24-hour private fitness center, and a clubhouse built for entertaining are some of the many amenities that welcome residents to One Henry Adams Apartments. Outside, a landscaped pedestrian mews divides the north and south residences, providing a sophisticated retreat from the bustling city surroundings. Inside, our spacious homes feature Caesarstone quartz countertops, iridescent glass tile backsplashes, stainless steel appliances and 9-foot ceilings. Select apartments include oversized sliding glass partitions which, combined with the floor-to-ceiling windows, create an incredible sense of space. Whether you select a studio, 1, 2, or 3 bedroom, all of the homes at One Henry Adams present an urban living experience without comparison.

Office Hours
Monday: 11:00 AM   - 04:00 PM  
Tuesday: 11:00 AM   - 04:00 PM  
Wednesday: 11:00 AM   - 04:00 PM  
Thursday: 11:00 AM   - 04:00 PM  
Friday: 11:00 AM   - 04:00 PM  
Saturday: 11:00 AM   - 04:00 PM

name: Stunning 2BR+Den/2BA Unit at The Ritz-Carlton Club and Residences
body:
The world's most trusted luxury brand brings a new level of service to one of the world's most exciting and innovative cities. The Ritz-Carlton Club and Residences combines luxury living with a multitude of highly desirable amenities and services.  Enjoy a private 12th Floor lounge with terrace overlooking Market Street, an executive boardroom, 24-hour concierge and security, two fitness centers, valet car service and curated events showcasing premium local vendors.  Residence #2101 is a stunning 21st floor unit that has been freshly painted throughout, boasts 1578 sqft of living space, 2 spacious bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, a bonus room/office, an open floor plan with upscale chef's kitchen with granite countertops and Viking SS appliances, in-unit W/D, and expansive windows capturing stunning city and water views.  Located in the heart of downtown San Francisco, close to premier shopping, fine dining, vibrant nightlife and convenient public transportation.

Virtual Tour: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MZkei2Lj3O0

Please contact Michelle for showings.  Easy to Show. Photos have been virtually staged. Unit will be delivered vacant.  $21,250 Due at Signing (Includes 1st Month's Rent + Security Deposit).  $40 Application Fee (Includes Background + Credit Check). 12 Month Minimum Lease.

body:
Stunning 9th floor corner unit at the highly coveted Brannan!  Boasting an expansive open floor plan with 1654 sqft of living space, 3 spacious bedrooms with custom built-ins, closet organizers and private balcony off the master suite, 3 full baths with marble vanities, gourmet kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, custom track lighting, Nest thermostat, and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of the Bay and city skyline.  The unit also includes additional storage unit and 1-car parking (additional parking space available for $200/month). The Brannan's resort-style amenities include 24-hour security, concierge, on-site HOA management, swimming pool with poolside kitchen, jacuzzi, and fitness center. body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.
 
 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. name: Master bedroom in SOMA
body:
Looking for someone to take over the spacious master bedroom of our 2bd/2ba apartment in SOMA in Bayside Village! Available now or by May 1, 2020 but can be flexible. Due to COVID-19, we are doing virtual viewings.

The master bedroom is very spacious; a queen-sized bed takes up less than half of the room. It comes with your own bathroom, walk-in closet, and storage closet. There is a laundry room on the same floor. The community also has a package room, gym, multiple pools, and sauna. The apartment is in a very convenient area walking distance to KT/N Muni (2 mins), Caltrain or BART (15 mins), tech shuttles, and Safeway/Trader Joe’s/Whole Foods.

We are: 2 professionals (F) in their mid 20’s living in the other bedroom + converted living room. We’re pretty clean & quiet and work normal working hours. We like trying new restaurants (roommate dinners!), card games, Netflix, and occasionally going out but we don’t invite a ton of people over. 

You are: Also a professional (F preferred) mid 20’s -early 30’s. Respectful, clean, and friendly! Sorry no smoking or couples

Costs: $1700/mo for the room plus utilities (which usually turns out to be < $75). There is a one-time $200 fee to add you to the lease. The lease ends at the end of March 2021 with an option to renew. We would also consider a subleaser from April to August. Garage parking is available for an additional $200/mo. 

If interested, please message me with a little about yourself, ideal move-in date, and your Instagram & LinkedIn!

name: Private Room - 3 Minute Walk to Glen Park Bart Station!
body:
PLEASE EMAIL TO SCHEDULE A SHOWING

One bedroom unit is currently available for rent in Glen Park! 3-minute walk to Glen Park Muni/BART station! 

The room is in a three-story house located on Rotteck Street. 

Glen Park is a secluded-feeling gem easily accessed by San Francisco's BART. The neighborhood's picturesque streetscapes and village vibe lend its coffee shops, organic markets, and independent boutiques an undeniable charm. This gentle neighborhood offers more than simple small-town treasures--Glen Park also boasts seventy green acres and miles of hidden nature trails that weave through its lushly forested hillsides.

-Great for working professional looking for the comfort of living outside the bustle of SF
-Hwy 280/101 nearby
-Muni/Bart/bus stop two blocks away
-Very safe neighborhood, easy parking
-Walk to Canyon Market and a Wide Array of Nearby Restaurants
-10 min Bart/Drive to downtown SF/Financial District/SOMA
-Hardwood floors
-Windows and plenty of natural sunlight

Unit:
*1 Bedroom with a Shared Restroom/Full Bath 
*200 sq. ft. with closet
*Shared Kitchen stove, sink, microwave, refrigerator
*Utilities Included
*Rent: $1200

AMENITIES: 
*Conveniently located next to the charming Glen Park neighborhood, GP Bart & Muni Station, City College of San Francisco, Ocean Avenue, Geneva Avenue, and Canyon Market
*Access to HWY101, I-280, and SFMTA Muni and BART 

SHOWINGS: 
By Appointment Only

*Security Deposit Required
*Utilities Included
*NO Pets
*NO Smoking

Glen Park is a secluded-feeling gem easily accessed by San Francisco's BART. The neighborhood's picturesque streetscapes and village vibe lend its coffee shops, organic markets, and independent boutiques an undeniable charm. This gentle neighborhood offers more than simple small-town treasures--Glen Park also boasts seventy green acres and miles of hidden nature trails that weave through its lushly forested hillsides.

name: STUNNING 3 BED/2 BA - BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION-  W/D & Parking
body:
This is a BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION! 6 MONTH LEASE

Video Tour and PRIVATE SHOWINGS available!

A bright & SPACIOUS 3 bedroom apartment with an inviting open plan living room and reading nook. Enjoy the large walk out TERRACE where you can dine alfresco with gorgeous garden and city views.

There are high ceilings, and luxurious plank oak floors throughout the unit.

The GOURMET KITCHEN and dining room are made for entertaining- with Pentalquartz counter tops and large dining island with premium appliances

The chef’s kitchen has built in microwave, ample storage space, gas range, dishwasher, double door stainless steel refrigerator and washer and dryer closet .

The master bedroom is BRIGHT and airy, has a large walk in closet and an exquisitely tiled bathroom with a double vanity and spa shower. The additional two bedrooms are spacious, with an additional well appointed second bathroom that has a shower over tub.

This bespoke home comes with ONE CAR PARKING in garage, nest thermostats and top of the line appliances.

The neighborhood boasts some of the best eateries - just a 4 minute walk to Divisadero home to Che Fico, the Mill, Bar Vale, Little Star, NOPA, Bar Crudo, Bi-Rite Grocery and many more!

One block from Alamo Square Park!

Another five-minute walk puts you in Hayes Valley, Japan Town or the Lower Haight. There are also two neighborhood farmer's markets on Saturday and Sunday.

Bus Lines
There are good bus lines, including the #5 Fulton which runs downtown. Also, close by are the 16AX, 16 BX, 21, 22, 24 & 31. The Octavia on-ramp to 101 is nearby as well.

For viewing appointments & more information please call Aashiyana on

name: Cow Hollow, Renovated 2BR, 1BR, Laundry, Garage Avail
body:
Shown by appointment.

Renovated full floor flat in quiet building in prime Cow Hollow / Marina neighborhood. The bright, sun exposed apartment has granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, tiled bathroom with glass enclosure, beautiful red oak hardwood floors throughout, cable ready, slate designed gas fireplace, double pane windows, recessed ceiling light with dimmer control, laundry room and shared backyard.

Stainless steel appliances consist of a gas range with self-cleaning oven, Bosch dishwasher, microwave, full-size refrigerator with water & ice dispenser, granite counters, under-mount lighting, garbage disposal, large eat-in kitchen and plenty of additional cabinet and counter space.

Unusually wide lot and large front double pane windows provide tremendous natural light to the front rooms - living room and kitchen/eat in area.
-	Living Room w/ gas fireplace, recessed lighting, hardwood floor, large double pane windows
-	Large Kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, built in cabinet and eat in area
(2) Bedrooms with closets and hardwood floors (Unable to create a third bedroom)

name: Beautiful 3BR/2BA Home with Parking & Small Yard!
body:
Located on 41st Ave. near Rivera, this lovely detached 3BR/2BA home is ready for occupancy.  Enter the secure gate and beyond the small courtyard area is the main entrance to the house.  On this level is a spacious bedroom and full bathroom and lots of closet space.  There is a door that takes you to the garage with tons of storage and full laundry facilities.  Out the back door is a small back yard with naturalized shrubs and a fruit tree.
Up the stairs you go to the upper level, with it’s gleaming hardwood floors.  Here, you’ll find a spacious living room with decorative fireplace, a dedicated dining area inclusive of the kitchen and a wonderful kitchen, complete with nice gas stove, dishwasher, a pantry and lots of cabinets for the busy cook.
There are two spacious bedrooms on this level that face the backyard as well as a full bathroom.  The house features several skylights, so it is very bright and cheery and other little bonuses such as a laundry chute in one of the bedrooms!  Come see this beautiful house and make it your home!  Sorry, no pets or smokers.

name: !Glorious Light-Filled Studio on Russian Hill!
body:
Located in the wonderful Russian Hill neighborhood, this spacious and elegant studio is centrally located so you can get downtown quickly or over the bridge for your getaways!  The main area is very spacious and welcomes you with a wall of windows, trendy new faux wood blinds and beautiful hardwood floors.  The kitchen is totally updated with granite counters, tile floor, nice gas stove, microwave and lots of cabinet space for the busy cook.  There is a pantry for all your supplies and the corner cabinets have Lazy Susan’s for your convenience.  The refrigerator with ice maker is very large and the freezer space is huge, so you can really stock up.  The kitchen has space for a table and chairs or stools with a counter, if you prefer.  There is a walk in closet the size of some New York apartments with shelves and plenty of hanging rods for all your clothes and belongings.  The bathroom is also updated with lovely marble walls and tile floor.  There is a tub and shower combination and a huge medicine cabinet as well as a vanity sink cabinet with storage.
A shared yard in the back is for your pleasure.  There is a washer and dryer in the building and also laundromats close by. On the corner is a café for your first cup of Joe and many stores and conveniences dot the area, as well as great shopping on Union Street!  Step out from the building and look to the Bay where you have an unobstructed view of Alcatraz!
One year lease
Rent                         $ 3,000
Security Dep               3,000          
Move Out Fee                100  (Owner will pay $100 Move In Fee)
Application Fee                25
Total Charges           $ 6,125

This beautiful studio is a San Francisco gem! Come make it your new home!
No Fee Agent – Kathleen Fetter

name: Sweet 1BR/1BA Plus Office In-Law!
body:
Located at 25th Ave and Irving, this sweet, updated In-Law is close to everything!  Freshly painted in lovely earth tones with new, bamboo floors, you will feel right at home.  The main living area is spacious and flows nicely into the kitchen where you will find new granite counters, a new large refrigerator and freezer, gas stove, nicely tiled floor (no dishwasher) and plenty of cabinets for the busy cook.  
There is one good sized bedroom with closet and a smaller room that could be used as a den, office or spare bedroom.  The bathroom is nicely tiled with a tub and shower combination and shelves for linens are just outside.
There are sliding glass doors that take you to the shared back yard that is currently abloom with many orchids!  No garage parking, but in the garage are three shelves just for you and your belongings.  There is also a shared washer and dryer in the garage that you are welcome to use two days a week and you choose which days!
You can walk to Golden Gate Park, and the N Judah Muni is just one block away that will take you all the way downtown in one direction and to Ocean beach in the other!  All up and down Irving St. are banks, produce markets, restaurants, (many Asian choices as well as others!) a Walgreen’s, hardware store and too many other businesses and fun shopping opportunities to mention!  Although situated in the vibrant and bustling Irving shopping area, the In-Law apartment is on the back of the house and is very quiet and cozy.  Landlord pays for garbage.  Water and PG & E are split. Sorry, no pets or smokers.  Call for a private showing!

body:
Unique, Large, Bright and Comfortable 1 Bedroom Apartment is Waiting for You!

Unit is: 
- Overlooking Moscone Park
- Corner Unit 
- Fully Furnished
- Unique Large Floor Plan 

Take a 3D tour around our unit simply copy and paste link below into your browser:

https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=F771Wi9rSoq

(May not represent the exact unit) 

Your dream San Francisco apartment is only one block from the Bay, near Fort Mason; and is a short walk to all the great shops, boutiques and restaurants near the Marina. While jogging on the Marina Green, you see the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, the Marin Headlands, and the constant marine activity on the San Francisco Bay. You're a short walk from the beautiful Palace of Fine Arts and the fascinating Exploratorium. Cyclists and joggers have an easy ride or run to and across the Golden Gate Bridge. Furnished apartments in the Marina are available, and we also offer short term leases and corporate leases. Our friendly and professional staff is always ready to help you.

body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.

 The Rise Hayes Valley 
1699 Market Street, San Francisco, CA, 94103


Call Now -  
 x 97
OR Text 97 to  
 to text our team directly.

See our property details here:
http://cl.greystar.com/h83990

Rise Hayes Valley Welcomes you Home!


This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 618 Sq. Ft. 

The Rise Hayes Valley is at the epicenter of the Mission, Upper Market and Hayes Valley neighborhoods in San Francisco. Sitting at the corner of Market St. and Valencia St., The Rise is uniquely positioned so you can chill at the Biergarten on Octavia, take in a flick at the Roxie theater, and do your organic grocery shopping at Rainbow Grocery and Whole Foods. With immediate access to Muni, BART, and bike-friendly lanes, all the best that San Francisco has to offer is at your fingertips.

name: Large victorian flat in NOPA, could be 5-bedrooms!
body:
Victorian flat with new kitchen and bathrooms.  There are 5 rooms that MAY be used as bedrooms.  They consist of two good sized bedrooms, a smaller bedroom, a living room and dining room.  Additionally, there are 2 all-new bathrooms.  One car garage included for a medium sized car.  Lots of original detail throughout.  Cats considered w/additional deposit.  1-year lease sought.  Security equal to one month's rent.  Tenant pays trash, PG&E, cable, internet, phone, etc.  Walk score = 95

Features include:
-shared yard
-coin-op laundry in the building
-high ceilings
-stainless-steel appliances incl dishwasher
-1 medium-sized car garage plus potential carport outside
-Two bathrooms
-new hardwood floors
-rear deck

After viewing, interested applicants should have the following:

1) completed Rental Application (available by request)
2) verification of income (last 2 pay stubs or offer letters)
3) recent bank statement (to show ample funds for move in)
4) credit report w/score
5) $40 processing fee per applicant (NON-REFUNDABLE)

name: Spacious 2 br with dual sinks and walk in closet. Virtual Tours Only
body:
Call Us Today   show contact info


Special Offer
Save up to one month's rent!

Great two bed room apartment located in the heart of SoMa. Every two bed room features two full bed rooms, and two full baths. We have a heated pool, Jacuzzi, work out center, and WiFi lounge on site. 
We are conveniently located near shopping, great restaurants, and public transportation.

SoMa Square is located in a prime area, in the midst of the hustle and bustle of the SoMa district in San Francisco. Being at the nexus of all modes of transportation, you will find that convenience is the amenity that people love most. 

Being able to get around easily is key, but what about when you come back home? When you come back home to SoMa Square you will be encompassed by an oasis-like, elevated central courtyard that is unlike any offering in SoMa. Get in a good workout in our updated fitness center or take a dip in our heated pool. We also have a rejuvenating spa for your pleasure.

Before you make a decision and before you make a move, you must have a look at our wonderful community.

SoMa Square Apartments
More Photos http://www.equityapartments.com/san-francisco-bay/soma/soma-square-apartments?ilsid=93

name: PRIME FURNISHED 1Bed/1BA in PREMIUM DOORMAN B'DING -UTILTIES INCLUDED
body:
PRIVATE SHOWINGS and VIDEO TOUR AVAILABLE!

Set in the ICONIC sought after downtown San Francisco art deco high-rise this Bright and BEAUTIFULLY FURNISHED Large 1 Bedroom in a prime Doorman Building.

This light and airy residence with high ceilings and rich period details has new wooden floors, with an exceptionally large living room. Large windows let in plenty of natural light!

Stylish furniture throughout the apartment- with a 48" Samsung Flat Screen TV on a mid century modern tv stand with matching coffee table.

Lovely dining area with a large wooden West Elm mid century modern dining table with expandable leaves for when you're entertaining!

Recently REMODELED KITCHEN with a NEW Samsung Smart Oven, Summit European Style Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Toaster and essentials!

Spacious and beautifully tiled bathroom with a separate shower stall and bath tub.

Large Hallway closet for storage and huge walk in closet in bedroom with Queen sized bed and luxurious Serta mattress.

Shared solarium/roof-deck with spectacular views!

name: 2.5 BR, 2 BA Newly Renovated Designer Condo
body:
The unit is a 2-level townhouse and features 2.5 bedrooms (incl. bonus office room), 2 full baths, 3 outdoor patios (with outdoor grill), covered garage for one car, and receives sunlight all day. The unit is offered unfurnished, partially furnished or fully furnished. It is available starting May 1, 2020 and requires a minimum 12-month lease (longer leases will be considered).

Located in the heart of trendy Upper Fillmore district, Lower Pacific Heights - Walkscore 98. Surrounded by shops, high-end retail stores, art galleries, cafes, 5-star restaurants, gourmet groceries, music venues, movie theaters, pharmacies, post office and many other conveniences.

The unit recently underwent a $250K renovation to fit new designer kitchen, living room and bathrooms. Kitchen renovations include custom cabinets, designer Italian lighting, ceasterstone countertops, and top-end appliances. Bathroom renovations include Duravitt Starck wall hung toilets, in-wall flushes, customer cabinetry, hand crafted contemporary sinks, tiling by Porcelenosa, and fittings by Brizio Siderna. One of the bathrooms has a jacuzzi tub and the other has a custom shower setup that includes a rain-shower, body jets and a hand-shower. The house has been fitted with high end accent dimmable LED lighting, including accent lighting under the custom cabinets and bar island.

This house has a wood burning fireplace, three patios and receives sunlight all day. There is also an outdoor grill. Total square footage is 1,400 (not including patios). There is also a new high capacity washer dryer.

The house is wired for high speed Comcast internet and cable. The house is fitted with Sonance® 7.1 in-wall speaker system with a sub-woofer.

For those interested in the partially/fully furnished options, the beds have TempurPedic® mattresses and the living room includes a zero-gravity chair and has a 60" SmartTV. The house can also come equipped with Sonos® sound system and a Universal remote control.

Price: $6,295 per month. Covered garage space is $295 per month extra, but is negotiable with length of lease.

name: PERFECT LOCATION! CLOSE TO THE AIRPORT, WELL EQUIPPED HOME
body: This place is perfect for your next visit to California,  Located just minutes from San Jose airport, Downtown San Jose, Convention Center, SAP Center, and major freeways. 20 mins to G00gle & Apple HQs. This charming house is fully-equipped and ready for your visit to San Jose. Both bedrooms have queen beds. Full kitchen, off-street and on-street parking. Gorgeous private deck for outdoor living in the fantastic California weather! Washer & dryer. THE SPACE: * A very cute two bedroom, one bath house conveniently located in central San Jose. Tons of vintage charm with clean fresh paint and furnishings. Typical of its era, this house is 1020 square feet but has a great layout. Get a great night's sleep on comfortable Serta mattresses. * Full kitchen, washer/dryer and a small desk/work area as well. * Out back, enjoy California's spectacular weather on a gorgeous private deck. GUEST ACCESS: * You are renting the entire house, so you'll have full access to the house (bedrooms, bathroom, living room, kitchen, laundry room/porch), and back deck. INTERACTION WITH GUESTS: *Self check-in with a lock box, or upon your request I can meet you at the house to check you in. I'm always available/on-call if any needs arise. I live just a few miles away. GETTING AROUND THE AREA: * Centrally located near downtown San Jose and within a few blocks of bus routes, and easy freeway access. Approximately 10 minutes from SJC airport. Parking for 1 standard-size vehicle or SUV in the driveway, and street parking available as well. Quiet outside after 8pm.  No exceptions. * Access is limited to the dwelling, front yard, driveway area in front of the driveway gate, and the fenced deck area outside the back door. Prohibited areas include the basement, fenced area behind the driveway gate, and the rear guest house/garage. * Parking in the driveway is limited to one (1) standard-size vehicle or SUV, which must be parked in such a manner as to allow unobstructed walking access to the driveway gate. Street parking is also available.

name: SUNNY  2BR 2B DECKS VUS RENT CONTROL
body: VIRTUAL VIDEO AVAILABLE FIRST Quiet pet friendly 2 bedroom 2 bath flat (direct access) with wood burning fireplace, hardwood floors throughout, compact galley kitchen, sunny south bedroom windows, north-facing floor to ceiling door windows in spacious combined living/dining room with deck outside. Direct access through secured gate and up one flight of stairs from the street so no interior hallways. Roof deck above shared with other units with spectacular views of Bay, Golden Gate Bridge and City (views shown are from roof deck). On quiet, dead-end street off Grant Avenue. All electric kitchen, including microwave.  There is lots of closet space including full wall to ceiling closets in both bedrooms, three closets in the hall and kitchen and storage above. The bedrooms are almost of equal size.The living/dining room is quite large also. Lots of storage.  One full bath with shower and tub is off the hall. The other has a shower, sink and toilet and is off one of the bedrooms. Forced air gas-fired heater provides heat throughout; the unit has its own separate water heater. Landlord pays garbage and water. PETS OK for $25 each. Washer and dryer are steps away on same level off the stairs. One year lease. RENT CONTROLLED.  Available May 1. Email to see; no application fee but applications taken on first come first served basis with deposit of $500 returned if not accepted; decision within 1 day of credit check. Parking in garage available for $400/month. Security deposit =rent plus $1000

name: Top Floor Apartment! Great Layout! Hardwood Floors!
body:
This apartment is stunning! Located in our south building, this apartment with be prefect for those looking for a bright apartment with stellar views of the city.

Call ahead or walk in, we are happy to show you around!

Welcome home to One Henry Adams! Located in San Francisco's newest emerging neighborhood, surrounded by brownstone buildings, with a New York, SoHo vibe!

A stunning rooftop terrace with skyline views, a 24-hour private fitness center, and a clubhouse built for entertaining are some of the many amenities that welcome residents to One Henry Adams Apartments. Outside, a landscaped pedestrian mews divides the north and south residences, providing a sophisticated retreat from the bustling city surroundings. Inside, our spacious homes feature Caesarstone quartz countertops, iridescent glass tile backsplashes, stainless steel appliances and 9-foot ceilings. Select apartments include oversized sliding glass partitions which, combined with the floor-to-ceiling windows, create an incredible sense of space. Whether you select a studio, 1, 2, or 3 bedroom, all of the homes at One Henry Adams present an urban living experience without comparison.

name: Updated 2 BR | Pet Friendly | Great Location
body:
2360 Van Ness

Experience the epitome of urban living in this newly remodeled and comfortable 1BR apartment with a brand new kitchen and a bathroom located in one of San Francisco's most exclusive neighborhoods Russian Hill/Cow Hollow, steps from Polk and Union Streets with numerous cafes, restaurants, bars, boutique shopping and with easy access to Muni.

2360 Van Ness offers the architectural charms of old San Francisco. The pet-friendly apartments feature updated kitchen and baths with granite counters, sleek cabinets and stainless steel appliances including microwaves and dishwashers. Close proximity to the Presidio, Palace of Fine Arts and Chrissy Field make it an ideal spot for, well, pretty much everyone.

name: Beautifully Renovated 1 Br |  Pet Friendly | Top Floor| No Laundry
body:
17 Decatur 

A rare SOMA stunner, 17 Decatur is a quaint pet-friendly building offering the perfect mix of classic San Francisco architecture and modern amenities. Gorgeous wainscoted walls, deep picture rails and built in display cabinets nicely complement modern open plan kitchens with sleek cabinets, granite counters, and stainless steel appliances. The 8 unit building offers studio and 1 bedroom apartments. It is located in close proximity to CalTrans and several Muni Bus lines, with easy access to Mission Bay, South Park and the Dogpatch.

name: Special offer on 2 bedroom at Avalon Mission Bay
body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.
 
 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. On-site retail, including Chase Bank and Bark Avenue Doggy Daycare, along with nearby Safeway, Bluxome Street Winery, Lucky Strike, and Alexander's Steakhouse, puts shopping, dining, and entertainment within reach.Rent: $4740Bedrooms: 2Bathrooms: 2Apartment Features:Patio/ Balcony*High-speed InternetGreen ApartmentStainless Appliances*Floor-to-ceiling Windows*Wood Floors*Washer/ DryerCommunity Amenities:Public TransportationWiFiHigh-speed InternetFully-equipped kitchenLoungeStainless Appliances*BarbecueCall us! show contact info
To learn more about this unit, visit us at www.avalon-communities.com/avalon-mission-bayPrices and availability are subject to change.

name: INCREDIBLE TOP FLOOR MARINA STUDIO!!!
body:
2665 Chestnut Street, #11 at Lyon Street

- One of a kind, top floor studio in gorgeous twelve-unit 1920’s Marina building 
- Beautiful, totally updated eat-in kitchen with granite counters, cherry wood cabinets, and all stainless steel appliances
- Gorgeous three tone paint from top to bottom
- Two hall closets including one walk-in 
- Stunning hardwood floors throughout
- Vinyl, double-paned windows throughout 
- Water, garbage and steamed heat included in rent
- Coin operated laundry onsite

name: 2 BR Flat- New HW Floors Near BART & Rainbow Grocery!
body:
We have a great 2 bedroom flat available! It's located on the top floor. Getting the best view out of all the units.

Both bedroom are a good size with personal closet. There is a also a window for ventilation and sunlight. Brand new wardwood floors run through out the entire flat. Be the first to break it in. The flat has a nice long hallway that connects all the rooms together and run the entire length of the building with access to the back shared concrete patio.

The bathroom has a sink and shower combo with sink and cabinet. The toilet is in it's own separate room and window. So it's great if someone is using the shower you can still use the toilet without waiting.

As you move further down you have the best part of the flat. The giant kitchen. Much larger than most apartments and can comfortably fit a dining table and still leave a lot of room for guests to mingle around. Almost a focal point for entertainment. New granite counter tops and natural wood cabinets makes the kitchen stands out.

The flat is located in a great part of the Mission. Only a few blocks to 16th Street BART, Food Co., Rainbow Grocery, Best Buy and Office Max. There are also a lot of places to eat just within in 3 blocks such as sushi, BBQ, Mexican, ect.. The freeway on ramp to Oakland or San Jose is conveniently just two blocks away! The Mission gets really good weather and you never get fog here compared to the other SF neighborhoods. Great location, nice weather and spacious flat. What more can you ask for?

Other Details 
- 1st month $3100 and deposit required.
- Credit report required, $25 credit report fee if you don't have one.
- Washers & dryers located in the basement. 
- No dogs and cats please. 
- Annual lease then goes month to month. 

No garage but street parking is available. The photos is from a similar unit. (Pardon the sideway photos.) You have to see the apartment for yourself.  It is available now! If you are interested contact Mary at  
 to set up a viewing.

Thank you!

1476 15th Street, cross South Van Ness

 to text our team directly.Center Yourself This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1374 Sq. Ft.  When you want to experience a city in its fullest and most vibrant, find its heart and discover its mind. Be in the center of where the big decisions are made, milestones are celebrated and where the arts are taken to new heights. Located in downtown San Francisco's bustling Civic Center district, Argenta puts you in the definitive position to do it all. You'll be within two blocks of City Hall, UN Plaza, Symphony Hall, the Opera House and City Auditorium. Inside your apartment, you'll experience a true quieting of the mind.Our modern concept has the clean lines, smart details and designer finishes to give you a flawless, light-filled urban sanctuary. Features - Incredibly spacious walk-in closets*  - Marble counter tops  - European design inspired bathroom  - European design is the inspiration  - Hardwood Style Floors  - Floor to ceiling windows  - Stainless steel GE appliances  - Caesarstone counter tops  - Berber style carpeting  - Custom window treatments  - Modern Kitchen(s)  - Rain forest style shower heads  - Frosted glass kitchen cabinets Community Amenities - Rated a "Walker's Paradise"  - Transport network is steps away  - 20 stories of modern architecture  - Garage parking is available  - Private garden terrace  - State of the art fitness center  - Resident lounge  - Stunning bay and city views Office Hours Monday - Friday: 9:00am - 6:00pmSaturday 10:00am - 5:00pmSunday 12:00pm - 5:00pm Pet Policy $500.00 Pet Deposit $75.00 per month Income Requirements: o The last two current and consecutive pay stubs from your current employer.o In the case of a recent job change (fewer than two pay stubs), last year's W-2(s) plus the mostrecent pay stub from current employer will be accepted.o If applicable, you may provide an order of alimony or child support. If no order exists, butalimony or child support is collected, three months' most recent consecutive bank statements (orcheck copies) showing regular deposits of alimony, or child support can be provided.o Irregular additional income that does not appear on your pay stub, such as gratuities,commissions, etc., may be counted only with verifiable documentation (i.e., tax returns). body:
This Lower Pacific Heights 2 Bedrooms, 1 Bath apartment available now for rent, near Geary Blvd and Baker St., 94115.

This apartment is a ground floor unit of a 2 unit building. It features an open kitchen/living room layout, hardwood flooring, granite counter top and stainless steel appliances. name: Redesigned Garden Home w/Laundry and Private Patio
body:
This home is unique as part of a historic building steps away from Fillmore and Divisadero Streets. Enter the gated front yard and find a peaceful outdoor space hidden in the City's best neighborhood. Charming features from 140 years ago were retained while the home was updated for current living with new cabinets, counters, appliances, in-unit laundry and radiant heating.

Street parking is easy with a $150 annual permit. Corporate shuttles, MUNI 1 California and cabs are always available within 1 block. The owner lives on site and is available as needs arise. Utilities are paid by the tenant and are low cost because of the efficient upgrades done to the home. Easy to show with a few hours notice. Please email with your cell number. This furnished home is available for 30 days or more. More photos and reviews can be found here:  https://www.vrbo.com/834413?unitId=1382352

name: The True Meaning of Luxury and Convenience!!
body:
Fox Plaza Apartments is pleased to offer virtual tours of our homes. With the rapidly evolving Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation, we have updated our business practices based on the Federal State of Emergency and the local Shelter in Place ordinance. Therefore, we have temporarily ceased all in-person property tours with prospective residents and instead, we invite you to visit our website to virtually walk through one of our beautiful homes. 

We also invite you to call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual tour with one of our leasing professionals. We can give you specific information about individual homes and also get you scheduled for a self-guided tour.

Convenience, Rent Control, and Modern Living! What More Could You Want? Fox Plaza has this and more! 

Living at Fox Plaza makes life so much easier. Walk outside and your steps away from Muni, Bart, and highway 101. It makes getting to work a breeze!
We are located in the dynamic downtown Hub neighborhood. Just outside your door, enjoy a variety of restaurants and cafés in Hayes Valley, catch a show at the SF Orpheum Theater or venture further to shop at the notable Union Square.

From the moment you walk through the front door you'll feel the comfort and serenity that makes our residents happy to call us home. Where else can you get fantastic views from all angles and one or more private balconies? Fox Plaza is where! Our homes feature sleek white cabinets, Caesarstone counter tops, efficient stainless-steel appliances, a spacious open floor plan, vinyl plank flooring and full length and/or spacious walk in closets.

As a valued resident, take advantage of our 24- hour state of the art fitness center to achieve your health goals! Wash multiple loads at once in our 24/7 laundry room. Don't want to hang out there watching your clothes? No worries. There's an app to inform you that your load is finished. Best of all we are pet friendly! :)

Stop by and take a look at the newly renovated One Bedroom, #1509. This beautiful home awaits you for a discounted rate of only $3,055 on a 12-month lease! Don’t let this opportunity pass you by! 

Community also includes:

• Starbucks
• Andersen's Bakery
• USPS
• Secure Garage Parking – discounted rate for residents

1390 Market St Ste. 107
San Francisco, CA 94102

Looking for more information? Find us at: http://www.essexfoxplaza.com/

name: Large Room Available in Sunny, Central 3BR/1BA Cow Hollow Apartment!!
body:
One of our roommates will be moving to New York & we are looking for a 3rd person to renew our lease with, on this amazinggg 3 bedroom apartment!! Here are all the details and a bit about us!

The Location: In the heart of Cow Hollow/ Marina. Cross streets are Pierce & Filbert! In a residential, quiet, safe area where you’re walking distance from: Union Street, Chestnut Street, Fort Mason, Crissy Field, Palace of Fine Arts, lots of workout studios, gyms, bars, restaurants. Also a block away from tech shuttle stops! We LOVE the location.

The Apartment/Your Room: This is a 3 bedroom/ 1 bath apartment in a 2-unit building. Our upstairs neighbor is a sweet elderly lady :) You would have a spacious bedroom that fits a queen bed, dresser, nightstand & has a closet. The room can come unfurnished or furnished with a queen bedframe & mini couch. The apartment has all new kitchen appliances, dishwasher, 2 (!!) ovens, pantry space &  lots of cupboards, stacked washer & dryer in - unit, a kitchen dining area, a backyard patio, hallway closet & a sunny street-facing living room

Details: The monthly rate is $1700/mo, Security deposit is $2900, the lease is a year long & would start on May 24, and all utilities come out to about $100 per person per month given this is only a 2-unit building. Move in date is flexible, rent would be paid for the first of the month. Please be prepared to fill out an application for the landlord (includes credit report, proof of income, etc!) 

The Roommates: Two gals in their mid-twenties looking for another gal to join our space who is employed, doesn’t work remote, social, respectful of common spaces/cleans up after herself,  and doesn’t bring the party home! We keep our home quiet during the week, and while we both enjoy doing our own things on the weekend, we’re down for chill nights in together.
We’ve been in this apartment for a year now and love it!

A bit about each of us:
Alex - 23, works in tech, typical 9 - 5 schedule with the occasional WFH Friday, out and about on the weekends in the city and exploring the beautiful state of California, loves soul cycle and corepower yoga, painting, reading, taking long walks along Crissy Field, going to farmers markets, and happy hours with friends. 

Britt - 25, works in consulting, currently travels M-Th/F about two weeks out of the month and works from home the rest of the time, but that travel schedule is always subject to change, enjoys going out with friends on the weekend, hiking, cooking/baking, reading, lots of tv and movie binges, and traveling. 

Please message & share a bit about yourself if you’re interested (please include social/linkedin links) - looking forward to meeting you!

name: Spacious 1 Bedroom, Hardwood Floors! Great Location!
body:
Wonderful 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment in a great location near transportation, shops and cafes! Hardwood floors throughout, updated kitchen and bathroom. Kitchen has room for a table. Bathroom has a shower over tub. Lots of storage! Must See!

Additional Lease Terms:
Minimum one year lease. Security deposit is 1.5 times the monthly rent. $30 application fee per applicant. Proof of income required. Tenants pay PG&E and Internet/Cable, Water & Garbage is included.

A little more about the Richmond District:
The Richmond has abundant outdoor opportunities for those who enjoy bundling up on foggy days. Both Ocean Beach and Golden Gate Park are within easy reach, and a good portion of the area has wide streets and relatively flat terrain for biking and walking. Several Muni bus lines serve the area, including the 38 Geary and the 1 California. Both the 38 and the 1 offer express buses to the Financial District during commute hours.

Hikers head to the Lands End Trail, which meanders along the cliffs above the sea, past the Sutro Baths and the Legion of Honor. Numerous walking and jogging paths crisscross adjacent Golden Gate Park. At the private Lincoln Park Golf Club, golfers enjoy lovely ocean views from every hole.

Cultural opportunities abound in this neighborhood as well. The Legion of Honor in Lincoln Park features art from around the world. The popular art-house Balboa Theatre regularly shows second- and third-run Euro and independent flicks. Golden Gate Park’s renowned museums are just a short drive or bus ride away.

Contact:
Susan Lucas

name: Stunning Home! Prime Potrero Hill! Shops, Cafes & More!
body:
93 WALK SCORE! This remodeled, spacious San Francisco home features high end finishes, top of the line appliances and state of the entertainment and sound systems. The first floor has an amazing flow between the entryway, dining room, living room, gourmet chefs kitchen and sunny office alcove. Step through double glass doors off the kitchen to enjoy the unbeatable three level 1250 square foot deck. The deck is lined with citrus trees, olive trees, and other low maintenance foliage. A DCI Outdoor Built-In BBQ with prep space is the perfect finish for sunny Potrero Hill afternoons. 

Climb the stairs to enjoy amazing city views from any of the three rooms. Each bedroom has grass cloth lined closets with lights that illuminate when the doors are open. The third room has a projection screen TV and state of the art sound system that replaces the need to ever go to the movies. Although this makes an amazing media room, it can also be used as a bedroom. There is also a hallway closet with the same grass cloth, light, and design features. The upstairs full bathroom is finished with marble floors, double faucets, and a shower with an unbeatable rain shower head. 

Garage is accessed through the back yard and can not only fit an SUV sized car, but has ample storage. This is where you will find the top of the line Miele washer and drier pair. 

Design Features:
-Perfect condition hardwood floors
-Custom cut carpets in living room, dinning room, stairs, one of the bedrooms and the media room
-Gas fireplace
-Top of the line windows
-Bay window in dinning room
-Skylights on both floors
-Dimmers throughout house
-Closets have grass cloth and lighting 
-Bathroom has euro toilets

Appliances:
-Thermador Freedom Towers, Fridge and Freezer
-96 bottle Wine Towers in kitchen
-Viking Range
-Bosch dishwasher
-Miele Washer and Dryer 

Entertainment Features:
-Ceiling speakers in all rooms downstairs (outdoor Sonos speakers)
-96 Inch Projection Screen with Dolby 5 Channel Surround Home Theater
-Mirror TV in dinning room
-Sonos 

The location of this home is equally important. On the north slope of Potrero Hill, the home offers an easy walk to many neighborhood shops and well known restaurants (Chez Maman, Umi, Plow, Serpentine, The Ramp, Mission Rock). 15 min walk to the Giants ballpark! Near UCSF Mission Bay and Chase Center!!!

The home is located near 101 and 280 freeways. The East Bay and the Peninsula are also easily accessible. More importantly - Caltrain is a 4 min cab or a 20 min walk, downtown San Francisco is a 5 min drive or a 25 min walk, public transportation (BUS) is within two blocks and BART is a 5 min Uber ride from the home.

Additional Lease Terms:
Tenant to pay all utilities. Minimum one year lease. Security deposit is 1.5 times monthly rent. $40.00 application fee per applicant. Proof of income required.

Contact:
Susan Lucas
Compass Property Management

name: Great Nob Hill Location! Near Transportation!
body:
Live in the center of it all!! This rarely available Nob Hill 1 Bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment is situated conveniently between the Financial District, Marina and Nob Hill. Just 1 block from the hot Polk Street. This apartment features carpet in the living room and bedroom, ample sunlight, a huge living room and closet space galore! The building features laundry, an elevator and a beautiful private rooftop with an amazing bridge to bridge views overlooking the beautiful bay!

Additional Lease Terms:
Minimum one-year lease. Security deposit is 1.5 times the monthly rent. $30 application fee per applicant. Proof of income required. Tenant pays Gas/Electric and Internet /Cable.

Transportation:
To Financial District: The #1 bus picks up just outside the apartment building on Clay/Larkin and takes approximately 14 minutes to central Financial District.
To SoMa: The #27 and #19 bus and takes about 20 minutes to arrive in SoMa.
Tech Shuttles: Pick up on Van Ness Avenue, just 2 blocks away.

name: Great Neighborhood! Cozy & Quiet! Renovated!
body:
Quiet 1 bedroom, 1 bath with hardwood floors throughout.  Renovated kitchen with room for a breakfast table.  Separate laundry area with washer/dryer.  Shower over tub in the bathroom.

Additional Lease Terms:
Lease term minimum of 12 months. Security deposit is 1.5 times the monthly rent. $30.00 application fee per applicant. Proof of income required. Tenant pays all utilities. Cats and Dogs considered with additional deposit.

A little more about Russian Hill:
Dazzling views, the hairpin turns down brick-paved Lombard Street, and the Hyde-Powell cable cars make iconic Russian Hill a favorite with tourists. Locals savor the steep garden walks, the tiny pocket parks, and Swensen's Ice Cream on the corner of Union and Hyde streets. Despite the steep streets, Russian Hill is a highly walkable urban enclave, with many residents able to commute to work on foot.  

Restaurants and boutiques along the tree-lined Hyde Street between Jackson and Union streets exude European charm. Polk and Green streets boast international cuisine — Abrazo, Eight AM, The Italian Homemade, Berber, Leopold's and Cafe de Casa to name a few.

name: SPACIOUS 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath w/Two Large Closets!
body:
Very spacious one bedroom apartment with two large walk in closets, CAN BE USED AS A 2 BEDROOM. Apartment is located in the back of the building with lots of natural light. Hardwood floors through. Bathroom has a shower over tub. Kitchen has room for a breakfast table. Lots of transportation options! 96 Walk Score!

Additional Lease Terms:
Lease term minimum of 12 months. Security deposit is equal to 1.5 month's rent. $30.00 application fee per applicant. Proof of income required. Tenant pays all utilities except trash and garbage. Cat OK with additional deposit.

A little more about Lower Pacific Heights:
Between California Street and Geary Boulevard and Presidio Avenue and Gough Streets lies Lower Pacific Heights, a new name for an old neighborhood. This community boasts a central location, proximity to Muni bus lines (the 1 California, the 2 Clement, the 3 Jackson, the 22 Fillmore, and the 38 Geary), and great shopping along the main axis, Fillmore Street. 

Ethnically and economically diverse, the neighborhood offers a buffet of city living. Residents can choose from the nightlife along Fillmore Street, including blues venue Boom Boom Room; Japantown and its extraordinary urban mall offering restaurants and specialty retail stores; recently renovated Lafayette Park; and the sunny, spacious, and welcoming Yoga Works on Divisadero Street, where another business district offers a range of restaurants and bars.

*Living Room and Bedroom Photos were digitally staged*

CONTACT:
SUSAN LUCAS

body:
Currently, we are only conducting virtual tours. Please contact us to view the homes you are interested in.  Welcome to L Seven Call Now -  
 This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 982 Sq. Ft.  At L Seven Apartments, we strive to build, create, and perfect everything we touch. We know brilliant minds need space, but also need to connect interact with each other. That's why we've curated a space for you to live, sleep, work, and play.Find the perfect brand new apartment that truly expresses your personality. Start by selecting the studio, one or two bedroom apartment that fits your lifestyle. Then personalize your new space by choosing which of our four unique finish packages inspires you. Each home features polished quartz counters, custom kitchen tile backsplashes, stainless steel appliances, wood-inspired plank or concrete flooring, expansive windows, and much more. Features: Kitchen Tile Backsplash, Comcast Internet Blast Package and HD Digital Cable, Private Direct Access Garage*, Polished Quartz Countertops, In-home Front Loading Washer and Dryer, USB Charging Outlets, Wood Look Plank Flooring or Polished Concrete Flooring in Living Areas, Four Custom Finish Packages, Views of Downtown San Francisco*, Keyless Entry Front Door  Community Amenities: Rooftop BBQ Terrace with Outdoor Heating and City Views, Fitness Center with Variety of Strength and Cardio Equipment Plus TRX Wall, Private Conference and Meeting Rooms, Resident Lounge Featuring Hospitality Station, Coworking Spaces, and Complimentary WiFi, Leed Silver Certified Community, Underground Parking Garage with Elevators, Rooftop Game Lounge with Ping Pong, Scrabble, and Life Sized Connect Four, Rooftop Firepit Lounge with Built-in Seating, Rooftop Beer Garden with Kegerator, Green Wall, and Outdoor Television  Pet Policy: We welcome you & your best friend, too!Looking for a new home for you & your pet? We are one of the few pet friendly communities in the area & enthusiastically welcome you & your pet (some restrictions apply).Pet Overview: Dogs & cats, including puppies & kittens under 1 year, are welcome at our community. Pet residents must have their health check & shots, and be spayed or neutered by 6 months of age. A signed animal addendum is required to be on file at our leasing office. Two (2) max pets allowed.Fee, Deposit and Pet Rent: $500 pet refundable deposit. Pet rent is $75 per month. (All fees, deposits and charges noted above are per pet.)Additional Details: We also welcome your domestic pet if it is a bird or fish with written approval from our onsite management team. No reptiles or exotic animals please. Fish tanks are not to exceed 55 gallons.Support Animals: If the animal is a service animal for a disabled person, pet deposits are not necessary & breed restrictions do not apply. A signed Letter Regarding Support Animals from a qualified professional verifying the need for the service animal along with proof of current rabies shots and licenses (if legally applicable) is required.Breed Restrictions: We welcome all breeds of dogs, except the following breed or mixed breed: Akita, Alaskan Malamute, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Husky, Pit Bull Terriers*, Rottweiler, Saint Bernard & Wolf Dog Hybrids.* (including all Pit Bull breeds - American Pit Bull Terriers, American or Irish Staffordshire Terriers, Bull Terriers, Pit Bulls, American Bull Dogs, & Presa Canario.) We reserve the right to add additional restricted breeds at any time. Interested In This Unit? body:
ID#1800: Marina Furnished 1BR+Office/1BA Condo w/Terrace, Storage, Parking

This tastefully furnished condominium is on the top floor of a Mediterranean style 4-unit building. Located on one of the finest blocks in the Marina, 1 block to the Marina Green. Great condition w/period detailing. Large living room w/high ceilings, 4 large picture windows and direct access to a small private home office. Formal dining room w/built-in book shelves leads to a private terrace and to the fully-equipped kitchen w/stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Spacious bedroom w/2 large windows and an organized walk-in closet. Updated bathroom has a shower/tub and stacked Bosch washer/dryer. Hardwood floors throughout. 1-car parking and a large private storage included. Sorry, no pets.

name: 2.5 BR, 2 BA Newly Renovated Designer Condo
body:
The unit is a 2-level townhouse and features 2.5 bedrooms (incl. bonus office room), 2 full baths, 3 outdoor patios (with outdoor grill), covered garage for one car, and receives sunlight all day. The unit is offered unfurnished, partially furnished or fully furnished. It is available starting May 1, 2020 and requires a minimum 12-month lease (longer leases will be considered).

Located in the heart of trendy Upper Fillmore district, Lower Pacific Heights - Walkscore 98. Surrounded by shops, high-end retail stores, art galleries, cafes, 5-star restaurants, gourmet groceries, music venues, movie theaters, pharmacies, post office and many other conveniences.

The unit recently underwent a $250K renovation to fit new designer kitchen, living room and bathrooms. Kitchen renovations include custom cabinets, designer Italian lighting, ceasterstone countertops, and top-end appliances. Bathroom renovations include Duravitt Starck wall hung toilets, in-wall flushes, customer cabinetry, hand crafted contemporary sinks, tiling by Porcelenosa, and fittings by Brizio Siderna. One of the bathrooms has a jacuzzi tub and the other has a custom shower setup that includes a rain-shower, body jets and a hand-shower. The house has been fitted with high end accent dimmable LED lighting, including accent lighting under the custom cabinets and bar island.

This house has a wood burning fireplace, three patios and receives sunlight all day. There is also an outdoor grill. Total square footage is 1,400 (not including patios). There is also a new high capacity washer dryer.

The house is wired for high speed Comcast internet and cable. The house is fitted with Sonance® 7.1 in-wall speaker system with a sub-woofer.

For those interested in the partially/fully furnished options, the beds have TempurPedic® mattresses and the living room includes a zero-gravity chair and has a 60" SmartTV. The house can also come equipped with Sonos® sound system and a Universal remote control.

Price: $6,295 per month. Covered garage space is $295 per month extra, but is negotiable with length of lease.

The unit is offered unfurnished, partially furnished or fully furnished. It is available starting May 1, 2020 and requires a minimum 12-month lease (longer leases will be considered).

Located in the heart of trendy Upper Fillmore district, Lower Pacific Heights - Walkscore 98. Surrounded by shops, high-end retail stores, art galleries, cafes, 5-star restaurants, gourmet groceries, music venues, movie theaters, pharmacies, post office and many other conveniences.

The unit recently underwent a $250K renovation to fit new designer kitchen, living room and bathrooms. Kitchen renovations include custom cabinets, designer Italian lighting, ceasterstone countertops, and top-end appliances. Bathroom renovations include Duravitt Starck wall hung toilets, in-wall flushes, customer cabinetry, hand crafted contemporary sinks, tiling by Porcelenosa, and fittings by Brizio Siderna. One of the bathrooms has a jacuzzi tub and the other has a custom shower setup that includes a rain-shower, body jets and a hand-shower. The house has been fitted with high end accent dimmable LED lighting, including accent lighting under the custom cabinets and bar island.

This house has a wood burning fireplace, three patios and receives sunlight all day. There is also an outdoor grill. Total square footage is 1,400 (not including patios). There is also a new high capacity washer dryer.

The house is wired for high speed Comcast internet and cable. The house is fitted with Sonance® 7.1 in-wall speaker system with a sub-woofer.

For those interested in the partially/fully furnished options, the beds have TempurPedic® mattresses and the living room includes a zero-gravity chair and has a 60" SmartTV. The house can also come equipped with Sonos® sound system and a Universal remote control.

Price: $6,295 per month. Covered garage space is $295 per month extra, but is negotiable with length of lease.

body:
