** PLEASE NOTE **
Private viewing available, email us for details:
when responding please include a short note stating the total number of people in your party, their relationship to you, and your employment situation/source of income. we are seeking tenants with good credit and references. thanks.
--------------

Tired of the high prices in SOMA? Live in one of SF's most vibrant, diverse and evolving neighborhoods - Silver Terrace- in this high quality, newly remodeled home. 

The home:
* open kitchen features new granite counters, beautiful wood cabinets
* all new stainless steel GE/Whirlpool appliances: gas range/hood, dishwasher, fridge + disposal
* open plan living room and kitchen, with dining area
* private patio plus a shared yard with fruit trees!
* freshly painted with custom colors
* beautiful wood like plank flooring, tile in bath
* large master bedroom, 14' x 10.5'
* spacious bathroom with storage cabinets
* remodeled in 2019
* unit ~ 515 square feet and very well laid out
* well maintained, secure 3 unit building with respectful professional tenants
* washer and dryer in building
* quiet and friendly street
* 1 off street parking pad spot available for $125 per month
* secure storage space available for $50 per month
* sorry no pets/animals; non-smokers only, pleased
* available now

VIDEO TOUR: https://youtu.be/q6Z8ZlrRZMw

About Silver Terrace:
* rapidly evolving neighborhood with hip cafes, new restaurants, cultural and nature based amenities
* 1 block to the 3rd Street T-Line which takes you straight to Downtown, Dogpatch nightlife/dining, UCSF Mission Bay Bio-Medical Campus, CalTrain Station at 4th/Townsend. S.F. Bus lines 23, 24, 44, 54 very close by. 
* easy access to 101 and 280 freeways, and SFO airport
* walking distance to: Starbucks coffee, Flora Grubb Gardens/Ritual Coffee, All Good Pizza, Roadhouse coffee, Bayview Opera House, Tato, Radio Africa Kitchen, several cool Microbreweries, Walgreens, supermarkets, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, post office, the new Bayview Library, etc., etc.
* one of SF's sunniest neighborhoods!
* awesome parks and green spaces nearby like: Heron Head Eco Park, Bayview Park, Candlestick Point Rec Area, India Basin Shoreline Park.
* massive new high end developments coming online nearby in The Shipyard, Candlestick Park, Warriors new stadium and Pier 70, which will make the southern area of SF vibrant with new retail, housing and fantastic parks reaching the bay.
* Bayview won CurbedSF 2016 and last year's 2015 neighborhood of the year awards!
2016: http://sf.curbed.com/2017/1/3/14154404/san-francisco-neighborhood-year-bayview
2015: http://sf.curbed.com/archives/2016/01/04/all_hail_bayview_the_curbed_cup_neighborhood_of_the_year.php
-------------

** PLEASE NOTE **
Private viewing available, email us for details:
when responding please include a short note stating the total number of people in your party, their relationship to you, and your employment situation/source of income. we are seeking tenants with good credit and references. thanks.

name: JUST RENTED: THE TOWERS | Two-Level 3BR/3BA Townhome |
body:
JUST RENTED 

The Towers is a luxury condo building across the street from Oracle Park. Built in 2000, the building offers luxurious resort-style amenities, including a heated outdoor pool and spa, a sun deck with a full BBQ, fire pit, and heat lamps. Residents also enjoy a private fitness center, conference room, business center, and entertainment room. The location is prime. It's located just a block from Embarcadero waterfront, entertainment, amazing restaurants, Safeway, and Whole Foods. Easy access to major freeways, Caltrain, shuttles, and Muni. Live across the street from the World Champion San Francisco Giants!

3D Virtual Tour:  https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=QBMqiWojubw

KEY FEATURES:

Year Built: 2000
Sq Footage: 1,575 sqft (approx).
Bedrooms: 3 Bed
Bathrooms: 3 Bath
Lease Duration: 12 to 16 months
Parking: $300/mo
Deposit: $7,199
Pet Policy: Small dogs OK 
Property Type: Townhome

This luxury 2-level townhome features three bedrooms and three baths, an open floor concept, stainless steel appliances, and very own private entrance in addition to the main entrance through the building. The main level boasts vaulted ceilings and hardwood floors and features a living room, dining area, kitchen, bedroom, and bath. French doors open to an outdoor patio. The second level features dual closets and ample space. Another two bedrooms and two full baths complete the upper floor. All bedrooms feature floor to ceiling bay windows.

UNIT FEATURES: 

•	Birch hardwood floors throughout the first floor; carpet on the second level
•	Floor-to-celling windows 
•	Kitchen features European wood cabinets, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances, walk-in pantry
•	Full laundry room
•	Large private patio off the living room
•	Closet space with ample storage 

COMMUNITY FEATURES: 

•	24h hour attended lobby
•	Fitness center
•	Business center and conference room
•	An outdoor pool and hot tub
•	Sun deck with barbecue and fire pit
•	Clubroom

LEASE TERMS:

• 12 to 16-month lease
• Parking $300/mo
• Security deposit $7,199
• Owner pays for trash, sewer, water, and internet
• Tenant responsible for gas/electric
• Tenant pays The Towers Move In/Move Out Fees

* To see other available rentals go to https://www.compass.com/agents/milan-jezdimirovic/. Scroll down to "Milan Jezdimirovic’s Listings"

Milan Jezdimirovic
Compass, CalBRE 01975028

Compass, CalBRE 02038642

name: Quartz Countertops, Free Wi-Fi In Common Area Locations
body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals. Welcome to VaraCall Now -  
 x 70OR Text 70 to  show contact info
 for more information. This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 695 Sq. Ft.  Welcome to Vara, a stylish residential community featuring new studio, 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom apartments in San Francisco's Mission District. Spacious layouts and premium amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options. Are you looking for an apt for rent in San Francisco? Enjoy the perks of interior features such as gourmet kitchens with hardwoodstyle cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and beautiful quartz countertops. Just steps from your door you can take advantage of community features like a tech room for getting work done, a courtyard for socializing and lounging, and a state-of-the-art fitness center for working out. Vara is a chic retreat located in one of San Francisco's most desirable neighborhoods. Welcome home.  Features: Gourmet Kitchen With Hardwood-Style Cabinets In 4 Finish Options And Stainless Steel Basin Sink With Pullout Spray Faucet, Quartz Countertops, Many Floor Plans With Flex Space (Extra Bedroom, Office, Den Or Expanded Living Space), Private Patios Or Balconies*, Hardwood-Style Plank Flooring, Variety Of Unique Floorplans, Some Featuring Lofts And / Or Dens, In-Home Washers And Dryers, High Ceilings, Expansive Double Pane Windows, Walk-In Closets*, Stainless Steel Appliances Including Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Glass Top Oven And Built-In Microwave, Vibrant San Francisco City Views*, Abundant Phone, TV And High-Speed Data Ports  *Varies By Floorplan And Location Community Amenities: Controlled Building Access, Storage Units Available, Close To BART And Muni, Walking Distance To Vibrant Mission District Shopping, Dining And Entertainment Options, Tech Room / Meeting Room With A Sound-Proof Music Practice Room And A Private Tele-Conference Room, Garage Parking With Car Lockers, Fitness Center With Health Club-Quality Equipment Including Built In Xbox 360 And Kinect System, Clubhouse With Catering Kitchen And Professional-Quality Bar With High End Sound System, Free Wi-Fi In Common Area Locations, Smoke-Free Community, Abundant Bicycle Parking And Bike Repair Shop Including Fully Equipped Workbench, Easy Access To Bay Bridge And 101 & 280 Freeways, Courtyard With Social Seating Areas, Barbecue, Lounge & Sunning Hill  Pet Policy: Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply) Interested in more information? body:
About This Home

The Hayes located at 55 Page Street is in the heart of the city. This beautiful Studio condominium has everything a sophisticated urban dweller desire. S/S appliances, in-Unit laundry, hardwood flrs, additional storage plus common area conveniences like 24hr lobby attendant, fitness center, and a 360 degree view roof deck. Hayes Valley is the cultural center of the city offers the best of San Francisco's culinary scene with world class restaurants, transportation, shopping, and nightlife.

name: 2.5 BR, 2 BA Newly Renovated Designer Condo
body:
The unit is a 2-level townhouse and features 2.5 bedrooms (incl. bonus office room), 2 full baths, 3 outdoor patios (with outdoor grill), covered garage for one car, and receives sunlight all day. The unit is offered unfurnished, partially furnished or fully furnished. It is available starting May 1, 2020 and requires a minimum 12-month lease (longer leases will be considered).

Located in the heart of trendy Upper Fillmore district, Lower Pacific Heights - Walkscore 98. Surrounded by shops, high-end retail stores, art galleries, cafes, 5-star restaurants, gourmet groceries, music venues, movie theaters, pharmacies, post office and many other conveniences.

The unit recently underwent a $250K renovation to fit new designer kitchen, living room and bathrooms. Kitchen renovations include custom cabinets, designer Italian lighting, ceasterstone countertops, and top-end appliances. Bathroom renovations include Duravitt Starck wall hung toilets, in-wall flushes, customer cabinetry, hand crafted contemporary sinks, tiling by Porcelenosa, and fittings by Brizio Siderna. One of the bathrooms has a jacuzzi tub and the other has a custom shower setup that includes a rain-shower, body jets and a hand-shower. The house has been fitted with high end accent dimmable LED lighting, including accent lighting under the custom cabinets and bar island.

This house has a wood burning fireplace, three patios and receives sunlight all day. There is also an outdoor grill. Total square footage is 1,400 (not including patios). There is also a new high capacity washer dryer.

The house is wired for high speed Comcast internet and cable. The house is fitted with Sonance® 7.1 in-wall speaker system with a sub-woofer.

For those interested in the partially/fully furnished options, the beds have TempurPedic® mattresses and the living room includes a zero-gravity chair and has a 60" SmartTV. The house can also come equipped with Sonos® sound system and a Universal remote control.

Price: $6,295 per month. Covered garage space is $295 per month extra, but is negotiable with length of lease.

name: STAGE 1075 | 2BR/2BA in Boutique Style Building | Virtual Tour
body:
Live in the heart of San Francisco! Largest 2 Bedroom floorplan in the building.

Stage 1075, a brand new luxury boutique-style building, is located at 1075 Market Street. The building is positioned at the intersection where SOMA, Civic Center and Hayes Valley meet. The city's famous cultural institutions, such as SF MOMA, Asian Art Museum, Bill Graham Civic Auditorium, SF Ballet and Opera are minutes away. Residents enjoy the convenience of walking to the farmers market, Union Square, shopping, restaurants, Target, Trader Joe', Westfield and much more. Chic and modern Proper Hotel with roof deck restaurant and bar is right across the street. Bart/Muni is on the same block as the building.

name: ONE RINCON |  2BR/2BA With City and Twin Peaks View | Virtual Tour
body:
One Rincon is a luxury condo complex on the apex of the Rincon Hill neighborhood of San Francisco. Completed in 2008, it was designed by architectural firm Solomon, Cordwell, Buenz, and Associates. The building soars to 60 stories and offers panoramic views of downtown, Bay Bridge, Twin Peaks, and Oracle Park. One Rincon combines the comforts of a luxury condo building with state-of-the-art amenities typically found at a world-class resort. This iconic development features fully glass exteriors, making it some of the most stylish in all of San Francisco. The building is situated next to South Beach and the Financial District, and it's just stepps away from the Ferry Building and all the major highway, as well as top-rated restaurants, such as Prospect, Waterbar, Epic, The Boulevard, Ozumo and Slanted Door.

 Unit is available furnished for $5,788 


 KEY FEATURES:

 Year Built: 2008
 Bedrooms: 2 Bed
 Bathrooms: 2 Bath
 Lease Duration: 12 to 15 months
 Parking: $300/mo
 Renting: Furnished or Unfurnished
 Pet Policy: No pets
 Floor: 18th
 Property Type: Condo

 UNIT FEATURES:

 * Floor-to-ceiling windows, northwest corner unit
 * Cherry hardwood floors throughout the living space, soft carpet in both bedrooms
 * Gourmet kitchen features granite counters, Bosch and Sub-Zero appliances including refrigerator, gas oven/range,
 dishwasher, microwave
 * The master bedroom features a spacious walk-in closet and includes a king bed
 * The second room can be used both as an office and guest bedroom
 * Washer and dryer in the unit
 * Balcony off the guest bedroom
 * Panoramic views of Twin Peaks and downtown from every room

 COMMUNITY FEATURES:

 * 24h doorman and concierge
 * Fitness center with steam rooms and showers
 * Gourmet barbecue area
 * Outdoor lap pool
 * Access to Uncle Harry’s lounge on the 49th floor of the Harrison
 * Social room with full kitchen

 LEASE TERMS:

 * 12 to 15 month lease
 * Parking $300/mo
 * Owner pays for trash, sewer, and water.
 * Tenant responsible for gas/electric
 * Application fee $42
 * Tenant pays One Rincon Move In/Move Out Fees

name: 1BR/1BA 26th & Mission Street! w/ Sunny Room/Hardwood Floors!
body:
This is a great one bedroom apartment. The apartment has new paint and energy efficient light bulbs installed. The heating system is a central gas furnace.

The bedroom also has long panoramic windows located along the top third of each of the window for additional air and privacy. Inside the bedroom is walk in closet with rods and long shelves for all you clothes and belongings. 

The bathroom is of full size with a tub and shower so you can have a refreshing shower in the morning or a soothing bath at night. Natural wooden cabinets give you a lot of space to store all your bathroom toiletries. 

The kitchen is a medium size with a full stove/oven, refrigerator/freezer and large sink. Natural wooden cabinets runs through the entire kitchen.  The granite countertop compliments the wooden cabinets nicely. There's even a space for a kitchen table.

The Mission has exploded over the past few years as the place to live. There are dozens of wonderful restaurants, plenty of inexpensive eateries, tons of shops, produce and grocery stores. This is a great place for Sunday brunch or shooting the breeze at local cafes. Live bands, bars, dance and art studios draw in fun and lively crowds. BART is 3 blocks away. 49 Mission and 26 Valencia is only a few blocks away. The shuttle buses for Google, Yahoo, Apple etc is only a few blocks away. The Mission is bicycle friendly with many bike lanes.

Water and garbage is included. You pay PG&E, phone, ect... No pets allowed. If interested please call Mary at  
 to schedule an appointment. Please bring a credit report to help speed up the process. Available now!
The address is:
3512- 26th Street #1, corner of Valencia.

name: Sunny Two Bedroom Flat with Panoramic City/ Ocean Views
body:
Come home to a tastefully renovated, sunny top floor flat with stunning panoramic views of the financial district, Bay Bridge, and ocean. Located in a charming Edwardian building on a quiet, tree-lined street minutes from downtown Noe Valley.

This unit features:

*High ceilings, period details, and open floor plan with natural light
*Two bedrooms (one approx 70 feet, suitable for a child or home office; adding wall to create a third bedroom is negotiable)
*South-facing sun room
*Direct access to expansive back yard with orange, plum, apricot, and peach trees.
*Third fully enclosed room with closet (no windows) that can be used as small office
*Bosch stainless steel appliances, Spanish style lighting and tile in kitchen
*Shared laundry in garage
*Parking in garage or driveway negotiable; street parking is also convenient
*Walk Score of 91
*Fenced dog parks and two playgrounds nearby

24-bus on corner
5 minute walk to downtown Noe Valley, Whole Foods, and-J line
15 minute walk to Safeway and downtown Bernal Heights
20 minute walk to downtown Glen Park, 24th St and Mission, and the Castro

Lease term is flexible. Serious applicants can submit a rental application (sensitive info can be omitted in first screen): https://jethiwangproperties.weebly.com/

Address is 4085 Cesar Chavez St, SF 94131 (please do not disturb tenants)

name: Sunny 2-bedroom Victorian w/ View Deck and Backyard
body:
This sunny, newly renovated Victorian is an urban oasis complete with a lush backyard and private deck with East Bay and skyline views.

Perched above the centrally located Castro, it’s steps from Corona Heights Park and a short walk to the vibrant Haight, Castro, Cole Valley and Noe Valley neighborhoods. Highways 280 and 101 are a 10-15 minute drive.

The two-bedroom, 1 bath unit has just been remodeled with new paint, flooring, bedroom windows, doors, deck, LED lighting, countertops, hardware, stainless steel appliances and more. The kitchen opens to a wraparound deck with east-facing Bay views. The exterior was repainted in 2015 and is framed by a succulent garden at the front entry and a shared rear backyard perfect for entertaining.

Rent includes shared access to a free washer and dryer in storage area.
Pets negotiable.
Parking is not included, but there is always ample street parking.

Contact for private contactless showing in line with COVID-19 public health orders.

Shared backyard

name: Alta Plaza Penthouse w/ Deck
body:
This exquisite condominium is perched at the top of a wonderful, historic shingled former mansion, in the heart of Pacific Heights, a block from the quaint shops and restaurants of Fillmore Street, and on Alta Plaza Park, facing west. The focal point of the apartment is the large, sheltered, west-facing terrace fronting the greenery of the Park. Two bedrooms and two bathrooms are at either end of this entire full-floor home. A bright kitchen with washer/dryer, generous dining room and inviting living room complete the layout. There is a separate storage unit and parking for one car with 240V outlet for charging.

This is priced at significant Covid-19 discount relative to previous rent rate.  Our bad luck is your good luck.   Send a message/email for viewing, we are scheduling individually for social distancing reasons.  We live close and obviously have flexibility due to circumstances, so please suggest a day/time and we can probably make it work.  

Video: https://youtu.be/gD16MbySiew

body:

This is a bright and sunny spacious extra large corner designer studio with Northern SF views particularly Presidio National Park. Unit features plenty of closet space, and double-pane sound reduction windows making the unit very quiet. Unit is located on the 3rd floor of a 6th story beautifully maintained 1920 Steel concrete building. Building has laundry facilities onsite, and elevator access to all floors. Other memorable features include newly refinished hardwood floors, bathroom with tub/shower, and spacious kitchen with granite countertop and dinette area and gas stove.In a great location, with great restaurants in abundance nearby on Clement St. Only minutes from downtown via the Geary Express.Close to USF, UCSF, Golden Gate Park, Kaiser Hospital, Restaurants, and Shopping. name: INFINITY| Furnished 1BR/1BA With Bridge View | 6 Months Lease
body:
Infinity is a luxury high-rise in South Beach neighborhood of San Francisco. It was originally designed by Heller Manus Architects and developed by Tishman Speyer. The Infinity combines the comforts of a luxury condo building with state-of-the-art amenities typically found at a world-class resort. This iconic development features fully glass exteriors, making it some of the most stylish in all of San Francisco. Situated one block away from the Embarcadero waterfront, the Infinity is steps away from the Ferry Building, Financial District, all the major highway, as well as top-rated restaurants, such as Prospect, Waterbar, Epic, The Boulevard, Ozumo and Slanted Door.


KEY FEATURES

Year Built: 2008
Sq Footage: 806 sqft (approx).
Bedrooms: 1 Bed
Bathrooms: 1 Bath
Lease Duration: 6 to 12 months
Parking: $250/mo
Deposit: $4,000
Pet Policy: No pets
Floor: 12th
Property Type: Condo

UNIT FEATURES:

•	Fully furnished, designer furniture
•	Partial water and bridge views from the living room and bedroom
•	Hardwood floor throughout living space, soft carpet in bedrooms
•	Gourmet kitchen with granite countertops, Studio Becker cabinetry, Bosch appliances
•	Bathrooms feature Studio Becker cabinetry
•	Ample closet space
•	Bosch washer and dryer

COMMUNITY FEATURES:

• 75-foot indoor lap pool and sauna
• 5,000 sq. ft. state-of-the-art fitness center
• 24/7 concierge service
• Private movie theatre
• Club lounge with a catering bar and full kitchen
• Business Center and board room
• Conference room

LEASE TERMS:

* 6 to 12 months 
* Parking available for $250/mo
* Owner pays for trash, sewer, and water
* Tenant responsible for gas and electric
*Tenant pays for Infinity move in and move out fee

name: 2 Bedroom with Very Large Rooms. Top of Nob Hill near Union Sq.
body:
Listing ID: #3014
 
Location: Mason and Pine 

Come see this beautiful, centrally located, offstreet top floor apartment which can be used as a 1 bedroom or as a 2 bedroom with one bathroom. This apartment has beautiful wall moldings and lots of closet space. Unit receives a lot of light and is quietly situated on the top floor of a 3 story building in Nob Hill right next to the Mark Hopkins Hotel. Unit features large kitchen gas cooking, granite countertops, and a dishwasher. Located one block from the top of Nob Hill (Fairmont, Mark Hopkins Hotels) and California Cable car. LOTS of closet space, including large walkin. Laundry in the building. Unit features hardwood floors. Great for people that work in the financial district and very close to Academy of Art. Walking distance to many restaurants, shops, gym, and post office. Easy access to downtown and Union Square. Utilties included: water and garbage. Parking in nearby lots available. Available unfurnished immediately. Pictures are of actual unit. This is a non-smoking property. [Note: If you use this as a two bedroom, there is no common area except for the kitchen. Your two bedrooms however will be very spacious.]

body: Clear-cut pricing!! Live a life enriched with urban convenience and avant-garde style in this turn-key home with a stellar location. Built-in 2007, this community of nine single-family homes is situated right behind a Starbucks and close to restaurants, shopping, and freeway access. The design of these homes is exemplary. The three bedrooms on the second level and the Master bath (with a bidet!) all have copious natural light during varying times of the day. Enter the two-car garage with interior access or the front door keyless. The adorable backyard and patio are low maintenance so you'll have plenty of time to focus on the things you really want to. name: *Self-Touring Option* Brand new Noe Valley Edwardian condo,Dog allowed
body:
Please note: Due to increased social distancing requirements, I am re-posting this listing with an option to view the unit without human interaction. Based on the description below please contact me if you are interested in seeing the unit privately.

Located in a residential area of Noe Valley, this is a top floor, fully-remodeled condo with beautiful views and natural light from every room, including a private back deck.  The unit features new Zero-V.O.C. paint, new Stainmaster carpeting, new windows, appliances, and fixtures.  Multiple rooms allow for a variety of space/living configurations.  

The unit is located in a beautiful, immaculate six-unit building built in 1912 that was completely rebuilt and seismically upgraded in 2002, and retains the original exterior facade and interior architectural elements.  It is ideal for working professionals seeking a quiet home that is ideally located for quick access to Downtown SF and major freeways.  The Muni J-train, 24 bus, and 35 bus are all within two blocks, and all major tech company buses stop within 3 blocks of the building.

One small to medium-sized quiet dog is allowed, please provide specific pet information if you have one.

Rooms+Amenities:
- Front room: Mainly used as a living room (can also be used as a large master bedroom).  Closet doors can be removed to create an alcove for a large-big-screen television and electronics or a small office area.   Large bay window faces hillside views to the West; new retractable shades allow filtered light at any height.  Independent wall heater with thermostat.
- Second room: Mainly used as primary bedroom (can also be used as office/second bedroom).  Includes a brand new sound proof double-pane window with blackout shade and a closet with organizer/shelving system.  Independent wall heater with thermostat.
- Bathroom: Beautiful modern Victorian bathroom with original, oversized clawfoot tub; adjustable height high-pressure shower; pedestal sink; apothecary cabinet and marble topped towel stand (both removable), full length mirror, air vent, and dimmable lighting.
- Third/Middle room:  Mainly used as dining room (can also be used as living room) with thermostat-controlled gas fireplace, fireplace bench with pad, and deep, lockable closet with adjustable/removable shelving system.
- Kitchen: Upgraded kitchen with brand new top-level stainless steel appliances including a 5-burner/triple-rack stove, multi-functional microwave, and triple-rack dishwasher.  High-end, maintenance-free granite counters with stainless steel sink, rack, new faucet with retractable hose and garbage disposal.  Three types of adjustable task lighting and amazing bay views.
- Back room: Mainly used as an office (can also be used as dining area).  Double-pane full wall slider door allows for incredible views and access to private back deck and back stairwell that leads to basement where laundry and storage are located.
- Private Deck: Private deck includes café table and seating with spectacular views of the San Francisco hills and the bay.  
- Dimmer switches are located in every room, including the bathroom.
- Unit is wired in all major rooms for any type of cable/internet set-up.

Building:
-Unit is located on the top (third) floor of a 6-unit building with basement access for extra storage and laundry.  
-The basement has four brand new, high-end, large-capacity washers and dryers which are free for residents to use.
-Private, lockable storage room and bicycle storage hooks available in the basement.

Location:
This quiet block in Noe Valley is a 10-15 minute walk or 5 minute bus or train ride to the charming and quaint 24th Street downtown area of Noe Valley, which has a Whole Foods, Starbucks, a Farmer’s Market, Post Office, periodic community and holiday activities, and a large variety of cafes, restaurants, shops and services.

Two blocks away is the secondary commercial area of Noe Valley (Church Street between 24th St. and 30th St.) with access to the Muni-J train and many dinner and brunch restaurants (Uma Casa, Regent Thai, La Ciccia, Ardiana, Toast, Inle, Chloe’s, Alice’s), cafes (Lovejoy’s Tea Room, Chloe’s Café, Noeteca, Cafe XO, Martha & Bros.), shops, bars, and grocery/convenience stores.  Douglas Café and Gourmet Market is one block away; Safeway is six blocks away.

The Upper Noe Valley Playground, Recreation Center and Park, Billygoat Hill, and Walter Haas Park are located within 6 blocks.  Various specialty gyms and spin and pilates studios within walking distance including 24-Hour Fitness and Core40.  The nightlife of the Bernal Heights and Mission neighborhoods located near Mission St. and 30th St. are within a 15 minute walk.

Transportation: 
-Several public transit stops located within blocks to head anywhere in SF and beyond.  The J-Line (light rail) to Market St. and Downtown and the Embarcadero/Ferry Plaza, as well as to a variety of BART stations in both directions, is two blocks away.  The 24 bus stop is less than one block away, the 35 bus stop is two blocks away.
-All tech bus stops including Google, Facebook, Apple, and Genentech are within 3 blocks.
-While there are various steep hills nearby, there are flat and direct paths to all forms of transportation as well as to downtown Noe Valley.

Parking:
Street parking only, which is quick and easy in this neighborhood compared to San Francisco standards.  Since parking is easy there are no City parking permits required for this area and street sweeping only occurs once every two weeks.

Utilities:
The rent includes water, disposal, and exterior building cleaning and maintenance, the tenant is responsible for PG&E utilities and cable/internet.  The unit has solar panels to help significantly reduce electricity cost.  

Price, and Contact:

Rent: $4,400 per month, $4,400 deposit, minimum 1-year lease term but multi-year term without rent increase may be available.  The intent is to find the right fit for long term tenant(s) who will not have the concern of significant rent increases.  Owner is conducting personal tours of the unit and building.  Thank you.

This 3 bedroom/2bath recently updated home features fresh interior paint, new manufactured hardwood floors, new dual paned windows, updated bathrooms, new kitchen appliances & countertop, and new carpeting. The refreshed backyard includes new lawns (front and back), mature plantings, a new sprinkler system, and a spacious patio - perfect for entertaining. Enjoy easy access to parks, shopping & commute - I-880, BART, and bus lines. This one's a keeper!  Email me: strageant< at >gmail.com

name: 2 Bed 2 Bath Available 5/01. Downtown City Views, Easy Caltrain Access
body:
Mission Bay by Windsor

Apt 408

Available 5/01/2020

2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom. 1000 sq ft

Video Tour: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nLeqGARb4zk

Please keep in mind that market rate pricing and availability is subject to change daily.
Tours available by appointment only. Call  
 or visit missionbaybywindsor.com to schedule a tour. 

Due to our unique floor plans, we request and strongly suggest that you schedule your tour within 30 to 45 days of your expected move. This is to ensure that we have a proper expectation of availability. Video tours are also available on our "Mission Bay by Windsor" You Tube page.  

Application Fee: $53 per applicant; Hold/Sec. Deposit: $500; Parking (if applicable): $325/mo; Pet Dues (if applicable): $65/mo w/$500 Pet Deposit

**Pet Policy: Mission Bay by Windsor is a pet-friendly community that accepts up to two cats or dogs per home.  There is a $500 pet deposit and a $65 monthly pet rent, per pet.   Breed restrictions apply. NO Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Chows, Doberman Pinschers, German Shepherds, Mastiffs, Pit Bulls, Presa Canarios, Rottweilers, Shar Peis, Siberian Huskies, Staffordshire Terriers, Wolf Hybrids or any variation or mixes of these breeds. All breeds and pets must be approved by property management. 

**Garage Parking Info: Parking is $325/mo per vehicle. 

**SF City Street Parking: The city of San Francisco, unfortunately, does not recognize our address as an approved locale for residential parking permits. This is due, primarily, to the number of vehicles addressed to our community and the fact that we offer parking in the community. In addition, the city is not currently offering street permits to many of the newer multi-family housing developments within proximity to the new Chase Center and Oracle Park. 

Complete listings are available on our website, www.missionbaybywindsor.com , under the Floor Plans tab. Only the available floor plans will reflect pricing. Best price is on a 12 month lease term. Please keep in mind that pricing and availability is subject to change daily. Our apartments are leasing fast. We often have apartments leased sight unseen as our market is very competitive.

Once approved, you have 24 hours to rescind your application. After this period, the $500 hold deposit is non-refundable.

Utilities: It is the responsibility of the resident to handle all utilities. Electricity is paid through PG&E.Water, sewage, trash services and internet are billed together through Minol. Depending on the number of occupants, the total monthly average for all 3 services is typically $200-250/mo-est.

All apartments have an open and spacious floor plan, heat, energy-efficient washer and dryer, and a built in microwave. The kitchen will feature luxurious quartz counter tops, stainless steel appliances as well as updated cabinets and flooring throughout the apartment. In addition, we have underground garage parking spots available to lease. Mission Bay by Windsor is a non-smoking property with controlled access and key-less fob entries. 

With a walk score of 82, Mission Bay by Windsor is minutes away from the Caltrain station, San Francisco Muni rail line, AT&T Park, award-winning restaurants and so much more. Our fitness center is open 24/7 and comes equipped with cardio machines, strength training and free weights. The leasing office provides complimentary coffee as well as wifi access. We are also a pet friendly property and accept dogs and cats. There is a breed restriction so we will need to know the type of dog you have. Our residents really love it here and I hope you will too!

name: Quiet Large Luxury 2bd/2ba with GG bridge view
body:
Listing ID:#3047
Location: Greenwich and Hyde 
This classic and refined large 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is very spacious measuring approximately 1500sqft. Has a nice view of the Marina,Palace of Fine Arts, and Golden Gate Bridge. Unit is very sunny and quiet. The apartment has an excellent floorplan with great flow and decor reminiscent of luxurious 1920's architecture. Notable features include formal foyer, formal dining room, living room with wood burning marble fireplace, dressing area in master bedroom, plenty of closet space, and modern kitchen with dishwasher and breakfast dinette area. This unit has a very large kitchen. Non-coin operated laundry facilities on first floor. Feel free to invite friends or guests over as this building also features the luxury of a rare gated guest parking area. This is located at the top of Russian Hill at Hyde and Greenwich, 1 blk from the Top of Lombard Street. Available approximately May 1, 2020. Minimum lease term of one year. 
Utilities included: water and garbage.  A must see!

Viewings by appointment only. Contact us directly. No broker fees involved.

T Central Richmond 2BR/1BA with Many Features. Building completely remodeled in 2011. Apartment faces the building's back. Hardwood floors except in tiled kitchen and bath. Wood burning fireplace in living room. Counter-style open kitchen/living room arrangement perfect for bar-style seating. Gorgeous kitchen has all stainless appliances including gas stove, wine cooler, refrigerator with water dispenser, dishwasher, microwave, black granite counters, and lots of cabinet and drawer space. Skylights in kitchen and bath. Bath has shower over tub and motion-activated lighting. Bedrooms have large, sliding glass door closets. Large double-pane windows throughout. Tasteful assortment of light fixtures.

Heat (hot water modern floor radiators) adjusted in apartment with thermostat. Four-machine laundry at ground level in garage; parking space available for Add'l fee. Garage, laundry, building have code access panels; front door entry system includes camera.  On top of all this, pets will be considered.

Apartment is in a great location, on 21st Avenue between Clement and California, making the plethora of shopping, dining and public transportation options on California, Clement and Geary readily accessible. WalkScore 85.

name: Second floor 2 BR / 1BA apartment in the Inner Richmond
body:
Contemporary-style, second floor 2BR / 1BA apartment in the Inner Richmond. 

Floors are hardwood except in kitchen and bath. 

Large windows let in lots of light and the bath has a skylight.

Gas wall heating. 

Living room is central to the apartment. Spacious living room. Kitchen is open to the living room but in its own space centrally to one side. A small dining arrangement would fit in the space.

Kitchen has Granite counter top, Range/Oven, Refrigerator.

One bedroom faces the street and has a closet with sliding wood doors. The other bedroom faces a lightwell and has a deep walk-in closet.

Bathroom has shower-over-tub.

Building has washer & dryer. 

Parking is available in the building's garage for an additional fee. 

Building is located less than a block from the most popular part of Golden Gate Park: between the Conservatory of Flowers and the de Young museum. 

Walk Score is 83. Close to All Public Transportation; bus lines 5, 31, 33 and 44 are all within two blocks.

Many shopping and dining opportunities near by on Clement and Geary streets. USF is within walking distance. 


Please call or text Laura at  
 to schedule a showing.

Due to the unique shape of The Towers at Rincon, each apartment has a layout and a view unlike any other, including vistas of the North Bay, Financial District, Bay Bridge, Ferry Tower or South of Market. 780 Post St. is a 11 minute walk from the J CHURCH, the KT INGLESIDE/THIRD and the L TARAVAL at the Metro Powell Station/Outbound stop.
This apartment is in the Downtown neighborhood in San Francisco. Nearby parks include O'Farrell-Larkin Mini-Park, Boeddeker Park and Parklet.
It has a Walk Score of 98 out of 100. This location is a Walker's Paradise so daily errands do not require a car.
Nearby schools include San Francisco Flex Academy, Redding Elementary School and San Francisco City Academy.
The closest grocery stores are Food & Liquor World, Crown Market & Liquor and Star Market & Deli.
Nearby coffee shops include Farm Table, Organic Coffee and Paris Cafe. There are 444 restaurants within a 15 minute walk including Pomidor Restaurant & BA, iThai and Pearl's Deluxe Burgers.
780 Post St. is near O'Farrell-Larkin Mini-Park, Boeddeker Park and Huntington Park.
There are excellent bike lanes and the terrain has very steep hills. 780 Post St. is very bikeable, biking is convenient for most trips.

name: Dream location, excellent neighborhood, 2 bdr / 2 bath in Jordan Park
body:
Dream location, excellent neighborhood, 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom quiet unit in beautiful Jordan Park neighborhood.

Each bedroom has its own bathroom next to it and the bedrooms are in completely separate parts of the apartment from each other; great for roommate arrangement, great for privacy.

Living room has a wood-burning fireplace. Kitchen includes a dishwasher, granite counters with the dining space in front of a window. 

New wood floor, new carpet.

Bathrooms remodeled in recent years. 

Lots of closet space.

Washer / dryer and elevator within building. 

Convenient public transportation, footsteps to all shops, banks, schools and restaurants, etc. within walking distance to USF, and California Pacific Medical Center. 

Parking is available for additional fee.

It is also a 14 minute walk from the J CHURCH, the KT INGLESIDE/THIRD and the L TARAVAL at the Metro Powell Station/Outbound stop. 

This location has a Walk Score of 98 out of 100. This location is a Walker's Paradise so daily errands do not require a car.

Nearby coffee shops include Han's Coffee Shop, Golden Coffee Shop and Cup A Joe Coffeehouse. There are 444 restaurants within a 15 minute walk including Bellissimo Pizza, Bite and Colombini Bistro Restaurant.

Soaring 42 stories into the air from the heart of San Francisco’s vibrant East Cut neighborhood, 500 Folsom's brand new apartments offer luxury high-rise living amid a host of shopping, dining, employment, and public transportation options. Just two blocks to the Transbay Transit Center and with a 96 Walk Score, here you will find the best of the city is always within easy reach. At 500 Folsom, it's easy to see that vision lives here.Our residential tower is comprised of brand new studio, 1-, and 2-bedroom apartment homes, including premium penthouses and townhome-style layouts. Each thoughtfully designed residence is finished in upscale style with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood-style floors. Select homes boast a private balcony and stunning Bay or city views.Around our new community, take advantage of a variety of vibrant social spaces and amenities including two amazing view decks—Bay Terrace North and Bay Terrace East—as well as our spa, community gardens, state-of-the-art fitness center, and yoga and spin rooms. Underground parking, neighborhood-servicing retail, and a public paseo connecting Clementina and Folsom streets add to the ease of your East Cut lifestyle, and all of this is complemented by our helpful, concierge-style staff dedicated to ensuring that all your expectations are met.Just outside our building, walk or bike to your choice of nearby restaurants, cafés, and art galleries, or head to work at neighborhood tech giants Google, Salesforce, or Slack. When your plans call for travel beyond our neighborhood, easily access BART, Caltrain, or interstates 80 or 280 to reach the rest of the Bay Area. Features - Hardwood-Style Vinyl Flooring  - Quartz Countertops  - Private Terrace (Select Homes)  - Tile Mosaic Backsplash in Kitchen  - Central air and heating  - Kitchen Island  - Garage Parking  - Floor to ceiling windows  - Fully appointed with stainless steel appliances  - Full Size Washer and Dryer Community Amenities - Sundeck  - Rec Room  - Elevator  - Multi Use Room  - Fitness Center  - Recycling  - Cover Park  - Lounge  - Spa  - Garage  - Storage Space  - Smoke Free  - Availability24 Hours  - On Site Maintenance  - On Site Management  - Free Weights  - Package Receiving  - Accent Walls  - Concierge Driving Directions Located on the corner of 1st and Folsom streets Office Hours Monday:9:00AM-6:00PMTuesday:9:00AM-7:00PMWednesday:9:00AM-6:00PMThursday:9:00AM-7:00PMFriday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PMSunday:10:00AM-4:00PMPet Policy We allow cats and dogsMaximum of two petsWe love all pets, but the following breeds/crossbreeds are not allowed: Pit Bulls (Staffordshire Bull Terrier), Dobermans, Rottweilers, Chow Chows, German Shepherds, Huskies, Mastiffs, Great Danes, Malamutes, Akitas and Wolf Hybrids. name: Roommate Wanted in Spacious 3BR/2BA Mission Dolores
body:
I understand that this is an extreme long-shot with the current status of the world right now, but we've found ourselves in a housing pickle and need to fill a room. Any discussions or meetings regarding a potential roommate would be done safely and following highest precautions and and quarantine protocols. Thank you for your consideration and understanding. 

✧༝┉┉┉┉┉ ˚* ❋ ❋ ❋ *˚ ┉┉┉┉┉༝✧

Greetings Potential Future Roommate,
Today, my fine friend, is your lucky day. As it so happens, we’re looking for third roommate at our palatial 3 bedroom, 2 bath condo which we affectionately refer to as “The Mission Oasis". *If interested, please apply at the link below*.

Fast Facts:

WHERE: We’re at 15th Street near Dolores.
WHEN: The unfurnished bedroom is available now through April -- later move-in possible and negotiable. We can be flexible for the right person). Bed & Desk are available for this room if needed.
HOW MUCH: Rent is $1975 per month. Utilities (electric, internets) are roughly $40-60/mo/person.

About the Apartment & Building:
The Oasis is a spacious (~1550 sq ft) condo nestled in a small cul-de-sac on 15th Street near Dolores. The apartment’s namesake comes from the uniquely peaceful and green gated garden. It's located just couple blocks from both BART, MUNI, Whole Foods, and Dolores Park.

The shared living room is quite large, roughly 16’ x 26’, not including the open kitchen and communal patio space that open up onto it. There is ample storage throughout.

The building has a gym, sauna and an in-resident manager who is around to receive packages for you. Laundry room is a couple doors away from our unit with 2 high-efficiency washers and 2 dryers, and a table to fold clothes. Several reserved parking spaces for guests and a protected garage parking spot for additional $175/mo. The posted photos are from the original listing - we'll have a different layout and furniture.

About the Room:
Your new room is approx. 11' x 16' with a large, two door mirrored closet. 

About R:
Mid 30s. Loves to design things. Frequently fucking around in the kitchen. Passionate about live music, film and his pup, Jack. Physically and socially active. Enjoys being outdoors, snowboarding, trying new whiskeys, building Lego, and playing guitar. He's in the master bedroom with 1 of the 2 bathrooms.

About Z:
30 years old. Software engineer originally from New York. You'll share a bathroom with him. More info coming soon.

About J:
Jack is a dog, but not at all like the other dogs you've met before. Incredibly intelligent, calm/well-mannered, and loving. Former Therapy animal, certified ESA. Has multiple obedience and trick awards under his belt (collar).

About You:
You're pretty cool. *Above average* clean/organized with common shared spaces. You're friendly, open minded, respectful, communicative, and pay rent on time. You pull your weight, not the hermit type, and you have your own social life/hobbies/weird shit you do. You are 420 friendly, and no live-in significant others.

We are looking for someone to join the lease, which is month-to-month (one month rent deposit). Our new roommate should be in good financial standing as our landlord will require a credit check for any new tenants.

This beautiful apartment seem like a good fit for you? Fill out the form below and help us quickly learn more about you. We'll respond very quickly. Thanks!

*** Please Apply here: https://forms.gle/Xg9yJ3jcxejAALzt5 ***

* Available: Now 


ADDRESS: 226 - 10th Avenue -2nd floor, quiet, faces away from street.
SHOWINGS:  Please call us for a private showing  
 or  


First floor 3-2BR/1BA contemporary apartment in the Inner Richmond. Floors are faux wood except in kitchen area and bath. Apartment has a long, narrow entry hallway. Living room is across from the kitchen and has a bank of windows at the top of the shared wall. Kitchen has space for a medium dining arrangement. Bedrooms both have wall closets with folding doors. One of the two bedrooms has ceiling cabinets and sliding glass doors which open onto a shared light well. Bath is standard with shower-over-tub. Living room could be used as a third bedroom if desired. Shared laundry is located in the garage.

Building is located on 10th Avenue between California and Clement. Extensive shopping and dining opportunities just half a block away on Clement and 1.5 blocks on Geary. Walk Score is 97. Transit Score is 77. Bus lines 1, 2, 28 and 38 are all within two blocks.

body:

name: ►VIRTUAL TOUR: Bright Top Floor 2BR/1BA  w/ Parking & Laundry!!◄
body:
446 Warren Street #6, San Francisco, CA 94131

2 Bedroom, 1 Bath


$2,950.00 /month

Please view the virtual tour and follow the URL in the tour to apply online or schedule a private showing.


Available immediately!!

Virtual 3D Tour:
Click or Copy and paste the URL below into a new browser window to view the Virtual Tour.

https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=4YfQ4Ev85Hg

Rental Description:
The front door opens up to a grand entertaining room ideal for both living and dining with an open air flow to an adjacent kitchen. The functional kitchen includes an electric range, refrigerator and ample cabinet storage. A short hallway off the living area leads to the bathroom and two spacious side by side bedrooms with spacious closets. Plush Carpets can be found throughout the home with large windows providing ample natural light throughout the day. Onsite coin operated laundry and a dedicated parking space are included.

Property Description:
If you are looking for convenience, look no further.  Located in the heart of Inner Sunset a quick 10 minute walk can take you to UCSF or the Muni N Judah Line providing direct service to Downtown and the Financial District. Equidistant is the 9th & Irving commercial corridor with top rated dining, cafes and weekend farmers' market. A couple more blocks walk away, escape to the seclusion and quiet of Golden Gate Park or explore the myriad of hiking trails immediately adjacent to the property in the Mt. Sutro Open Space Reserve. Your new home awaits you!!

Rental Features:
• Cable & Internet ready

• Plush Carpets

• Ample Storage

• Onsite Coin Operated Laundry

• Dedicated Parking


Lease Terms:
• $5,000.00 security deposit 

• One year lease; month to month thereafter. 

• Tenant responsible for all PG&E and discretionary utilities (i.e. phone, cable, internet) and a flat monthly water fee. 

• No Smoking Permitted. 


About Us:
KeyOpp is a Family Owned and Community Focused Property Management Company providing the best experience for both our Residents and our Clients. We have a keen understanding of the importance of balancing and maintaining healthy relationships with our Resident community while also ensuring an effective return for the Real Estate Investment. Learn more about our Leasing, Property Management and Investing services at www.keyopp.net

name: ONE MONTH + 2 Weeks off special! Call Now! Studio/1ba
body:
AVA Nob Hill is a new type of living space in San Francisco that apartment caters to a community experience in addition to your own personal space. Just minutes from downtown and South of Market and Mission District, there are always fresh adventures to embark on. Colombini Bistro, Café Royale, The Outsiders, Union Square Park and Landmark Theatres Lumiere are just a few local destinations and delicacies you'll love in this chic neighborhood.

 Our studios and 1- and 2-bedroom Nob Hill apartments feature an urban-inspired design that extends beyond your walls and throughout the entire community. There's the outdoor space with lava heat and lobby lounge-both with free Wi-Fi – -perfect for you to hang with friends or unwind alone. We also have a spectacular fitness center and dog run on-site, ensuring you'll never have to go far to do the things you love.

name: Luxury 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Heart of the Mission Brand New
body:
Brand new. Most luxurious and modern building the Mission has seen yet. Great location for this upscale, secure living. 2 bedroom 2 bathroom featuring spacious floor plans and high-end amenities. Accentuated by soaring ceilings and expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, these brand new units are awash with natural light and breathtaking outlooks of San Francisco. Elevated state-of-the-art fixtures and appliances, evidenced by Arclinea Italian made cabinetry. Miele appliances, Sigma plumbing fixtures, Italian Geostone tile and Pental Quartz counter tops, are just some of the features 606 Capp has to offer.

Alongside these stunning residential amenities are a variety of unparalleled community features, such as a fitness room, a landscaped and fud courtyard and commercial space providing retail and dining options at the residents' finger tips. To top it all off, 606  Capp has community and private roof decks that are furnished and landscaped with sweeping views of the city spanning Downtown, the Mission, and Twin Peaks. 

The communities prime location in the middle of the Mission makes this property extremely appealing. With a walk score of 99, residents of 606 Capp can easily access public transportation with the 16th Street Mission BART station just one block away, or the bus stops along Mission street, or spend a relaxing day perusing the Mission's many coffeehouses, restaurants and shops. In addition, 606 Capp is just four blocks away from Dolores Park.

If you are ready to experience urban living at its finest, contact us for a chance to pick out you new, Heart of  Mission, luxury unit.

First floor 1BR/1BA apartment in Lower Pacific Heights. Fully remodeled early 2019. Heat is via gas wall heater. Floors are hardwood in living room and bedroom, tile in bath and kitchen. Apartment is accessed through the living room. Kitchen is to one side of the living room, the bedroom is on the other side. Bath is accessed through the bedroom. Building is located on Presidio Avenue between Pine and Bush. Shared laundry is located in the building. There are a lot of shopping and dining opportunities in the immediate neighborhood. Trader Joe's is several blocks away. Walk Score is 95. Transit Score is 77. Bus lines 1, 2 and 3 are within a block or two and several other lines are within reasonable walking distance. Within our community of courtyard-connected homes, you'll find thoughtfully designed studio, one-, two- and three bedroom apartments and townhomes. body:
* $6,495/month annual lease
* In-unit washer/dryer
* Spacious
* Small pet considered for additional fee
* Balcony
* Ornamental fireplace
* Available: Now

ADDRESS: 269 Avila Street
SHOWINGS:  Please call us for a private showing  
 or  


Fully, newly remodeled second, top floor 3BR/2BA full flat in the Marina. Bright, elegant flat has hardwood floors throughout except in baths and under stacked washer/dryer. Large living room faces the street, has an ornamental fireplace, and a full wall of windows overlooking a balcony. Open dining room is behind the living room. Semi-open kitchen is behind and open to the dining and living rooms. Kitchen has new, all stainless appliances including gas stove, dishwasher and microwave. Stacked washer and dryer are located in an alcove at the end of the central hallway.

The two bedrooms are at the back and one extra room (can be used as an office/nursery/bedroom) is off the living room. The master bedroom has a full wall closet and private bath with glass shower stall. The second bedroom has a wall closet as well.  The third room has a standard closet and can be used as a bedroom/office/nursery.  Shared bath has an inset glass shower stall.

Central Marina location is in a purely residential area, three blocks from the middle of Chestnut Street's vibrant shopping and dining district; most day-to-day needs can be done on foot. Building is also three blocks from Marina Green at the San Francisco Yacht Club. Walk Score is 91, Transit Score is 71. It's about two blocks to bus line 30, just a few more to the 22 and 43, and a quick ride to many other bus lines.

Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.

name: Victorian Modern 2bd/2Ba with Air Cond, No Credit, Foreigners = Ok
body:
Location! Location! Location!

Furnished / UnFurnished 2 bedroom and 2 baths with Air Conditioning.

Do you need to rent from Two Months to One Year for Furnished Apartment?

From $ 4,699 with Six Month LEASE Furnished.
If you need less than Six Month, please give me a call.

No Credit in the United States?  Foreigners? Need a Quick Approval and Move in SOON? Contact Me!

30 Reasons Why this Unit should be Your Home:

1. Location, Location, Location. The building is located in one of the most desirable districts in San Francisco Downtown, the Mission Dolores District , inside the Valencia Corridor, where there are lots of restaurants, local stores and entertainment. The Ideal Surrounding for any person who loves San Francisco Downtown.

2. Near Popular Neighborhoods (walking distance) / HOT SPOTS: Valencia Corridor, Dolores Park, Noe Valley, Hayes Valley, Civic Center, Castro District.

3. High Walk Score and High Bike Score.

4. Easy Public Transportation (BART, MUNI Bus, Street Car).

5. Victorian Building Outside (Historic Building with High Ceiling), Newly Modern Unit Inside (Open Floor Plan).

6. Shared Roof Deck with Beautiful View of San Francisco.

7. Washer-Dryer inside the Unit ( So you do not have to carry your laundry to the basement or to a laundromat).

8. Unique to San Francisco Apartment:
Three Air Conditioning/Heaters inside Your Unit (When San Francisco is hot or cold, you feel comfortable).

9. CCTV throughout the Common Area (Hallway, Lobby, Front Building) which gives you a safety environment.

10. Smart Lock with Keyless System which You can control remotely through your cell phone (Android/Iphone).

11. Excellent Exterior Wall Insulation so you don't waste money in keeping the unit warm or cold.

12. Double Pane Windows Throughout with Noise Reduction Window Panels in the Master Bedroom.

13. Fully Furnished with Nice Quality Furniture.

14. Modern Kitchen with Utensils. Stainless Steel Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Stove/Oven, Microwave.

15. High Ceiling with Recessed LED Lights.

16. Two Bathrooms in the Unit (one with Bathtub and one with Shower Stall), No waiting in line.

17. Tankless Water Heater so You can take Shower with Endless Hot Water.

18. Big Screen TV in the living room.

19. Hardwood Floor Throughout.

20. Recently Remodeled in 2016 with Earthquake Retrofitted.

21. Open Floor Plan.

22. Within the Two Mile Radius, you have Megastores like Costco, Best Buy, Walgreen, Safeway, Whole Food, Trader Joe, Nordstorm Rack, T-Mobile, Office Max, Enterprise Car Rental, U-Haul. Also, Farmers Market (Wednesdays and Thursdays).

23. The Famous Dolores Park is about One Mile away from Our Building.

24. Whole Food and Safeway are about 2 blocks away from the building (So, you can walk rather than drive).

25. Easy Access to Freeway.

26. Walking distance from the techno-elite bus stop locations.

27. Bike Rack Storage so you can safely keep the bike in the building.

28. Next Door is a Convenient Store that opens till midnight which makes it easy for you to get your basic needs.

29. Ready for you to Move-In Today with Comfort so you don't have to buy all the EXTRAS.

30. Easy for you to Move-Out since You do not have to move Furnitures/Appliances, etc.

name: Brand New Luxury Units in the Mission Like Living In 5 Star Hotel
body:
Brand new. Most luxurious and modern building the Mission has seen yet. Great location for this upscale, secure living. 2 bedroom 2 bathroom featuring spacious floor plans and high-end amenities. Accentuated by soaring ceilings and expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, these brand new units are awash with natural light and breathtaking outlooks of San Francisco. Elevated state-of-the-art fixtures and appliances, evidenced by Arclinea Italian made cabinetry. Miele appliances, Sigma plumbing fixtures, Italian Geostone tile and Pental Quartz counter tops, are just some of the features 600 SVN has to offer.

Alongside these stunning residential amenities are a variety of unparalleled community features, such as a fitness room, a landscaped and fud courtyard and commercial space providing retail and dining options at the residents' finger tips. To top it all off, 600 South Van Ness has community and private roof decks that are furnished and landscaped with sweeping views of the city spanning Downtown, the Mission, and Twin Peaks. 

The communities prime location in the middle of the Mission makes this property extremely appealing. With a walk score of 99, residents of 600 SVN can easily access public transportation with the 16th Street Mission BART station just one block away, or the bus stops along Mission street, or spend a relaxing day perusing the Mission's many coffeehouses, restaurants and shops. In addition, 600 SVN is just four blocks away from Dolores Park.

If you are ready to experience urban living at its finest, contact us for a chance to pick out you new, Inner Mission, luxury unit.

name: Brand New Luxury Units in the Mission Like Living In 5 Star Hotel
body:
Brand new. Most luxurious and modern building the Mission has seen yet. Great location for this upscale, secure living. 2 bedroom 2 bathroom featuring spacious floor plans and high-end amenities. Accentuated by soaring ceilings and expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, these brand new units are awash with natural light and breathtaking outlooks of San Francisco. Elevated state-of-the-art fixtures and appliances, evidenced by Arclinea Italian made cabinetry. Miele appliances, Sigma plumbing fixtures, Italian Geostone tile and Pental Quartz counter tops, are just some of the features 600 SVN has to offer.

Alongside these stunning residential amenities are a variety of unparalleled community features, such as a fitness room, a landscaped and fud courtyard and commercial space providing retail and dining options at the residents' finger tips. To top it all off, 600 South Van Ness has community and private roof decks that are furnished and landscaped with sweeping views of the city spanning Downtown, the Mission, and Twin Peaks. 

The communities prime location in the middle of the Mission makes this property extremely appealing. With a walk score of 99, residents of 600 SVN can easily access public transportation with the 16th Street Mission BART station just one block away, or the bus stops along Mission street, or spend a relaxing day perusing the Mission's many coffeehouses, restaurants and shops. In addition, 600 SVN is just four blocks away from Dolores Park.

If you are ready to experience urban living at its finest, contact us for a chance to pick out you new, Inner Mission, luxury unit.

name: Location, Community, Quality Living. It Starts Here!
body:
Fox Plaza Apartments is pleased to offer virtual tours of our homes. With the rapidly evolving Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation, we have updated our business practices based on the Federal State of Emergency and the local Shelter in Place ordinance. Therefore, we have temporarily ceased all in-person property tours with prospective residents and instead, we invite you to visit our website to virtually walk through one of our beautiful homes. 

We also invite you to call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual tour with one of our leasing professionals. We can give you specific information about individual homes and also get you scheduled for a self-guided tour.

Convenience, Rent Control, and Modern Living! What More Could You Want? Fox Plaza has this and more! 

Living at Fox Plaza makes life so much easier. Walk outside and your steps away from Muni, Bart, and highway 101. It makes getting to work a breeze!
We are located in the dynamic downtown Hub neighborhood. Just outside your door, enjoy a variety of restaurants and cafés in Hayes Valley, catch a show at the SF Orpheum Theater or venture further to shop at the notable Union Square.

From the moment you walk through the front door you'll feel the comfort and serenity that makes our residents happy to call us home. Where else can you get fantastic views from all angles and one or more private balconies? Fox Plaza is where! Our homes feature sleek white cabinets, Caesarstone counter tops, efficient stainless-steel appliances, a spacious open floor plan, vinyl plank flooring and full length and/or spacious walk in closets.

As a valued resident, take advantage of our 24- hour state of the art fitness center to achieve your health goals! Wash multiple loads at once in our 24/7 laundry room. Don't want to hang out there watching your clothes? No worries. There's an app to inform you that your load is finished. Best of all we are pet friendly! :)

Stop by and take a look at the newly renovated STUDIO, #2827. This beautiful home awaits you for a discounted rate of only $2,664 on a 12-month lease! Don’t let this opportunity pass you by! 

Community also includes:

• Starbucks
• Andersen's Bakery
• USPS
• Secure Garage Parking – discounted rate for residents

San Francisco, CA 94102

Features - Private Direct Access Garage*  - Comcast Internet Blast Package and HD Digital Cable  - Four Custom Finish Packages  - Polished Quartz Countertops  - Wood Look Plank Flooring or Polished Concrete Flooring in Living Areas  - In-home Front Loading Washer and Dryer  - USB Charging Outlets  - Keyless Entry Front Door  - Kitchen Tile Backsplash  - Views of Downtown San Francisco* Community Amenities - Rooftop Beer Garden with Kegerator, Green Wall, and Outdoor Television  - Rooftop Firepit Lounge with Built-in Seating  - Underground Parking Garage with Elevators  - Private Conference and Meeting Rooms  - Rooftop BBQ Terrace with Outdoor Heating and City Views  - Resident Lounge Featuring Hospitality Station, Coworking Spaces, and Complimentary WiFi  - Leed Silver Certified Community  - Rooftop Game Lounge with Ping Pong, Scrabble, and Life Sized Connect Four  - Fitness Center with Variety of Strength and Cardio Equipment Plus TRX Wall Pet Policy We welcome you & your best friend, too!Looking for a new home for you & your pet? We are one of the few pet friendly communities in the area & enthusiastically welcome you & your pet (some restrictions apply).Pet Overview: Dogs & cats, including puppies & kittens under 1 year, are welcome at our community. Pet residents must have their health check & shots, and be spayed or neutered by 6 months of age. A signed animal addendum is required to be on file at our leasing office. Two (2) max pets allowed.Fee, Deposit and Pet Rent: $500 pet refundable deposit. Pet rent is $75 per month. (All fees, deposits and charges noted above are per pet.)Additional Details: We also welcome your domestic pet if it is a bird or fish with written approval from our onsite management team. No reptiles or exotic animals please. Fish tanks are not to exceed 55 gallons.Support Animals: If the animal is a service animal for a disabled person, pet deposits are not necessary & breed restrictions do not apply. A signed Letter Regarding Support Animals from a qualified professional verifying the need for the service animal along with proof of current rabies shots and licenses (if legally applicable) is required.Breed Restrictions: We welcome all breeds of dogs, except the following breed or mixed breed: Akita, Alaskan Malamute, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Husky, Pit Bull Terriers*, Rottweiler, Saint Bernard & Wolf Dog Hybrids.* (including all Pit Bull breeds - American Pit Bull Terriers, American or Irish Staffordshire Terriers, Bull Terriers, Pit Bulls, American Bull Dogs, & Presa Canario.) We reserve the right to add additional restricted breeds at any time. Driving Directions Driving westbound on I-80 from Bay Bridge. Take exit 1C towards Harrison Street. Destination should be on the right.Driving north from San Jose on US-101 N. Take 7th Street exit and drive to Harrison. name: Contemporary 2br/2ba at Bridgeview! AMSI/Mo Couture
body:
Furnished 2 br/2 ba condo at the prestigious Bridgeview. Open floor plan with gourmet kitchen, dining area, and comfortable main room. Built-in laundry, gas range, hardwood and stone bathroom floors. This spacious 2 br is the perfect respite for the busy executive, or someone wanting a move in to a ready home. The bedrooms have queen and king beds, and the bathrooms offer both a walk in shower or relaxing tub.  Private patio with table and chairs is just outside the main room.  The decor is contemporary, and very comfortable. Utilities are included with high speed internet, and this is a pet friendly environment!

The Bridgeview is a full service building with a 24 Hour Concierge, Lap Pool, Spa, Gym, View Sundeck with Barbeque Area for Private Parties. Enjoy South Beach's sunny weather and great proximity to the Embarcadero. At this prime location you are walking distance to the Financial District, Ballpark, and Moscone Center. Grocery store is a few blocks away, and local corner markets offer your daily needs. There are many fine dining restaurants, and the Waterfront which hosts a Farmer's Market each weekend. Freeway entrances are also just outside your door.

Walk Score 92 ** Transit Score 100 **

name: 4 BR-3 BA LUXURY BERNAL HOUSE
body:
Due to the Shelter in Place, applications are being taken on line. Virtual Tour: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1FjOy3Z-OOebbov_bF3uTHljgdEljFIzp/view?ts=5e86a94c

Recently renovated 1886 Victorian, 2,800 square feet, split on 3 levels. It is fully furnished, and picture perfect, ready for you to move right in! Each bedroom is spacious with large flatscreen tvs, and the gourmet kitchen has a large island with barstools, as well as dining area. Radiant heat throughout warms your feet, and large windows give you amazing light. The backyard with lighting is a perfect way to unwind, and gives a warm glow to the kitchen & dining area.

The house offers a large main room, two 12x12 bedrooms, 10x7 bathroom with glass rain shower, gourmet kitchen with stainless LG appliances, large dining table, and beautiful backyard with lighting. And this is just on the first level! Upstairs you have your master suite complete with free standing European style tub, glass shower, and massive bedroom.  Washer & dryer en suite, and bottom level of house can used as an office or perfect nanny's quarters.  

Bernal Heights is conveniently located just off the 101, so ideal for the City worker, or Penninsula, for an easy commute. You are walking distance to the main district of Bernal, where you have many restaurants, shops, boutiques, and grocery stores. There are many schools in a short distance, and locals feel it is one of the best neighborhoods in SF! Clean streets, easy walking, dog parks, schools, library, and nice weather name just a few wonderful attributes of Bernal Heights.

Shown by appointment:
Maureen "Mo" Couture
AMSI Real Estate Services

Recently renovated 1886 Victorian, 2,800 square feet, split on 3 levels. It is fully furnished, and picture perfect, ready for you to move right in! Each bedroom is spacious with large flatscreen tvs, and the gourmet kitchen has a large island with barstools, as well as dining area. Radiant heat throughout warms your feet, and large windows give you amazing light. The backyard with lighting is a perfect way to unwind, and gives a warm glow to the kitchen & dining area.

The house offers a large main room, two 12x12 bedrooms, 10x7 bathroom with glass rain shower, gourmet kitchen with stainless LG appliances, large dining table, and beautiful backyard with lighting. And this is just on the first level! Upstairs you have your master suite complete with free standing European style tub, glass shower, and massive bedroom.  Washer & dryer en suite, and bottom level of house can used as an office or perfect nanny's quarters.  

Bernal Heights is conveniently located just off the 101, so ideal for the City worker, or Penninsula, for an easy commute. You are walking distance to the main district of Bernal, where you have many restaurants, shops, boutiques, and grocery stores. There are many schools in a short distance, and locals feel it is one of the best neighborhoods in SF! Clean streets, easy walking, dog parks, schools, library, and nice weather name just a few wonderful attributes of Bernal Heights.

Shown by appointment:
Maureen "Mo" Couture
AMSI Real Estate Services

name: Contemporary 2br/2ba at Bridgeview! AMSI/Mo Couture
body:
Furnished 2 br/2 ba condo at the prestigious Bridgeview. Open floor plan with gourmet kitchen, dining area, and comfortable main room. Built-in laundry, gas range, hardwood and stone bathroom floors. This spacious 2 br is the perfect respite for the busy executive, or someone wanting a move in to a ready home. The bedrooms have queen and king beds, and the bathrooms offer both a walk in shower or relaxing tub.  Private patio with table and chairs is just outside the main room.  The decor is contemporary, and very comfortable. Utilities are included with high speed internet, and this is a pet friendly environment!

The Bridgeview is a full service building with a 24 Hour Concierge, Lap Pool, Spa, Gym, View Sundeck with Barbeque Area for Private Parties. Enjoy South Beach's sunny weather and great proximity to the Embarcadero. At this prime location you are walking distance to the Financial District, Ballpark, and Moscone Center. Grocery store is a few blocks away, and local corner markets offer your daily needs. There are many fine dining restaurants, and the Waterfront which hosts a Farmer's Market each weekend. Freeway entrances are also just outside your door.

Walk Score 92 ** Transit Score 100 **

Shown by appointment only:
Maureen "Mo" Couture
AMSI Real Estate Services

name: Quite-Light & Bright Suitcase Ready SOMA Exec-Corporate Full 1-Bedroom
body:
Sought after location in SOMA is our Fully Furnished & Equipped Light and Bright 1 Bedroom Condo.
It will come available as of April 15th.
Just a Short walk to Bart, Muni & Caltrain lines.
½ a block to Whole Foods, and 2 blocks to Target.

We usually go with a 12-month agreement, but especially catering to Doctors and other Medical Professionals we will consider even a 3, 4, or 6 month shorter-term stay.

Right on Folsom near 4th Street.
Easy walking to everywhere downtown.

* High-Speed Internet WiFi is set and Included.
*All cookware, dishware, and even starter condiments are there upon arrival.
*Microwave, Coffee Maker, Hot Water Pot, Iron, Ironing board and more are here.
*Stainless Steel with a Granite Top Kitchen awaits with an in-unit washer & dryer!
*Beautiful wood flooring and a Carpeted Queen Size Bedroom with a Walk-In Closet.
*Larger than normal, nicely tiled full bathroom with shower over tub.
*Light and bright with walls of windows to let in lots of natural light and fresh air.
*The building and the unit are only approximately 12 years old.
*You will find it Suitcase Ready with style and comfort, as an inclusive rate of $ 3700
* Amazing Tropical Center Outdoor Courtyard steps from your unit.

For consideration, If interested and qualified, please reply with one very detailed email.  Due to current health care considerations viewings will not take place until April 15th.  This is a great condo in the perfect SOMA location and for those reasons, in the past, it has been easy for me to lease it out sight unseen when necessary. The photos attached have not been touched up at all, so what you see is what you get.

There are lots of scams here on Craigslist as we all know and this is not one of those.  After one email and one phone / video chat with me, you will see that easily and clearly.  This unit when it comes available always moves quickly.  UNIQUE: Because of how this unit sits in the back corner of the building overlooking a narrow side street, it is an extremely quiet unit the likes of what is hard to find anywhere in San Francisco. Stay Safe and be Well, like most problems, this too shall pass..  Enjoy Always!,    Rob

body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.Now Leasing! NEW APARTMENT HOMES, in San Francisco, California.  Potrero Launch features a collection of urban loft style apartments located in the vibrant central waterfront Dogpatch neighborhood of San Francisco. Each apartment offers a choice of spectacular views ranging from the City, The Bay, Potrero Hill or the Zen garden. Many of our apartment homes have oversized windows framing these remarkable views.Stroll to our rooftop Sky Lounge and over into our open-concept social room with demonstration kitchen. Energize in our fully-equipped 24/7 fitness club, and get your Om on in either our yoga studio or professionally landscaped Zen garden. Ready to venture farther? The best of the city is just outside your front door, with the unique neighborhood watering holes and eateries of Dogpatch, plus easy access to Muni, BART & CalTrain to explore San Francisco and beyond. name: 1x1 Want to live in San Francisco…without the chaos?
body:
With the rise of COVID-19, our home is our shelter. We know that looking for an apartment during this time is particularly challenging. To help ease the burden, we have implemented a modified leasing process designed for everyone’s well-being, including virtual tours and electronic application and lease processing. We hope these additional services make finding a home easier, and we look forward to assisting you.  

 

 

Parkmerced is San Francisco’s cleaner, greener, beautiful gem. Close enough to downtown to experience everything the City has to offer. Just far enough from the bustle to make you feel like you can breathe…relax…and enjoy where you live. 

 

HELD OVER! Act NOW to get our amazing 5-5-5-0 deal! Pay only $5 for Deposit, $5/month Parking, $5/month Pet Rent, and $0 Application Fee when you sign a lease between 2/28/2020 and 4/15/2020* See below for details 

 

 

Call or click to schedule your virtual tour today! 

 

 

Our townhomes & high-rise apartments are larger than you typically find in SF, and are nestled in 150 acres of open green space. We’re adjacent to lovely Lake Merced, moments from Fort Funston and the coast, and Public transit & freeway access are close and convenient. Dining, shopping, and entertainment surround our unique community, so there’s always something fun and interesting to do. 

 


Call  show contact info
 today to schedule your virtual tour of Parkmerced and experience this unique San Francisco lifestyle for yourself. 

 

 

 

Bedrooms:  1 

Bathrooms:  1  

Square Feet:  792 

Pets: Dogs (even large breeds) and Cats welcome! 

Rent Control: Yes! 


COMMUNITY AMENITIES 

* 150 Acres of green space  

* Large apartments and townhomes  

* $100 monthly credit per lease for Uber, Clipper, and Getaround 

* Outdoor BBQs and firepit 

* Community gardens and playgrounds 

* Pet-Friendly community with dog parks and areas   

* Multiple parking options 

* Fitness centers and laundry facilities 

* Clubhouse and business centers 

* Zipcars and electric vehicle charging stations 

* Volleyball, bocce ball courts, and Recreation Shed with lawn games and toys 

* 24-hour community outreach 

* Montessori children’s center onsite

Schedule your virtual tour of Parkmerced today! Call  show contact info
 now.
 

Equal Housing Opportunity  

* Offers valid for first-time Parkmerced residents only, on approved credit score of 650 or higher only, and for leases signed between 2/28/2020 and 4/15/2020 only. $5/month parking offer valid for one (1) parking space per apartment lease in a designated Parkmerced-operated structure, subject to availability. $5/month pet rent offer applies toward either one (1) dog or one (1) cat that meets pet policy criteria.
