name: Beautiful and Spacious Studio with Storage Loft in Mission
body:
Photos on this ad may vary from unit to unit.
    
 Contact info:  Keith | Davis-Paul Management Group |  show contact info
Beautifully Remodeled Spacious Studio with Storage Loft in Mission District818 Treat Ave #02, San Francisco, CA 94110$2,300/mo KEY FEATURES  Year Built:  1900 Bedrooms:  Studio Bathrooms:  1 Bath Parking:  Street Lease Duration:  12 Months (See Details Below) Deposit:  $2,300 Pets Policy:  Cats OK Laundry:  None Floor:  2 Property Type:  Apartment  DESCRIPTION 818 Treat Ave (@ 21st Street) ***During the shelter-in-place order, we are unable to show the apartment directly but can arrange for a Skype viewing. Please contact us if you have interest in a Skype viewing or would want to be contacted when a physical showing can take place.  Thank you for your interest.*** This intimate 6-unit Edwardian styled building is located on Treat Avenue between 21st and 22nd streets in San Francisco's Mission District. Within a few blocks, you can find many different shops or restaurants that offer diverse dining experiences.  Commuting from this location is also very easy. The 24th street BART station and Muni bus stops are all conveniently close. The Google bus stop is at Valencia and 24th Street. The Apple bus stop is at Guerrero and 24th Street.  The nearest laundromat is located just a couple blocks away.  The available unit is updated and enjoys tall ceilings. The kitchen has granite counter tops and 40in cabinets. There is a dining area off the kitchen. The living area has wood flooring and a walk-in closet. There is also a storage loft within the unit above the bathroom. The bathroom has a shower only (no tub).  The apartment will be available in the beginning of February.  If emailing to request an application form, please be sure to include your phone number and email address in the body of the message. Please prepare two copies of pay stubs as proof of employment (or accepted offer of employment) and a current copy of a valid photo id to the viewing. A background check fee of $30 per applicant is also required. We can accept this fee via Venmo (@dpmgapplicationfee). Please remember to include the names and the property address you are applying for in the comments section.  RENTAL FEATURESWalk-in closetStorage loftRange / OvenRefrigeratorFreezerCable-readyHardwood floorGranite countertop COMMUNITY FEATURESVintage building LEASE TERMSWater and garbage are included with the rent.  Smoking is not permitted on the premises. Contact info:   Keith   Davis-Paul Management Group  show contact info
 Professionally Managed by: Davis-Paul Management Group | DRE License #00796063

name: Beautiful & Remodeled Pet-Friendly Studio Near Union Square
body:
Photos on this ad may vary from unit to unit.
 Contact info:  Pat Boyd | Davis-Paul Management Group |  show contact info
Beautiful Pet-Friendly Studio Available in May 830 Bush St #404, San Francisco, CA 94108$2,300/mo KEY FEATURES  Year Built:  1923 Bedrooms:  Studio Bathrooms:  1 Bath Parking:  None Lease Duration:  1 Year (See Details Below) Deposit:  $2,300 Pets Policy:  Pet of 40lbs or less considered with additional deposit Laundry:  Shared Floor:  2nd Property Type:  Apartment  DESCRIPTION***During the shelter-in-place order, we are unable to show the apartment directly.  We can assist with a virtual tour of the apartment by using Skype or Facetime, however.  If you wish to have a physical viewing of the apartment, please email or call and we can contact you when the shelter-in-place order has been lifted. Thank you for your interest.*** This charming building built in 1923 is located right in the heart of the San Francisco. It is conveniently close to Union Square, famous restaurants, farmers markets, Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, and major public transit lines, making for easy transportation throughout the city.  The unit itself is a spacious studio with hardwood floors. It has a large living room, bathroom with tub/shower, dining area off the kitchen, and a gas range. In addition, there is a walk-in closet large enough for a bed and a smaller but spacious hall closet.   We accept a pet under 40 pounds. There is an additional $300 deposit for pets.  When replying to this e-mail, please include your e-mail address and phone number in the body of your reply.  It will work to your benefit to have a copy of a valid photo id, proof of income (such as two recent copies of pay stubs or an employment offer), and $30 cash or money order per adult applicant for the screening fee, should you wish to apply. We cannot accept personal checks for the background checks.  We look forward to meeting you! Please contact us if you have interest in the apartment and we will contact you when a physical or Skype showing can be scheduled. Thank you for your interest.***This intimate 4-unit Edwardian styled building is located on a charming one way street between 14th and 15th streets in San Francisco's Mission District. The building is very close to both Dolores and Duboce parks. Within a few blocks, you can find many different shops or restaurants that offer diverse dining experiences. There is a Safeway and a Whole Foods nearby for your grocery shopping needs. Commuting from this location is also very easy. The Church street MUNI station, 16th street BART station, pick ups for Google and Apple bus stops are all conveniently close.The available unit is fully remodeled and located on the second floor of the building. The kitchen has granite counter tops, porcelain tile floors, and shaker style 40" cabinets, stainless steel refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, and range.  There is also an alcove off the kitchen for a small eating area or office.  The living room is spacious, with double French doors that separate it from the bedroom. There is a sunny shared back patio and garden accessible by all residents of the building.
When applying, the following will need to be provided by each applicant: copy of valid photo id, proof of income (e.g. two recent paystubs or a recent offer letter) and $30 each for the background check which can be paid via Venmo.  If emailing to request an application form, please be sure to include your phone number and email address in the body of the message.
We will look forward to meeting you.RENTAL FEATURESLiving roomWalk-in closetRange / OvenRefrigeratorDishwasherMicrowaveGarbage disposalStainless steel appliancesBalcony, Deck, or PatioYardCable-readyHardwood floorTile floorGranite countertopCOMMUNITY FEATURESVintage buildingControlled accessOn-street parkingLEASE TERMSWater and garbage are included with the rent. We can assist with a virtual tour of the apartment by using Skype or Facetime, however. If you wish to have a physical viewing of the apartment, please email or call and we can contact you when the shelter-in-place order has been lifted. Thank you for your interest.***   This elegant, charming building is located right in the heart of the San Francisco. It is conveniently close to Union Square, famous restaurants, and major public transit lines, making for easy transportation throughout the city. This is a large one-bedroom with beautiful hardwood floors and details throughout. It includes the bedroom, two very large closets, two additional closets, bathroom, kitchen and living room.  The kitchen has been fully remodeled with a gas stove and a dining area.  The living rooms are South facing and the apartment does receive good light.  There are bay windows in both the living room and bedroom.  One of the large closets could be made into an office. We welcome a cat or dog (up to 40 pounds) for an additional pet deposit of $300. There is a coin-operated laundry room (two washers and two dryers) on-site. You may request an application form before the showing via email.  Please include your name, phone number and email address in the body of your email inquiry.  With your completed application form, we will require a valid copy of a photo id, proof of income (e.g. two recent paystubs or a recent offer of employment), and $30 per applicant for the background check which can be paid via Venmo @dpmgapplicationfee. Please contact us if you have interest in a Skype viewing or would want to be contacted when a physical showing can take place.  Thank you for your interest.*** This charming building is located downtown in the Civic Center and borders the Van Ness Corridor and Lower Nob Hill.  Union Square is very close. The entry to the property has elegant high ceilings and beautiful woodwork. There is coin-operated laundry locating in the building. The building has an elevator. There are a number of shops, dining and night life within close proximity of the building. Public transportation is also very convenient, with a number of MUNI lines all within a few blocks of the building (2, 3, 5, 38, 47, 49). In addition, there are private bus lines at Van Ness and Geary stop for Apple, eBay, Electronic Arts, Facebook, Google and Yahoo. The property is approximately seven blocks from the Civic Center Bart Station. The unit itself is a two bedroom with hardwood floors located on the fourth floor.  The kitchen has been fully remodeled with 40" shaker cabinets, quartz counter tops, a breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. The bathroom has a tile floor and shower over bath tub with tile surround. The master bedroom is sizeable with an extra large closet.  The apartment will be available in mid-February.  You may request an application form before the showing via email. Please include your name, phone number and email address in the body of your email inquiry. With your completed application form, we will require a valid copy of a photo id, proof of income (e.g. two recent paystubs or a recent offer of employment), and $30 per applicant for the background check which can be paid via Venmo @dpmgapplicationfee. You will want to include the name of each applicant and the property address in the comments section of this transaction. name: Two Bedroom on Top Floor w/ Balcony. ONE MONTHS RENT FREE! Apt 564.
body:
*One month rent free when applying by 4/30*

Where you live is where you come alive. In one of San Francisco’s most eclectic and vibrant neighborhoods, Avalon Dogpatch connects you to everything needed to upgrade your lifestyle. Within our community of courtyard-connected homes, you'll find thoughtfully designed studio, one-, two- and three bedroom apartments and townhomes. Entertain in a modern, open kitchen featuring stone countertops, tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities including a fully-loaded fitness center with yoga studio and Fitness on Demand programming. Relax in our indoor/outdoor lounge with entertaining spaces or unwind on one of the rooftop decks with stunning Bay views. Your four legged friend will enjoy our WAG Pet Spa and dog run, along with a brand new adjacent public dog park.

-Business Center
-Stainless Appliances
-Washer/ Dryer
-Hard-Surface Flooring
-Lounge
-Parking
-WiFi
-Bike Storage
-Fitness Center
-Public Transportation
-Fully-equipped kitchen
-Air Conditioning

Call:  

Visit www.avalon-communities.com/avalon-dogpatch to learn more.

Prices and availability are subject to change.

Description:

	This newly remodeled spacious breathtaking remodeled apartment  is close to trendy Polk and Union Street - Walkers Paradise with lots of restaurants, shops and nightlife only a couple of blocks away.  You will love living here!  Riders Paradise - convenient to public transportation and the Shuttle stops along Van Ness Ave.  

	Virtual/video tour only

	Featuring the following:
	~  2nd floor backside apartment in a 3 story elevator building
	~  Rent controlled
	~  Hardwood floors 
	~  Designer finishes throughout
	~  Spacious open floor plan - living/dining combo
	~  Remodeled gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances featuring an induction range stove top, dishwasher, built-in microwave and breakfast bar
	~  Huge master bedroom with large closet and en-suite bath with vanity sink and shower/tub combo
	~  Second bedroom with large closet
	~  Smaller 3rd bedroom with closet 
	~  Remodeled main bath with vanity sink and walk-in shower
	~  Half bath with vanity sink and washer and dryer
	~  Addition coat and linen closet in hallway
	~  Water and garbage included
	~  Washer and dryer in unit
	~  Street parking only at this time

	No pets or smoking

	 

	 
This is a non-smoking unit. Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.

name: Gorgeous 3BR2BA home by Union Square! 10 mins walk to downtown SF!
body:
$4,995.00 per month for unfurnished rental 
Description 
Spacious 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms home conveniently located near Financial District, Chinatown, Union Square and public transportation. 
 Kitchen Amenities 
 Refrigerator 
 Microwave 
 Dishwasher 
 Stove 
-Walking distance to Financial District, Union Square and Chinatown 
-Accessible to public transportation 
 Located in Nob Hill-Great Location!
 One of the original seven hills of San Francisco, Nob Hill is rated 99 out of 100 on a walk ability scale. Centrally located, the home is situated 2 blocks from Grace Cathedral and Huntington Park. With Powell Street BART station only a short walk through Lower Nob Hill and Union Square and several MUNI connections, all of San Francisco is at your fingertips. Or take the cable car to all the exciting places: Fisherman's Wharf, Ghiradelli Square and Downtown. <
 2 short blocks to Grace Cathedral, Mark Hopkins 
2 short blocks to Huntington Park.
2 short blocks to Trader Joes 
 3 short blocks to Chinatown 
 4.5 blocks to Wholefood. 
 8 blocks to Union Square 
 About 10 minutes walk to Powell BART station or Montgomery BART station. 


 Public Transpiration 
 Cable car lines and Muni bus lines are only half block away from the home. It takes about 12 minutes walk to Market Street, where you will have access to BART.

name: Large 1 bedroom at Avalon Mission Bay
body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.

 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. On-site retail, including Chase Bank and Bark Avenue Doggy Daycare, along with nearby Safeway, Bluxome Street Winery, Lucky Strike, and Alexander's Steakhouse, puts shopping, dining, and entertainment within reach.

body:
1st Floor 1BR/1BA Apartment
* $3,100/month
* Annual lease
* Sorry, No Pets!
* Laundry Available in Adjacent Building Under Separate Agreement
* Available: Now

ADDRESS: 58 Liberty #3

VIDEO: https://youtu.be/AyXs-9Rnge8

SHOWINGS: Please call  
 or  


First floor 1BR/1BA apartment in a fabulous Victorian in Mission , by Dolores Park. Extremely high ceilings, tall windows, hardwood floors except in bath and kitchen. Apartment can be entered from the front of the building or the back, through the kitchen. Living room faces the back of the building. Kitchen includes a gas stove. Small bedroom has a large walk-in closet. Bath is standard with shower-over-tub.

Building is located on Liberty Street, a small, quiet, tree-lined street between Guerrero and Valencia. Dolores Park is 2.5 blocks away. Huge number of restaurants and shops in the immediate neighborhood east to Mission and north to 16th. Walk Score is 99. Transit Score is 91. J-Church MUNI is two blocks west, bus lines 14 and 49 are 1.5 blocks away on Mission, and the 33 bus is three blocks away.

Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.

name: Large Studio, Furnished Garden Apartment, Beautiful Architecture
body:
Beautiful Furnished garden studio apartment  located 1 block off Fillmore Street.  

Remodeled in 2020.  Hide away kitchen has Bosch refrigerator, Bosch convection oven/microwave, ceramic burners and Fisher Paykel Dishwasher Drawer.  Bathroom is in two separate rooms.  Clawfoot tub and built in shelves in one room.  Toilet and pedestal sink with exposed brick wall in another room.  Full sized Closet and separate coat hook area.  Furnished with queen sized bed, love seat, ottoman, expandable dinning room table, wall-mounted 43" Samsung TV, etc.  It's warm, dry and cozy and comes with a dehumidifier.  Floors are metallic epoxy finish with area rugs.

Private access.  Internet, basic cable, all utilities included.

name: Charming, Spacious, Bright-1.5 blocks from SF Yacht Harbor/Presidio
body:
Come see and judge for yourself what $3,995.00 per month is really worth. Now, are you the correct custodian to reside in this urban sanctuary and live 1 block from the SF Yacht Harbor/Bay? 

This spacious 1 bedroom apartment approximates over 975 square feet. The unit has hardwood floors and seven (7) large floor-to-ceiling (72" High) bay windows making the unit bright and sunny. The unit is painted in three tones making your future home feel warm and charming. It is on the third floor in the rear of the building and has views of the rolling Presidio hills and interior block gardens from the bay windows. All windows have been replaced by dual pane operating windows. 

The building is a beautiful Spanish/Mediterranean style built in 1929 and has almost all of the period's charming accents with many modern upgrades. The living room (13' X 20') and dining rooms (9.5' X 9.5') have soffet ceilings with arched entry ways. The bedroom (17' X 10') and hallway has vaulted barreled ceilings. 

This intimate 6 unit building is ideal for the discerning tenant wishing a quiet living environment by avoiding the inconveniences of co habitation hassles in the larger buildings in the Marina and unresponsive owners. 

The unit has been completely remodeled with wood cabinets and gorgeous granite counters in the kitchen, new decorative tiles in the bathroom, and reconfigured/reorganized walk in closets to maximize closet space.  All windows in the unit have been replaced and are dual panes operating windows. All work was done with a permit and ensures you that the remodel was done to code. 

Kitchen (13.5' X 7') appliances include electric stove, large refrigerator, dishwasher,  under counter lights, a deep stainless steel sink (18" W X 30" L X 10"), Groen kitchen faucet, and garbage disposal. 

The ELECTRICAL AND COPPER PLUMBING HAS BEEN COMPLETELY REPLACED with additional electrical /cable/phone plugs strategically placed throughout the unit. 

Units are cable ready and have CAT 5 phone lines. 

The unit has had significant seismic upgrades (Shear Wall and Hold Down Pins).   All work was completed with a Permit from the San Francisco Building Department.

You are only blocks away from the Chestnut Street shopping and restaurants, the Marina Greens, Crissy Fields, Palace of Fine Arts, and the Presidio. 

Public transportation is at your doorstep. This is the first 30X bus stop which ensures you a seat on the bus. 

Coin operated laundry facilities are located in the building. 
1 stacked parking space available for an additional $ 100.00. 
Storage closet in garage available for $ 200.00.
Locked bike storage caged ($25/hook).

Landlord pays water, garbage, and common area PG&E. 
NO PETS PLEASE. 
No smoking. 
Current pictures provided are for illustrative purposes only. 
The unit will be vacant on Mid April 2020. 
To make an appointment to view the unit, please call my cell @  
.

name: Entire 1st Floor of 3 Story Loft
body:
Hello, I'm looking for a roommate to fill the first floor of my huge 1800 sq ft, 3 story, 2 bd room, 3bth corner loft. You would have your own private entrance from the street, full private bathroom and the room is quite spacious, about the size of a studio apartment. There's a shared kitchen on the main floor, in unit laundry, and I occupy the mezzanine level. 

I'm a professional working in advertising, who travels often for work. So when I'm home, I like to be mellow and relax. I also have 2 small dogs (see pic) who are sweet and friendly and probably the best part about coming home. Also looking for another quiet, clean professional or student, who loves dogs and doesn't bring the party home. 

Location is ideal for someone who commutes as it's across from Caltrain & close to major freeways. Also nearby Pinterest, Uber, Lyft, Stripe, tons of start-ups, bus lines and easy to get downtown. There's also a Safeway, Walgreens, Starbucks, Petes, Oracle Ball Park, South Park, post office & lots of restaurants within a 2 block radius.

Available now. Short term or month to month only, and flexible to show the space by appointment. Thanks for your interest & best of luck with your hunt :)

PRIVATE SHOWING : Please call  
. 

ADDRESS: 2465 Chestnut #303


Gorgeous, 1BR/1BA in the Marina. Classic San Francisco apartment has a hacienda-style feel. Floors are hardwood parquet in living room and dining room and hardwood elsewhere except in tile bath. Living room and kitchen have built-in shelving. Large, deep living room has a bank of three windows at one end and wall sconces. The living room a very large closet and there is a door to the dining room at the windowed end. Dining room is in front of windows and open to the kitchen. It can accommodate a six-setting dining arrangement. Kitchen is galley-style and includes electric stove, microwave and dishwasher. It has a lot of cabinets, many with glass panes, and lots of counter space.

Bedroom is large and has a sizeable closet. It has a view of Angel Island. Bath has both a jacuzzi and a glass shower stall. Building has shared laundry and a roof deck. Roof deck has a spectacular 360° view which includes the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, and the downtown skyline. Deck has some chairs and two tables. Landlord will consider pets for additional fee.

Terrific location at the Presidio end of Chestnut Street's vibrant shopping and dining district. Walk Score is 96. It's just steps to the bus line 30. Lines 22, 28, 41, 43, and 45 are within reasonable walking distance.

Please be noted, that pictures are of a similar unit with same layout.

name: Remodeled Traditional 3 Bed/3Bath Home w/Gas Fireplace
body:
238 Chester Ave. 

$4950

Entering the gracious Living Room with ornate corner fireplace with its marble surround and gas insert you immediately feel at home!
Amid the many preserved details of this home are refinished hardwood floors, parquet in the Living and Dining Rooms, and unique original moldings throughout. Through a curved archway, you enter the Formal Dining room, with its Bay windows to capture the light.
The inviting eat-in kitchen has hardwood floors, high-end stainless steel appliances including a double oven, solid wood cabinets and striking honed quartz countertops.
There are 3 stylish tiled bathrooms, one with a tub and two with showers. Upstairs are two spacious bedrooms including the Master with ensuite bathroom. Downstairs, overlooking the manicured garden, is a huge third bedroom/family room with washer/dryer, sink, and a wine bar. There is also a full bath on this level.
Huge Two Car garage with ample storage. 
This lovely home has been completely renovated and is in immaculate condition. Almost all new systems, almost all new windows, new exterior and interior paint, and new deck and fences. Minutes away from 280 Freeway, BART station and 2 Blocks to Oceanview Village Shopping Center.

name: VideoTour! Quiet, Spacious & Elegant classic SF flat, Pets Welcome
body:
Perfect for travel nurses or doctors! Watch the video here: https://vimeo.com/402354142 Pass: HayesRental, and email me for a personal virtual tour over Facetime, Skype or Zoom. Any length of lease negotiable.

Come home to a retreat on a quiet side street while being right in the middle of the shopping, restaurants and nightlife of Hayes Valley. Walk score 97, Transit score 100. Lots of shuttle bus stops nearby. Street parking is plentiful and easy. 2 blocks from historic Alamo Square park and 2 blocks from vibrant Patricia's Green. Apartment offered furnished or not. We can meet virtually and I can walk you around/show you all the details you'd like to see.

The apartment is a spacious, airy 'classic San Francisco' flat that has just been renovated in style! Brand new bathroom with penny tile, classic wood bead-board walls, antique restored clawfoot tub, and heater/fan; bright, elegant living room painted in rich mossy green; large, updated kitchen and breakfast nook; 2 bedrooms with super comfy queen beds, painted calming soft grey/green/blues with intricate wallpaper and wooden trim; good storage space; a new washer/dryer and a beautiful, plant-filled side-yard. This historic duplex has a ton of charm, soaring 11' ceilings, chandeliers & unique victorian details throughout with modern amenities done in character with the house. My partner and I have lived upstairs almost 5 years and really care about continuing to make things nicer, with an artistic eye and insistence on quality. When it comes to selecting finishes, fixing something as it ages or general improvements, we treat the rental flat the same as our home and look for what's right, beautiful and well designed, not what's cheap. The pictures really don't do it justice (and we're finishing last tweaks this week). We love animals and non-destructive kitties and dogs are welcome. We share the side yard (in which we have a beautiful container garden) and laundry facilities.

Rent includes water, trash/recycling/compost. You’d pay for gas and electric utilities. Please email or text me to set up an appointment by Facetime, Zoom, Google Hangouts or even Skype! 213 and then a three 24, followed by 2259. No brokers or realtors please.

name: One bedroom Apartment home with an Amazing View!
body:
SOMA one bedroom/one bathroom apartment home centrally located in the heart of the city. Windows on two sides of the living room walls. name: Beautiful 3-2BR/1BA , Pet Consid, by Lafayette Park ( 2011 Sacramento)
body:
* $4,750/ month annual lease
* Pet consid for an add'l fee
* Shared Laundry
* Available: May 1st or sooner 


ADDRESS: 2011 Sacramento #5
VIDEO TOUR: https://youtu.be/YD0yulImMeY

Absolutely gorgeous period piece San Francisco style apartment on the top floor of a building overlooking Lafayette Park. Original detail lovingly retained on walls, ceiling, built-in cabinetry, some doors and windows. Fully remodeled, it has hardwood floors throughout except in stone kitchen and bath. All rooms except the bath have skylights. Living room and one bedroom have wall sconces in addition to hanging center light. Center hallway and kitchen have track lighting.

Kitchen and living room are at the back of the apartment. Modern kitchen has all stainless appliances including gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, black marble counters and dark wood cabinets. The living room can be accessed either from the kitchen or central hallway. Living room can be converted into a bedroom, kitchen will be common space. The center hallway has a stack of built-in cabinetry.

Both bedrooms face Lafayette Park. One has wall sconces, the other includes stained glass windows. Both have walk-in closets but the closet for one of the two is directly across from the bedroom's entrance. Elegant bath has shower-over-tub with sliding glass door. Pets are considered at an additional fee.

Building is in Pacific Heights. Both Walk Score and Transit Score are 93. The start of Polk Street's extensive shopping and dining district is three blocks away. Bus lines 1, 19, 27, 47 and 49 are all within three blocks.

Pictures are from similar unit in the same building.

Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.

Everest Mwamba
Kenney & Everest Real Estate

name: Beautifully funsihed 1bed 1 bath for rent
body: Central Glen Park living in charming 1BR/1BA detached home w/ entertaining patio on wrap-around deck walkable to restaurants, bars and fun. Perfect for a first time home buyer or developer. High ceilings lend the open Great Room a lofty air, where natural light gleams off hardwood floors from a bay of tall windows. Entertain guests from the adjoining kitchen. Capture city views from the bedroom, marble-tiled bathroom & rear deck. A flexible bonus room that can be used as an office/den or 2nd bedroom completes this home. With Noe Valley & Bernal Heights a heartbeat away, there's always something to do, somewhere to go. A charming, walkable neighborhood, Glen Park locals get morning coffee cake from Destination Baking and fresh homemade soups from Canyon Market. Glen Canyon Park's meandering trails entertain families while its newly updated rec center boasts tennis, rock climbing and pickle ball. Commute on I-280 from the 1-car garage or walk to Glen Park BART station a few blocks away

name: Hayes Valley Beautiful Furnished Apartment, available May 25th
body:
Completely furnished 2 bedroom apartment available for [relatively] short- and long-term rentals.  May be available as soon as May 1st.

Fully equipped kitchen, cozy living room, cable, W/D in unit, comfy queen beds, 1 bath.  Street parking only.  Storage in basement.

Conveniently located in Hayes Valley, close to Market Street, and public transportation. Close to grocery stores, deli/cafes, fabulous restaurants, clubs and shopping, Theater District, Financial District, Civic Center.

Note Terms: This property is a furnished only, short-term, transitional use home. 2/month Min - 12/month Max. 

Includes: trash/recycling.   Not included housecleaning (subsidized but about $100 every other week), PG+E, internet, and water. Owners are strong enviros:  we conserve water, save energy, compost, and recycle, and believe folks may conserve more when paying directly for services.  

For a prompt response to your inquiry, please include the following:
1) References (required)
2) Personal email and phone number

OTHER PRICING DETAILS
$3995 mo rent

     *Housecleaners do many neighboring homes -- they are highly regarded and you will be psyched!
Security + last months rent spread out over 4-6 months.
Minimum Lease: 2/mo
Available on May 25th.

THE CONTACT

Experience the epitome of urban living in this newly remodeled and comfortable 1BR apartment with a brand new kitchen and a bathroom located in one of San Francisco's most exclusive neighborhoods Russian Hill/Cow Hollow, steps from Polk and Union Streets with numerous cafes, restaurants, bars, boutique shopping and with easy access to Muni.

2360 Van Ness offers the architectural charms of old San Francisco. The pet-friendly apartments feature updated kitchen and baths with granite counters, sleek cabinets and stainless steel appliances including microwaves and dishwashers. Close proximity to the Presidio, Palace of Fine Arts and Chrissy Field make it an ideal spot for, well, pretty much everyone.

body:

* Available:Now 

PRIVATE SHOWING :Tuesday (4/7) from 4:45PM-5PM.  We will keep safe distance. 
. 
Virtual Tour : https://youtu.be/neIlzCi5b2A
Location: 780 Guerrero #8

Newly remodeled 2-1 BR/1BA second floor apartment in the Mission Dolores district. Floors are dark hardwood except in tile bath. Heat is via steam radiators. Very large open kitchen serves as the common space. Kitchen has new stainless gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator and granite counters. It could fit a couch and table or full dining arrangement. Small room connected to kitchen can be used as storage space. One bedroom is at the back of the building overlooking the yard and has a huge walk-in closet. The other room can be used as a living room or as a second bedroom and it has a closet with sliding mirror doors. Elegant bath has glass shower stall. There is a large closet near the apartment's entrance. Shared yard is concrete with bike rack, potted plants. Building has coin operated washer and dryer.

Building is on Guerrero, four blocks equidistant from shopping and dining on 16th and 24th Streets. It's just one block to the south end of Dolores Park. Walk Score is 97, Transit Score is 92. Lots of transportation options within easy walking distance include 16th and 24th Street BART stations, J-Church MUNI, and bus lines 14, 22, 33, 49.

Pictures are from a similar unit in the same building.

Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.

Everest Mwamba

name: Gigantic studio-sized master bedroom /w private bath in Nopa mansion!
body:
****The room is usually $2700/mo but during those crazy times we are offering a discounted rent of $2200 until the end of July - short term lease considered during that time. 

Come join us in our mansion in Nopa! We currently have our master bedroom open that is by far the largest room, the walk-in closet is the largest in the city and comes with a private bathroom with a dedicated shower and bathtub. You have to see it for yourself! We think this is a great space for couples who want more than a simple studio or if you want a massive room with walk-in closet and double sink bathroom to yourself!

You have roommates when you want them, but a gigantic living room with 4 sun windows, a dining room with an extra comfy couch and nice views, as well as a den upstairs give everyone plenty of room to themselves when they need to. The kitchen has a 6-burner viking range, plenty of storage for all kitchen gadgets/pantry items, a dishwasher, as well as washer and dryer. You really have to see it in person to get a feel for it.

We are in the heart of Nopa, 2 blocks away from Divis. If you know it, it's super clean, quiet and neighborhoody, while in Divis has all the action you would want. We are right by the 5/5R/31 that brings you downtown in 15 minutes. We have a GoBike station on the same block and with the Wiggle, you can bike/scooter into the mission in 10 minutes. We have a Lucky's grocery store 5 minutes away, and Trader Joe's/Target/Bi-Rite 10 minute walk away. Golden Gate Park is 10 minutes away as well, or reading a book on Alamo Square while overlooking the city is just 5 minutes.

As for the people itself, we are looking to create a community of people that want to live together. The apartment is so big that you can always have space to yourself (which everyone needs to!), but we don't want to live in an apartment where everyone hides in their rooms. The apartment is too gorgeous for that. Currently we have

J - He's originally from New Hampshire, MIT grad, knows everything about distributed systems and now a software engineer at Facebook.
J - French-American, grew up in Paris loves everything cheese, bread and wine. A video editor learning about production on the side who’s big into sustainability, zero waste, farmers markets and the outdoors. 
K - Another New Englander who got tired of shoveling her driveway. Works in restaurant operations and studies design on the side.
M - Proud Canadian from Toronto. Really into wine, cycling and photography these days, but always found in the outdoors and appropriately works at Hipcamp.com
N - Originally grew up in Berlin, Germany, watches football, but plays soccer. Dances sometimes https://nambrot.com/aroundtheworld

You - Interested in making this a clean, fun, yet relaxed home. The usual fine print of having a stable income, be a clean and courteous roommate apply. We have cleaners come by every 2 weeks and keep the place above-average clean in the first place. No pets unfortunately. The lease will be month-to-month, but we are looking for people that don't want their apartment to be just an collection of roommate after roommate like so many apartments in SF. Move-in is ASAP! As per usual, there is only so much you can convey in a listing like this, so please reach out!

name: Bright 2-Level Condo w/ GG Bridge Views! 3BD+Office/2BA/2-Car Gar Prkg
body:
2920 OCTAVIA STREET
Summary:
      Rent: $7,200
      Bed/Bath: 3bd+office / 2ba
      Type: Condo / Unfurnished
      Parking:  2-car garage prk
      Terms:  1 Year Lease Terms
      Available: Now
_____________________________________________________________
Bright 2-Level Condo w/ GG Bridge Views on a Lovely Cow Hollow Block.
UNIT FEATURES:

3 bedrooms + office/nursery, 2 baths, 2 over-sized decks & 2 car private garage with workroom  
Gorgeous dark stained Hardwood floors throughout
Elegant living room features a decorative fireplace with inlaid sandstone surround, mantel and all framed by built in bookshelves with cabinets.
Bay windows with custom plantation shutters, crown molding, recessed lighting w/ dimmers and in ceiling speakers finish off this lovely and very livable room
Spacious eat in kitchen with an abundance of storage & counter space, stainless steel appliances and breakfast bar
Additional extended area off of kitchen for formal dining or family room area
2 bedrooms on this main living level share access to a full bath with shower over tub
Upper master bedroom  features a huge private deck w/ GG Bridge and city views, 2 large closets
Master bath has deep soak tub and separate shower
Upper level has additional room that can be used as a nursery or small office
Rear deck offers lots of room for lounging next to laundry room with sink and wine fridge
Large 2-car private garage with plenty of storage and separate workroom
Walk Score 94: A walker's paradise; with Union Street & Chestnut Street corridors to choose from, there are plenty of restaurant, shopping, & entertainment options just outside your door
Bike Score 77: Very bike-able area; mostly flat, excellent bike lanes
Transit Score 86: Excellent transit; with multiple MUNI bus lines within a couple blocks away such as the 41-Union, the 45-Stockton, & the 28-19THAVE

Neighborhood:
The Cow Hollow neighborhood is serene and private by urban standards, yet conveniently located near the boutiques, parks, and restaurants on the Union and Chestnut Street Corridors. For recreation, there's The Presidio, Crissy Field and the Marina Green. The beloved Cow Hollow Playground is tucked in a near-secret setting off Baker Street. MUNI lines and tech shuttles make transportation a cinch. Access to the Golden Gate Bridge is nearly instant!
											
Contact: REPLY AT TOP
Jeanne Zimmermann
Director of Leasing
DRE# 01393214
www.mcguire.com/rentals

body:
Rent an Original in the Heart of North Beach. This Light Filled 3BR

Legacy Update Exemplifies Authenticity.  History + Modernity are

United in Holy Matrimony.  Located in a Vibrant Fun Area

Where Locals Lift Their Hands in the Air and Say "Abbondanza" for

The Good Life of Food. Family. Fun. Holy Cannoli.  It's All Here Right Off

Washington Square in an Area with Bohemian Vibes. Where the Spirit of

Joe DiMaggio, Francis Ford Coppola & Lawrence Ferlinghetti is Alive & Well.

Ideal Setup for Shares for $1665 Each Since All Bedrooms Are Same Size.

name: Remarkable Value. Unbeatable Location!!!
body:
Fox Plaza Apartments is pleased to offer virtual tours of our homes. With the rapidly evolving Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation, we have updated our business practices based on the Federal State of Emergency and the local Shelter in Place ordinance. Therefore, we have temporarily ceased all in-person property tours with prospective residents and instead, we invite you to visit our website to virtually walk through one of our beautiful homes. 

We also invite you to call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual tour with one of our leasing professionals. We can give you specific information about individual homes and also get you scheduled for a self-guided tour.


Convenience, Rent Control, and Modern Living! What More Could You Want? Fox Plaza has this and more! 

Living at Fox Plaza makes life so much easier. Walk outside and your steps away from Muni, Bart, and highway 101. It makes getting to work a breeze!
We are located in the dynamic downtown Hub neighborhood. Just outside your door, enjoy a variety of restaurants and cafés in Hayes Valley, catch a show at the SF Orpheum Theater or venture further to shop at the notable Union Square.

From the moment you walk through the front door you'll feel the comfort and serenity that makes our residents happy to call us home. Where else can you get fantastic views from all angles and one or more private balconies? Fox Plaza is where! Our homes feature sleek white cabinets, Caesarstone counter tops, efficient stainless-steel appliances, a spacious open floor plan, vinyl plank flooring and full length and/or spacious walk in closets.

As a valued resident, take advantage of our 24- hour state of the art fitness center to achieve your health goals! Wash multiple loads at once in our 24/7 laundry room. Don't want to hang out there watching your clothes? No worries. There's an app to inform you that your load is finished. Best of all we are pet friendly! :)

Stop by and take a look at the newly renovated Studio, #2616. This beautiful home awaits you for a discounted rate of only $2,720 on a 12-month lease! Don’t let this opportunity pass you by! 

Community also includes:

• Starbucks
• Andersen's Bakery
• USPS
• Secure Garage Parking – discounted rate for residents 

Fox Plaza Leasing Office
1390 Market St Ste. 107
San Francisco, CA 94102

Looking for more information? Find us at: http://www.essexfoxplaza.com/
Call us today to schedule a tour:  


*Pricing and Availability is subject to change*
*Equal Housing Opportunity
*Pictures may not be of actual apartment

body:

We strive to create communities where people feel at home and invite you to virtually experience a tour of our modern living interiors and life-enriching amenities you can enjoy every day. Our simple leasing process will save you time by choosing the home that feels right for you-all from the comfort of where you are, 24/7. For more information about apartment communities available in Northern California, visit www.woodmontrentals.com

O & M Apartments 680 Indiana Street | San Francisco, CA 94107

Live in one of San Francisco's dynamic waterfront neighborhoods - Dogpatch! Spacious floor plans with all the features you want. Explore our available studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartments as well as 2-level loft residences to find the one that fits you best. Enjoy one of our fire pits, outdoor lounges, or host a BBQ with friends on one of our two roof decks with 360 degree views of the city and water. Amazing restaurants, nightlife, parks, entertainment venues, and public transportation in your backyard. Contact us today to schedule your private tour!

name: 3 Bed-Avalon at Mission Bay, up to 1 1/2 Months FREE RENT!!!
body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.
 
 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. body:
Mission Bay by Windsor

360 Berry Street, San Francisco, CA, 94158

Pricing & Availability subject to change daily.

Located in the contemporary Mission Bay neighborhood of San Francisco, Mission Bay by Windsor is a boutique apartment community just steps from the waterfront and thoughtfully created for your perspective. A one-of-a-kind community providing a private retreat in the middle of the metropolis.

The Mission Bay by Windsor lifestyle is unexpected - by design. We offer a variety of one, two, and three bedroom floor plans tailored to your individual lifestyle. Our homes have been carefully and thoughtfully appointed with the most modern, top-of-the-line comforts. Nine foot ceilings, open concept kitchens, Energy Star stainless steel appliances, full-size washer and dryers, walk-in closets, keyless entry and amazing views all come standard. Mission Bay by Windsor is intentionally designed to foster a unique sense of community in a property appointed with top-notch features.

Mission Bay by Windsor takes connectivity to an entirely new level. The community's thoughtful design and centered social, recreational, business and transportation opportunities create an environment unlike any in the region.

name: Prime Cow Hollow Neighborhood 2 Bedroom Flat
body:
Now offering move-in special: one months free rent with immediate move-in!

We are pleased to announce the availability of a charming first floor 2+ bedroom, 2 bath flat in San Francisco’s Cow Hollow neighborhood in the heart of the Marina District. With an impressive walk score of 98 and within a short block from Lombard, this six-unit apartment building retains the charm of a classic San Francisco flat with touches of modern conveniences.

Entering the apartment up a short flight of stairs, a long hallway provides separation from different parts of the unit. Two bedrooms are at opposite ends of the flat with hardwood floors throughout. A front parlor can be converted into a third bedroom if needed. The large kitchen offers various prep areas and includes a gas stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher. A private laundry room and access to the shared backyard completes this apartment. At approximately 1,100 square feet, highlighted features include:
*Custom Paint
*Hardwood Floors
*Bathtub and Shower Combo
*Gas Heating
*Dual Pane Windows
*Dine in Kitchen
*Modern Bathroom
*Off Street Parking on a First Come First Serve Basis Monitored by Tenants
*Entertainment: Marina Theatre .1 miles; Presidio Theatre .3 miles; LucasFilm Lobby .7 miles; Fort Mason .8 miles; Clay Theater .6 miles.
*Marina Restaurants: MaMo, The Dorian, Delarosa, Mamanoko, Balboa Café, A16, Ace Wasabi, Alegrias, Atelier Crenn, Baker Street Bistro, Isa, Naked Fish, Delarosa, Pacific Catch

body:

name: Fantastic 3 bedroom remodeling with pergo wood floors in bedrooms
body:
Great 3 bedroom at 24th St and Harrison available around May 1st.
Open living room and kitchen with bay windows and good sunlight. Kitchen has gas stove and microwave.
2 good sized bedrooms and huge master bedroom. All bedrooms have closets. Quiet in bedrooms since they do not face the street. Bedrooms will have pergo oak wood floors.
1 shared full bath with bath tub.  Second full bath with shower in master bedroom.  Central gas heating.
Amazing location close to Bart, restaurants and night life
Water and Garbage included in rent
One year lease and then month to month
Rent is $4750 Security deposit is $3000, move in costs first month rent and security deposit
Well behaved dogs and cats allowed with $200 security deposit per pet. Please no smoking.

body:

Description:

	Stunning two bedroom two bathroom Pacific Heights condo located at on Pacific Avenue in a boutique condo building maintained to the highest standards.

	This condo comes fully turn-key furnished and is ready for move in around March 20, 2020 for around 6 months (owner has some flexibility).

	Unit Features:

	~ Beautifully furnished throughout - over 1350sf!
	~ Gorgeous living and dining area with stunning views of the Bay
	~ Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a gas stove with grill and 2 ovens
	~ Two large bedrooms with ample closet space - one is a master suite with private bathroom
	~ Miele washer and dryer in unit
	~ Two bathrooms with modern finishes
	~ Private balcony with amazing views of the San Francisco Bay
	~ One parking space in attached garage (not for a super large SUV) for $350

	A small dog will be considered. All utilities are included in the rent.

	Tenant pays for once a month maid service for $100.

	Additional common laundry room available for free use in the building for large items. 

	Great location near Union Street and Fillmore St coffee houses, restaurants and pubs. 94 Walkscore! 90 Ridescore!

	Available around May 1, 2020 for approximately 4 months. 

	Owner will be moving back into the unit around September 2020.

	Property can be seen now with a minimum of 24 hour notice. 
This is a non-smoking unit. Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.

name: HUGE 2 bedrooms/2 baths Pac Hghts PRIVATE PATIO + FIREPLACE +BAY VIEWS
body:
This gorgeous HUGE 2 bedrooms with 2 large bathrooms apartment home is located at 2140 Pacific Avenue in prime Pacific Heights...steps to all Fillmore Street shopping!

As you walk into your apartment you enter a large foyer which leads to the living room and separate spacious dining room. The dining room has gorgeous French Doors which lead to the units PRIVATE outdoor PATIO!!

The foyer and dining room have designer lighting fixtures in keeping with the buildings style and grace. The master bedroom has a large en-suite bathroom with separate bathtub and shower. This unit also has lots of closet space (including a large walk-in closet in the master bedroom) and telecom system to allow guests to enter the building lobby. 

Enormous picture windows allow for tons of light. With 10' ceilings throughout, original crown moldings, newly refinished hardwood floors and an enormous wood-burning FIREPLACE, this apartment has the grace of the 1920's style. 

This unit features a fabulous and large kitchen with BRAND-NEW all full size and STAINLESS appliances including: Including Bosch Refrigerator, stove/oven, garbage disposal and dishwasher!

In addition, this apartment home has STUNNING views of the BAY and Pacific Heights!

2140 Pacific Avenue includes both a resident elevator, as well as a service elevator. In addition, the buildings roof deck has lounge chairs, with stunning San Francisco and Golden Gate Bridge Views!

To view this unit please contact the on-site manager, Kathleen, at  

No pets please. 

2140 Pacific Avenue received a 92% on walking score! Please visit http://www.walkscore.com/score/2140-pacific-ave-san-francisco-ca-94109

*In building parking available for $250.00 
*Included in Rent: Heat, Water, Trash, Sewer, Free Bike Storage 
*Please note: This unit is dedicated as smoke-free

name: Feel the City in a Beautiful Studio, Ready to Rent!Vtour 2213.00
body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.You. Are. Here. The Fillmore Center is surrounded by a community so diverse it feels like a city within a city with its own unique blend of shops, cafes and theaters. At home, you'll actually find space to stretch out and relax or recharge, a hard-to-find commodity here in San Francisco. Not to mention upgraded kitchen and bathroom features to enhance your lifestyle. When the day is done, you'll enjoy dazzling skyline views of the city and the fog rolling in at night. name: One-Bedroom, One-Bath layout with abundant natural light
body: Exquisite Bay Bridge and Downtown view Residence at The Brannan, South Beach's premier luxury high-rise. Featuring a One-Bedroom, One-Bath layout with abundant natural light throughout, Residence 15B showcases open living spaces and a Northeast facing balcony with views spanning across the Downtown City Skyline and onto glittering Bay Bridge lights. In-home laundry and secured garage parking for one car. Luxurious Brannan amenities include 24/7 attended Lobby, Concierge, Pool, Fitness Center, Cabana and Outdoor Kitchen, Courtyard with Pond and seating, on-site Manager, Maintenance, Janitorial and Engineering Staff. Minutes from the Embarcadero, The Brannan's ideal location is within close proximity to Downtown, Caltrain and BART, tech shuttle stops, parks, the Ferry Building, and AT&T Park.

name: Luxury View Penthouse Apartment
body:
San Francisco’s perfect location for your extended stay.

Website Here:  https://www.luxviewsf.com/

Our home is the two-story penthouse unit in a 4-unit building located in North Beach/Telegraph Hill. It is perfectly centered between The Financial District (“FiDi”), Pier 39, Fisherman's Wharf and North Beach (the Italian District).  Ideally situated and appointed for a relocating professional and her/his family, a “work team” in need of extended housing away from their home-base, or a displaced family unable to live in their normal residence due to construction or the like. 

It's walking distance (or a very short Uber ride) to the Financial District, Chinatown, and Union Square. Coit Tower is a few block away. Giants games, Boutique shopping, and world-class museums are just a short Uber ride away. And, if you just want to spend a day at home, relaxing, you'll find the top floor to be peaceful and calm high above the hustle and bustle of SF.

We provide all furniture and furnishings (bed linens, towels, etc.).  The kitchen is fully stocked with all glassware, barware, flatware and gourmet cooking essentials - you will feel right at home cooking in our home.  We supply all consumables such as sponges, paper towels, toilet paper, dish soap/tablets, laundry detergent and the like.

You can literally bring your suitcase and a toothbrush, and you’ll have everything you need for your stay.  

A complete list of additional amenities and perks listed on this page.  And if you feel like something is missing, just let us know and we will make it happen - we go above and beyond to have the most comfortable and well-appointed extended stay furnished rental in San Francisco.

Note that the penthouse has its own private entrance, as do the other three (one bedroom) apartments. The other 3 units are occupied by three long term tenants - all middle-aged professionals and all-around great people.

Ideal for a family relocating and in need of temporary housing, or a team or professionals in town for a few months.  Our home is replete with the amenities and personal touches that will make you feel at home while away from your’s.  

Available:  Imediately

Key Features:
3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms

1,750 sq. ft. (approx. inc. deck)

Fully and Luxuriously Furnished

Panoramic Views

Private huge deck

En Suite Master Bedroom (jacuzzi tub!)

2 Guest bedrooms with bath

Fee Onsite Garage Parking -  (1 midsize car/SUV)

Gourmet Kitchen -  (Wolf Range, Sub-Zero Refrigerator, Miele Dishwasher)

Shared rear deck off of Master (perfect for that morning cup of coffee!)

Key Amenities & Perks:

WiFi, Cable TV, Netflix included

LED Televisions in every room

Washer & Dryer

All Linens Provided

Two Fireplaces

Printer/Scanner

Fully Stocked Bar*

Nespresso 

Gas BBQ with complimentary fuel

Child/Toddler Ready

NO Pets

NO smoking (deck is okay)

name: Up to 4 Weeks Free! Furnished Studio In Prime Downtown SF!
body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.Luxury High Rise Apartments in Downtown San Francisco What makes The Towers at Rincon Luxury Apartments a great place to live? We're happy you asked. Our studio, one-bedroom and two-bedroom luxury apartments for rent in downtown San Francisco are designed for the ultimate in excellence and comfort. Due to the unique shape of The Towers at Rincon, each apartment has a layout and a view unlike any other, including vistas of the North Bay, Financial District, Bay Bridge, Ferry Tower or South of Market. Another view and attraction in close proximity to our apartments in San Francisco, CA is The Embarcadero, which provides a variety of sights and shopping opportunities.  Call Now:  show contact info

body:

This spacious two bedroom receives plenty of natural lighting! 

Both bedrooms offer private entrances, with private bathrooms which include dual sinks, built-in linen cabinets, stand-up showers & roman tubs. The walk-in closets are must see! You might have to shop just to fill the space!

name: Mission Bay: 235 Berry Street 2BR/2BA Condo w/ parking
body:
235 Berry Street #302

https://www.235berrystreet302.com

This spacious Mission Bay 2BR/2BA condo offers environmentally conscientious
features along with the sophistication of fine materials and detailing. The open concept
living/dining is bright and spacious. Access to your exclusive use patio from the living/dining
area offers calming views of the lushly landscaped common area courtyard. The master suite
with 2 spacious closets and dual vanity bath is a welcome oasis at the end of the day. The
second bedroom and guest bath are equally as spacious inviting. The home is complete with
an in-unit washer/dryer and 1 car parking. Living at 235 Berry means you have a multitude of
options just outside your front door and much more via the Caltrain and Muni station one block
away. If you love to exercise or being outside, living next to Mission Creek makes outdoor
activities a breeze. Located near shopping, dining, entertainment, Oracle Park and The Chase
Center.

Unit Features:
2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
960 sq. ft. per tax records
Floor-to-ceiling windows
Exclusive use patio overlooking the lushly landscaped common area courtyard
Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops
Bedrooms offer plenty of storage
Master bathroom features Kohler fixtures, Toto toilet, limestone countertops, dual sinks
Secondary bathroom features ceramic tile countertops, frameless mirror, Kohler fixtures
Pre-wired data/communications and satellite TV system
In-unit washer/dryer
1-car parking
Exclusive-use bike rack

Building Features:
Full-time doorperson/concierge, manager, and cleaning staff
Courtyard garden overlooking Mission Creek
Located in prestigious Mission Bay neighborhood
Walk Score of 92 / Transit Score of 89 / Bike Score of 95
Easy freeway and public transit access

This classic Edwardian flat will make you look forward to coming home. Located less than one block from the trendy shops and gourmet restaurants on Fillmore Street, features of this restored flat include: 

- top floor of a charming three story building 
- crown molding, wainscoting and oak wood floors throughout 
- large, open and spacious

- master bedroom with large windows, plantation shutters and a great view 
- two bright guest bedrooms, one of which has a Victorian decorative fireplace and large bay windows

- bathroom has a clawfoot tub under a bright skylight  
- large living room with great views and an extra large window looking out on Pacific Heights 
- stained glass skylight over the stairs 
- private deck with unobstructed, gorgeous views of the city 
- washer/dryer in shared laundry room 
- high ceilings, hardwood floors and central heat add comfort to this classic flat 
- accessible shared yard 
- best street parking in the area 
- extra storage space in laundry room 
- Walk Score: 99 Walkers paradise 
- excellent transit and very bike able 
- very cool landlord! 

Nearby you'll find: 
- Alta Plaza and Lafayette Parks 
- movie theaters  
- transportation corridors

- Mollie Stones 
- Pizzeria Delfina 
- Sift Cupcakes

- MAC Cosmetics 

And most of the above shops are within 2 blocks of the apartment.... This is an incredible neighborhood to live in!

name: Master Bedroom in Mission
body:
The details:
$1,675/month rent
$1,500 deposit
Month-to-month lease
5/1/2020 Move-in
$60-$75/month utilities (water, electric, internet), split evenly 3 ways 

The room:
Master Bedroom with private bath.
14ft x 12 ft with additional spacious closet (2ft x 8ft). East-facing window means plenty of morning sunlight if desired. Room comes unfurnished.

The apartment:
3 bedroom, 2 bath nestled between the Mission and Potrero Hill right across the street from SF General Hospital. Top floor walk-up unit with hardwood floors and incredible views of twin peaks, Sutro tower, and the Mission. Kitchen features tons of cabinet space, granite countertops, dishwasher, and gas range. Dual living and dining room currently furnished with microfiber sofa/loveseat combination and full dining table with seating for up to 6. Bathroom features marble floors and full bath with detachable shower head. Easy access to Potrero shopping center (including Safeway, Ross, 24 Hour Fitness, etc), access to downtown via 9 Bus or walk to Bart in 10-15 minutes.  

Street parking permit can be obtained through the appropriate San Francisco agency.  Sorry, no pets allowed.

The neighborhood:
Easy access to 24th street restaurants and nightlife with the quieter vibe of a residential area. Quick walk up to Potrero hill or into the heart of the mission. Enjoy a quiet nook in one of the sunniest spots in San Francisco.

The roommates:

Mark (35) is an attorney in SF.

Charlie (35) works in solar energy in Oakland. Did Peace Corps in Dominican Republic, with Mark, and then business school before landing in SF. 

About you:
If you're interested in the room, tell us about yourself!  Please include a link to your Linkedin profile. We'll reach out if there's a good fit.

Description:

	This is a new constructed, corner Studio apartment in a 12-unit building. You would be the first to reside in this unit. You are a short walk from Whole Foods, transit and all the action in Haight Ashbury, and Irving/Judah streets. Walkable to GG Park and UCSF Medical Campus. Easy downtown commute on the N-Judah. 

	 

	This apartment features the following:


		Rent controlled unit

		Front, street-level, sidewalk entrance unit (right side on the building photo above).

		Newly constructed; everything in the unit is new. 

		Hardwood throughout

		Kitchen with electric range/oven, tile counters and plenty of cabinet/storage space.

		Sleeping alcove (big enough for a Queen bed) with closet. 

		Spacious studio living area. Windows are high-set, for privacy.

		Bath with wall-mounted sink and glass, stall shower.

		Water/Trash/heat included. Tenant only responsible for electricity and cable/internet.

		Coin-op laundry in-building

		Bike storage in the building


	No parking available. Street parking w/ SFMTA permit is easy within a block.

	Sorry, no pets.
This is a non-smoking unit. Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.

name: Spacious & Modern Top Floor 3 Bdrm, 1.5 bath
body:
Our historic 1906 Victorian has been lovingly remodeled as a spacious (1100 sq ft) and modern apartment, yet still retains the original charm of a turn of the century era home. Full of modern conveniences including gourmet kitchen, large open plan living & dining and sunny rear deck – all only moments from the activity Valencia & Mission Streets! Walk to all the best restaurants, shops, cafes, and bars. As close as you are to the action, you will be tucked away on a side-street with little cross-traffic = surprisingly quiet. Available May 1st. 

It features high ceilings, decorative detailing and hardwood floors. The electrical and plumbing systems have been completely updated. The apartment is currently furnished, however, could be available un-furnished also.

A spacious top floor apartment filled with natural light. Features include the following:

– 3 bedrooms
– 1.5 bathrooms
– Large fully equipped gourmet kitchen (this is an open plan Kitchen that looks onto the dining and living areas)
– Spacious living and dining areas (1,100 sq ft)
– Hardwood floors
– Fireplace (gas)
– Washer and Dryer in the apartment
– Private rear deck with outdoor seating
– Shared garden
– Parking (tandem) avail ($200 month) in a secure garage (shared with 2 other cars)
– Well-behaved pets considered

Available either furnished or un-furnished.

Location/Transportation:

7-minute walk to 24th Bart Station, 15-minute commute to Montgomery Station in FiDi door-to-station. 5-minute drive to the highway. Close to many tech shuttles.

Right off of Valencia street (Coffee shops, vintage stores, restaurants, and grocery stores). Enjoy a coffee and a morning snack at one of the best bakeries in the city just right around the corner. Two very convenient bodegas within a block away to grab a bevy or snacks to hit Dolores Park!

$5,800 a month
Utilities: landlord pays water & garbage, tenant pays electric
1 year lease

name: THE MARIPOSA | VIRTUAL TOUR  | MISSION BAY
body: Welcome to the Mariposa at 601 Tennessee. This brand new building has a great boutique feel with 20 units, 5 floors and a roof deck. You will feel right at home in this fully furnished 2 bedroom 2 bathroom unit with state of the art appliances, modern finishes and in unit laundry. Technology is thoughtfully integrated through many features from Nest Thermostats, Free Wifi and Latch keyless entry systems. BBQ while enjoying views of the Bay and downtown from the fabulous roof top terrace. Enjoy your stay in San Francisco, living as you should be, in luxury and style at the Mariposa. Just minutes from the Chase Center, UCSF Medical Center, and Oracle Park, while offering easy access to the 101 and 280 FWYS. Call today to schedule a private tour. name: Top Floor HUGE Renovated Flat, Fully Furnished, Avail thru Aug 30
body:
FURNISHED Apartment available August 30 on flexible Month-to-Month basis, 30 days minimum. Monthly base may vary depending on number of residents and other factors.

This Mission District flat has been recently renovated keeping many of the apartment’s 1908 details, with a sweeping stairway entry, high ceilings and hardwood floors throughout.

The open floor plan combines a chef’s kitchen, spacious dining room and comfortable living room - all surrounded by large windows with spectacular views of Sutro Tower and Twin Peaks. The spacious eat-in kitchen is equipped with all modern appliances and has everything you need to prepare meals. The living room is furnished with comfortable seating and a brand new flatscreen smart TV. Each of the four comfortable bedrooms has a queen size bed and its own flatscreen smart TV.

WiFi available throughout the apartment. Laundry washer and dryer are on-site.

No smoking or pets permitted.

Deposit and Cleaning Fee required. Landlord pays for garbage collection, internet; water, gas and electric utilities up to normal use limits.

APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS

name: Duboce Triangle Garden Apt, Furnished, Avail June 1 (6mo max)
body:
FURNISHED Apartment available June 1 on flexible Month-to-Month basis, 30 days minimum. Six months maximum lease agreement. Monthly base may vary depending on number of residents and other factors.

Old meets Modern in this newly furnished lower level/garden apartment with a light filled bedroom in the Duboce Triangle neighborhood.

This unit sits at the back of the apartment building so you won't have any street noise. The bedroom is on the cozy side but has a comfortable queen bed and a large closet. The living room is very roomy and the kitchen is just right for two people with an extra chair in the living room in case you have a guest. The backyard is shared.

Short walk to Mission (access to 16th and Mission bart), Hayes Valley and the Castro. Tons of local Cafes, Brunch spots just down the block.
No smoking

Pet policy: Cats allowed with additional deposit and reference from previous landlord.

name: Garden Apt w/ Pvt Patio, Furnished, 1-6mo Lease
body:
FURNISHED apartment available for 1-6 months tenancy, month-to-month.

Remodeled with ease and simplicity in mind, this peaceful 1bed/1bath garden-level apartment makes coming home from a long day of work or exploring both relaxing and easy to do. The space is furnished with a comfortable king-size bed, bathroom essentials, living/dining area, and a fully-stocked kitchen with cookware and utensils -- all ready for your enjoyment.

Super clean bathroom with a spacious walk-in shower featuring dual shower heads, a shower bench and railing assist.

Open-concept kitchen with abundant counter space plus an island. Appliances include: dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator/freezer, range with gas cooktop.

French double doors lead to a patio with table and chairs.

Bernal Heights is a quiet residential neighborhood with plenty of green space and a wide range of shops and eateries along picturesque Cortland Avenue. From the apartment, you can take a brisk one-mile trek to the summit of Bernal Hill, a favorite spot for local picnickers that offers expansive views of the Financial District to the north, Twin Peaks to the west, and Glen Park to the south.

No smoking. Cats and small dogs considered.

Deposit and Cleaning Fee required. Landlord pays for garbage collection, internet; water, gas and electric utilities up to normal use limits.

name: Chic 1 BDR/1 BA in the Arterra in Mission Bay
body:
300 Berry St #307 in the Arterra in MIssion Bay

This chic 1 BD/ 1 BATH unit offers eco-friendly living, and a modern design. Built by renowned architect Kwan Henmi, Arterra is San Francisco's first LEED certified residential development.

UNIT
- 1 BDR
- 1 full bath
- NEW Hardwood floors and paint throughout
- Floor-to-ceiling windows
- Modern kitchen
- Bright open floor plan: living room and kitchen 
- In unit washer/dryer

AMENITIES
- 24/7 front desk attendant
- Shared BBQ and outdoor terrace
- State-of-the-art fitness center
- Resident lounge with fireplace and kitchen
- Guest Suite

Building
- Arterra is a luxury LEED - certified highrise
- Year built: 2008
- 3 buildings; total units: 269
- Completely smoke free building

TERMS
- 12 month lease
- Security deposit: 1.5x rent
- Utilities: Owner pays for water & garbage, Tenant pays PG&E
- One car garage parking and storage locker included
- HOA Move In Fee: $200/ $500 refundable damage hold deposit
- Non smoking unit

LOCATION

Just steps to CalTrain, UCSF Mission Bay, Spark Social, parks, bike trails, AT & T Park, Safeway and much more.

Established in 1998, the Mission Bay neighborhood has been growing by leaps and bounds. What was once an industrial wasteland has continued to evolve and is on the brink of becoming one of the most hip (and unexpectedly upscale) neighborhoods in San Francisco.

The biotech industry has made its home in Mission Bay. The University of California, San Francisco put down roots here when it opened its new research campus in 2003, and in 2015 it opened San Francisco’s first new hospital in 30 years, the UCSF Medical Center at Mission Bay.

Kaiser Permanente also joined the elite medical facilities in Mission Bay when they opened up a state-of-the-art one-stop medical facility in March 2016 offering everything from adult and pediatric care to women’s health services and a pharmacy.

Homes in Mission Bay are primarily new luxury loft and condominium developments that satisfy the majority of the residents most-drawn to this neighborhood: young professionals, often tech- or biotech-minded enthusiasts, as well as students from around the globe.

Transportation reaches Mission Bay via the Muni light rail and other public transportation lines offering a quick transport to downtown. Living here also puts you close to both Caltrain and the I-80 and I-280 freeways forging a direct shot to Silicon Valley, one of many attractions for residents.

While it is not yet on the map as a foodie culture hub, more restaurants, cafes, and boutique storefronts are moving in to accommodate the professionals that work in the neighborhood and the growing number of well-to-do residents.

With its growing energy and steadfast potential, Mission Bay is paving the way to become a San Francisco destination neighborhood.

www.RentalsInSF.com

Jennifer Risano
Rentals In SF
Leasing Agent
BRE# 01912615

Broker - Rentals In SF 1318 Hayes Street San Francisco CA 94117

name: Tree-lined 2BR w/deck with skyline views & minutes away from Downtown!
body: Residence 383 Arkansas St is Potrero Hill gem with fantastic curb appeal is located in the heart of the coveted North Slope on one of the most desirable blocks in the neighborhood. Beyond the sunny front garden an extensively remodeled home with chic designer finishes and endless character awaits you.  Enter the home with a burst of color from the elegant entryway and custom built-ins and into the living room with fabulous natural light, crown molding and recessed lighting. The adjacent spacious formal dining room boasts designer wallpaper and is a perfect backdrop for entertaining friends and hosting family gatherings.  At the rear of the home is the exquisitely renovated gourmet kitchen which features beautiful marble counters and delightful eat-in island, stainless steel appliances by Wolf and Bosch, and opens up to the charming rear patio and garden. Also on this level is a large cheerful bedroom with ample built-in storage and an updated full bathroom with a classic clawfoot tub.  Up the stairs you will find a luxurious master suite as your private retreat. The suite is complete with office nook, two generous walk-in closets, a gorgeous remodeled bathroom with heated floors and private deck with downtown skyline views. Enjoy some of the best weather in San Francisco from the roof deck with eco-friendly artificial grass and western outlooks.  Located on a phenomenal tree lined street in an A+ Potrero Hill location, one block from 18th Street retail where you can grab a Farley's coffee, brunch at Plow, dine al fresco at Chez Mama and shop at Christopher's Books, Ruby Wine and Belle and Trunk flowers. A commuter's dream with direct access to freeways, CalTrain, Mission Bay, Dogpatch and SOMA and minutes away from Downtown. Don't miss this rare opportunity for a turn key dreamy home on the Hill.

body:
Very sunny flat on top 2nd floor.  Recently completely remodeled.  Hardwood floors throughout.  Total 5 rooms, living room,  dining room,  kitchen, medium sized bedroom, and small bedroom. 

Two bedrooms each with mirrored closets.  One bedroom is medium sized and the second bedroom fits a twin size bed, also great as an office space. There are electric wall heaters throughout the flat.

Large very sunny living room.  There is also a separate dining room which leads out to a small  private deck and to a larger sunny lower deck.  

The kitchen is large and will easily fit a table.  Lots of cabinets, granite counter tops, microwave, dishwasher, garbage disposal, gas stove/oven.

Bathroom is off of the living room.  It has a claw-foot tub with shower over tub.

There is a garage space available for $200/month.  There's good on-street parking available.

It is available now.
Rent is $3,595/month and includes water and garbage.

No pets allows. No smoking.

There is no laundry hook up available.  No washer/dryer.  Not permitted.

It's in walking distance to shops and restaurants on Cortland and easy access to 101 and 280.

One-year lease, then month-to-month.

Please send an email with your phone number and we can set up a day and time to view the flat.  Thank you.

name: Unfurnished Sunny 3 bd/2.5bth Exec Rental
body:
This unit is a corner unit of the Millennium Tower with a rare and large floor plan. Can be fully furnished for an additional cost. Apartment is very child-friendly.

Asking rent is for 12 month contract and includes valet parking for 1 car. Utilities, weekly cleaning can all be included in the rent for an additional fee.

The Millennium Tower is a 58-story high-rise condo building centrally located in San Francisco's south Financial District (also boarders SOMA and South Beach) at the intersections of Beale, Mission, and Fremont Streets. The development has 2 separate buildings: a 60-story tower and an 11-story podium building.

Containing a total of ~400 homes, the building evokes images of a crystal with a multi-faceted facade designed to reflect sunlight at various times of the day, much like a sparkling crystal in the sky. The quality of the amenity level and service Millennium Tower provides is unparalleled in the city of San Francisco. The 20,000 square-foot amenity complex includes a massive 5,500 square foot fitness center, a children's playroom, an outdoor terrace with beautiful landscaping and seating area, a 75-foot indoor competition lap pool under a large skylight, an adjacent hot tub, a wine cellar, a tasting room, a 2,500 square foot private lounge with food service from Michael Mina's RN 74 just downstairs, and a screening room with a 100" HD projector screen to top it off.

The Millennium Tower caters to the most sophisticated city dweller.  Building Amenities:

• 24-hour attended lobby and concierge
• 20,000 sq.ft. private club level
• Indoor saline lap pool with glass roof and outdoor feel
• Wine tasting room and cellar
• Private bar and lounge
• Screening room with 100" HD projector
• Children's room
• Outdoor terrace
• 5,500 sq. ft. fitness center on site
