name: 1BR - Location, Luxury and Affordability all in One!!!
body:
1BR - Location, Luxury and Affordability all in One!!!
When you enter your home for the first time, you'll notice the contemporary tones throughout, from the oversized double pane windows to the perfectly paired open kitchens with quartz countertops and hardwood cabinets. Our included furniture and decor are expertly selected and placed for this individual layout, and the mounted Samsung Smart TV's are ready for your enjoyment. Finally, your home is filled with our convenience amenities from the luxurious bedding to the completely stocked kitchen. Every element of your new home invites you to step right into a hassle-free living experience.

Amenities:
- Utilities and wifi included in the rental price and ready to use immediately 
- Kitchen already equipped with all appliances and dishware
- Refrigerator, oven, and microwave 
- Washer and dryer in unit
- All appliances are stainless-steel
- Plush, comfy sofa and a large smart tv mounted on the wall and in the bedroom
- Bedroom is well-lit and comes with large floor to ceiling windows. 
- Pets allowed: restrictions do apply

We know location is everything; Mission Bay is San Francisco’s newest neighborhood located within walking distance to the new Chase Center and Oracle Park as well as plenty of restaurants, parks and coffee shops.

During move in you will be greeted by a Landing host and have access to 24/7 concierge services through our mobile app to schedule cleanings, maintenance, or service requests. 

With the Landing membership you get access to all of our properties located in many popular cities and the ability to move units in any city with 72 hours notice.

The building comes with some amazing perks for you to enjoy like; reservable conference space, valet dry cleaning, lounge, grilling stations, outdoor space and business center. Enjoy living at its finest at an affordable price! 

Take a look at our photo gallery and schedule your appointment, or drop by and take a tour today!

name: 1bed and 1bath available
body: Located in the newest building in the heart of San Francisco's vibrant Mission Bay neighborhood, this bright and modern 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom + den condo offers oodles of space. The gracious 823 sq. ft. open floor plan (per tax records) showcases a spacious living room with huge windows overlooking the building's pool and courtyard. In the L-shaped kitchen, there is ample cabinet and counter space; the new refrigerator and dishwasher are cleverly concealed behind wood panels. There is a center island that is not pictured, in-unit laundry, and 1 car parking is available for lease. One Mission Bay affords residents the utmost in luxury living. The last condo building to be built directly on the channel, One Mission Bay's residents have some of the area's best views and best park access. Nothing else compares to being directly next to the water and overlooking ORACLE Park. The building offers numerous amenities including a 24-hour doorperson; an outdoor heated pool; resident dining and lounge areas; a large terrace with a fire pit, cabana, barbecues, and outdoor dining; a state-of-the-art fitness center; a business center and library with private meeting rooms; a reservable guest suite; and an adjacent hotel. Thriving Mission Bay continues to be one of the most up-and-coming neighborhoods in the city with significant corporate investment, family-friendly playgrounds, and soon-to-be completed the Exchange offering world-class shopping, retail, and office space. You are close to Spark SF, Reveille Coffee Co., and the Market Hall. Public transit abounds in this area, making your commute a breeze. A UCSF campus, the Warriors' basketball stadium site, and ORACLE Park are minutes away, adding a unmatched level of energy and vitality to the area.

name: Renovated 2B2B Condo w/Private Deck/Roof Deck/Parking/Storage/WD
body:
This beautiful two bedroom, two full bathroom condo is on a flat, tree-lined street in a charming 3-unit building in the heart of North Beach offering ample natural sunshine through bay windows and featuring city views of Coit Tower, Saints Peter and Paul Church, and downtown.

The condo has been thoughtfully updated and includes one car parking, ample garage storage, in-unit washer and dryer, dishwasher, updated bathrooms, hard flooring throughout, custom crown and wall mouldings, and French doors leading from the bedrooms to a large exclusive-use backyard deck. The master bedroom has a generous walk-in closet and overhead lighting. Both bathrooms are renovated with quartz counter tops, tile floor, Toto toilets, glass shower doors, and beautiful finishes. The condo includes in-unit washer and dryer, custom blinds in the living room, and modern light fixtures throughout the apartment. The living room also offers a custom fireplace, built ins with designer millwork (ample storage and built in desk), and a built in sofa, all basking in the beautiful sunlight that pours in big bay windows. 

CONDO INCLUDES:
-One car parking (included in rent)
-Multiple exclusive-use storage areas in garage 
-In-unit washer and dryer
-Quartz bathroom countertops, tile floor, Toto toilets 
-South facing building (sunny & bright)
-Hard floors throughout 
-Gas fireplace
-Built-ins offering desk area and storage
-French doors leading from both bedrooms to exclusive-use back deck patio
-Stainless steel refrigerator, dishwasher, and oven
-Custom bay window sofa and up-down blinds
-Crown and wall mouldings
-Large (300+sqft) exclusive use back deck patio
-Shared modern rooftop deck and seating offering Bay and North Beach views 
-One block away from Joe DiMaggio park (tennis courts, basketball courts, playground, library)
-Coit Tower views
-Two blocks away from Trader Joe’s and Safeway grocery stores

ONE YEAR LEASE
APPLICATION FEE: $40 PER ADULT

UNFURNISHED RENT ($4,700), FURNISHED OPTION AVAILABLE--PLEASE INQUIRE
SECURITY DEPOSIT 1.5 TIMES RENT ($7,050 UNFURNISHED)

RENTER’S INSURANCE REQUIRED
SEWER / GARBAGE INCLUDED
NO ANIMALS PERMITTED

name: Studio Stunner (Liberty Hill Historic)  Furnished
body:
Beautifully renovated garden apartment in the Liberty Hill District of Noe Valley. This is a tastefully furnished unit, self contained with a fully stocked kitchen, plasma tv, tri-level deck for entertaining, marble counter-tops, custom made cabinets, safe and secure environment, private entry overlooking an English garden, with laundry on-site. The sleeping area is in a large alcove just off the entire living space and houses a queen-size bed with additional storage. Very cozy. Extensive garden area for entertaining, large barbaque at your disposal any time and very private.

This is a large, wide-open space, purposely designed for easy living and upkeep. Perfect for corporate relocation and who enjoy an expansive outdoor space. Liberty Hill is considered a historical and destination neighborhood where Dolores Park meets the Valencia Corridor.

Perfect setting for outdoor entertaining, (Al Fresco style), or just enjoying the magnificent weather of San Francisco and as a peaceful retreat from the daily hustle and bustle. Conveniently located to all facets of the following neighborhoods, Valencia, Noe Valley and the Mission. There are coffee houses abundant on Valencia and Noe Valley. We are centrally located to world-class eateries in Gourmet Ghetto and easy access to Dog Patch, public transportation and freeway access. Direct TV included.

This is a non-smoking environment, and we are located to (BART, Muni Metro). Also walking distance to the Google, Genentech and Apple shuttle service pick-up locations. One year lease. No smoking. One strictly indoor cat okay or small dog under 20lbs. Available June 1, 2020. Please respond to the above to schedule a viewing.

body:
Hi! I have a one-bedroom apartment. There is more than one set up for the apartment on craigslist. Pictures were taken by the previous tenants.

. Please don't hesitate to text or call me to find out more if the info you want is not listed at the bottom.

The lease term is 1 year.

Please text me to schedule an appointment for viewing.

 the one-bedroom apartment has a private entrance, bathroom, and mini kitchenette(microwave, fridge, sink, kitchen cabinets) It's doesn't come with a stove


 the size of the living is about 15X10
 the bedroom is about 10X10
 the bathroom is about 5X5
 the closet is in the living room. hanging space is 3ft wide.you can hang at the top and bottom. on the left, there are some shelves for closet storage as well.

Location

its located by the water, at Candlestick Park near Gilman Ave and Hawes St.
-2 mins drive to 101S or 101N
-3 mins drive to 280S or 280N
- a half block away from bus 29 line (takes you to city college,stonestown and sunset)
-3 blocks away from muni T Train (it will take to you mission bay and downtown)
-6 bocks away from bus line 8, 9, I think also 8ax 8bx (takes you to downtown and city college)
-5 mind walk to Candlestick point state recreation with a beautiful view of the bay
-10mins drive to downtown,soma and mission bay
-10 mins drive to sf international airport
-15mins walk to major grocery and restaurant.
-Bayshore Caltrain station is not too far away as well

Has a stable job which provides enough income and cash for rent and in case of emergency
Like to keep the place clean
Respectful and responsible
Don't do drugs
Don't have any pet

Good credit (if credit is not the best, I may be able to work with you also. Email is the key)

1-year lease
move-in cost: first month + security deposit
Utilities are shared
Free street parking near the house

Thanks for your time!! Happy Hunting!!

body:

Situated in the vibrant Mission District, this polished, two bedroom Edwardian flat can be used as a 3 bedroom due to it's large eat-in kitchen. THE KITCHEN has enough room for a dining table or a small couch and coffee table.
Set at the back of the building, quiet and bright, the flat includes oak hardwood flooring, charming period detail, beautifully remodeled kitchen (granite counters, stainless steel appliances, microwave, gas range and dishwasher) and pristine bathroom with step-in shower. The sunny laundry room adjacent to the kitchen provides useful storage.  Fresh designer paint and newly refinished floors enhance the elegant space.  Steps to Valencia Street eateries and shopping, Victoria Theater, Alamo Draft House, BART and the amenities of Mission Dolores Park, this flat is convenient as it is beautiful.

name: 1 bed, 1 bath condo in a defined modern living.
body: Built in 2002, this 1 bed, 1 bath condo is the definition of modern living. The sleek floor plan brings natural light from the large windows throughout the open concept living and dining space. Relaxing views overlook the mature trees, flowers, and water feature in the open air courtyard. In addition to the superb design, in-unit laundry and an extra space off of the bedroom, which could be an office, maximize convenience within the home. Just outside your front door, the building is overflowing with amenities. The 3rd floor courtyard offers a green-space to host parties or enjoy a little sunshine. Also on the 3rd floor, a conference room is available for meetings, and downstairs, the newly renovated gym is equipped with free-weights, lifting machines, treadmills, and even a yoga room. With an excellent walk score, just 1 block south of Market St. , residents can enjoy their home inside and out.

name: Nice One Bedroom Apartment For Rent.
body: Ride off into the Sunset, where the surfers tame the waves, fog or shine. This Golden Gate Park adjacent neighborhood is so big, it is divided into Inner and Outer Sunset with 9th and Irving being the commercial and dining hub of the former. Further toward the ocean, Irving turns into an area that locals call the city's third Chinatown. Find your place in the Sunset. You only have to look up to see how special this building is; the lobby ceiling is a Mediterranean-themed masterpiece. Arched doorways, cozy alcoves and fit-for-fashionistas closet space makes the  apartment a work of art. Genius come in many forms, and most geniuses come to San Francisco. You're one of a kind and your home should be too! From restored historic Pacific Heights Edwardians to rebooted Downtown classics, Iconic Charm. Modern Living.

name: 2 BR, 2 BA Condo in South Beach w Rooftop Deck
body:
88 Townsend Street, San Francisco, CA

88 TOWNSEND STREETAddress: 88 Townsend Street #419Neighborhood: South BeachRental term: moBedrooms: 2 BRBathrooms: 2 BA Style: CondoParking: AssignedSquare Feet: 1169Lease Term: 1- 4 month lease termsThis beautiful 2 bedroom residence is located in the heart of South Beach. Live amongst all of the action at 88 Townsend Street. Residences at 88 Townsend feature a mix of warm modern interiors with a commitment to traditional hand craftsmanship which has resulted in crown molding, custom millwork Brazilian cherry kitchen cabinetry, granite countertops, spa-like bathrooms, and generous closets. This spacious 1,169 sq. ft. (per appraiser) open concept home overlooks a bamboo courtyard and is an end corner unit. The generous living room space with high ceilings offers two sets of floor-to-ceiling windows and a separate dining area. The dining area comfortably accommodates a large table for formal dinner parties or holiday parties. A modern kitchen overlooks the living/dining area and also provides a breakfast nook for more casual dining. The kitchen is complemented with the convenience and comfort of stainless steel appliances including a gas range, refrigerator, microwave and Bosch dishwasher. The master bedroom includes a large walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom with dual vanity sinks, storage, and a shower-over-tub. The second bedroom is perfect for a roommate, guest bedroom, or dedicated office and has its own double-door closet and courtyard views. Located at Townsend and 2nd Street, this 10-year-old building tastefully blends its historic 1882 warehouse facade with the contemporary styling of its 4-story brick addition. Elevators provide easy access for tenants and guests. Entry to common areas are warm and welcoming. The building showcases 2 internal courtyards and an incredible common area roof deck with barbecue area, several seating areas, and dynamic views of South Beach. 88 Townsend Street is located in one of San Francisco’s liveliest neighborhoods: South Beach. Its unique location affords convenience and opportunity all within a short distance from your front door. Enjoy the flourishing tempo of City life with hotels, restaurants, shopping, parks, the Embarcadero waterfront, and AT&T Ball Park. 88 Townsend offers an excellent commuter location close to the financial district, Muni, and Caltrain, with easy access to the Bay Bridge and freeways. It’s a “Rider’s Paradise,” with a Transit Score of 100, Bike Score of 90, and Walk Score of 82.• YouTube TVUnit Features:• 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom• 1169 sq. ft.• Kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances including gas oven/range, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave• Full bathroom with granite counters, tile floor, shower over tub• Large walk-in closet with built-in organizers• Front-loading energy-efficient washer/dryer in unit• 1-car parking in gated underground garage included• Storage space included PG&E Bill is covered for $85.00 per month. After that, it is the tenants responsibility.Building Features:• Elevator building• Enormous rooftop view deck with barbecues and seating• 2 courtyards• Excellent transportation is available: Muni Metro, Caltrain, easy access to freeways• 1 block to AT&T ball park and the Embarcadero promenade• Shop at nearby Whole Foods, a 24-hour Safeway, and the Ferry Building• Dine at MoMos, Paragon, Slice House, and Primo Patio

name: Pac Heights 1 Bedroom Condo
body:
1620 Broadway, San Francisco, CA

Neighborhood: Pacific HeightsBedrooms: 1 BRBathrooms: 1 BAStyle: CondoParking: Available at Grosvenor Atrium1690 Broadway for $300/mo. Call  
 forinformation about parking ONLY, not the property.Lease Term: Flexible lease terms 1-12 monthsCan be rented furnished or unfurnished. One year lease required with unfurnished.If you're looking for variety, then Pacific Heights is your place. What you'll find is heart-stopping sunsets with neighborhood hills lifting up from the Marina stretching east and west between the Presidio and Van Ness Avenue. This is the stuff of which dreams are made. It's a picture-perfect setting, and one Hollywood chooses to highlight when depicting the world-famous hills of San Francisco. This majestic section of townhouses some of the largest homes in the city, including a wide array of Victorians, Edwardians, Mission Revival and homes in the style of French Chateaus. An affluent neighborhood, Pacific Heights is home to the consulates of Germany, Greece, Italy, Portugal, and Russia. Several elite private schools in the area were once former baronial mansions. Among these are Town School For Boys, Convent of the Sacred Heart, Stuart Hall High School, San Francisco High School, and Drew School. Folks fortunate enough to live in Pacific Heights benefit from its gorgeous parks, playgrounds, and miles of hiking, running and biking in the adjacent Presidio Park. For shopping, look no further than Fillmore Street, running north and south through this exciting part of town. Many world-class boutiques and fantastic restaurants are found along Fillmore, as well as exceptional patisseries, flower shops, and designer retail clothing.Tenant pays PG&E over $65.00 per month.Unit Features:•Youtube TV• Full kitchen• Modern bathroom with shower• Washer/dryer in unit• Sorry, no pets• Lease Term: Flexible 1-12 month lease terms

name: Nob Hill Condo
body: Do you want to see San Francisco scenic views from your home everyday? If yes, then this is the one for you! Light-filled top floor Nob Hill condo in a 12-unit boutique building, built in 2000, with elevator. This specious 2BR/2BA condominium features den/office nook, living room with gas fireplace, dining room, eat-in kitchen, in-unit laundry, hardwood floors, bay windows, and one car parking. You can enjoy views of Russian Hill rooftops, Treasure Island, peek-a-boo glimpses of the Bay from living room, dining room, den/office nook and both bedrooms. Its unique three-side open exposures makes the unit super bright and airy. The building has shared panorama-view rooftop deck and 2nd-floor courtyard.

name: Classic top floor flat
body:
Five Room Sunny Top Floor Heart of Mission Victorian

Spacious and Sunny Classic Mission Victorian Flat. Full Top Floor, 1200 sq ft, 5 + rooms with Eat-In Kitchen. Possible third bedroom or office with Twin Peaks View.  Sun-filled living room with gas fireplace and Twin Peaks view, bathroom with shower over clawfoot tub, four generous closets and additional in-unit built-in storage, high ceilings, refinished wood floors and original details throughout. In-unit Bosch washer/dryer and ample pantry storage. Sunroom/porch with full access to outdoor patio. 

Google, Apple Shuttles and Muni on corner, Genentech and other Tech shuttles nearby. Easy access to Caltrain and 101 and 280 freeways. Easy street parking with permit. Short walk to 24th St. BART. Footsteps from all the Mission’s popular restaurants, bars, cafes, playgrounds and walking distance to Valencia and Mission Dolores.

Walk Score: 95
Bike Score: 99

Tenant to pay PG&E. No pets. Deposit: $4400

Call Jack Murphy to reserve or schedule a showing of this immaculate, overly-improved, urban oasis.

See the video at:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9A3hT79JPys

This stunning 1 bedroom property on a prime block in Lower Pacific Heights encompasses the highest level of modern fit and finish along with the convenience of the home's proximity to the most desirable shopping and dining corridors in San Francisco.  In addition to the property's proximity to Fillmore Street, the Divisadero corridor and Alta Plaza Park, the home is 1 block away from the Technology Shuttle stop, as well as express bus lines to the Financial District.   Within the newly constructed interior space, one finds the best materials and furnishings available today.   Carrera Marble abounds throughout the home's open concept chef's kitchen and luxurious bathrooms.   Radiant heated wood floors run throughout the home, adding to the warm, enveloping ambiance of of this custom, bespoke home.   Miele appliances are found throughout the home, complimenting the home's overall level of refinement.

This bright and immaculate railroad style flat is available for immediate occupancy. Two bedrooms, 1 bath and a large and stunning eat in kitchen with stove, fridge and dishwasher. body:
***Currently occupied until 05/05/2020 - available via virtual tour**

68 Harriet St #5 is in SOMA

This light filled 1 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath 2-level loft is available May 5th! 
It has an open and flexible floor plan ideal for entertaining. There is an amazing roof top terrace with 360⁰ view! This convenient location is near Whole Foods, shopping, dining, nightlife, freeways

UNIT:
- Furniture available to purchase from previous tenant
- 1 Bedroom
- 2 Bathrooms
- In unit washer/dryer
- Featuring floor to ceiling windows
- High ceilings
- Gas fireplace
- Stainless appliances
- Hardwood floors
- Roof deck

LEASE TERMS:
- Available May 5, 2020
- One year lease
- Security deposit 1.5 x rent 
- Utilities: Owner pays water and garbage
- No pets
- Non-smoking unit 
- 250 move in/out fee
- Parking available for $195

Location: 
The South of Market (SoMa) neighborhood is an industrial and urban area filled with converted warehouses, art galleries, bookstores, trendy bars, chic furniture showrooms, and some of San Francisco’s most celebrated restaurant and nightclub destinations. Also within its borders you will find some of the city’s only big box chain stores who have taken advantage of the topography.

Historically an area created on the “wrong side” of the Market Street cable car track, full of factories and Gold Rush immigrant workers, it evolved into one of the most well-known areas in the 1990s: dot-com boom central. Since the sizzle cooled, many businesses associated with the boom have closed, but new tech companies have not been deterred from moving in. SoMa is a rejuvenated district where in 2012, a young giant in the technology industry — Twitter — put down roots at the corner of Market and 10th Street, inspiring new businesses to move in to cater to the young professionals and a long list of other tech companies following suit.

SoMa is also a magnet for visitors from around the world for its famed stretch along Eleventh and Folsom known as the heart of the gay leather and S&M scene, and home to the annual fetish street fest called Folsom Street Fair.

What SoMa lacks in terms of personal outdoor green space, quiet living quarters, and parking, it makes up for in gripping energy, trendy nightlife, and its thriving tech industry.

www.RentalsInSF.com

Jennifer Risano
Rentals In SF
Leasing Agent
BRE# 01912615

Broker - Rentals In SF 1318 Hayes Street San Francisco CA 94117

name: Spacious|OpenLayout|NearUber,Twitter,Square|InMidstTonRstaurntsBarsEtc
body:
Large, open layout, very spacious and beautiful full floor flat available for rent in SOMA (South of Market) near Twitter, Uber, Zynga, etc. The entire flat is for rent. 

Note, this flat is NOT the same as another separate and completely different flat in the building that is available as roommate share. There are few units in the building. If you are looking for roommate share, contact me and I will put you in touch with the other flat. All units in building renovated with similar materials.


FLAT DETAILS:

Full three separate bedrooms.  Note, rooms are different sizes.  Tenants to determine breakdown of rent between rooms.

Large separate living room.

Very large separate kitchen with plenty of space for dining and large tables, with designer large, modern, dark and clean style format porcelain tiles.  Kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, garbage disposal, etc.

Very dark and solid hardwood (mahogany) floors throughout entire flat, including all bedrooms, closets, hallway, living room, etc., except bathrooms and kitchen which are tiled with designer large, modern, dark and clean style format porcelain tiles.

In flat/unit large separate laundry room with washer and dryer as well as extra space for storage for exclusive use by only the one flat.

One bathroom with built in tub and shower with large format, designer dark colored porcelain tiles in tub to ceiling and throughout all floor areas of bathrooms.

Large hallway closet for additional storage.

High ceilings.  

Tons of natural light throughout entire flat, South facing building.

Entire unit/flat painted in a beautiful, warm, chic and modern earth tone (Silver Fox by Benjamin Moore).

Concrete paved backyard, which is common area for the building and can be used for things like barbecuing, etc.

Incredibly maintained flat.

Great tenants in building, all professionals, e.g., Google, Uber, Stanford Funds, etc.

There is an in building covered garage parking for a car and possibly a couple of motorcycles, but the car space is currently being rented out.  You can be first on the waiting list if you want.  There is also a large public and pay garage parking complex starting around ½ block away from the flat/building with some hundreds of parking spaces.  In addition, starting about ½ block away from the flat/building in various and multiple directions, there is regular street parking that is non-metered designed for residents so you don’t have to worry about having to constantly feed meters (last I heard the parking permit fee for these non-metered spaces, which allows you to park for greater than 2 hours, overnight, etc., is $110 per year, or $55 for half-year, so they’re meant for residents and applying I understand is pretty easy).  Lastly, the area is filled with businesses, so street parking spaces change hands and open up quite frequently.


LOCATION DETAILS:

Near numerous tech and other companies, such as Twitter, Uber, Square, Zynga, Dolby Laboratories, Adobe Systems, etc.

The flat/building is located in the heart and midst of one of the most bustling, vibrant, and densely concentrated collection of the hippest and chic restaurants, bistros, bars, night clubs, art galleries, wine merchants, boutiques, lounges, night spots, theaters, both specialty and large groceries, and host of other commercial businesses, in all of San Francisco. In the immediate area are some of the trendiest restaurants like Sushi Ondo, Bar Agricole, Perennial and Zuni Café to more traditional fairs like Zaoh, Don Ramon's and 1601 Bar & Kitchen. Starting approximately 1 ½ blocks away, dozens of bars, night clubs, music venues, and lounges of every type, from traditional to eclectic, line the streets, such as Wish, Butter, Tank18, Bergerac, Calle-11sf Nightclub, Halcyon SF, Slims, Willows, Forgery Bar, Holy Cow, Audio Nightclub, SRO/Oddjob, DNA Lounge, Driftwood, Azucar Lounge, Verso, Zeitgeist, etc. A highly commercial area too -- within walking distance, are hundreds of conveniences such as Trader Joe's, Target, Foods Co., Rainbow Grocery, Costco, The Market, Best Buys, Bed Bath & Beyond, OfficeMax, etc. Technically, one doesn't need a car living in this area. This corridor continues to be one of the hippest and fastest, continuously developing commercial areas in San Francisco, offering a high level, in-demand lifestyle in one of the busiest, hip and urban environments in San Francisco. City living at its best.

Nearby and surrounding areas include Union Square and Financial District to the Northeast, Civic Center/Hayes Valley/Opera District to the North, Embarcadero to the East, Oracle Ball Park to the South, and the Mission District to the West.

The building/flat is also just blocks to the on and off ramps of all of the San Francisco Freeways, including U.S. 101, U.S. 280 and U.S. 80, which go southbound to Silicon Valley/San Jose/Peninsula/etc., northbound to Golden Gate Bridge/Marin/etc., and eastbound to Berkeley/Hayward/Walnut Creek/Oakland/etc., providing quick and easy access to all parts of the Bay Area (a great deal of traffic and drive time is cut to various parts of the Bay Area, such as the South Bay and East Bay).

Area served by various modes of public transportation. 


CONTACT INFO:

Contact: Tony, owner,  
.  Select above Reply Button or Show Contact Info Button for more contact info.

Appointments available anytime to view.

One month security deposit.  First month rent due on date of move in.

Available Now.  Flexible move in date.

name: MUST SEE|Modern,Spacious|2BlocksToUnionSquarePlaza&FinancialDistrict
body:
Four bedroom, modern, spacious, and beautiful full floor flat available for rent.  Entire unit completely and newly renovated from studs in including all new sheetrock, plumbing, electrical, windows, finishes, etc.  The entire flat is for rent.


FLAT DETAILS: 

Four separate bedrooms.  Three of the bedrooms are very large and one bedroom is average to large sized.  Tenants to determine breakdown of rent between rooms.

Wide open and spacious layout with modern kitchen and living room, with long designer quartz island table (seating for 8), showcasing undermount LED lights.  Entire area designed to impress and entertain. All cabinets in kitchen contain frosted glass doors. All stainless steel appliances. Pantry.  Appliances include dishwasher, garbage disposal, etc.

Entire unit is modern and new, from new sheetrock to all new finishes, to new double pane windows everywhere, new dark hardwood floors, etc.  Guts of building such as electrical, plumbing and central heat systems are brand new too. Features include Decora light switches and switches on dimmers, multiple plug outlets/receptacles in each and all rooms as required by latest codes, all new drains and water lines everywhere, new central heat gas furnace system delivering heat throughout entire flat.

Very dark and solid hardwood floors throughout entire flat, including all bedrooms, closets, hallway, living room, etc., except bathrooms which are tiled with large, modern and clean style format porcelain tiles.

Recessed lighting everywhere.

New and large double pane windows everywhere.

In flat/unit laundry room with front load, high efficiency washer and dryer for exclusive use by only the one flat.  Laundry room is large with area for folding, additional storage, laundry baskets, etc.

Separate one full bathroom, with modern and clean design Kohler tub, shower, designer sink, toilet, etc.  

Completely separate and additional half bathroom, with designer sink and toilet.  Modern and large format, designer dark colored porcelain tiles in tub to ceiling and throughout all floor areas of bathrooms.

In unit central heat, high efficiency gas furnace providing heat throughout entire flat with auto temperature on and off control.

Hallway closet for additional storage.

Lots of natural light.

Intercom and automatic gate release.

Numerous parking garages stones throw from building and there is street, non-metered parking in front of building (which seems to change hands frequently because of commercial nature of area).


LOCATION DETAILS:

Located in Nob Hill, two blocks to Financial District, two blocks to Union Square, one building off Powell Cable Car line, ½ block to Ritz Carlton, one block to Fairmont Hotel, etc.  

The flat/building is located in the midst of countless and possibly the densest concentration of restaurants, bistros, bars, theaters, spas, luxury shops and retailers, art galleries, night clubs, hip night spots of all types, wine merchants, lounges, hotels, booksellers, cafes, specialty and large groceries, etc., a host of countless commercial businesses, in San Francisco. One of the most sought after and hottest areas in all of San Francisco.  The immediate area is San Francisco’s premier shopping district as well.

Restaurants in the immediate area, some of the trendiest, include the Tonga Room, Rue Lepic, Nob Hill Restaurant, Parallel 37, Big Four Restaurant, Scala’s, Farallon, Oak Room, Café Bastille, etc., and the more traditional fares include Sears, Morton Steak House, E&O Trading, Sam’s Grill & Seafood, Cheesecake Factory, Dining Room at the Ritz, etc.  Within steps and just a block or two away are dozens of bars, night clubs, music venues, and lounges, from traditional to eclectic like the Huntington, Irish Bank, Belden Traverna, Harry Denton’s Starlight Room, Top of the Mark, Burritt Room, Rickhouse, Sugar Café, The Cellar, Cantina, etc.  Art galleries and department stores include Pasquale Lannetti Art Gallery, Jenkins Johnson Gallery, Mishin Gallery, Bernstein S. & Co., Meridian Gallery, Caldwell Snyder Gallery, Gallery 444, Saks Fifth Avenue, Tiffany’s, Macy’s, Gucci, Prada, Louis Vuitton, and countless others.  In the immediate area are also traditional conveniences such as E & E Fine Foods, J & W Market, Trader Joe’s, Food Fair Market, Bush Market, etc.  The flat offers a beautiful and modern place to live and get away, in the midst of an area that is vibrant and full of life day and night.  

The building/flat is located 1.06 miles to the on and off ramps of all of the San Francisco Freeways, including U.S. 101 and U.S. 280 (southbound to Silicon Valley/San Jose/Peninsula/etc. and northbound to Golden Gate Bridge/Marin/etc.) and 1.16 miles to U.S. 80 (eastbound to Berkeley/Hayward/Walnut Creek/Oakland/etc.), providing quick and easy access to all parts of the Bay Area.  

Numerous South Bay companies have pick up points in the area.

Area served by various modes of public transportation as well.


CONTACT INFO:

Contact: Tony, owner,  
.  Select above Reply Button or Show Contact Info Button for phone number and email contact info.  

Appointments available anytime to view.

One month security deposit.  First month rent due on date of move in.

Pine Street @ Powell Street.

Available April 20, 2020 or soonest date thereafter. Possible move in date prior also.

body:

Live in one of SF's most vibrant, diverse and evolving neighborhoods - Bayview - in this high quality, newly remodeled home. 

The home:
* huge bright and open living/dining/kitchen area, 24' x 16' is perfect for entertaining! 
* large and open kitchen features granite counters, beautiful white cabinets, gas range/hood, dishwasher, disposal, new stainless steel fridge 
* massive master bedroom suite upstairs, 550 square feet, with in suite bathroom incl. large jacuzzi tub and separate shower, office area and 2 view decks! 
* 2 additional large bedrooms with spacious closets and good light, 15.5' x 12' and 13.5' x 12'
* freshly painted with custom colors 
* beautiful refinished white washed oak wood floors, tile in baths 
* second full size bathroom with tub off hallway 
* 2 large private decks with downtown and bay views! 
* recently built in 2001, including central/forced heat 
* in unit washer/dryer 
* unit ~ 1700 square feet and very well laid out 
* well maintained, secure 3 unit building 
* quiet and friendly street 
* secure storage room available for $80
* sorry no pets/animals; non-smokers only, pleased 
* available May 1 

VIDEO TOUR:  https://youtu.be/vXvqHY44iuY 

About Bayview:
* rapidly evolving neighborhood with hip cafes, new restaurants, cultural and nature based amenities
* 1 block to the 3rd Street T-Line which takes you straight to Downtown, Dogpatch nightlife/dining, UCSF Mission Bay Bio-Medical Campus, CalTrain Station at 4th/Townsend. S.F. Bus lines 23, 24, 44, 54 very close by. 
* easy access to 101 and 280 freeways, and SFO airport
* walking distance to: Starbucks coffee, Flora Grubb Gardens/Ritual Coffee, All Good Pizza, Roadhouse coffee, Bayview Opera House, Tato, Radio Africa Kitchen, several cool Microbreweries, Walgreens, supermarkets, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, post office, the new Bayview Library, etc., etc.
* one of SF's sunniest neighborhoods!
* awesome parks and green spaces nearby like: Heron Head Eco Park, Bayview Park, Candlestick Point Rec Area, India Basin Shoreline Park.
* massive new high end developments coming online nearby in The Shipyard, Candlestick Park, Warriors new stadium and Pier 70, which will make the southern area of SF vibrant with new retail, housing and fantastic parks reaching the bay.
* Bayview won CurbedSF 2016 and last year's 2015 neighborhood of the year awards!
2016: http://sf.curbed.com/2017/1/3/14154404/san-francisco-neighborhood-year-bayview
2015: http://sf.curbed.com/archives/2016/01/04/all_hail_bayview_the_curbed_cup_neighborhood_of_the_year.php
-------------

when responding please include a short note stating the total number of people in your party, their relationship to you, and your employment situation/source of income. we are seeking tenants with good credit and references. thanks.

name: Three rooms available in cute Lower Pac Heights Victorian!
body:
A few of our roommates will be moving on to other places – we'll miss them, but three rooms are available for rent! 

About us:
We're looking for non-smokers who are clean, considerate, don't bring the party home, and are looking for long-term housing (4 months+). And while we love animals, our apartment doesn't allow pets.

About the rooms:
$1350 – AVAILABLE NOW: 
The room is 7'9" X 11'5". It can easily hold a queen-size bed and comes with a large dresser. It's ideal for someone without a lot of stuff. That said, the room comes with exclusive access to the attic if you need extra storage space.

$1425 – AVAILABLE NOW: 
A midsize room with double closets, a chandelier, and room for a queen-size bed and two dressers. 

$1600 – AVAILABLE MAY 15: 
The room is the largest in the apartment, with wall-to-wall closets, a ceiling fan, lots of natural light, and room for a sitting area. 

About the house:
We live in a spacious 4 bedroom, 1.5 bathrooms Victorian in Lower Pac Heights. We have a living room, separate kitchen, dishwasher, in-unit washer and dryer, and a shared backyard with a patio, hammock, and a lemon tree. It's a great place to retreat to after a long day.

About the location:
Lower Pac Heights is a great, safe neighborhood that's really close to Fillmore, Polk St, and Japantown–which means you have easy access to restaurants, shops, and lots of great parks. We're also walking distance from Muni lines (2, 3, and 38) and an 8-minute walk from the tech shuttle stop on Gough & Geary. Trader Joe's, Safeway, Mollie Stone's, and Whole Foods are all within walking distance as well.

Street parking is also pretty good. You can usually find a spot within 1 - 2 blocks of our house.

If you're interested, please reply with information about yourself and we'll try to set up a time to meet or give a video-tour.

body:
2 Bed/2 Bath modern lower Pacific Heights unit in a quiet 5 story building on Sutter between Gough and Octavia.  The unit is a corner unit on the 4th floor, lots of light and has city views. A large hardwood deck is great for barbecues! Also, there are two beautifully landscaped common areas for all units to share. The master bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet.  Guest bedroom includes large window with city views and big closet.  Kitchen features beautiful high end Bosch appliances and honed granite countertops. The living room has a built in gas fireplace and hardwood flooring is in the kitchen, living and dining areas. All windows have tops down/bottoms up window shades that allow you to have privacy when needed and also provides views of the city! There is an in-unit front load, high efficiency washer and dryer and includes additional storage on the side and top of the washer/dryer.  Coat closet creates additional storage.

The building has installed its own access to very high-speed internet, which is included in the rental price. The unit is very centrally located near Fillmore Street, Polk Street and is 2 blocks from Japantown. There are two nearby theatres (Sundance and AMC 1000) as well as Safeway and Whole Foods just a few blocks away. Lafayette and Alta Vista Parks are all easily accessible. Tech shuttles are within walking distance.  CPMC Sutter Health is a few blocks away.

Key Features:

- 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with large hardwood deck
- City views (North and East)
- LOTS of light
- In-unit washer/dryer
- Bosch stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher and hood/microwave)
- Honed granite counter tops
- Recessed lights throughout unit
- Oak hardwood flooring in living-kitchen-dining areas
- Carpet in bedrooms
- Gas fireplace
- Distinctive window shades
- High speed internet included
- Parking available for additional $250 (flexible)

Leasing Details:
· Available April 15
· 12 month lease minimum
· Security Deposit- 1.5x monthly rent

Reply to Craigslist listing for questions and/or schedule a showing. Showing by appointment only.

name: Furnished Apt 1Bdr // 10 min to Glen Park // Avail JUNE 15th
body:
Your first email must contain phone number, skype account, we don't answer if you don't provide that. We only rent to people who we can video Skype with. This is to avoid scams. 

If you don't live in San Francisco and we can not meet in person until June 2020 but you really want the place, please email your info as specified above and I can give you the link on AlRBNB if you want to put your deposit there, or with Paypal.

Exact dates are flexible, let us know what dates you need. You can rent a month or the whole period. We're flexible.

Available from June 15th

Conveniently located just south of the Mission (Outer Mission), Noe Valley and Bernal Heights districts. 6 minutes bus from Glenn Park BART station (for fast Airport or Downtown access). Restaurants 10 min walk away. Great for couples or families.

We have hosted many families here, as well as students (UCSF, SFSU, INSEEC, Lycée Francais, FAIS, etc..) visiting local campuses for a month or two. We're happy to talk with you and show you around.

$3000/month for 5 people (max) with cleaning and utilities all included. Price is negotiable.

--------------------------

Large 1 Bedroom (600sqft=55m2) + Backyard. Perfect for 4 or 5 people.

SLEEPING & MORE:
1 Bedroom with a very comfy queen sized bed and bunk bed (2+1 people). Inside the apartment there's a portable crib if needed.
1 Bathroom.

--------------------------

AMENITIES:
Wireless / Internet (High Speed) included
Washer / Drier can be made available
Kitchen with Microwave, Nespresso, Electric kettle
3 beds (queen + full & twin bunk bed) + crib (bed for babies)

NO PETS - NON NEGOTIABLE (even the small ones).

THE NEIGHBORHOOD
Hayes Valley has managed to retain a sense of community during its transformation into a haven for haute couture. The neighborhood boasts many shops, cafes and eateries. One of the neighborhoods favorite attractions is located on the east side of Patricia Green park where shipping containers have been transformed into exciting establishments such as a beer garden, coffee shop, ice cream shop and clothing store.

name: Cheap spacious private room in NOPA/Lower Haight
body:
Hi all!

I’m moving out of my super spacious room in a 5 bed 2 bath apartment in NOPA/Lower Haight this week (to go home to Australia before the flights stop) and looking for someone to take my spot.

Some details:

• Large private bedroom with large closet space

• Bedroom can come furnished

• Super spacious & sunny lounge room (TV has Netflix, youtube, etc.), equipped kitchen & a lot of storage space for big items

• Rent is $1142 with a $1800 security deposit, utilities/internet usually come out to approx. $95 a month

• Lease term is preferably 6 months to 1 year but can be flexible

• Immediate move-in

• Incredible location on Divisadero St and Oak St: Walking distance to loads of bars/restaurants/take-out food, local grocers, safeway, the panhandle & golden gate park.

• Public transport: 8 min walk to Muni and loads of buses nearby

• Housemates: Four young professionals in their late 20’s & early 30’s working in tech and consulting. Looking for housemates who are friendly & easy-going, as well as clean, respectful & doesnt bring the party home.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if you’re interested in a (virtual) tour of the apartment! Best way to reach me is through email, I respond very quickly!

body:
This is a beautiful, fully upgraded 2-bedroom apartment located at 507 Haight St on the iconic corner of Fillmore and Haight. 

Incredibly convenient location, businesses and restaurants on this street include Haight & Fillmore Wholefoods Co., CVS, Iza Ramen, Stone Bowl, Perilla, Hot Zushi, Taqueria Estrella, Rosamunde Sausage Grill, Toronado, Mythic Pizza, and so many more. Great access to Hayes Valley, Civic Center, Duboce Triangle, Castro, Divisadero Street, and Upper Haight.

name: 1 Month Concession at Avalon at Mission Bay
body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.
 
 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. On-site retail, including Chase Bank and Bark Avenue Doggy Daycare, along with nearby Safeway, Bluxome Street Winery, Lucky Strike, and Alexander's Steakhouse, puts shopping, dining, and entertainment within reach.Rent: $7250Bedrooms: 3Bathrooms: 2Apartment Features:5th FloorCommunity Amenities:On-site RetailFloor-to-ceiling Windows*Fitness CenterWood Floors*Highway AccessHigh-speed InternetPackage AcceptanceCall us! show contact info

name: CHIC NOE HILL (incl utilities )
body:
Beautifully furnished one bed room apartments in an amazingly well located bldg. at the corner of Noe and 19th street just a couple blocks from Dolores Park or Castro district.  This newly renovated building has been unavailable for over 10 years and is now renting for terms between 1-12 months.  

This intimate 4 suite building offers all new stainless appliances, granite counter tops, 
hardwood floors, and all new stylish furnishings.  New commercial sized  laundry facilities are on site at no cost and parking is avail for $350/mo.   living supplies such as linens and kitchen dishes and cooking utensils are provided at no additional cost. All utilities including cable tv and internet are included 

This is the perfectly situated home to experience one of San Francisco's most iconic neighborhoods.  Located near Castro, the home is walking distance to SF Muni, historic street cars, several bus lines, and countless restaurants, coffee shops, and wine bars.  With a walk score of 100,  Dolores Park and exciting Mission District are only minutes away.  Discover why Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook lives only blocks away.   

Check out our amazing video :)!!

name: Walk in Closet, AC, Unrivaled Amenities, 24/7 Valet and Concierge
body:
From its central location and iconic architecture to its unrivaled amenities whose scope and size set a new benchmark for San Francisco, Fifteen Fifty helps answer how to live a naturally centered life.

This Thoughtfully-designed home benefits from an abundance of natural light through large double pained windows. The apartment includes hardwood floors throughout, open kitchen with custom grey-oak cabinetry, white Caesarstone counters and a Calacatta Caldia marble slab backsplash, Bosch gas cooktop and stainless steel appliance package with integrated paneling, Nest thermostats with resident-controlled air-conditioning and heating, in home W/D, generous walk-in closet.

Our beautiful community offers:
— Over 12,000 SF of private landscaped park with grilling stations, dining areas and fire pits
— Rooftop pool and hot tub with landscaped sun deck and lounge seating
— Indoor Pool House provides seamless indoor-outdoor experience
— 40th-floor Penthouse Club with private dining, entertainment lounge and terrace set against stunning city and bay views

This Thoughtfully-designed home benefits from an abundance of natural light through large double pained windows. The apartment includes hardwood floors throughout, open kitchen with custom grey-oak cabinetry, white Caesarstone counters and a Calacatta Caldia marble slab backsplash, Bosch gas cooktop and stainless steel appliance package with integrated paneling, Nest thermostats with resident-controlled air-conditioning and heating, in home W/D, generous walk-in closet.

Our beautiful community offers:
— Over 12,000 SF of private landscaped park with grilling stations, dining areas and fire pits
— Rooftop pool and hot tub with landscaped sun deck and lounge seating
— Indoor Pool House provides seamless indoor-outdoor experience
— 40th-floor Penthouse Club with private dining, entertainment lounge and terrace set against stunning city and bay views
— Direct lobby access to Equinox’s new 32,000 SF state-of-the-art Fitness Club
— Fitness Center with the latest cardio and weight-lifting machines, plus separate Yoga Room
— Business Lounge with three reservable conference rooms, complimentary coffee and Wi-Fi enabled printing
— Demonstration Kitchen with dining area
— Sports Lounge with six TV monitors, pool table, and bar with Kegerator
— Screening room with oversize TV and plush lounge seating
— Library with curated book collection
— Over 5,600 SF dedicated to a landscaped rooftop dog run


NOW LEASING AND AVAILABLE FOR VIRTUAL TOURS—INQUIRE TODAY.

body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.

 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. name: Gorgeously furnished 1-2 bedroom - Looking for the new move-in-ready love
body:
Hello!

It looks like I will be moving soon, and so I wanted to start sharing photos of my place that I love so much. I am on a month-to-month lease so am flexible on timing, but I do want to find someone who loves how it has been furnished, decorated, and equipped, because so much time, care, and expense went into it - someone who would want to purchase the furnishings and accoutrement in the apartment as their ideal way to move in as well. 

Please let me know if that might be you, and we can start with a video tour given everything going on in the world. I look forward to meeting you! 

The apartment is incredibly spacious, and my current rent is around $3,000. This could be considered a one-bedroom or a two-bedroom depending on how you choose to lay things out. I currently have the smaller room set up as an office, however the occupant before me established the room as her bedroom.

In terms of how I have it set up currently, there is a very large bedroom with a king-sized bed, a large dining / living room combination (dining table extends to comfortably seat ten), an office (which the previous occupant used as the bedroom; could also be made into a glamorous dressing room or nursery), large kitchen and bathroom. Parking does somewhat frequently become available in the building. The view is so beautiful, unobstructed onto the park and of the Presidio trees as well as the Golden Gate Bridge. I love sitting in the bay window with a warm tea and getting some afternoon sun. The neighbors are all wonderful as most people stay in this building for years and are all introduced to each other via email upon move-in. Little touches like neighbors taking the time to drop packages from the foyer right in front of your door are so kind.

Hope to speak with you soon.

body:

Our very secure 116 sq meter/1250 square foot condo is on the 5th floor and was built in 2014, has great light and wonderful layout, with 2 separate master suites. Layout perfect for share with each bedroom has own full bathroom.  Bedrooms are on opposite ends of apartment separated by large common space.

name: Incredibly Spacious, Remodeled Apartment
body:
Quiet area- 
Our area is called Silver Terrace. It's very close to where Highway 101 and 280 come together. It's a residential neighborhood with many long-term occupants. Our street is one block long. It's very quiet 24/7. 

Easy to get around
There are so many options for getting around from this apartment. You have the Third Street T line streetcar, you have the express bus that goes downtown, and you can drive four different ways to downtown.  To go anywhere else, there are many bus lines that will take you to where you want to go nearby.

Who lives here
You have your own space downstairs ground-level.  I, the owner, live upstairs. 

What do you get
You get a great quiet place to live. You have two rooms all to yourself. One room could be used as a bedroom, the other room can be used as a den, study, living room ,whatever you want it  to be. You have shared access to the kitchen and the bathroom with just one other person .
You have hardwood floors for the two rooms that have recently been remodeled. 
There is a washer dryer in the unit that you can use. 
There is extremely fast high-speed internet. 
For $1395 all of this is included. 


Location
It's very close to where Highway 101 and 280 come together. 
We are very close to Third  Street. The Third Street T Line Streetcar goes downtown. We are also very close to the bus station where you can get an express bus that goes downtown in minutes. We are ½ a block away from the police station. Right next to the police station around the corner is a supermarket. Also we have Walgreens very close to us as well. There are a lot of restaurants near us, many are on San Bruno Avenue.  There are also a  number of restaurants on 3rd Street. 

How to get the apartment
All that I require is an application and a deposit to hold the apartment. The deposit equals rent  which is only $1395. 

We are looking for one person that is a non-smoker and has no pets.

For additional information, questions, or to see the apartment, please send an email with your name, phone number, and a little about yourself or call

body:

    • Owner pays for trash, sewer & water
    • Tenant responsible for gas/electric, internet & LUMINA move-in/move-out fees
    • 1 car valet parking space included 
    • Application Fee $35

DESCRIPTION:
Life meets luxury at one of the most beautiful high rises to have ever been built in The City. Designed by famed architects Bernardo Fort-Brescia and Laurinda Spear, in collaboration with homegrown Heller Manus Architects, LUMINA was designed to offer not just a place to live, but a life to experience. Bring your own private chef and throw the grandest parties in the private dining room or take the party outside to the 10,000-square-foot rooftop terrace; catch a movie in the private screening room with your party of 30; stay balanced in the 7000 square foot fitness center, complete with yoga, a climbing wall, and sun lit, 70 foot, heated saltwater pool; and finish it all off in the 2,000 square foot spa with a steam room and dry sauna. Once you're done, take off to one of the many Michelin star restaurants or just enjoy a walk along the waterfront. With one of the most popular floor plans, this FURNISHED 2 bed, 2 bath home will show you the best that San Francisco has to offer!

name: Fantastic 2 bedrooms, 1-bathroom Apartment in San Francisco, CA
body:
1200b Treat Avenue, San Francisco, CA 94110, United States

(For interested applicants, please provide a mobile number for listing inquiries.)

Fantastic, unfurnished Apartment on the vibrant Mission District neighborhood in San Francisco. It has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and adequate parking spots on the street.

The cozy unfurnished interior features hardwood and tile floors, beige-colored walls, and plenty of recessed lights that help brighten any room. The stunning kitchen is equipped with granite countertops, ample storage in the cabinets and drawers, and appliances such as a refrigerator, oven/range, microwave, dishwasher, and garbage disposal. Nice and airy, the bedrooms are perfect for getting a good night’s sleep. The bathroom has a shower and bathtub combo with sliding glass door, and vanity cabinet sink surmounted by a mirror. For your convenience, there are shared washers and dryers available.

The tenant pays for gas, electricity, and cable. Trash and water are included in the rent.

Sounds great? Book a showing now and experience digital application at no cost, online payments, and efficient 24/7 maintenance support. Choose from a variety of tours - Self-Tours, Guided Tours, or 3D Virtual Tours. Enjoy this and more when you book today!

Additional Details:
On-street parking is available for use.

Small pets on the property are negotiable with a $500 pet deposit/pet.

Smoking is strictly prohibited.

Nearby Parks: Bernal Park, Precita Park, 23rd & Treat St. Park, and 24th & York Mini Park.

The property’s Walkscore is 99/100, Transit Score is 85/100, and Bikescore is 86/100. This apartment is ideally located on a Walker’s Paradise area so there’s no need for a car in doing daily errands. The area has excellent transit so making trips is easy. The place is Very Bikeable, too, so biking is convenient and safe for most trips or exercise.

name: Lease takeover — 2 bed, 2 bath in Design District
body:
Hi there

I’m looking for someone to take over my lease for a 2BR/ 2BA apartment in the Design District. 

SHORT TERM RENTALS ARE WELCOME TOO!!!

The building is pretty new and luxurious. More details below:

Apt:
- 2 bed, 2 bath apartment. One master with en-suite, 2nd with bathroom outside bedroom. 
- Very spacious (1000+ sq ft)
- In-unit washer/dryer
- In-unit air conditioning/heating


Building:
- Great location in the Design District - Close to Caltrain, supermarkets, restaurants, and bars
- Close to some of the very large start up offices (Airbnb, Stripe, Pintrest, Zynga, etc.)
- Transit Score of 92 (Bart, Muni, shared bike services and many bus routes are very close to the building)
- Gym, games room, BBQ pit, rooftop seating area, Firepit, redwood groves, Pet Spa, Dogpatch, Library, Yoga Room and club lounge in the building


Me:
I’ve lived here for almost 2 years, however since I’ve moved in with my fiancé in the Financial District, I’m looking for someone to take over the lease. The current lease is until July 7, 2020.


You:
Anybody who’s looking to relocate to SF and take advantage of the ability to renew their lease at the “existing tenant” rate, versus having to sign a new lease at going market rate. 


Lease:
- My current lease is until July 7.
- Security deposit of $1,100 (which is what I have paid the apartment community)
- Utilities (water, trash, internet) will be paid by you, based on your usage
- Secure, garage parking on-site available at $300/mo which is paid directly to the apartment community


This may be an ideal situation for someone who is looking to only move to the city, or for someone that is starting work fresh out of school

If this sounds suitable to you, write me back with details about yourself and what you do, and we can figure out a time to meet (virtually is okay too) and show you the place

name: 3BR Renovated 1 Month FREE Avail NOW @ Avalon at Mission Bay
body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.

In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. On-site retail, including Chase Bank and Bark Avenue Doggy Daycare, along with nearby Safeway, Bluxome Street Winery, Lucky Strike, and Alexander's Steakhouse, puts shopping, dining, and entertainment within reach.

This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

name: Top Fl. Beach House 3bed 2ba Furnished by Zoo, SFSU free wifi, w/d/pkg
body:
Turnkey wonderfully furnished as seen in the pictures. 

 Flat screens TV's in each room . Free in unit new washer and new dryer. Ideal for families, nature lovers, students and outdoor enthusiasts in a world class city located in a safe, desirable neighborhood.

* Excellent location across the street from SF Zoo and right next to Ocean Beach. Only 147 steps from front door to sand.

* Easy access (1 short block) to L streetcar to downtown (25 minutes), 18 and 23 line bus stops across the street lines to SFSU in ten minutes (SF State University) . Close by are: Stonestown and West Lake Malls, Lakeshore Plaza with Lucky's Grocery Store only 3/4 mile away, Lake Merced, Great Hwy, restaurants, and shops. Close to 280 freeway and CA 1 highway.

* TOP FLOOR UNIT: Very bright (2 sky lights, big windows, partial ocean/zoo views) 3 Bedrooms, 2 full Baths. It comes with formal dining room table (seats eight). No more than four residents in the flat. 

Each unit has: three private bedrooms with full size beds (master has private full bath). The bunk bed room has a twin on top and full on bottom. All have huge closets and chest of drawers. Second full bath is shared. Two full size comfy sofa beds. Crib and Highchair also included if desired.

* Including each unit lease is one garage SUV sized parking space (side by side garage.) There is also ample street parking for extra vehicles.

* There is also: new microwave, high quality cookware, blender, toaster, dishwasher, new refrigerator, new stove, new flatware, a vacuum cleaner, glassware, and silverware, cooking utensils, and much more. Linens and towels if desired.

You must see this place to appreciate the decor and furnishings of these corporate like / vacation home quality apartments. Recently a Five Star Trip Advisor Certificate of Excellence Rental, these units come with all of the amenities at your disposal and ready to move in. THIS A DRUG, VAPE AND SMOKE FREE BUILDING. 

Owner will pay garbage bills. Tenants will be responsible for utilities (gas, electric, and water service). Usually, between $30 - $50 a month per person.) There are HDMI cables and the unit is cable/internet ready. High Speed Wi-Fi prepaid for one year by landlord if lease is signed by May 1st, 2020. ($1,200 value/savings)

*A reservation fee, equal to one and a half month's rent can bind us into contract and guarantee your stay. That fee is fully applied to your first month's rent and credited at move in.  One and a half month's and refundable security deposit of  $6,500. One, Two and Three year leases are also available to lock in rental rates. Should you want to bring in some of your own furniture, we can be flexible. Lease must be at least until August 16, 2021. 

Dogs or cats require additional refundable pet deposit fee.  Also requires approval of the property manager.

Qualified applicants only. Happy to answer any questions. Students can have parents apply to sign a binding lease as a cosigner. 

* This is a newer, well kept building on the coast of one the best cities in the world. These are market rates and will fill quickly. Beach lovers, surfers, students, bikers, joggers, families, golfers (Harding Park, Olympic Club and Fleming courses are next door) and lovers of animals (Zoo is across the street) are all welcome to contact us. 

* Appointments are now being taken to see the unit. A reservation fee can hold property until upper unit becomes available: August 16 2019,  but current tenant is open to moving out earlier. Thank you.

Scott
Property Manager

name: Fun & Artsy 2 bdrm 2 bath Hayes Valley Hidden Gem
body:
Address:::::::: 690 Grove St, San Francisco, CA 94102



This Victorian flat is equipped with everything you'll need for your stay -- it has an expansive living room, 15' ceiling and is adorned with a JD Salinger mural from floor to ceiling. The spacious dining area has a floor to ceiling window and is adjacent to a fully stocked kitchen. Each wall in the apartment is treated with a different faux marbling technique to complement style and texture.

The 2 bedrooms are located on opposite ends of this flat. The master bedroom has a queen bed with memory foam, a dresser and spacious closet. The adjacent bathroom has shower over tub. The second bedroom has an ensuite bathroom, it offers a queen bed, closet/dresser, opens to an outdoor patio where you can relax and plan your day.

Located just 2 blocks from the Hayes Valley shopping, cafes & restaurants, 2 blocks from Alamo Square Park where the TV show 'Full House' was filmed featuring the famous Painted Ladies of San Francisco. Just a block from public transportation leading to downtown, Union Square, cable cars and more shopping. Zip Car parking nearby. Walking distance to City Hall, San Francisco Symphony, Jazz Center, Asian Art Museum and the San Francisco Public Library

WELCOME TO THE WILSON


This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 510 Sq. Ft. 

In a city with more than its share of beautiful, historic landmarks, there is one building that combines modern conveniences with a Landmark Life on the center of Market Street – The Wilson. Built in 1904, then a survivor of the 1906 earthquake, The Wilson has been completely re-imagined and re-established for the 21st century resident seeking a home with a story to share for generations to come. Having seen the city grow-up and transform around it, The Wilson is now the premiere address for residents looking to do more than just rent an apartment; The Wilson is for those looking to live the Landmark Life.

The Wilson's unique architectural flair joins modern luxury finishes with historic architectural detail. The apartments and lofts feature natural light, oversized rooms, and are wired for high-speed internet and cable. The gourmet kitchens include custom-designed cabinets, quartz countertops, gas cooking, and stainless steel appliances

name: Healthy, Low Density. Best Quality & Location. Amazing View.
body:
Welcome to the virtual tour by copying and pasting the following URL: 

            
 https://youtu.be/TzrBJV4G7Zk




Tastefully situated in the prime of Inner Sunset, this superbly clean and low density apartment, with best quality, will add an unmatched level of tranquility, comfort and convenience to your lifestyle. If you're looking for more than just a place to crash, then come and see how this healthy and refined home can elevate your living experience in this most desirable location and abode.








The pictures only reveal a hint of the fine quality of the unit.  You'll appreciate it even more when you see the property in person.








Healthy, low density with few neighbors, among only four units, away from the crowds. This apartment with private rooms and enclosed, super spacious kitchen/dining area, is ideal for two people’s relaxation and for even both working from home without interrupting each other.








Walk, bike, or jog in beautiful Golden Gate Park or along Ocean Beach. Enjoy a vista, have a picnic, or explore the rich Golden Gate National Recreation Area. Visit fabulous DeYoung Museum and Academy of Science Museum in Golden Gate Park right across street from your home. Fine Art Museum and  Palace of Fine Art also are in walking distance. Located in the best neighborhood of San Francisco, you owe it to yourself to experience and embrace life in the oasis of this charming apartment.








A short, pleasant walk to UCSF.  Ample public transportation to downtown or any destination in the city.  Also easy access to Silicon Valley in the south and Marin County in the north.








Fine quality unit in superb condition located in prime Inner Sunset. Virtually everything you may need is in walking distance. Fulfill your healthy, convenient, economic and environmentally friendly life style without automobile if you prefer. A paradise for diverse dining, walking, shopping, socializing and outdoor activities.








Top (third) floor, end unit with more privacy and extra storage space. Large bedroom (15.5 by 11.5 feet) and large, private living room, or second bedroom (15.5 by 12.5 feet), each with stunning views and ample closet space. Top quality, double-paned bay windows provide excellent sound and heat insulation. Great configuration in every room without any awkward corners; easy for furniture arrangement. Another spacious closet in the hallway for easy organization. The equal sized, completely private rooms are ideal for a couple or two house mates to share the apartment.








Wonderful, exceptionally spacious, and completely enclosed dining-in kitchen (12.5 by 10.5 feet) with beautiful view, is a sure space to entertain and impress visitors or guests. All energy star appliances and abundant maple cabinets and modern counter tops. Frost-Free Refrigerator with Space-Saver Shelving. Full-Size Gas Range with Self-Cleaning Oven and Hood.  Multi-cycle Dishwasher and Disposal.  Bright  bathroom with double-paned window, heater, ventilation fan and spacious linen closet.  








Well maintained building is in excellent condition inside and out. Bright entry foyer emits cozy, homecoming welcome. Many comfortable features inside of the apartment: high ceiling; bright and light in every corner of the unit; double-paned windows in every room including kitchen and bathroom; convenient individual hot water heater and gas furnace; cable and high speed internet connection ready. Intercom communication system.  Security system. Secure package receiving.








Management and Assistant on call with excellent service. Two bike racks, and extra private storage space joint with the unit.








Coin-operated laundry in building; Easy street parking; permit J-Mark parking available via the city's  resident application. 








Maximum Occupants:  2.    








No smoking of any kind, no pets or animals of any sort.








Absolutely NO subletting or short-term rentals (no AirBnB, VRBO, etc.)








Tenants are responsible for their utility costs.








Showing by appointment. Please call  
, or e-mail, with brief introduction, to confirm the address and the viewing.








To facilitate your application, you are welcome to bring the following to your viewing appointment:








1) completed application (application can be obtained by email beforehand) and photo ID








2) 2 months pay stubs and/or 3 months bank statements showing ability to remit rent with stability








3) letters of reference, job offers, proof of employment, scholarship, etc...that you feel would help your chances








4) application fee $25 per person; credit screening fee $30 per person. 






During this time of uncertainty, it’s paramount to secure a healthy, safe, and private oasis. Don’t miss this GEM.

name: Private room in 2BR available May 1st!
body:
Available for rent starting May 1st is a private room in a 2 bedroom in-law apartment located in the Sunset/Parkside district of San Francisco! The lease term is month-to-month. Utilities are split with the other tenant in the apartment and WiFi is $10/month. The room includes a queen size futon and 6 cube storage organizer shelf if you would like either of those items. The shared room in the apartment is fully furnished and includes a small kitchen table & chairs, desk, lounge chair, refrigerator and stove. The bathroom is shared with the other tenant. Tobacco smoking is not permitted inside of the unit. No couples and no pets!

The apartment is located one block from the L Taraval MUNI stop on 26th & Taraval, and there are multiple bus lines (28, 29, 66, 7) that are all within walking distance. There is a parking spot available in the driveway if you own a vehicle. The other tenant will give you access to laundry in the garage. There is also access to a small backyard! If you would like to come see the place and meet me in person, send me a message or give me a call and we will schedule a time to do so. Thanks :)

name: Most Desirable 2BD/2BA Floor Plan at the LUMINA | 3D Virtual Tour Avai
body:
Designed by Bernardo Fort-Brescia of Arquitectonica, LUMINA offers residents world-class amenities such as a full-length saline lap pool, a 7,000 sq. ft. state-of-the-art gym, landscaped outdoor spaces, rooftop, valet parking, 24-hour door service front desk service. On the ground floor of LUMINA, Woodlands Market offers organic and natural products from local suppliers as well as prepared foods and a coffee bar.

Unit 5K is one of the largest and most desirable Two-bedroom ﬂoor plan at the LUMINA. This corner unit features a spacious open ﬂoor plan with windows wrapping around the living and dining areas, wide plank wood flooring throughout, motorized window treatments, ample closet space with custom built-in shelving. The kitchen is finished with cesarstone and quartz countertops and high-end Gaggenau appliance package.

name: REMODELLED 1-BR UNIT VIEW APARTMENT
body:
View apartment.  Bright, large, corner one bedroom on 2rd floor with southern and western exposure, ideal for plants.  Living room faces Golden Gate Park and Ocean Beach in distance.  Bedroom overlooks Golden Gate Park, GG Heights, and downtown.  

Blond colored hardwood floors throughout, except linoleum kitchen area and tiled bathroom.  Dual paned windows for added warmth and quietness, fitted with Venetian blinds and blockout blinds in the bedroom.

New kitchen sink and retiled counter, and new cabinets underneath.  Eat-in kitchen with hardwood floors.  Bathroom has new sink, new water conserving toilet and shower fixtures.  Tub surface refinished.  Entire building recently replumbed and seismically retrofitted. 

Located within 2 blocks of Golden Gate Park. Conveniently located along 31 Balboa bus line, and close to 38 Geary and 5 Fulton bus lines.  Laundrymat two blocks away on Balboa St.

Street parking or garage available for rent separately.  Sorry, no pets.

Please contact Sherman at  
 (landline) to schedule viewing.   Best time to call Sherman are mornings and after 3:00pm.  Alternatively, text Robin at

body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.

Welcome to The Wilson 

Call Now -  
 x 21
OR Text 21 to  
 to text with us.


This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 510 Sq. Ft. 

In a city with more than its share of beautiful, historic landmarks, there is one building that combines modern conveniences with a Landmark Life on the center of Market Street – The Wilson. Built in 1904, then a survivor of the 1906 earthquake, The Wilson has been completely re-imagined and re-established for the 21st century resident seeking a home with a story to share for generations to come. Having seen the city grow-up and transform around it, The Wilson is now the premiere address for residents looking to do more than just rent an apartment; The Wilson is for those looking to live the Landmark Life.

The Wilson's unique architectural flair joins modern luxury finishes with historic architectural detail. The apartments and lofts feature natural light, oversized rooms, and are wired for high-speed internet and cable. The gourmet kitchens include custom-designed cabinets, quartz countertops, gas cooking, and stainless steel appliances 

Features:
Wired for high-speed internet and cable, Gas cooking, Historic architectural detail, Custom-designed cabinets, Quartz countertops, Oversized rooms, Modern luxury finishes, Stainless steel appliances, Natural light

body:
Virtual and Self Guided Tours Available! Use the link in this ad to visit our website for more information or contact us via phone or email.Vision Lives Here. Soaring 42 stories into the air from the heart of San Francisco’s vibrant East Cut neighborhood, 500 Folsom's brand new apartments offer luxury high-rise living amid a host of shopping, dining, employment, and public transportation options. Just two blocks to the Transbay Transit Center and with a 96 Walk Score, here you will find the best of the city is always within easy reach. At 500 Folsom, it's easy to see that vision lives here.Our residential tower is comprised of brand new studio, 1-, and 2-bedroom apartment homes, including premium penthouses and townhome-style layouts. Each thoughtfully designed residence is finished in upscale style with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood-style floors. Select homes boast a private balcony and stunning Bay or city views.Around our new community, take advantage of a variety of vibrant social spaces and amenities including two amazing view decks—Bay Terrace North and Bay Terrace East—as well as our spa, community gardens, state-of-the-art fitness center, and yoga and spin rooms. Underground parking, neighborhood-servicing retail, and a public paseo connecting Clementina and Folsom streets add to the ease of your East Cut lifestyle, and all of this is complemented by our helpful, concierge-style staff dedicated to ensuring that all your expectations are met.Just outside our building, walk or bike to your choice of nearby restaurants, cafés, and art galleries, or head to work at neighborhood tech giants Google, Salesforce, or Slack.
