name: Fancy and Classy Condo At The Popular 4 Seasons!
body: Luxury, Service, Location All Awesome!. This unit has newly refreshed interiors offering a luxurious move-in condition lifestyle overlooking San Francisco's world renowned Union Square. The Four Seasons defined luxury city living when it opened in 2001 and has continued to elevate the homeowner experience through high touch concierge service, discreet security, and an unrivalled amenity package. This 1 bedroom condominium has been configured to accommodate open plan entertaining, intimate den seating, and a spacious master suite. A bistro kitchen with counters for barstool seating. Newly refinished ebony hardwood floors in the living area and plush wall to wall carpet in the bedroom. Built-in window seating throughout to watch dramatic sunsets over the downtown skyline. Granite and marble counters, designer lighting fixtures, top of the line appliances. Valet parking.

body:

name: 2 Bedrooms Available May 1st in Russian Hill
body:
We are looking for two roommates to join our place on May 1st. We live in Russian Hill (cross streets North Point and Hyde), and are a block from the water, and a short walk to Fort Mason. There is a bus stop right across the street that has multiple bus lines to take you to the FiDi to make your commute easy! 

Bedroom #1 (with the bay windows)- $1,600:

• Very large room with bay windows and a fireplace. Easily fits a queen or king bed, with room for multiple dressers and a desk (no closet)

Bedroom #2 (with closet) - $1,300

• Smaller room, but fits a queen bed, tv stand and has a closet with built in shelves

The Apartment:

Our apartment is a 4 bedroom, with 1 large bathroom that has built in storage. We have laundry and a dishwasher in unit, as well as a backyard patio where we enjoy hanging out. We split utilities/WiFi evenly which is typically $30-$50 a month per person. Water and garbage are included. We’re a short walk to Safeway, Trader Joe’s, 24 hour fitness and Ghirardelli Square. We are looking for girls only (sorry guys) and unfortunately no pets are allowed. 

Roommates:

We are two 26 year old girls, and work as a recruiter and a legal secretary in the financial district. We are pretty low key during the week and like to workout and cook, and have the occasional happy hour with our friends. On weekends we are pretty social and tend to be out of the apartment. 

Please send me an email with a little more information about yourself, and please provide a link to your FB or Instagram if you are interested!

body:
Looking for the perfect location? Look no further! Park West offers it all!

We currently have apartment home #A305 available Immediately! This one of a kind studio is located on the third floor and consists of 476 square feet of living space. Your new home comes with an updated kitchen, stainless steel appliances, and carpeted living room! No need to run to the Laundromat! Your new home comes with a washer and dryer in unit, saving you precious time for other things - like enjoying the neighborhood!

Park West is perfectly located with the Golden Gate Park in our backyard and downtown San Francisco just a bus ride away! Here you will enjoy the perfect blend of charm, comfort, a great location and outstanding service. You'll be just steps away from restaurants, shopping, public transportation, and the best sights of San Francisco.

That's not all - your new community offers you top amenities!


Our office hours are Mon - Fri: 9:00AM - 6:00PM. Feel free to call at us at any time to make an appointment, or walk right in so we may show you our beautiful homes! Our leasing office can be accessed on the sidewalk fro, Funston St. Parking can also be found in the neighborhood or on Lincoln Ave. adjacent to Golden Gate Park!

body: A stunning residence at the Radiance! Huge 1,802 sq ft three-bedroom, two-bath corner residence with a large private terrace. This luxury residence features top of the line finishes, dark stained wood flooring, gourmet kitchen, Ceasar Stone countertops, stainless appliances, solar shades, home theatre/surround sound wiring, parking, and extra storage. Stunning bayfront location surrounded by acres of parks in the vibrant Mission Bay with easy access to transportation, Cal Train, MUNI, Oracle Park, the fabulous Chase Center, and world-class dining. Pet residents must have their health check & shots, and be spayed or neutered by 6 months of age. A signed animal addendum is required to be on file at our leasing office. (All fees, deposits and charges noted above are per pet.)Additional Details: We also welcome your domestic pet if it is a bird or fish with written approval from our onsite management team. No reptiles or exotic animals please. Fish tanks are not to exceed 55 gallons.Support Animals: If the animal is a service animal for a disabled person, pet deposits are not necessary & breed restrictions do not apply. A signed Letter Regarding Support Animals from a qualified professional verifying the need for the service animal along with proof of current rabies shots and licenses (if legally applicable) is required.Breed Restrictions: We welcome all breeds of dogs, except the following breed or mixed breed: Akita, Alaskan Malamute, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Husky, Pit Bull Terriers*, Rottweiler, Saint Bernard & Wolf Dog Hybrids.* (including all Pit Bull breeds - American Pit Bull Terriers, American or Irish Staffordshire Terriers, Bull Terriers, Pit Bulls, American Bull Dogs, & Presa Canario.) Soaring 42 stories into the air from the heart of San Francisco’s vibrant East Cut neighborhood, 500 Folsom's brand new apartments offer luxury high-rise living amid a host of shopping, dining, employment, and public transportation options. Just two blocks to the Transbay Transit Center and with a 96 Walk Score, here you will find the best of the city is always within easy reach. At 500 Folsom, it's easy to see that vision lives here.Our residential tower is comprised of brand new studio, 1-, and 2-bedroom apartment homes, including premium penthouses and townhome-style layouts. Each thoughtfully designed residence is finished in upscale style with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood-style floors. Select homes boast a private balcony and stunning Bay or city views.Around our new community, take advantage of a variety of vibrant social spaces and amenities including two amazing view decks—Bay Terrace North and Bay Terrace East—as well as our spa, community gardens, state-of-the-art fitness center, and yoga and spin rooms. Underground parking, neighborhood-servicing retail, and a public paseo connecting Clementina and Folsom streets add to the ease of your East Cut lifestyle, and all of this is complemented by our helpful, concierge-style staff dedicated to ensuring that all your expectations are met. Just outside our building, walk or bike to your choice of nearby restaurants, cafés, and art galleries, or head to work at neighborhood tech giants Google, Salesforce, or Slack. When your plans call for travel beyond our neighborhood, easily access BART, Caltrain, or interstates 80 or 280 to reach the rest of the Bay Area.

name: Beautifully updated & remodeled home in sought after Killarney  Farms.
body: Beautifully updated & remodeled home in sought after Killarney  Farms. Home features a spacious living room, family room & additional living space overlooking the beautifully landscaped backyard & patios. State of the art kitchen features shaker style cabinetry with quartz slab countertops, under-counter lighting & stainless steel farmhouse sink. High-quality appliances include GE glass top slide-in range, Kitchen Aid dishwasher, Samsung refrigerator & GE Microwave. Exterior landscaping has been professionally designed with elegant walkways. The backyard features a large patio & pergola, a gas-operated fire pit & a spacious lawn area surrounded by mature shrubs. Bathrooms are remodeled with modern vanities, fixtures, quartz countertops, and tile flooring. Additional features include recessed LED lighting throughout, dual pane windows & patio door, sun tunnels, 2 car garage with automatic roll-up door, premium windows coverings, automatic irrigation system, central heating/AC.

name: Fantastic, charming cottage with tons of outdoor space!!
body:
Contact info: 
Christina Sutton DRE 01930675 | Vanguard Properties 
We are complying with the "Shelter in Place" mandate issued by the state of California. We will not be hosting open houses. Please take time to review photos and thoroughly read through the advertisement before reaching out with questions. There is also a 3d tour on the property website that starts with a “Z” that I’m not allowed to spell out here. I’ll be happy to send you the link should you not find it on your own.


30th St @ Sanchez St, San Francisco CA
 DESCRIPTION  

AWESOME space in Lower Noe Valley!!!   

This charming cottage was built around 1900. Though everyone that has lived here has loved her dearly, she is old. She’s small. She has some new windows and some old windows. She has old walls. She creaks a bit and sometimes her front door gets sticky. Her ability to store lots of big stuff is nonexistent. She only allows a maximum of 4 people at a time on her wonderful rooftop deck with a panoramic view from Sutro Tower over Downtown and back to Bernal Hill. And she’s charming as F**K for people that live simply, love nature, and just want a quintessential San Francisco home in a fantastic neighborhood! Freestanding and located at the rear a three unit property, you are surrounded by the neighbors gardens. Sometimes all you’ll hear are a few birds chatting and that’s it. It’s generally quiet around here. The current tenants will take many of their plants with them when they move. That said, you’ll still have mature trees including a lemon tree and there will be ground plants still here, just not all of them. 

Great Dining on Church St -- XO Coffee Shop is down on the corner! (I LOVE their Mocha Milano.)  LaCiccia, Pamelo, La Nebbia, and many others all nearby.  Cottage is located directly on Noe Valley/Glen Park Border. Easy access to Bernal Heights, Mission, 24th St in Noe Valley. A bit further and you find Dolores Park. Roam over the hill & land in Glen Park central. Noe Recreation Center is a 1/2 block over. Billy Goat Hill Park also nearby.

Due to the peculiar nature of our “Shelter in Place” situation, I am also going to attempt to answer a few questions that tend to come up for rentals and this cottage. 

 Why are the current tenants leaving? They are relocating to the East Bay for a variety of reasons, none of which have anything to do with this home.

 How long do people usually live in the cottage? I’d say tenants here average around 3 years, give or take. All have left for major life changes except one. That one left to move closer to downtown and desired a significantly more urban environment.  

Who else lives on the property? The front building has two units in it, each occupied by professional couples. Myself and these outgoing tenants find them to be lovely people.

Who manages the property? The owner self manages. I help find tenants and guide everyone through the application and lease process. The owner lives part time in San Francisco and not on the property itself.

How many people can live in the cottage? What about children? This is probably the trickiest question we get. We are absolutely open to children here!!! Thus far though we haven’t had any move in, only move out when their mom & dad went from a two top to a three top and decided they needed more space. In general it’s normally a single person or a couple that moves in. Whether or not you want to move in with a child/children will depend on your lifestyle and need for interior space. There just isn’t that much.

So how big is this cottage? We have not measured it. The bedroom has a queen bed in it in these photos. The sofa in the living room is a comfortable sized sofa, though not huge. The space available is what you see. There are no hidden areas. Find the 3d tour on the “Z” website for a tour.

Where is the laundry? Behind the door between the refrigerator and the bathroom.

When were the photos taken? On March 21, 2020, possibly the most gorgeous day EVER in San Francisco. Though Noe Valley often has nicer weather than much of SF, it does have requisite fog days and whatnot. Pristine air quality and gorgeous weather is not guaranteed everyday. Photos were taken with a cell phone and lightly edited for clarity.


KEY FEATURES
*1 Bed 1 Bath 
*Kitchen has a gas stove, no dishwasher
*Full size washer & dryer IN UNIT 
*Private patio with mature trees 
*Patio furniture on lower patio is included
*BBQ on front deck is included
*Heat lamp included, though functionality has not been tested and is not promised
*The cat is not included


KEY INFORMATION 
Availability: April  18th, 2020
Rent:  $3,375/mo
Security Deposit:  $5,000
Bedrooms:  1 
Bathrooms:  1
Floors: hard
Laundry: Laundry in-unit 
Other: Private patio, private front deck, private roof deck
Pets: Cat(s) is negotiable, NO DOGS. We’ve also had a rabbit here before. 
Parking:  Street parking. Absolutely no option on the property.
Public Transportation:  MUNI lines nearby: Light rail J, Buses 24, 49, 14, 14R, 36
Lease Duration:  12 months 
Lease Terms:  Tenant pays utilities. Tenant required to carry renters insurance.  All information provided deemed reliable, but not guaranteed.
Application Information:  Each prospective adult tenant must complete the full Vanguard application process. 
Viewing: We are still figuring this out! Please review all information provided and photos before reaching out via the email link.


 Contact info:   Christina Sutton DRE 01930675 | Vanguard Properties

body:

This fabulous 1 bedroom + den condo has been furnished with a designer's touch. As you enter the open kitchen, dining and living area you are taken by the 9' high-foot ceilings, the dramatic oversized double-hung windows looking out at the Palace Hotel, the beautiful hardwood flooring and modern furniture artistically accessorized.

The spacious carpeted bedroom has an organized walk-in closet as well as a flat-screen television and custom blackout shades for the oversized windows. The full bath is across the hall from the bedroom.

name: QUIET LARGE CORNER unit, PANORAMIC VIEW, HEATED POOL, Free Parking
body:
The Beacon, in the trendy Mission Bay area, offers you a luxurious lifestyle with service and amenities at your fingertips. Your impressive surroundings will include a 24 hour door person to greet you as you enter your community. Concierge services are available to all residents. Imagine relaxing in the heated pool, sauna, or in one of the two spas.

Other amenities include a state-of-the-art exercise room, clubhouse with kitchen, recreation room with fireplace, business center, garden/greenbelt, BBQ facilities, and a private doggie park. All this and close to shopping, fine dining, and an easy walk to public transportation, including CalTrain (across the street), Muni, and BART.

Safeway is in the same building just down the elevator, and Barry’s Bootcamp, Orangetheory and many restaurants are in the same block.  The owner lived in this condo for several years and loved every minute of it!

This view corner unit is on the 12th floor in the 260 King Street building.

Ready to show now, and available for move in April 26th.

For rent by owner.


Condo features:
•	Large 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom (832 sq ft)
•	Walk-in and custom built-in closet 
•	ASTOUNDING VIEWS of the bay, city lights and the Giants stadium from the living room, bedroom, kitchen and balcony
•	FLOOR TO CEILING WINDOWS in living room and bedroom — a feature unique to corner units in the Beacon!
•	Clear view of Oracle Park fireworks from the balcony (March 26th, June 22nd and Aug 31st this year!)
•	Sizable balcony
•	Bedroom & closet are carpeted, main room & kitchen have wooden floor
•	In-unit washer/dryer
•	Bosch dishwasher

•	The unit has never had pets

•	Optionally comes with a second parking space in the same garage for an additional $190 per month

Residence features:
•	Heated Pool and Hot Tub (newly renovated)
•	24 hour doorman - receives and holds packages for you!
•	Elegant lobby (newly renovated)
•	Elevator building
•	Garage parking
•	Gym and sauna (newly renovated)
•	Residence lounge (newly renovated)

Requirements:
•	Lease term: 12 months, then month to month after 12 months
•	Asking rent: $4100
•	Security deposit: $4100
•	Tenant must hold rental insurance
•	Owner pays for: Water, Garbage and HOA

body:

Beautifully remodeled light filled apartments at 2395 26th Avenue, at Taraval.
Be one of the first to rent one of these newly renovated residential units.
The apartments have been remodeled with eat-in kitchens featuring premium appliances, new cabinets, and hardwood floors.
The bathrooms have shower-over-bathtubs, custom tile-work, and new fixtures.
All closet doors have been updated to beveled mirror sliders with custom wood trim.
The apartments’ front doors have hand crafted wood trim.
Easy commute location to Silicon Valley via Interstate 280.
Abundant and easy access to top amenities for “San Francisco living”, be it parks, shopping, the ocean, or world class health care.

The L-Taraval MUNI line stops at 26th Avenue leading to transportation options
throughout the city.
The tiled lobby entry leads to a terrazzo staircase to access the residential units, spacious parking garage, and laundry in building.

name: Price slashed**Designer 1 Bed + Den! Fully Furnished! 1 year minimum!
body:
Price slashed.

This fabulous 1 bedroom + den condo has been furnished with a designer's touch. As you enter the open kitchen, dining and living area you are taken by the 9' high-foot ceilings, the dramatic oversized double-hung windows looking out at the Palace Hotel, the beautiful hardwood flooring and modern furniture artistically accessorized.

The spacious carpeted bedroom has an organized walk-in closet as well as a flat-screen television and custom blackout shades for the oversized windows. The full bath is across the hall from the bedroom.

As you enter the condo, the den is to the right of the hall and is comfortably furnished with a large desk and a modern queen size sofa bed. The hallway double closet houses full-size stackable washer and dryer with added shelving for linens, etc.

The Montgomery is a 1914 architectural gem that has retained its original facade. Now home to 107 modern, full-amenity condos, a large private resident roof deck equipped with a built-in barbecue with plenty of lounge chairs and tables, a beautifully furnished modern lobby with lobby attendant and 24-hour controlled access to the building. 

Walk Score:97

CALL TODAY!

Price slashed from $3,995 to $3,495. Tenant pays PGE gas/electric, water and garbage included. Security Deposit of 1 1/2 month's rent. No move-in fee.

David Klampert
Broker Associate/Realtor®

The Best Service That Money Can Buy!

name: private one bedroom *Private bath *Missionbay* sfo
body:
Hi! The place is not far from SFO and Mission Bay. The place is near GILMAN and HAWES ST

You are looking at a huge and clean private bedroom that is available now. You can have a private bath with a little bit more money. The kitchen is shared with two other clean and quiet tenants. They are both very busy and don't bring any party home.

I have two ads up. This one of the setup from the previous tenant. 


We are looking for one quiet person to fill this room. The place feels like new. It was remodeled a couple years ago. The lease term is 1 year. Flexible move-in date.

 Please call or text me to schedule an appointment for viewing. My number is  




 Location

 its located by the water, at Candlestick Park near Gilman Ave and Hawes St.
 -2 mins drive to 101S or 101N
 -3 mins drive to 280S or 280N
 - a half block away from bus 29 line (takes you to city college,stonetown and sunset)
 -3 blocks away from muni T Train (it will take to you mission bay and downtown)
 -6 bocks away from bus line 8, 9, I think also 8ax 8bx (takes you to downtown and city college)
 -5 mind walk to Candlestick point state recreation with a beautiful view of the bay
 -10mins drive to downtown, soma and mission bay
 -10 mins drive to SF international airport
 -15mins walk to major grocery and restaurant.
 -Bayshore Caltrain station is not too far away as well


 Ideal tenant:
 Has a stable job which provides enough income and cash for rent and in case of emergency
 Like to keep the place clean
 Respectful and responsible
 Don't do drugs
 Don't have any pet
 Don't smoke in the house
 (Quiet)Don't play loud music and don't bring the party home
 Good credit (if credit is not the best, I may be able to work with you also. Email is the key)

 Lease Term & deposit:
 1-year lease
 move-in cost: first month + security deposit
 Utilities are shared
 Free street parking near the house

body:

Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this lovely Hayes Valley furnished two-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and pretty living room. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that San Francisco has to offer! (ID #SFO54)

Designed With You In Mind

Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m
home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your exquisite living room streaming
the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on
the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Hayes Valley apartment has
to offer.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-Queen Bed, 63in/160cm

-Single Bed, 35.4in/90cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Doorman
  - Pet Friendly
  - Gym
  - Indoor Parking
  - Roof Deck
  - Garden
  - Courtyard
  - Bike Storage
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is located in Hayes Valley. It is a fashionable neighborhood in the center of San Francisco. Hayes Street is perfect for shopping, eating or just taking a stroll. There is always something new to see, with pop-up restaurants and cool boutiques providing unique entertainment. Playgrounds and park spaces fill the medians of the streets. The close-knit neighborhood features a community garden, a pocket park with art installations, and access to music and theater near the Civic Center. It is a great stop for art enthusiasts. The SFO Airport is 25 minutes away by car or an hour away by BART.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.

name: Sunny Potrero Hill 3 Bedroom Close to CalTrain and Freeway
body:
3 bedrooms or 2 large bedrooms and a good size home office in excellent condition. 3 units in the entire building.

The home is located near 101 and 280 freeways. The East Bay and the Peninsula are also easily accessible.  Caltrain is a 5 min walk, downtown San Francisco is a 10 min drive or a 35 min walk, public transportation (Muni) is within   blocks.

On the north slope of Potrero Hill, the home offers an easy walk to many neighborhood shops and well known restaurants (Chez Maman, Umi, Plow, Serpentine, The Ramp, Mission Rock). 35 min walk to the Giants Oracle ballpark and 20 mins to Chase Center.

2 minute walk to the Potrero Hill Recreation Center with basketball/tennis courts plus 2 children's playgrounds.

Features:
1 master bedroom with ensuite bathroom
2nd large bedroom
3rd medium sized bedroom or good sized home office
Two full baths
Large Living room and Dining area
Large windows provide great day time light
Solid hardwood throughout with carpets in the bedrooms
New appliances
Quiet building
Laundry in building
Access to roof deck and backyard
Single parking space
Approximately 1250 sq ft

Additional Lease Terms:
Tenant to pay all utilities. Minimum one year lease. Security deposit is 1.5 times monthly rent. 

Cat/Small dog okay with pet deposit.

name: Newly Renovated 2 Br with Balcony. Virtual Tour Only
body:
Call Us Today   show contact info


Special Offer
Save up to one month's rent!

Join us and come check out this spacious 2 bedroom apartment. Located on the 7th floor, this lovely home is not one you want to miss.

SoMa is one of the most up and coming neighborhoods in SF and stretches from the Mid Market area by Van Ness all the way East to the Embarcadero. It's an eclectic blend of sights, sounds, smells, and has something for every taste. It also changes rapidly; sometimes a block away can be an entirely different world!

Here at SoMa Square, we are located close to Rincon Hill and the Financial District and border 3rd street one of the main arteries of San Francisco. You'll find it convenient to be in the center of it all in a well kept area of SF. The Yerba Buena Gardens, Union Square shopping, wild and eclectic nightlife, soothing bay views of the Embarcadero, and the hustle and bustle of the FiDi are all a short distance away from your front door. 

If you need to get around the Bay, simply hop on BART or unlock a ZipCar and find yourself a mere block away from all major freeway entrances and on ramps. This is truly commuter's and walker's paradise.

You will find that our community is unlike any other in the area with our elevated central courtyard that feels like an oasis in the concrete jungle. You need to stop by on your apartment search and see that value, convenience, and comfort coalesce here at SoMa Square Apartments in San Francisco!

SoMa Square Apartments
More Photos http://www.equityapartments.com/san-francisco-bay/soma/soma-square-apartments?ilsid=93

body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

12+ month lease: $4,990* / mo
6 to 12 month lease: $4,990* / mo
2 to 6 month lease: $4,590* / mo
1 to 2 month lease: $3,890/ mo

Prices quoted are applicable only if billed upfront for the entire duration of the contract. Rates are up to 9% higher if billed monthly. Prices are exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-lower-pacific-heights-047?utm_source=classified-8

Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this exquisite Lower Pacific Heights furnished two-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and cozy living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that San Francisco has to offer! (ID #SFO47)

Designed With You In Mind

Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this two-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in San Francisco, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

-Double Bed, 55in/140cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is in Lower Pacific Heights - also known as Upper Filmore. Located between California Street and Geary Boulevard, this gorgeous area has a lot to offer. Once a middle-class neighborhood, it is now considered quite upscale. The Financial District is within walking distance of this beautiful apartment, and buses are regularly available. This small neighborhood has an array of fine restaurants, and shopping, all within walking distance.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

Beautiful Art Deco 1937 building. It is often photographed by tourists located in San Francisco's North Beach/Telegraph Hill neighborhood. Close to all the city nightlife, transportation, China Town, and Downtown. The condo is fully furnished.
Nice beds, clean, plants, artwork, etc. Hi-speed WIFI, cable TV, full hi-fidelity sound system, etc. ALL THE AMENITIES IN EVERY WAY.

North Beach is a neighborhood in the northeast corner of San Francisco adjacent to Chinatown, Fisherman's Wharf and Russian Hill. The neighborhood is San Francisco's Little Italy and has historically been home to a large Italian American population. It still holds many Italian restaurants today, though many other ethnic groups currently live in the neighborhood. It was also the historic center of the beatnik subculture. Today, North Beach is one of San Francisco's hippest and most desired locations. We are both a nightlife district, foodies, bars, etc. as well as a residential neighborhood populated by a mix of young urban professionals, families and is considered the place to be if your traveling
The American Planning Association (APA) has named North Beach as one of ten 'Great Neighborhoods in America”

name: The best deal at the Infinity Tower. RENTED Gustavo Lopez AMSI
body:
RENTED RENTED RENTED

2BR/2BA+Den at the Infinity with bamboo flooring, plush carpeting in the bedrooms, upgraded Hunter Douglas window coverings, and high-end appliances and fixtures. The living area is comfortable and functional with a large den/office off to the side--perfect for the working professional or for storage. The bedrooms are generously sized and comfortable. The master bathroom is warm and rich in feeling with travertine tiling and wainscoting, marble-topped double-sink vanity, Studio Becker walnut cabinetry, Watermark fixtures, and deep soaking bath tub. Closet space galore with a huge walk-in closet in the master bedroom and 3 other large closets in the unit.

• The iconic Infinity designed by the joint architecture team of Bernardo Fort-Brescia of Architectonica and Heller Manus and built by Tishman Speyer, is a complex of 4 individual buildings, two high-rise towers of 42 and 37 stories and two mid-rise towers of 9 and 8 stories all sharing a full suite of luxury amenities and services. The Infinity's signature all-glass exterior and round, undulating corners makes it one of the most distinctive projects in all of San Francisco. One block away from the Embarcadero on Folsom St in South Beach/Rincon Hill, the location is A+.


Unit Features

• Den/Office area--perfect for the home office
• Bamboo flooring
• Contemporary Studio Becker kitchen cabinets with gorgeous dark granite countertops
• High-end appliances (Thermador Fridge, Bosch Washer/Dryer, Bosch Oven, Microwave)
• Master bedroom has 2 closets: 1 large walk-in closet and 2nd smaller closet
• Hunter Douglas window treatments
• Custom European-style shower door
• Upgraded carpet
• Built-in closet organizers in each room
• Premium large parking close to building elevators; available for additional fee
• Small pets negotiable


Building Amenities

• 24-hour attended lobby
• Concierge and on-site HOA
• 5,000 square foot fitness center
• 75 foot long heated indoor pool
• Club lounge with catering kitchen and bar
• Movie theater
• Business center
• Landscaped courtyard with waterfall
• Prospect restaurant in the complex
• Embarcadero waterfront across the street

body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

1 to 2 month lease: $5,190 / mo

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-lower-nob-hill-243?utm_source=classified-8

Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this roomy Lower Nob Hill furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and cheery living room. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that San Francisco has to offer! (ID #SFO243)

Designed With You In Mind

Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this one-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in San Francisco, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living.

Sleeping Arrangements

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - In-Building Laundry
  - Pet Friendly
  - Dog Park/Run
  - Roof Deck
  - Garden
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished property is situated on Lower Nob Hill. Adjacent to Nob Hill, this friendly neighborhood offers now a  mix of restaurants and stores, as students and young families have turned the area to a new hotspot for residential and retail development. It is also walking distance from Market Street, the Financial District, Chinatown and Union Square, a fact that renders it a highly coveted location.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

name: 3BD, 2BA w/NEW Kitchen & Hardwood Floors / Pets OK!
body:
Rarely available first-floor flat in Haight facing huge back yard!

Please reply to this email or call/text Michael at  
 to schedule a viewing this week

DESCRIPTION
This three-bedroom, two-bath Victorian apartment has been completely remodeled! New hardwood floors and kitchen make this apartment perfect for sharing, especially if one of your roommates has a dog! The apartment building is located directly across from the Panhandle and just a stone's throw from Golden Gate Park. It's also just a two-block walk to Whole Foods and Haight Ashbury.

The apartment itself is located in the rear of the building, on the first floor, with direct access to a huge back yard via the extra storage room in the rear of the unit. It features high ceilings and Victorian details throughout. All three bedrooms are good sizes and can fit queen/king beds. The kitchen has a brand new gas stove & fridge, while the living room features a decorative fireplace. The unit gets great afternoon light through the bay windows facing the back yard. Laundry and bicycle storage is located in the basement of the building.

LEASE TERMS:
•Lease: One year
•Security Deposit: $4,850
•Garbage & water included in rent
•Dog & cat friendly!

name: Private Entrance, Gated Underground Parking, Sundeck, BBQ and Fire Pit
body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.With a New Angle on Urban Luxe, Duboce offers San Francisco Boutique-Style Living Duboce Triangle is a vibrant and highly-desirable neighborhood infused with color and culture. The Duboce is a boutique-style apartment community that blends high style with urban luxury. The walking score is at a phenomenal 98. Distinctly tranquil with a bustling nightlife and remarkable shopping of the Castro and the Mission are mere steps away.Embracing an urban retro aesthetic, Duboce provides stellar community features, remarkable amenities and pet-friendly living options. From our polished porcelain tile flooring and dual-tone cabinets to our beautiful subway tile backsplashes and Caesarstone quartz countertops, Duboce offers classic living and will quickly become your happy place. Perfect for entertaining friends and family, each apartment home provides staple items for a fun, yet functional space that will enhance your living experience.With one- and two-bedroom apartment rentals and a variety of floor plans, Duboce is ideal for those seeking a walkable home life and an effortless commute. Whether enjoying a BBQ with friends and family or soaking up the sun on our expansive roof deck, residents at Duboce enjoy exciting features that allow them to feel connected and comfortable. name: Completely restored furnished Victorian. Near Bi-Rite! ~ J.Wavro
body:
San Francisco - NOPA - Home for rent
Completely restored furnished Victorian. Near Bi-Rite!
 Link to mobile layout:   http://www.jwavro.com/rental_details.php?id=3309257-0
Summary:
Rent: $9995
Bed / Bath: 6 / 3.5
Type: Home
Term: Monthly
Please contact:
Joanne Fazzino   |    show contact info
    |   www.jwavro.com

Description:

	This is a phenomenal restored Victorian - down to the studs!

	Monthly only. Rented November 2019 and January 2020. October and December, 2019. 

	Available only furnished and accessorized. Over 3300sf!

	This beautiful 3 level home with 6 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms has 3 fireplaces and radiant heating with 10 zones.

	It has a "Country Inn" feel with Victorian period charm - high ceilings and striped hardwood floors.

	The gourmet kitchen has granite counters and stainless steel appliances including a Subzero refrigerator and gas range. 

	The first level is common area with a formal living room, formal dining room, eat in kitchen and a powder room.

	The second floor has 3 bedrooms (including a master suite) and 2 bathrooms.

	The 3rd level has 3 bedrooms (one of which is used as an office) and 1 bathroom. 

	Laundry is on the 2nd level.  There is a large deck with a barbecue as well. 

	The Panhandle of Golden Gate Park is across the street. NOPA is full of restaurants, bars and organic grocery stores, including Bi-Rite Grocery and Ice Cream. 

	Plenty of buses and shuttle stops close by. Enjoy the true San Francisco experience in this beautifully restored Victorian.

	Utilities will be negotiated based on the length of the term. 

	Here are the bed sizes:

	       1). Master California King

	       2). Queen

	       3). Bunk twin size

	       4). Twin

	       5). Daybed - twin size

	       6). A little larger than a full size - custom

	             size mattresses

	Available around March 1, 2020.

	No pets, please.
This is a non-smoking unit. 
Details:
Floors: Hardwood
Kitchen: Gourmet
Laundry: In Unit
Outside area: Deck

Parking: Street
Parking Fee: $0
Pets:  No 
View: City
Location:
Fell Street & Central Avenue, San Francisco, California

Situated in the dynamic Potrero Hill neighborhood this building is the epitome of urban living within walking distance to 18th Street, Home to San Francisco's most quintessential shops, cafes and restaurants, as well as Whole Foods. 540 De Haro has a Walk Score of 93, a excellent location for commuters being close to 280S, and is less than a 20 minute walk to the 22nd Street Caltrain Stop

name: Furnished queen bedroom by Glen Park BART stop
body:
Furnished queen bedroom available starting March.
Share the bathroom with 1 house mate.
This private bedroom has a queen bed, side tables, dresser, sofa chair and closet. 
The flat has 4 bedrooms, 3 baths shared by 4 total working IT professionals.

It's located in a friendly family neighborhood. Walk a few blocks to the Glen Park BART subway stop for a quick 10 mins ride to downtown financial district and SOMA. 
Walk 1 block to Mission Street for safeway supermarket, fitness centers, restaurants, banks and also the 14 express Mission street bus to downtown and SOMA.

Living space of approximately 1200 sq ft:
There are 4 bedrooms 3 bathrooms total. 
The kitchen has a stove + oven, fridge, dishwasher, a microwave.
The Dining set seats up to 4 people
No living room. The only common area is the kitchen inside the home.
Fast WiFi with data ports in each bedroom.
Laundry washer & dryer in the building. 
Street parking 

Location:
- walk 1 block to Mission Street for Safeway supermarket, Walgreens pharmacy, restaurants, cafes, banks, shopping.
- Walk 1 block to the Mission 14 express bus stop for a 15 mins ride to downtown and SOMA. 
- walk a few blocks to the Glen Park BART subway for a quick 10 mins ride to downtown financial district and SoMA. 
- No onsite parking. Free street parking.

Lease terms:
Monthly rent: $1,480 + $100 fixed fee to cover all utilities and WiFi 
Available starting March.
Rental deposit $1,800 due upon lease signing

Please email me a self introduction and I'll reply back to schedule a showing.

name: Furnished 3 bedrooms 2 baths flat by BART
body:
Nicely furnished 3 bedrooms 2 bath flat available in April.

Living space of approx 1,200 sq ft include:
 - The spacious living room has large bay windows facing the street. It has a sofa set, a flat screen cable TV and a conference work table & chairs for easy team work at home.
- renovated kitchen has stainless steel appliances, granite counters, a microwave, toaster, coffee maker, cooking ware and dining ware. 
- Dining set seats up to 4 people. 
- Two of the bedroom have a queen bed in each. The 3rd bedroom has a 1 full size bed. Each bedroom has side tables, a desk & chair, and a dresser. 
- 2 newly renovated bathrooms. There is 1 ensuite bathroom inside the master bedroom.
- washer & dryer in the building. 
- enjoy the sun in the shared blooming garden on the ground level. Furnished with patio chairs and tables.

name: Gigantic studio-sized master bedroom /w private bath in Nopa mansion!
body:
****The room is usually $2700/mo but during those crazy times we are offering a discounted rent of $2200/mo until the end of July - short term lease considered during that time. 

Come join us in our mansion in Nopa! Bear with me, I know it's roommates, but please check it out, we believe it is a way better deal than a studio you could get for this price. We currently have our master bedroom open that is by far the largest room, the walk-in closet is the largest in the city and comes with a private bathroom with a dedicated shower and bathtub. You have to see it for yourself! We think this is a great space for couples who want more than a simple studio.

While the apartment has 6 bedrooms (3BA) total, you can honestly never feel that way because it is so big. You have roommates when you want them, but a gigantic living room with 4 sun windows, a dining room with an extra comfy couch and nice views, as well as a den upstairs give everyone plenty of room to themselves when they need to. The kitchen has a 6-burner viking range, plenty of storage for all kitchen gadgets/pantry items, a dishwasher, as well as washer and dryer. You really have to see it in person to get a feel for it.

We are in the heart of Nopa, 2 blocks away from Divis. If you know it, it's super clean, quiet and neighborhoody, while in Divis has all the action you would want. We are right by the 5/5R/31 that brings you downtown in 15 minutes. We have a GoBike station on the same block and with the Wiggle, you can bike/scooter into the mission in 10 minutes. We have a Lucky's grocery store 5 minutes away, and Trader Joe's/Target/Bi-Rite 10 minute walk away. Golden Gate Park is 10 minutes away as well, or reading a book on Alamo Square while overlooking the city is just 5 minutes.

As for the people itself, we are looking to create a community of people that want to live together. The apartment is so big that you can always have space to yourself (which everyone needs to!), but we don't want to live in an apartment where everyone hides in their rooms. The apartment is too gorgeous for that. Currently we have

J (M)- He's originally from New Hampshire, MIT grad, knows everything about distributed systems and now a software engineer at Facebook.
J (F)- French-American, grew up in Paris loves everything cheese, bread and wine. A video editor learning about production on the side who’s big into sustainability, zero waste, farmers markets and the outdoors. 
K (F)- Another New Englander who got tired of shoveling her driveway. Works in restaurant operations and studies design on the side.
M (M)- Proud Canadian from Toronto. Really into wine, cycling and photography these days, but always found in the outdoors and appropriately works at Hipcamp.com
N (M)- Originally grew up in Berlin, Germany, watches football, but plays soccer. Dances sometimes https://nambrot.com/aroundtheworld

You - Interested in making this a clean, fun, yet relaxed home. The usual fine print of having a stable income, be a clean and courteous roommate apply. We have cleaners come by every 2 weeks and keep the place above-average clean in the first place. No pets unfortunately. The lease will be month-to-month, but we are looking for people that don't want their apartment to be just an collection of roommate after roommate like so many apartments in SF. Move-in is ASAP! As per usual, there is only so much you can convey in a listing like this, so please reach out!

This furnished rental is located in Hayes Valley. It is a fashionable neighborhood in the center of San Francisco. Hayes Street is perfect for shopping, eating or just taking a stroll. There is always something new to see, with pop-up restaurants and cool boutiques providing unique entertainment. Playgrounds and park spaces fill the medians of the streets. The close-knit neighborhood features a community garden, a pocket park with art installations, and access to music and theater near the Civic Center. It is a great stop for art enthusiasts. The SFO Airport is 25 minutes away by car or an hour away by BART.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.

name: Charming Presidio Duplex
body:
Portola NeighborhoodPresidio ResidencesSan Francisco, CA 94129The Portola neighborhood features charming brick duplex buildings with proximity to the Union, Chestnut, and California Street retail areas. These three-bedroom, one-bath homes offer beautiful historic detailing, including fully glassed-in sun porches. The neighborhood is set within Tennessee Hollow, the Presidio’s largest watershed, amid eucalyptus and cypress groves and native plant restoration sites. The homes are conveniently laid out with the kitchen, living room, and formal dining room on the first floor, and the bedrooms and bathroom on the second floor. The neighborhood is near hiking trails such as Lovers’ Lane, as well as the popular Julius Kahn Playground. name: Stunning Penthouse VIEW Unit Steps from Union Street!
body:
Stunning Penthouse VIEW unit located in a boutique 6-unit building steps from Union Street! This sophisticated full floor flat blends quintessential architectural design with modern living to create the perfect place to call home.  Spacious, top floor apartment flooded with an abundance of natural sunlight featuring a large living room / great room with fireplace & dramatic picture window which frames the Golden Gate Bridge.  The gourmet Chef’s kitchen boasts honed granite countertops, ample custom cabinetry, and top-of-the-line stainless appliances including:  4-burner Viking range/oven with center grill & ventilated hood, Subzero side by side oversized refrigerator, built-in Miele espresso maker, dishwasher & microwave.  The grand master bedroom has custom built-in closets, and a cozy private reading area with lovely city views.  Two additional bedrooms, two luxurious remodeled bathrooms with heating flooring, and in-unit laundry (GE stackable washer & dryer) complete the flat.  
Additional features:  high-end finishes throughout, newer paint, hardwood floors, ample storage, multiple skylights, wall mounted flat screen TV’s in living room & master bedroom, multi-zone audio system throughout (6 independently controlled zones), in-unit gas furnace with smart thermostat, and August smart lock remote entry.  A lovely west-facing rear patio/garden is shared, 2-car parking with automatic garage door opener, plus additional storage in garage (included in the rent)!    
A++ walkable location near Union, Chestnut & Fillmore Street restaurants, lively cafes, boutique shopping, multiple fitness studios (Soul Cycle, Barry’s Bootcamp, Core40, CorePower Yoga), the Marina Green, parks, public transportation, tech shuttles and social economy.  

*  Penthouse Unit 
*  Stunning VIEWS of Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz & City Skyline
*  3 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms
*  Gourmet Kitchen
*  Remodeled Throughout
*  2 Car Parking + Additional Storage
*  Shared Patio/Garden
*  6-Unit Building Constructed in 1906

LEASE TERMS:
Looking for a 1-year lease, however the term is negotiable.  
The unit may come furnished or unfurnished - this is negotiable.  
Security deposit to be 1.5 x's the rent.  
Pet's are negotiable with an additional pet deposit.  
Owner pays:  water & garbage.  Tenant pays:  PG&E, internet & cable.    
Please contact Listing Agent to set up a private virtual tour, and/or the unit may be shown via private appointment to pre-qualified Tenants per current San Francisco showing regulations.

name: Besler Bldg Live/Work Loft Rental in Emeryville
body:
Rarely Available Work in this spacious Live/Work Loft. A very cool and spacious loft in the Historic Besler Bldg, walking distance to Pixar, Town Hall, stores, restaurant and transportation which includes the Emery-go-round (Free shuttle to BART). Located on Second Floor with approx. 1700 sq. ft of space on two levels. Walk into a dramatic open space with exposed brick below floor to ceiling windows, Frank Lloyd Wright Columns and the 14 ft. ceiling height creates a very cool hip place to live. Kitchen area with gas stove, s/s Refrigerator, butcher block counters, tile backsplash and wonderful concrete floors throughout. The Bath features a clawfoot soaking tub and vanity with lots of space to store linens. A spiral staircase leads to the Loft level with 2 sleeping platforms created to fit Queen size beds and ample space for closet/storage. This is wonderful historical building with loads of rustic charm and washer/dryer located in the building for common use and 1 car permit parking with lots of street parking available.  Call for a private showing...and/or a virtual tour.

Contact Agent for pictures

name: Furnished Studio in Lower Haight
body:
Tired of sheltering in place with roommates? Looking to social distance in your own space near amazing to-go restaurants (& bars ;) ) and a few lovely parks? Healthcare worker looking for a space near Sutter Hospital?

Do I have the spot for you!

Leasing my lovingly furnished studio for someone who needs a new spot during these crazy times.

Comes equipped with: basically new stainless steal appliances (FULL sized gas oven, dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave), amazing queen bed, pull out sofa with storage, piano, desk ready to go for your WFH life, a projector with a firestick for all your tv/streaming needs, high speed wifi, and some antibacterial cleaning products to keep you safe.

Location: Lower Haight - lots of restaurants/bars doing take out - feet away from the place, safeway is a 7 minute walk, cvs is a 1 minute walk, Duboce dog park and Alamo Square park are both ~10 minute walks, Panhandle is a 10 minute walk for all you runners out there.

Laundry: 1 floor down in the building, this is the closest unit to the facilities, coin op ($1.75 wash, $1.25 dry), but it's a small building so there's rarely anyone in there/using it. The building is also doing routine full sanitizing service right now.

Availability: Now - July 1, with an option to extend past on a month to month basis.

Interested? Shoot me your details, social links/linkedin, and we can schedule a 10 minute zoom chat to go over what you're looking for and logistics. The place was just fully cleaned and is ready for move-in immediately.

Close proximity to Clarendon Elementary, West Portal Elementary, Alice Fong Yu Elementary, & UCSF Parnassus Campus. Seconds to Forest Hill MUNI underground!

name: Furnished, Central Lower Nob Hill 2BR w/ W/D, 1 min walk to SFMH
body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

12+ month lease: $4,790* / mo
6 to 12 month lease: $4,990* / mo
2 to 6 month lease: $4,190* / mo
1 to 2 month lease: $3,490/ mo

Prices quoted are applicable only if billed upfront for the entire duration of the contract. Rates are up to 9% higher if billed monthly. Prices are exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-lower-nob-hill-123?utm_source=classified-8

Discover the best of San Francisco, with this two-bedroom Lower Nob Hill apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this elegantly Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, pretty living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #SFO123)

Designed With You In Mind

Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this two-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in San Francisco, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-Queen Bed, 63in/160cm

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Courtyard
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished property is situated on Lower Nob Hill. Adjacent to Nob Hill, this friendly neighborhood offers now a  mix of restaurants and stores, as students and young families have turned the area to a new hotspot for residential and retail development. It is also walking distance from Market Street, the Financial District, Chinatown and Union Square, a fact that renders it a highly coveted location.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

name: #227 FURNISHED ONLY Spacious Loft Style, 1 Bedroom
body:
A spacious 1 bedroom, 1.5 bath at 1,187 square feet and a highly functional floor plan.  The main level consists of a remodeled kitchen, marble counters, half bathroom, and full walk-in closet.  Upstairs one will find a master bedroom, full bathroom, and a loft style office space. The apartment has all new appliances and washer/dryer inside the unit. 

 This building is designated as a landmark of historical significance.  Which also means it is located on bedrock and not landfill.  Re-habbed and retrofitted in 1996, this unit is a classic "Brick and Timber" loft with great style and architectural appeal.

The building is situated very well to restaurants, transit, and the downtown commercial district.  A short one block stroll and you will be on the Embarcadero where you will find a well-regarded Seafood restaurant and equally regarded steakhouse.  Across the street is a more casual dinning experience but the closest place to grab a meal.  If you walk another block down the Embarcadero towards the ferry building, you will find a fantastic neighborhood restaurant and bar.  And of course, there is always the Ferry Building itself, with multiple eateries and shops.  You are also a short stroll along the bay to AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants baseball team.

One block away on the Embarcadero is the Muni Tram system, which can take you to many places across the city.  A few blocks walk down Spear street toward Market street will take you to the Embarcadero BART station which can take you across the city and under the bay to east bay locations.

$300 per month w/ parking. 

-Stove/Oven
-Microwave
-Dishwasher
-Washer/Dryer: in unit
-Accomodates 2
-Bed Size: Queen
-Parking available upon request
-Wifi
-TV

Fully Furnished

For more information please visit our website International Executive Rentals (IERSF) or contact us via or phone at  
 and request home #227. This home is FULLY FURNISHED.

name: $1350 Private bedroom
body:
Private bedroom with shared bath available in SF on Anza in the Central Richmond. The room is available as of April 1st, and will be available until July 31st, 2020 with the option to take over the lease. $1350 per month. Rent includes trash, the landlord takes the trash out for us every Monday morning. it also INCLUDES PARKING 2 weeks out of the month (shared with another roommate). We pay the landlord $20 for water, and split WiFi and PG&E between 4 people. (about $30 a month)

This is a 4 bedroom 2 bath 3rd floor unit. You would share 1 bathroom with 2 other girls. You will be sharing the entire apartment with three girls in total, we are all mid-20's. 2 are law students at USF and the other is an attorney working in FiDi. The lease is perfect for a student coming to SF for school or a working professional in between leases. 

Ideally we would like to find someone who is adult, professional, keeps a clean space, quiet, and a non-smoker. We keep a nice home and we would like it to stay that way :) It's super cozy, homey and well-kept. The place is HUGE and filled with natural light! 

The apartment is the perfect distance between multiple muni lines, the park, the beach, and a straight shot down Geary to downtown SF by public transportation.  The neighborhood is very safe and quiet. It's mostly families in the area. Other tenants in the building are students or recent grads. 

The room comes with a bed a spacious white wooden desk and wooden white chair, and the rest of the space has everything you could ever ask for! From wine openers to a sectional couch. 

**Our landlord does not allow pets, sorry!** 

Location:
- 1 block from a Grocery Outlet
- 1 block from the 38 muni line (to Downtown)
- 3 blocks from the 5 muni line (to USF)
- Bus ride away from Trader Joe's/Target/Chipotle/Ulta 
- 20 minute walk to Baker Beach 
- 2 blocks from Golden Gate Park 

Space includes:
- Wifi
- Shared kitchen includes:
- Dishwasher
- Garbage disposal 
- Microwave 
- Fully stocked with dishes/pots/pans/cooking supplies
- Common living room
- Hardwood floors throughout (NO carpeting) 
- Furnished living room (Couch, coffee table, dining table) 
- TONS of natural light from lots of windows and skylights! 
- Coin Op Laundry (Located in the garage) 
- Heater for those cold SF days!
- Plenty of Street parking but parking in GARAGE 2 weeks out of the month. 

Room: 
- Furnishings include: 
- Bed frame and full size mattress (if necessary & for sale)
- Natural light (1 window)
- Overhead lighting 
- Huge closet with sliding mirrored doors 
- Bathroom has a shower, a tub, and cabinet space

I am available to show the space on FaceTime if you are not in the area, and also available to show the space in person.

Deposit is $625 and will need to sign a sublease. Will need to provide landlord with picture/copy of ID.

If interested please respond to the ad! I am happy to answer any additional questions :)

body:

Illuminated by the Bay Lights, the surrounding historic homes and hills puts you right in the middle of spectacle. This home has a spacious living room with tall windows and offers a view toward the bay and the city. Fully equipped kitchen with granite counters, and washer and dryer.

Located centrally - Easy access to restaurants and services like dry cleaning, Muni transit, local eateries and more!

ABOUT THE RUSSIAN HILL NEIGHBORHOOD
Russian Hill A residential neighborhood with pockets of charming restaurants and shops, sunny Russian Hill has spectacular views looking out over Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz and the Bay Bridge. Lombard Street, the "world's crookedest street," winds through the area, and the Spanish-style San Francisco Art Institute with its distinctive bell tower is located down the hill towards North Beach.

Marina Green, a grassy playground with stunning views of the Golden Gate Bridge and San Francisco Bay, attracts joggers, sunbathers and kite fliers. The terracotta Palace of Fine Arts is home to the hands-on science museum, Exploratorium. Off Marina Boulevard, streets are dominated by grand stucco houses and flats. Chestnut Street brims with inviting stores, restaurants and watering holes.

name: #197 Furnished Italianate Victorian 2 Bedrm + Office & Den In Nob Hill
body:
Everything is within a short walk
#197   2 Bedrooms 2 Bathroom plus powder room and entertainment room

Newly renovated and professionally decorated luxury Italianate Victorian home sits on the exclusive top of Nob Hill in the heart of San Francisco and is the perfect short-term residence for professionals, corporate executives, or vacationers. The home was built in 1908 and  has 1850 square feet of living space.

Located two blocks from Grace Cathedral, this property is uniquely located on a pedestrian lane, which can only be accessed by foot. The only sound you will hear are of the bell from the Cable Car, which stops right at the foot of the steps. There are 57 steps from the sidewalk to the front door of the residence, so please note this access to be sure that it meets your requirements.

This is a Victorian home with a very contemporary interior has two bedrooms, two baths plus a powder room, a formal living room, an entertainment room-with a million dollar unobstructed view of the Golden Gate Bridge from an outdoor deck, a dining room, an office with high speed internet, and a full gourmet kitchen. From the entertainment room there is an unobstructed view of the Golden Gate Bridge. The master bedroom has a large king size four-poster bed with a connecting master bathroom. Beautiful travertine marble covers the floor and shower surround and this bathroom also features generous double sinks. From the master bedroom there is a view of the Bay. The guest room features a queen-size bed and the adjacent guest bathroom is beautifully appointed with marble from South America and includes a tub and shower.

The gourmet kitchen is bright and airy with stainless steel appliances. The kitchen includes an industrial gas range, convection oven, outdoor gas grill, refrigerator with ice maker, filtered water, and quick cooling/freezing features. There is also a quiet high efficiency dishwasher. All professional cooking utensils are also provided with the property.

ABOUT THE NOB HILL NEIGHBORHOOD

European in flavor with its hidden stairways and alleys. Almost every street gives you a different and spectacular angle of San Francisco's beautiful bay. This neighborhood is so centralized that you do not even need a car. Nearly everything is within a short walk.

Try walking to most of San Francisco's greatest attractions; Union Square, Fisherman's Wharf, The Ferry Building, Chinatown, The Crooked Street, The Financial District, Coit Tower, The Embarcadero, The Filbert Steps, The Moscone Center, The Saint Francis Yacht Club, The Restaurant District, The Theater District, The Marina, Fort Mason, SBC Field, the beach, charming shops in Union Square/North Beach/Hyde Street and Castro Street, the trolleys, the cable cars and the cable car museum, and much, much more.

Nob Hill is one of the most upscale central neighborhood in San Francisco, and its safe and quiet.  Several of San Francisco's best restaurants are within walking distance, you will be less than 10 minutes from Union Square, Fisherman's Wharf, and the financial district, the , minutes from the SOMA high tech district, and 20 minutes from the San Francisco International Airport. Public transportation is also available at a bus stop one block away. This location in the City provides easy access to the freeways going south to Silicon Valley, Palo Alto, Stanford, Carmel/Monterey and beyond.

body:
388 Fulton St Unit #406, San Francisco, CA 94102, United States

Enjoy rebates and get huge savings from your rent up to the first 3 months if you sign a lease with us on or before April 30, 2020. Call us now to book your showing!

A posh and modern studio apartment right in the heart of Hayes Valley, within walking distance to tech companies like Uber, Twitter, Airbnb and Pinterest HQ, and a shuttle ride away to Facebook and Google.

This beautiful studio apartment is in a vibrant community, with great amenities, including a rooftop retreat with a spectacular view, a lush private courtyard, a boutique sidewalk retail collection, indoor bike parking, and secured entry.

#406 boasts of a luxe kitchen, with European style cabinetry, Bosch dishwasher, Bertazzoni cooktop and oven, and Blomberg built-in refrigerator. The pristine living room has natural white oak flooring. For your laundry needs, this unit also comes with a high-end Bosch washer and dryer.

You’ll love this charming Hayes Valley furnished studio apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and cozy living room with great  views.Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that San Francisco has to offer! (ID #SFO112)

Designed With You In Mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a
fully-equipped kitchen in this studio property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and
towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in
the San Francisco vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart
TV.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is located in Hayes Valley. It is a fashionable neighborhood in the center of San Francisco. Hayes Street is perfect for shopping, eating or just taking a stroll. There is always something new to see, with pop-up restaurants and cool boutiques providing unique entertainment. Playgrounds and park spaces fill the medians of the streets. The close-knit neighborhood features a community garden, a pocket park with art installations, and access to music and theater near the Civic Center. It is a great stop for art enthusiasts. The SFO Airport is 25 minutes away by car or an hour away by BART.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

name: ASK US ABOUT OUR VIRTUAL TOURS
body:
Woodmont Real Estate Services is committed to help you find your new home from wherever you are. We strive to create communities where people feel at home and invite you to virtually experience a tour of our modern living interiors and life-enriching amenities you can enjoy every day. Our simple leasing process will save you time by choosing the home that feels right for you-all from the comfort of where you are, 24/7. For more information about apartment communities available in Northern California, visit www.woodmontrentals.com

O & M Apartments 680 Indiana Street | San Francisco, CA 94107

Dogpatch is one of San Francisco's most vibrant and diverse neighborhoods, filled with a mix of galleries, brew pubs and wine bars, artisanal cafe's and restaurants, working factories and one of a kind shops-plus, it’s one of the sunniest locations in San Francisco! Living here, you’re close to Potrero Hill, Mission Bay and Downtown San Francisco. Contact us today to book your private tour!

OFFICE HOURS:
Monday- Friday 9:30 am to 5:00 pm (Live Video & Virtual Tours)
Saturday 10:30 am to 4:00 pm (Live Video & Virtual Tours)
Sunday 12:30 pm to 4:45 pm (Live Video & Virtual Tours)
Please call or text us at  
 to self-schedule from your phone!
Online Leasing Available 24/7

FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES: • Beautiful white quartz countertops • Stainless steel appliances in all homes • Energy efficient LED lighting throughout • Designer wood cabinetry with soft close drawers • Wood flooring throughout all homes • In-home Bosch washer & dryer • Soaking tubs • Ceramic tile backsplash in bathrooms • Grohe kitchen & bath fixtures

PROPERTY AMENITIES: • 2 rooftop decks with 360 bay & city views • Outdoor lounges with fire pits • 3 BBQ stations with Viking grills & outdoor dining • Package receiving • On-site cafe - Noon All Day - from the owners of Piccino • Available garage parking with EV charging stations • Bicycle friendly with on-site bike storage • Pet families welcome • Adjacent to Dogpatch Arts Plaza • 100% smoke free community

~NEW Community Rewards Resident Program!

NEARBY PLACES:
• Walking distance to Muni Metro T-Line & 22nd St. Cal-Train station
• Walking distance to Oracle Park & newly opened Chase Center
• Major employers: Dropbox, Pinterest, UCSF, UBER, Lyft & Kaiser
• Nearby dog parks, restaurants & nightlife
• Nearby Zip Cars & Ford Bike station

MANAGED BY: WOODMONT REAL ESTATE SERVICES

Floorplan specifications are approximate and may vary. Pricing and availability subject to change. Utilities not included in pricing. Please contact our leasing center for complete information on monthly rental rates and any additional charges that may apply.

Subletting is strictly prohibited. Please contact the onsite community staff should you come across a sublet or short term stay at this location through other online sources.

name: Furnished, Roomy Lower Nob Hill 2BR w/ W/D, Lounge, near SFMH, FiDi
body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

12+ month lease: $4,390* / mo
6 to 12 month lease: $4,590* / mo
2 to 6 month lease: $3,590* / mo
1 to 2 month lease: $2,390/ mo

Prices quoted are applicable only if billed upfront for the entire duration of the contract. Rates are up to 9% higher if billed monthly. Prices are exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-lower-nob-hill-130?utm_source=classified-8

Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this comfortable Lower Nob Hill furnished two-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and charming living room. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that San Francisco has to offer! (ID #SFO130)

Designed With You In Mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this two-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the San Francisco vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-Queen Bed, 63in/160cm

-Queen Bed, 63in/160cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished property is situated on Lower Nob Hill. Adjacent to Nob Hill, this friendly neighborhood offers now a  mix of restaurants and stores, as students and young families have turned the area to a new hotspot for residential and retail development. It is also walking distance from Market Street, the Financial District, Chinatown and Union Square, a fact that renders it a highly coveted location.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

name: Luxurious 1 BED, 1 BATH in Historical Dogpatch - $3,700
body:
815 Tennessee St #307 is in a luxurious condo building, recently built in 2018. Desirably located in the historic Dogpatch neighborhood of San Francisco, residents enjoy the convenience of being 1-2 blocks from UCSF, multiple public transportation options, easy access to 101/280 freeways (north and south) and moments away from Chase Center (Warriors arena), Oracle Park (Giants Stadium). With a variety of world class restaurants, a bustling nightlife, quaint local artisan shops and many art galleries to explore, this location offers it all.

Inside, the west-facing living room boasts an open floor plan, with soaring floor-to-ceiling windows providing abundant sunlight, and gorgeous wide plank oak floors. The kitchen includes a white quartz waterfall countertop and eat-in kitchen peninsula, in-unit washer dryer, ample storage space, Bosch gas range and dishwasher. The bedroom, also west-facing, is carpeted and has a large walk-in closet.

This 1 bedroom, 1 bath unit features:

- Wide-plank oak hardwood floors in kitchen, living room and hallway, carpet in bedroom
- Kitchen has white quartz waterfall countertops, stainless steel Bosch gas range and dishwasher, built in Liebherr refrigerator, Sozo kitchen cabinets and large pantry
- Washer/dryer in unit
- Bedroom with western-facing windows, walk-in closet
- Large bathroom with shower over tub
- Zoned heating system
- Custom Hunter Douglass blinds with remote control in living room and bedroom
- Large deeded storage space
- Water and trash included in rent

Building amenities:
- Landscaped roof terrace with BBQ and panoramic views of Bay and City
- Weekday lobby attendant: package concierge and mailroom
- Laundry locker
- Key fob access to all floors and common areas
- Bicycle storage and repair station
- Keycafe

Great location, easy access to:
- Esprit Park, soon to be developed Pier 70 and parks
- Many artisan shops and art galleries
- 22nd St. Caltrain station, T-line on 3rd street, and easy access to 101 / 280 freeways
- Chase Center (Warriors Stadium), Oracle Park (Giant’s Stadium) and UCSF Mission Bay Campus
- Fitness: UCSF gym, 3rd street boxing gym, Dogpatch Boulders
- Moments away from favorite local restaurants & cafes: Serpentine, Mr. and Mrs. Miscellaneous, Magnolia Brewing, Stem Kitchen, Spark Social, SF Kebab, Plow, Piccino, Daily Drivers

Offered at $3,700 / month for lease ending June 30, 2021.
Offered for $3,850 per month for 12 month lease.

*(Images are virtually staged)*

If you’re interested in purchasing this unit it is available for sale, contact Eddie Valtierra at  
.

name: Experience 77 Bluxome in the heart of SoMa!
body:
Call Us Today   show contact info


Special Offer
Save up to two weeks off your first month's rent on select homes

Experience a lifestyle of tranquility and serenity here at 77 Bluxome Apartments. Optimized for maximum versatility, these stunning homes also feature modern interiors and layouts. Expansive windows let sunlight illuminate the gorgeous finishes. This community serves as a reprieve from the fast paced city. Relax by the calming water features or perched on the rooftop deck, admiring the panoramic views of the San Francisco surround.

77 Bluxome Apartments is right off the transit line in San Francisco's up-and-coming SoMa neighborhood, home of the San Francisco Giants. Beneath the neighborhood's industrial exterior - a major perk if you're looking for a unique place to call home in the Golden Gate City - lies a hidden waterfront treasure on the verge of being discovered. Our neighborhood has fewer chain businesses and establishments, favoring local commerce and hidden gems that are free of too much tourist traffic. When you're looking for a handcrafted cocktail, some locally roasted coffee or a hip boutique full of vintage frocks and finds, look no further than SoMa. Come see what our artsy neighborhood has to offer!

77 Bluxome Apartments
More Photos http://www.equityapartments.com/san-francisco-bay/soma/77-bluxome-apartments?ilsid=93

name: Large 4 Bedroom Presidio Duplex Available
body:
East Washington NeighborhoodPresidio ResidencesSan Francisco, CA 94129The East Washington neighborhood is located in a peaceful eucalyptus forest near Presidio Golf Course. The 4-bedroom duplex buildings were built in 1948 as officers' family quarters and most still have their original oak parquet floors in the living rooms and dining areas.
