name: Montana House for rent- Glacier Park
body:
Newley remodeled, fully furnished 6 bedroom 3 bath house and brand new attached and also furnished 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment for a total of 8 bedrooms, on the most beautiful block in the Historical East Side.  3 Blocks from Main St.  Large professional kitchen. 35 minutes to Glacier Park and 20 minutes to Whitefish.  
Wine Cellar, Wet Bar, Billiards Table and Attached heated garage.  This home was owned by the former Dr. of Slugger Babe Ruth.  And is a 5-10 minute drive to the Hospital.
6 month lease available starting 4/1/2020

Escape the madness and rent our Registered Historical home in Kalispell Montana. Built in 1919 with a half million dollar remodel just completed in 2019 this beautiful 5,00 sq. ft. classic is a dream property.  I am a master craftsman that uses mediums of concrete, wood, and steel.  I personally fabricated every concrete countertop, concrete sink, concrete shower and light fixture in this remodel.  I've poured my heart and soul into the design and finish to give you the best lodging experience in the Flathead valley. 

Besides being registered on the Historic Society list as a Historic Property, this home is a true one of a kind.  Built by the President of the Empire Lumber Co. and only owned by Judges and Doctors since the prestige in evident as soon as you walk in the door.  Location is everything.  and this property sits on the top of the hill in East Kalispell and is only 3 blocks from main street shopping and dining.  The tree lines streets of the East side offer endless walks to appreciate the century old architecture surrounding this home.  Glacier Park, Flathead Lake, Whitefish Mountain Resort, Whitefish Lake and Town are only minutes away so the central location of this property makes it a vacationers perfect location to play during the day then take a 5 minute walk to either the Bias Brewery or Kalispell Brewery to enjoy great local food and drinks.  
The finish and fixtures of the recent remodel are all top shelf, our bathrooms are Spa quality and the design is completely updated and custom.  Enjoy the new master bedroom which boasts massive 100 year old collar tie rafter bracing with the turnbuckles we salvaged from the Whitefish Fire Station built also in 1919.  
The Custom gourmet kitchen is now incorporated into the open floor plan of the dining and living room.  We took all measures to keep the original in this home.  the original double hung windows compliment the glaze filled interior doors and beautiful Bi-fold doors separating the dining/ living room space.  The 1.5" maple strip floor was refinished to look brand new.  
You can have the kids sleep in the "Beach" themed room with bunk beds or if you have a baseball player in the family the "Babe Ruth" room is a hit.  The former owner of this home was a Dr. whom after returning from WWII was legendary slugger George  Herman "Babe" Ruth.  the baseball themed front bedroom features baseball memorabilia from days long gone.
The basement of this home will take you to another time when the hotels in the early 1900's had a feeling of class and comfort.  Play on the billiards table or sit at the bar for a cocktail. or you can enjoy a bottle of wine in the wine cellar with a custom wine rinsing sink approved by the Francis Ford Coppola winery in California.  Soak in the copper bathtub after a long day hiking in Glacier Park.  Play a game of Billiards or cards on one of two gaming tables.  Chess, Checkers and of course the X-Box is available. 




Due to owner health issues this property is absolutely no smoking/ no pets.
Credit Check as well as proof of income required for application processing.
Call 406-212-479nine for information.

name: #168 Furnished&unfurnished - 2 Bdrm 1 Bath in SOMA/South of Market
body:
This 800 square foot condo was built in 1992. Beautiful hardwood floor in the kitchen and living room. The kitchen is fully equipped and the appliances are stainless steal. Small balcony is available. Lovely home suitable for a small family or colleagues.

The property is walking distance to the Moscone Center, half a block to Wholefoods, and a few blocks to Westfield mall, restaurants, theater, museum, Muni and Bart and more.

ABOUT THE SOUTH OF MARKET NEIGHBORHOOD
SoMa/South of Market SoMa, or South of Market, is a vast, warehouse-filled district. It encompasses Mission Bay and South Beach, where the Giants play baseball at waterfront AT&T Park. Surrounding Yerba Buena Gardens is an arts center, sleek convention complex Moscone Center and several museums, including the acclaimed San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA). The area is dotted with upscale dining options and high-energy nightclubs.

body:
The location is great and has wall of tall windows with spectacular views of the Golden Gate Bridge and Alcatraz. Originally an Italian neighborhood, elegant homes line the waterfront and the famous Marina Green is a favorite with dog walkers, runners, and kite enthusiasts. Residents, many of whom are young professionals, also enjoy a bustling commercial district of shops, restaurants and museums. 

Pacific Heights In this elegant neighborhood you'll find multi-million dollar Victorian homes and stunning views of the Bay and the Golden Gate Bridge. It's generally a quiet, residential area. Driving the hills of Pacific Heights can be breathtaking. The homes are gorgeous, the views are stunning and the streets are incredibly steep.

name: #218 Furnished Only Luxurious 2 bedroom in SOMA/South Beach
body:
Comfortable and luxury living in the SOMA/South of Market. There is 24-hour doorman, full-size heated outdoor lap pool and spa, gym, concierge service, in-unit laundry and more.

South of Market and central to everywhere. The financial district, the theater district, the waterfront, the museums, transportation, services, tantalizing restaurants, chic boutiques, Saks, Neimans, you name it. Every downtown thing to do. You're there in minutes. There is also a small market walking distance at Beale and Brannan and great restaurants included Italian, Chinese, and Cafes on Brannan and Delancey street.

Neighborhood Overview
South of Market is a large stretch of area incorporating a patchwork of warehouses, art spaces, trendy nightspots, lofts, condos and breathtaking high rise residential buildings. It includes everything from the venerable, grassy square of South Park to the handsome ballpark at 24 Willie Mays Plaza. Here you'll also find the beautiful SF Museum of Modern Art.

Getting around
BART - Embarcadero station.

Other things to note
Garage parking: Charge $300 for parking, housekeeping once a month. Washer / Dryer: in unit

Enjoy the convenience of walking in the neighborhood with cafes, restaurants, Presidio Park, and much more.

Neighborhood
The Marina was developed on the site of the 1915 Panama-Pacific International Exposition. Marina Green, a grassy playground with stunning views of the Golden Gate Bridge and San Francisco Bay, attracts joggers, sunbathers and kite fliers. The terracotta Palace of Fine Arts is home to the hands-on science museum, Exploratorium. Off Marina Boulevard, streets are dominated by grand stucco houses and flats. Chestnut Street brims with inviting stores, restaurants and watering holes.

Virtual tours available daily, easily scheduled with on-site manager.

Light and airy one bedroom, newly painted with new flooring throughout, spacious rooms, and eat-in kitchen. Includes one off-street parking space in back and a storage locker.

Cable ready, Sonic gigabit fiber available for top speed Internet.

Located in desirable Noe Valley in a clean and quiet 4-unit building with laundry facilities.

Walkable neighborhood. One block to shopping and dining on Church Street. Easy walk to 24th Street shopping. Close to Mission District.

Easy access to HWY 280 and HWY 101.

Close to shuttle stops and public transportation.
J streetcar line within 2 blocks

BART within 1 mile

name: Furnished-Suitcase ready, 3 month minimum-Quiet-Modern-SOMA 1-Bedroom
body:
Sought after location in SOMA is our Fully Furnished & Equipped Light and Bright 1 Bedroom Condo.
It will come available as of April 15th.
Just a Short walk to Bart, Muni & Caltrain lines.
½ a block to Whole Foods, and 2 blocks to Target.

We usually go with a 12-month agreement, but especially catering to Doctors and other Medical Professionals we will consider even a 3, 4, or 6 month shorter-term stay.

Right on Folsom near 4th Street.
Easy walking to everywhere downtown.

*High-Speed Internet WiFi is set and Included.
*All cookware, dishware, and even starter condiments are there upon arrival.
*Microwave, Coffee Maker, Hot Water Pot, Iron, Ironing board and more are here.
*Stainless Steel with a Granite Top Kitchen awaits with an in-unit washer & dryer!
*Beautiful wood flooring and a Carpeted Queen Size Bedroom with a Walk-In Closet.
*Larger than normal, nicely tiled full bathroom with shower over tub.
*Light and bright with walls of windows to let in lots of natural light and fresh air.
*The building and the unit are only approximately 12 years old.
*You will find it Suitcase Ready with style and comfort, as an inclusive rate of $ 3700
*There is an Amazing Tropical Outdoor Center Courtyard to enjoy steps from your door.

For consideration, If interested and qualified, please reply with one very detailed email.  Due to current health care considerations viewings will not take place until April 15th.  This is a great condo in the perfect SOMA location and for those reasons, in the past, it has been easy for me to lease it out sight unseen when necessary. The photos attached have not been touched up at all, so what you see is what you get.

There are lots of scams here on Craigslist as we all know and this is not one of those.  After one email and one phone/video chat with me, you will see that easily and clearly.  This unit when it comes available always moves quickly.  UNIQUE: Because of how this unit sits in the back corner of the building overlooking a narrow side street, it is an extremely quiet unit the likes of what is hard to find anywhere in San Francisco. Stay Safe and be Well, like most problems, this too shall pass..  Enjoy Always!,    Rob

Discover the best of San Francisco, with this studio Hayes Valley apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this exquisitely Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, comfortable living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #SFO301)

Designed With You In Mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a
fully-equipped kitchen in this studio property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and
towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in
the San Francisco vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart
TV.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-Queen Bed, 63in/160cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Gym
  - Indoor Parking
  - Roof Deck
  - Garden
  - Courtyard
  - Bike Storage
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is located in Hayes Valley. It is a fashionable neighborhood in the center of San Francisco. Hayes Street is perfect for shopping, eating or just taking a stroll. There is always something new to see, with pop-up restaurants and cool boutiques providing unique entertainment. Playgrounds and park spaces fill the medians of the streets. The close-knit neighborhood features a community garden, a pocket park with art installations, and access to music and theater near the Civic Center. It is a great stop for art enthusiasts. The SFO Airport is 25 minutes away by car or an hour away by BART.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.

name: Junior 1 bedroom apartment available now-Virtual Tours only
body:
Call Us Today   show contact info


Special Offer
Save up to one month's rent!

Come check out one of our fabulous 1 bedroom apartments. This is the only type of 1 bedroom apartments that includes a washer and a dryer per unit. The living room is spacious and so is the actual bedroom itself. You also get two closets; one in the bedroom and one next to the washer/dryer.  

SoMa is one of the most up and coming neighborhoods in SF and stretches from the Mid Market area by Van Ness all the way East to the Embarcadero. It's an eclectic blend of sights, sounds, smells, and has something for every taste. It also changes rapidly; sometimes a block away can be an entirely different world!

Here at SoMa Square, we are located close to Rincon Hill and the Financial District and border 3rd street one of the main arteries of San Francisco. You'll find it convenient to be in the center of it all in a well kept area of SF. The Yerba Buena Gardens, Union Square shopping, wild and eclectic nightlife, soothing bay views of the Embarcadero, and the hustle and bustle of the FiDi are all a short distance away from your front door. 

If you need to get around the Bay, simply hop on BART or unlock a ZipCar and find yourself a mere block away from all major freeway entrances and on ramps. This is truly commuter's and walker's paradise.

You will find that our community is unlike any other in the area with our elevated central courtyard that feels like an oasis in the concrete jungle. You need to stop by on your apartment search and see that value, convenience, and comfort coalesce here at SoMa Square Apartments in San Francisco!

SoMa Square Apartments

name: Spacious Renovated Flat/Available Now!
body:
This bright and spacious flat is located in a neighborhood filled with other well kept homes in the sunny Potrero Flats/Mission district.  Located close to public transportation. One block from Potrero and 24th St. and close to Hwy 280 and US 101 to Silicon Valley. Though the flat is fully renovated, it maintains a lot of the original charm with built-in shelves, decorative brick fireplace, french doors, chair and pictures railings.

Features: *Hardwood floors,*Bay windows,*Lg. eat-in kitchen with granite counter top, gas range, microwave and dishwasher,*Laundry room area,*Good closet space,*Central heating,*Security gate.

Other info: *Street parking,*no pets (sorry),*Landlord pays for water and garbage only.

What you need to have: *Credit report w/FICA scores, *Proof of employment,*Last 10yrs landlord contacts(if possible)*Bank info
First months rent and $4000. security deposit required to move in.  1 year lease.

Private showing upon request.  We wear gloves and masks.  We can provide gloves.
Call or text *Karen  

Video tour available upon email request.

name: Sunny, Modern 2-level City view Condo in Potrero Hill 3bd/2.5bth
body:
Sunny, Modern 2-level City view Condo in Potrero Hill 3bd/2.5bth

The CONDO:
-Luxurious 2-level, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom 1800 sqft modern condo with beautiful open city views, perfect for entertaining
-Open floor plan with living room, dining room and kitchen on upper level with access to 2 private outdoor balconies
-Top of the line Chef's kitchen with Miele coffeemaker, dishwasher, instant hot water dispenser, refrigerator, Wolf Gourmet gas stove and oven, Miele microwave
-Grill and fire pit on main balcony
-Hot tub on second balcony
-Hardwood floors in living room, dining room and kitchen. Carpeted bedrooms.
-Lots of storage

The LOCATION:
-Located in Potrero Hill, on Arkansas St. between 19th/20th streets, walking distance to both 18th and 20th street shops and restaurants
-Walking distance to the Caltrain (0.5 mile / 10 min walk)
-5 minute drive to either 101 or 280.
-Walking distance to SOMA, Mission, and Dogpatch, including UCSF Mission Bay Campus (2 miles) and Zuckerberg General Hospital, Oracle Park, Chase Center (Golden Gate Warrior Stadium)
-Walking distance to Google shuttle (apparently)
-Whole Foods 6 blocks away. Goodlife grocery 2 blocks away. Trader Joe’s, Safeway 1 mile away. 4 coffee houses within 3 blocks.
-4 Community tennis courts and 2 basketball courts 3 blocks away.
-Potrero Hill is in the sunniest part of town and is rarely foggy.

The ROOMS:
-All bedrooms on lower level
-Master bedroom:
-24ft x 24 ft, bay windows, custom blackout curtains.
-Built in custom desk, cabinets, and bookshelves.
-Matching set of white bedframe, dresser, and set of drawers.
-Large spacious walk-in closet with organized compartments.
-Luxurious attached private bathroom with open double showerheads, double sinks, and custom bathtub.
-Bedroom 1: 17' x 11'7", sunny with large windows and unobstructed open views.
-Bedroom 2: 13' x 10'', sunny with walk-out deck
-Full bathroom on lower level, half bath on upper level

The DETAILS:
-Available 6/1/20
-Rent: $8500/month
-One year lease
-Deposit: 1 month rent.
-Credit check and verification of income required.
-1 car garage included. Plenty of free street parking (no permit needed).
-Washer/dryer in house.
-Pets negotiable.

name: Furnished, Serene Hayes Valley Studio w/ Rooftop, W/D, 1 min to BART
body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

12+ month lease: $3,590* / mo
6 to 12 month lease: $3,790* / mo
2 to 6 month lease: $2,790* / mo
1 to 2 month lease: $2,290/ mo

Prices quoted are applicable only if billed upfront for the entire duration of the contract. Rates are up to 9% higher if billed monthly. Prices are exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-hayes-valley-108?utm_source=classified-8

Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this spacious Hayes Valley furnished studio apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and cheery living room. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that San Francisco has to offer! (ID #SFO108)

Designed With You In Mind

Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m
home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your sophisticated living room streaming
the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on
the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Hayes Valley apartment has
to offer.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-Queen Bed, 63in/160cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Roof Deck
  - Bike Storage
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is located in Hayes Valley. It is a fashionable neighborhood in the center of San Francisco. Hayes Street is perfect for shopping, eating or just taking a stroll. There is always something new to see, with pop-up restaurants and cool boutiques providing unique entertainment. Playgrounds and park spaces fill the medians of the streets. The close-knit neighborhood features a community garden, a pocket park with art installations, and access to music and theater near the Civic Center. It is a great stop for art enthusiasts. The SFO Airport is 25 minutes away by car or an hour away by BART.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

body:

Please contact:
Kent Boeker   |    show contact info

Description:

	This large 1 Bedroom apartment is located on Pine Street, between Hyde and Leavenworth, just one block south of the California Street cable car line. This is a 1930's style building with hardwood floors and arched ceilings. 

	 

	You are within walking distance of Union Square, the Theatre district and Civic Center. Trader Joe's is 1 block away; Whole Foods is a 3-block walk. The Financial District is within walking distance, as well (~20min). You will not need a car with this location!

	 

	This apartment features the following:


		Hardwood throughout

		Spacious foyer with linen closet and coat closet 

		Upgraded kitchen with gas range, and dinette area

		Large windows facing South on Pine St bringing in tons of natural light

		Living room with walkin closet

		Large bedroom. Features another walk-in closet; big enough to be a workspace. Connects the BR with the bath.

		Note: LR/BR are similar size, both with walk-in closets, so could work with 2 roommates.

		Bath off the foyer with vanity sink and tub/shower combo

		Laundry in-building

		Sorry, street parking only

		Water/trash/steam heat included. Tenant responsible for PG&E and cable/internet.


	Sorry, no pets.

	 
This is a non-smoking unit. Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.

name: Furnished, Airy Hayes Valley 2BR w/ W/D, by Muni, near to Shops
body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

12+ month lease: $5,190* / mo
6 to 12 month lease: $5,390* / mo
2 to 6 month lease: $4,490* / mo
1 to 2 month lease: $3,790/ mo

Prices quoted are applicable only if billed upfront for the entire duration of the contract. Rates are up to 9% higher if billed monthly. Prices are exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-hayes-valley-288?utm_source=classified-8

Discover the best of San Francisco, with this two-bedroom Hayes Valley apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this stylishly Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, beautiful living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #SFO288)

Designed With You In Mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a
fully-equipped kitchen in this two-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and
towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in
the San Francisco vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart
TV.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is located in Hayes Valley. It is a fashionable neighborhood in the center of San Francisco. Hayes Street is perfect for shopping, eating or just taking a stroll. There is always something new to see, with pop-up restaurants and cool boutiques providing unique entertainment. Playgrounds and park spaces fill the medians of the streets. The close-knit neighborhood features a community garden, a pocket park with art installations, and access to music and theater near the Civic Center. It is a great stop for art enthusiasts. The SFO Airport is 25 minutes away by car or an hour away by BART.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

Discover the best of San Francisco, with this one-bedroom Hayes Valley apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this fashionably Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, beautiful living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #SFO187)

Designed With You In Mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this one-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the San Francisco vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Gym
  - Indoor Parking
  - Courtyard
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is located in Hayes Valley. It is a fashionable neighborhood in the center of San Francisco. Hayes Street is perfect for shopping, eating or just taking a stroll. There is always something new to see, with pop-up restaurants and cool boutiques providing unique entertainment. Playgrounds and park spaces fill the medians of the streets. The close-knit neighborhood features a community garden, a pocket park with art installations, and access to music and theater near the Civic Center. It is a great stop for art enthusiasts. The SFO Airport is 25 minutes away by car or an hour away by BART.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.

Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.

name: Remodeled Victorian apt available May 1st! ~ J.Wavro
body:
San Francisco - Lower Pacific Heights - Apartment for rent
Remodeled Victorian apt available May 1st!
 Link to mobile layout:   http://www.jwavro.com/rental_details.php?id=3307082-0
Summary:
Rent: $3395
Bed / Bath: 1 / 1
Type: Apartment
Term: 1 Year
Please contact:
Joanne Fazzino   |    show contact info
    |   www.jwavro.com

Description:

	This beautiful freshly painted Victorian flat has high ceilings, gorgeous crown molding and original wide plank wood floors.

	You will love the nicely remodeled eat-in kitchen with a large island that has storage and 2 stools.

	Stainless steel appliances include a refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher and disposal. 

	The living room, bedroom, walk in closet and full bathroom are charming and filled with period charm. 

	There is a private patio in the back of the unit which is quiet and sunny. 

	The washer and dryer are included inside the unit on an enclosed porch.

	You hear very little traffic outside due to the double pane windows.

	Walk 2 blocks to the bus to downtown, 4 blocks to trendy Fillmore Street with a myriad of chic shops, coffee houses, restaurants and bars.

	Octavia Restaurant with Michelin-star Chef Melissa Perello is in the building!

	On Fillmore St have breakfast at The Grove, or a beer at Harry's Bar. One of the best streets for dining in San Francisco.

	Closeby are the Fillmore Jazz district and Japan Town, as well as walking distance to Polk St and the Civic Center. Rideshare available. 

	A pet will be considered. No smoking in the unit allowed.

	A parking space and storage locker are available for $375/month in the building - just steps away from the front door.

	98 Walkscore! 

	90 Ridescore!


	 
This is a non-smoking unit. Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.

Floors: Hardwood
Kitchen: Remodeled
Laundry: In Unit
Outside area: Patio

Bush Street & Octavia Street, San Francisco, California

name: 2 Weeks Free!  Extraordinary Views, Free Group Fitness Classes
body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.

Welcome to Jasper

Call Now -  
 x 2
OR Text 2 to  
 to contact our leasing team.


This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1491 Sq. Ft. 

Jasper is a convergence. Of structure and imagination. Of the classic and the eclectic. Of art and life. This 400-foot high-rise apartment building crowns San Francisco’s fabled The East Cut and stands as an iconic addition to the city skyline. It is a statement about elegance in a place where elegance actually means something. 

Features:
Stainless steel Fisher & Paykel refrigerator*, Dual-zone air conditioning and heating, Gas stovetop, Pre-wired for telephone, data and TV, Expansive vistas from floor-to-ceiling windows, Roller shades, Room of all trades*, Hansgrohe faucets, Window seats*, Fiber-optic cable provides fastest Internet connection in the San Francisco Bay Area, Soaking tub*, Apartments with balconies and terraces*, Caesarstone countertops, Keyless entry for residence doors, Slow-close cabinets and drawers, Stainless steel Bosch cooking suite and built-in dishwasher, Bertazzoni speed oven*, Light ash-finished hardwood floor, Full-size vented washer and dryer, Garbage disposal 
*Select units

body:
This classic sunny turn of the century modernized one bedroom features an arched vestibule entryway, a great room adorned with bright wall to wall western facing windows replete with serene views of Haussman Era neighboring homes, a formal fireplace with a state of the art remote controlled green gas insert, coved high ceilings with period medallion encrusted contemporary lighting, multiple closet and storage areas, original hard wood floors, eat in kitchen with sleek white cabinetry with cove lighting top and bottom, new Bosch stainless steel refrigerator, dishwasher, built in microwave, gas range and garbage disposal. Enjoy the pocket door tiled breezeway and cabinetry storage entrance to the fully remodeled tiled bathroom complete with a soaker tub with shower, high ceilings and combo heat, vent and multiple lighting options and building laundry machines.Living:-Completely remodeled-Hardwood floors-Floor to Ceiling Windows-High Ceilings-Granite countertops-Stainless steel appliances: Gas range, Bosch refrigerator, GE Microwave-Dishwasher-Garbage Disposal-Soft close kitchen cabinetry-Authentic Edwardian fireplace mantel with state-of-the-art Valor gas insert technology with a remote thermostat-Plenty of storage-Natural sunlight-Shared laundry in building-Private Laundry Hook-ups in unitNeighborhood:-Located in Ashbury Heights/Cole Valley-Charming gourmet grocer on corner-Famous "Bacon Bacon" Deli next to corner grocer-Chic Cole Street shops and dining just a 3 block walk-Lovely common area garden access on premises-Buena Vista Park, Golden Gate Park and Haight Street a few blocks away-Lycée De Français is one block north on Ashbury-Outstanding access at corner to Google, Genentech and MUNI-Near UCSF Medical Center at Parnassus-Walk score 92. Transit score 89. Bike Score 74.Details:-

Lease Terms
12 month Lease Term
-Water, garbage & landscaping included
-Deposit is 1.5x monthly rent
-$40 Application Fee
-No pets, No smoking

Discover the best of San Francisco, with this two-bedroom Hayes Valley apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this fashionably Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, cozy living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #SFO316)

Designed With You In Mind

Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m
home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your spacious living room streaming
the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on
the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Hayes Valley apartment has
to offer.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

-Queen Bed, 63in/160cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Dog Park/Run
  - Gym
  - Indoor Parking
  - Roof Deck
  - Garden
  - Courtyard
  - Bike Storage
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is located in Hayes Valley. It is a fashionable neighborhood in the center of San Francisco. Hayes Street is perfect for shopping, eating or just taking a stroll. There is always something new to see, with pop-up restaurants and cool boutiques providing unique entertainment. Playgrounds and park spaces fill the medians of the streets. The close-knit neighborhood features a community garden, a pocket park with art installations, and access to music and theater near the Civic Center. It is a great stop for art enthusiasts. The SFO Airport is 25 minutes away by car or an hour away by BART.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.

body:
**To do our best to be in compliance with the Shelter In Place mandate, no in-person tours will be conducted. Video/FaceTime tours can be requested below**

Ryan C.P. Combs and Mosser Companies Present… 891 Post #310 (Upgraded Efficiency Studio)

EXPERIENCE THE LIFESTYLE:
891 Post Street will live in San Francisco history as the home of noir writer Dashiell Hammett as well as the home of his famous fictional detective Sam Spade in The Maltese Falcon. A gem in the Tendernob, the common areas of this vintage stunner showcase some classic architectural details of the Art Deco Era. The pet-friendly modern units feature hardwood floors, huge windows, decorative moldings and lots of storage space.

name: Apartment for Rent
body:
Villa Nob Hill is a charmingly restored 1922 Edwardian apartment building located in the heart of San Francisco at 1124 Leavenworth St., 100 feet from the Cable Car and just blocks from Union Square, Chinatown, North Beach and the Financial District. A few more blocks takes you to the wharf. These 900 Sq.ft. warm and gracious apartments are available with one or two bedrooms and can be leased for long-term or month-to-month. They are move-in ready, equipped with everything from fresh linens to cookware, cable TV and high speed wi-fi internet. These apartments are beautifully furnished in contemporary and olde world French/Italian.

Please call or email, if interested.

With a New Angle on Urban Luxe, Duboce offers San Francisco Boutique-Style Living


This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 852 Sq. Ft. 

Duboce Triangle is a vibrant and highly-desirable neighborhood infused with color and culture. The Duboce is a boutique-style apartment community that blends high style with urban luxury. The walking score is at a phenomenal 98. Distinctly tranquil with a bustling nightlife and remarkable shopping of the Castro and the Mission are mere steps away.

Embracing an urban retro aesthetic, Duboce provides stellar community features, remarkable amenities and pet-friendly living options. From our polished porcelain tile flooring and dual-tone cabinets to our beautiful subway tile backsplashes and Caesarstone quartz countertops, Duboce offers classic living and will quickly become your happy place. Perfect for entertaining friends and family, each apartment home provides staple items for a fun, yet functional space that will enhance your living experience.

With one- and two-bedroom apartment rentals and a variety of floor plans, Duboce is ideal for those seeking a walkable home life and an effortless commute. Whether enjoying a BBQ with friends and family or soaking up the sun on our expansive roof deck, residents at Duboce enjoy exciting features that allow them to feel connected and comfortable. 


Income Requirements:

Combined Gross Income needs to be at least 3x the monthly rent.



Office Hours:

Monday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM

body:
1BD | 1.5BA | 927SQFTSeize your chance to live in one of the premier apartment communities in Daly City, CA. Picture coming home every day to the warm embrace of meticulous landscaping, comfortable homes, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life. Located in Bayshore, Daly City, with easy access to US 101 and I-280, Pacific Place is just minutes away from San Francisco State University, as well as all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby San Francisco has to offer. (+more) Pacific Place provides its residents a wide selection of unique one, two or three bedroom apartment homes that feature exclusive community and household amenities like city views, reserved garage parking, and full size washer and dryers. Enjoy the beautiful city and ocean views, stroll through our pet-friendly community with your favorite furry companion, or have a day out on the town in nearby San Francisco. We know you deserve the very best in apartment living, and our community is designed specifically to ensure you don’t just lease, you live. Go take a look at our photo gallery and schedule your appointment, or drop by and visit us for your personal tour today! name: Sophisticated Condo 2/2 --Furnished or Unfurnished! ~
body: Sophisticated & renovated SOMA Live/Work loft. Grand open space featuring a dramatic floor plan with 17' ceilings, updated kitchen & baths, private deck w/hot tub. Partial hardwood floors, lots of natural light, new interior paint, move-in condition. The main level has a dining room with a sliding door to a private deck and hot tub. Updated galley style kitchen w/new counters, cabinets & appliances. Dramatic living room w/high ceilings streams with natural light from multiple windows. The guest bath off hall completes this level. The bright upper level has a classic loft bedroom & also features hardwood floors, designer lighting and has access to a private and newly updated full bath. The lower level has new carpet and offers tremendous space for guest room/family room with access to 2nd full bath w/stall shower. The back door opens to Butte Alley, making grocery runs and drop-offs more convenient. The exclusive back deck offers a unique hot tub situation rarely available. 1 car pkg, addtl storage...

name: Sunny 6th Floor corner studio in Symphony Towers
body:
Well maintained 6th-floor corner studio in a luxury Symphony Towers. You are just steps away from public transportation, restaurants, museums and many cultural venues.

-View to the city and the courtyard
-Granite countertops and upscale stainless steel appliances
-Spacious bathroom
-Security access to the building and your own level
-One assigned parking spot in a secured and spacious underground parking garage (included)
-Fire Sprinklers through the unit and the building
-Common Roof deck + Courtyard
-In unit washer + dryer
-Owner pay for water + trash. Tenant will be responsible for own WiFi and PG&E.
- Partially furnished but can remove furniture if needed.
- Security deposit is 1.5X monthly rent

To schedule a private showing, please email to schedule a time. Look forward to meeting you!

name: Sunny Two Bedroom Flat with Panoramic City/ Ocean Views
body:
Come home to a tastefully renovated, sunny top floor flat with stunning panoramic views of the financial district, Bay Bridge, and ocean. Located in a charming Edwardian building on a quiet, tree-lined street minutes from downtown Noe Valley.

This unit features:

*High ceilings, period details, and open floor plan with natural light 
*Two bedrooms (one approx 70 feet, suitable for a child or home office; adding wall to create a third bedroom is negotiable) 
*South-facing sun room 
*Direct access to expansive back yard with orange, plum, apricot, and peach trees. 
*Third fully enclosed room with closet (no windows) that can be used as small office 
*Bosch stainless steel appliances, Spanish style lighting and tile in kitchen 
*Shared laundry in garage 
*Parking in garage or driveway negotiable; street parking is also convenient 
*Walk Score of 91
*Fenced dog parks and two playgrounds nearby

24-bus on corner 
5 minute walk to downtown Noe Valley, Whole Foods, and-J line 
15 minute walk to Safeway and downtown Bernal Heights 
20 minute walk to downtown Glen Park, 24th St and Mission, and the Castro

Lease term is flexible. Serious applicants can submit a rental application (sensitive info can be omitted in first screen): https://jethiwangproperties.weebly.com/

Address is 4085 Cesar Chavez St, SF 94131 (please do not disturb tenants)

name: Furnished and Move in Ready!
body:
Virtual Tour
https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=VNUUgHusCbp&mls=1

Comfort awaits you at this prestigious Pacific Heights 1 bedroom condominium. This 4th floor condo has a warm and sunlit living and dining area complete with decorative fireplace. A small balcony offers an escape for fresh air or views of historic Broadway street. The apartment also has a sleeper sofa and with 1 and 2/3 bath it is perfect for the occasional guest.
The large bedroom is located on the opposite side of the apartment overlooking a large open air atrium. This side of the building is free of street noise and allows for a restful nights sleep. A large built in closet systems extends the length of the bedroom wall and provides amble storage and custom lighting. The master bath has dual vanity sinks, a large walk in rainfall shower, heated floors, and comes stocked with a welcome amenity from Lather bath products.

Relax further from the buildings shared rooftop terrace with breathtaking views of the Bay, Golden Gate Bridge, and Alcatraz. From this 6th floor roof desk you can see that this sleepy Pacific Heights condo is actually just steps to bustling Union street. Union Street (Cow Hollow) is lined with boutique shops, restaurants, and night life. The walk Score of this location is 97 = walker's paradise. If you do decide to venture off and leave your car in the secure parking space, transit is a easy and plentiful with a score of 93.

Rate includes all utilities, basic cable and wifi. No smoking. No pets allowed. Flexible lease terms

THE APARTMENT
Remodel Kitchen w/Stainless Steel Appliances
-Dishwasher-Remodel Bathroom
-Hardwood Floor
-Laundry in building
-Pet Friendly
-No Parking

THE NEIGHBORHOOD
Plenty of Restaurants, Social Life, and easy access to Public Transportation. Trader Joe’s, Golden Gate Tap Room, Green Sports Bar, Burritt Room, Bouche, Beanstalk Cafe, Tacorea, Akiko’s Sushi, Elephant Sushi, and E&O Kitchen are all within walking distance!
-Walking Score: 97
-Biking Score: 63
-Transit Score: 100

THE BUILDING
Steps from Chinatown and Union Square, 618 Bush is a historic Art Deco building in the desirable Nob Hill district. The secure building retains vintage charms of the era, including neo classical pillars, wrought iron gate, marble flooring and an elevator. The pet-friendly studios are well-appointed and modern, with updated hardwood floors and lighting fixtures, double-hung windows and ample closets. Tastefully updated bathroom and revived kitchens feature sleek cabinets and stainless steel appliances including dishwashers. Close proximity to the Financial District, Powell Street BART, and several Muni bus lines makes 618 Bush an ideal home for car-less residents.
 ____________________________________________________________________________________

This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 573-587 Sq. Ft. 

Duboce Triangle is a vibrant and highly-desirable neighborhood infused with color and culture. The Duboce is a boutique-style apartment community that blends high style with urban luxury. The walking score is at a phenomenal 98. Distinctly tranquil with a bustling nightlife and remarkable shopping of the Castro and the Mission are mere steps away.

Embracing an urban retro aesthetic, Duboce provides stellar community features, remarkable amenities and pet-friendly living options. From our polished porcelain tile flooring and dual-tone cabinets to our beautiful subway tile backsplashes and Caesarstone quartz countertops, Duboce offers classic living and will quickly become your happy place. Perfect for entertaining friends and family, each apartment home provides staple items for a fun, yet functional space that will enhance your living experience.

With one- and two-bedroom apartment rentals and a variety of floor plans, Duboce is ideal for those seeking a walkable home life and an effortless commute. Whether enjoying a BBQ with friends and family or soaking up the sun on our expansive roof deck, residents at Duboce enjoy exciting features that allow them to feel connected and comfortable.

Ceramic Backsplash, Front-Loading Washer and Dryer, Keyless Entry System, Fiber Optic Wired for High-Speed Internet Access, Under-Mounted Stainless Steel Sinks, Under-Mounted Lighting, Caesarstone Countertops, Hardwood Styled Vinyl Plank, Porcelain Tile Flooring, Dual-Tone Cabinets

name: Courtyard Garden Apt w/ Huge Walk-in Closet, Garage, W/D
body:
***This is a real apartment available for rent. Not a scam. We own the apartment and the whole building. Looking for nice tenants. We can meet and show you the apartment. It has come to my attention that some scammer has been copying my ads. Please make sure you are dealing directly with me. I never rent to someone that I haven't met or spoken with over the phone / skype. If you aren't in the city, then let me know if you have someone local that I can meet. The security deposit and first month's rent is due on the first day of the lease. Anyone asking for large sums of money up front from you is probably a scammer. Please be aware.***

Avail long or short term. One month minimum.

This is a first floor garden style apartment overlooking the courtyard and garden. We have an amazing rosemary bush that is great for cooking. Also, we have lemon tree and rose bushes. Some tenants can even BBQ in courtyard area.

Garage parking available for extra monthly charge.

Totally private apartment. 

Full bathroom, kitchen, living room/dining room with designated office space.

One bedroom with queen bed, tall dresser with TV, nightstand, and huge walk in closet (It is the length of the bedroom--long wise.)

Fully equipped kitchen with gas stove, microwave, frig, tons of custom built cabinets, big windows over looking garden and rosemary bush. Kitchen has everything you need for cooking and eating. All utensils, pots, pans, dishes, glasses, etc. Original built in ironing board. Stainless steel counter and wood block counter. Great for prep and cooking. 

Art Deco Bathroom has new vanity, toilet, big bath tub with shower, and built in cabinet for extra storage and window.

Living room/dining room has pull out sofa bed, flat screen tv, dining table that can seat 4 people, cocktail table and side table and there is a designated office area with a custom built desk and office chair.

We preserved lots of the original details such as a built in telephone seat, arched doorways, beams in ceiling. 

The entire apartment has wood floors and is freshly painted with a nice light green color. 

Apartment is already set up with high speed wireless internet and satellite tv with 160 channels and DVR. 

Full size washer and dryer in garage. Only four apartments in the building that share the laundry.

Extra monthly charge for all utilities, including high speed wireless internet, satellite tv with DVR and use of the washer and dryer--Not coin operated.

Some pets allowed depending upon breed, size, etc.

If interested, then please email me your dates.

name: GG Park views, hdwd flrs, yard/Furnished 25% OFF month rent
body:
GG Park views, hdwd flrs, yard/Furnished 25% OFF month rent




Property Address

875 36th Avenue | San Francisco, CA 94121


  Available: Now



Offered By

Elite Leasing 




Description

    This beautifully spacious furnished short term rental is a 2 bed/1 bath flat with abundant natural light and centrally located in the Richmond District with many neighborhood delights nearby. Golden Gate park views from the living room, hardwood floors throughout with a fireplace and a formal dining room and fully stocked kitchen with breakfast nook complete the living areas. Each bedroom has a queen size bed with walk in closets & desks. Backyard garden to enjoy and exclusive use of a washer & dryer. 

The Balboa Corridor is just a few blocks away with many restaurants, shops and one of the oldest movie theaters in the city. This flat is also within walking distance to many other city highlights: Steps away from Spreckels Lake, fly fish casting, Bison and trails. Ocean Beach, China Beach and Baker Beach, The De Young Museum, Japanese Tea Garden, Steinhart Aquarium, Legion of Honor, multiple award winning schools, playgrounds and the famous Lands End coastal trail with views of the Golden Gate Bridge are found in this neighborhood and within walking distance. 


This neighborhood also has an excellent transportation system in all directions. Downtown in 25 minutes. USF, UCSF, CPMC & the VA Hospital are close by. Plenty of street parking. Walk Score is 87 

If you are looking for a San Francisco experience...stop looking and start living. 

For a limited time only...Move-in Special - 25% off one months rent.  Call today for more details.

body:

Property Address

3264 Market Street | San Francisco, CA 94114


  Available: Now



Offered By

Vanguard Property Management




Description

    Built new in 2005, this modern three-bedroom home is perched on a hillside, overlooking the vibrant Castro District.  The main level boasts a formal living room with a gas-burning fireplace and a deck, a dining room, and a professional-grade kitchen with a breakfast bar.  This entire modern, open, and bright area allows you to take in breathtaking views of Downtown San Francisco and the Bay.  There are also two tranquil bedrooms with private decks and a luxurious bathroom with a walk-in shower on this level.  The Master Suite Level features a large bedroom with an elevated reading nook with downtown views, Juliette balcony & an expansive spa-like bathroom with dual vanities, walk-in shower, over-sized soaking tub, enormous master closet, and separate entry.  This unit also features an Airphone Entry System, In-unit washer & dryer, and a parking space in the garage.  Ideally situated near dining, nightlife, entertainment, commuter shuttles, and MUNI, this home won't last!

name: Beautiful Condo good for families , free wifi, free parking near Ghira
body:
Beautiful Condo, good for familes, free wifi, free parking, near Ghirardelli Sq

Description:Larkin Street is a beautiful, completely remodeled, 2 bedroom, 2 bath flat in a two unit Edwardian building on Larkin near Ghirardelli Square, Aquatic Park, Fort Mason and Marina. It was originally built in 1913, with many period details including crown molding, fireplaces and clawfoot bathtubs. It was recently renovated with remodeled bathrooms and kitchen, Brazilian walnut floors upstairs, and carpet in bedrooms. Master bath has marble counters, double sinks andheated floor. Parking is available in adjacent garage and there is easily accessible public transportation (cable car, trolley, bus and taxi) to all parts of city.

body:

____________________________________________________________________________________


****************AVAILABLE NOW!

Must see to appreciate the care that went into restoring this grand Victorian and integrating the past with the present.

Occupying 1 Full Floor of the building, this unit features a harmonious pairing of modern conveniences and Victorian charm. From the ornamental fireplaces and footed slipper tub to the stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, crown molding and cherry wood floors, you will enjoy its luxury features. Conveniently located close to Fillmore Street, Divisadero Corridor, Laurel Village, shopping, restaurants, parks, hospitals, transportation corridors.

This unit boasts:
- Living room w/Victorian white marble decorative fireplace, converted to 4th bedroom but can still use as living space
- Formal dining room w/original Victorian white marble decorative fireplace
- Chef’s delight kitchen w/beautiful granite counters, maple cabinets, crown molding, tiled floor, triple sink w/disposal, stainless steel appliances include: refrigerator, gas stove, microwave, dishwasher
- Master bedroom with two closets and large bay windows
- Two additional bedrooms, one of which has a Victorian white marble decorative fireplace and bay windows 
- Luxurious bath w/double sided slipper tub, travertine tiled floor and walls, Victorian reproduction vanity with marble
- In-unit washer/dryer
- 12 foot ceilings, dual pane windows, newer cherry wood floors and central heat add comfort to this unit
- Beautiful shared yard with one decorative fountain and patio area for your relaxation and enjoyment
- Parking available in the garage for additional fees of $350 for regular sized vehicles and additional monthly fees for oversized vehicles
- Approximately 1600 sq. ft. 

No pets and no smoking.

Tenants pay their own utilities. 
Landlord apportions all common utilities (garbage, water, electricity) per occupied unit. Intervals of collection of apportioned utilities may vary at Landlord’s discretion.

Top floor unit also available at $7,995.00 per month. Former tenants using this and top floor unit as a 2 level townhouse set-up.

Security Deposit : $8000.00

name: 2 BEDROOM + STUDY/OFFICE VICTORIAN APT. 1.5 BL FROM ALAMO SQUARE PARK
body:
2 bedroom + separate study/office, 1 bath apartment in six-unit Victorian era building 1.5 blocks from Alamo Square Park and the famous “Painted Ladies” row of Victorians. 
Bathroom is split into water closet and separate bathroom with vanity sink and original, reglazed cast iron clawfoot tub and shower.
This quiet apartment is on the first floor in rear of building. No deck or yard access. No garage.
Tall ceilings, Victorian detail and built-ins. New flooring in bathroom and kitchen, new, professionally painted. Most of the apartment has wood floors. 
Study/office: 7.5ft. x 12ft., bedroom 1: 9ft. x 12.5ft., master bedroom: 12.5ft. x 14ft. All rooms have closets. 
Nice size updated kitchen with separate pantry. Stainless steel appliances includes built-in microwave. No dishwasher. Coin operated washer/dryer in building.
Building is on the #5 Fulton bus line that runs downtown to the ferry building and links up to BART, Muni and CalTrans. Easy access to 101 freeway to the south bay.
Walking score: 95, transit score: 89, bikeable score: 88
Bulding is located in the much desirable Alamo Square historic district and a short walk to the Divisadero Street corridor. Note: This charming boulevard has a distinct personality and is lined with restaurants, bars, cafes, and unique shops including the upscale Bell Market. Huge Safeway only blocks away.
One year lease. Building is under San Francisco rent control laws so future rent increases are capped and set by the city.
One cat okay but sorry, no dogs. Non-smoking building.
$3,795 a month plus $5,000 security deposit.
Water/sewer and trash included. Tenant pays their own PG&E.
Please contact me for a private showing. I will schedule 30 minute apart appointments and limit showings to one group at a time.

name: Furnished, Airy Dogpatch 1BR w/ Gym, Rooftop, walk to Chase Center
body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

12+ month lease: $4,190* / mo
6 to 12 month lease: $4,390* / mo
2 to 6 month lease: $4,090* / mo
1 to 2 month lease: $4,190/ mo

Prices quoted are applicable only if billed upfront for the entire duration of the contract. Rates are up to 9% higher if billed monthly. Prices are exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-dogpatch-220?utm_source=classified-8

Show up and start living from day one in San Francisco with this stylish one-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Dogpatch home. (ID #SFO220)

Designed With You In Mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this one-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the San Francisco vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Dog Park/Run
  - Gym
  - Indoor Parking
  - Roof Deck
  - Courtyard
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished apartment is located in Dogpatch, between the Bay and Potrero Hill. It is a bustling and trendy area full of restaurants, cafes, and pubs. Known for its culinary offerings, foodies flock here to try the many farm-to-table options. The Museum of Craft and Design is an ideal attraction for art enthusiasts. Formerly a shipbuilding hub dating back to the 1800’s, this area has a creative and industrial vibe. Recently converted dockside warehouses and factories have become art studios, shops and hip shared living spaces. From Dogpatch, the SFO Airport is just 20 minutes by car.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.

WELCOME TO THE WILSON

This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 531 Sq. Ft. 

In a city with more than its share of beautiful, historic landmarks, there is one building that combines modern conveniences with a Landmark Life on the center of Market Street – The Wilson. Built in 1904, then a survivor of the 1906 earthquake, The Wilson has been completely re-imagined and re-established for the 21st century resident seeking a home with a story to share for generations to come. Having seen the city grow-up and transform around it, The Wilson is now the premiere address for residents looking to do more than just rent an apartment; The Wilson is for those looking to live the Landmark Life.

The Wilson's unique architectural flair joins modern luxury finishes with historic architectural detail. The apartments and lofts feature natural light, oversized rooms, and are wired for high-speed internet and cable. The gourmet kitchens include custom-designed cabinets, quartz countertops, gas cooking, and stainless steel appliances

- Oversized rooms

name: 1BR Fully Furnished - in 3BR, 1.5BA fully furnished rental
body:
Furnished one bedroom is rented in our modern apt that consist of 3 bedrooms, large living room, kitchen and 1.5 baths. Apt is located in the heart of North Beach by many restaurants, coffee shops, walking distance to Fisherman's Wharf, Lombard Street, Coit Tower, Cable Car and much more. 

Rent is $1,300 per month. I will need good references and one month security deposit. Utilities split 3 ways (~$50/month). This is a month-to-month rental. 

Ideal candidate: 
- Would have a management consultant type schedule or intern 
- Clean, respectful, non-smoker, keep the party outside the apartment.
- No live-in girlfriend or boyfriend. 
- No pets please.

Apartment: is near Washington Square Park, quiet, clean, new appliances, newly remodeled. Hardwood floors. High ceilings. No parking. No dishwasher, no washer-dryer in the apartment (but there is a laundry in the same block).The location has a Walk Score of 99. 

Room: pretty small, about 9 ft. x 5 ft. with a single size bed. Walk in closet.

The occupants of the other rooms are well educated, working professionals. Busy lifestyle, mid 30's. Non-smoker.

Please email me to arrange a time to see the apartment. The room is available April 1st. Do let me know about yourself, your background, your work. Please attach a linked-in profile.

Thank you

name: Furnished, Lux Dogpatch 1BR w/ Gym, near UCSF Medical Center
body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

12+ month lease: $4,390 * / mo
6 to 12 month lease: $4,590 * / mo
2 to 6 month lease: $3,690 * / mo
1 to 2 month lease: $2,590 / mo

Prices quoted are applicable only if billed upfront for the entire duration of the contract. Rates are up to 9% higher if billed monthly. Prices are exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-dogpatch-225?utm_source=classified-8

Discover the best of San Francisco, with this one-bedroom Dogpatch apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this fashionably Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, charming living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #SFO225)

Designed With You In Mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a
fully-equipped kitchen in this one-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and
towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in
the San Francisco vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart
TV.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Dog Park/Run
  - Gym
  - Indoor Parking
  - Roof Deck
  - Garden
  - Courtyard
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished apartment is located in Dogpatch, between the Bay and Potrero Hill. It is a bustling and trendy area full of restaurants, cafes, and pubs. Known for its culinary offerings, foodies flock here to try the many farm-to-table options. The Museum of Craft and Design is an ideal attraction for art enthusiasts. Formerly a shipbuilding hub dating back to the 1800’s, this area has a creative and industrial vibe. Recently converted dockside warehouses and factories have become art studios, shops and hip shared living spaces. From Dogpatch, the SFO Airport is just 20 minutes by car.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.

name: Stunning Waterfront condo with Gorgeous Views of the Bay Bridge
body:
2BR/2BA FULLY FURNISHED condo at Portside II Building.
Enjoy views of passing sail boats and ferries during the day, and at night watch the Bay Bridge light show from the comfort of your living room.

PRIME Location - Portside II offers an outstanding location within a short walk to world-renowned restaurants, the Financial District, downtown, the Ferry Building, Whole Foods, Woodlands Market, AT&T Park, Bay Club – 4 locations, Barry’s Bootcamp and much more. Google, Facebook, Salesforce, LinkedIn, Airbnb, Yelp, Nextdoor, the new Apple office and hundreds of start-up companies are all around the corner.

* Building is 1 block to Embarcadero Waterfront, located between the Ferry Building and Ball Park
* 1 block to downtown Financial District
* 1 block to Transbay Terminal
* Google bus -- less than 1 block away
* 3-4 minute walk to Muni bus stops everywhere
* 2 blocks to the WATER (Embarcadero)
* Palm Trees everywhere along the Embarcadero
* 10 minute walk to Ferry Building
* 10 minute walk to AT&T Park
* 15 minute walk to CalTrain station
* Restaurants everywhere in the neighborhood, including acclaimed restaurants: Angler, Waterbar, Epic Steak, Boulevard, Prospect, Ozumo, Town Hall, Pabu, Palomino and many others.
* Grocery stores (Woodlands Market 1 block away. Safeway and Whole Foods are within 5 minute drive)
* One of the Sunniest Neighborhoods in SF

The Building:
Portside is a unique Modern Art Deco-designed building and Nautical themed building that has won prestigious Architectural awards, located on the Embarcadero in the heart of South Beach. The residence offers many boutique amenities including 24/7 security (full-time guard); a heated lap pool overlooking the San Francisco Bay; a sun deck; 2 gyms; and a jacuzzi spa. Luxuries at the Portside include high ceilings and dramatic spaces; innovative floor plans; high-quality finishes; and large, curvilinear bay windows which capture the waterfront’s special light quality and fabulous views of the bay and the city.

Building Features:
• Amenities include heated swimming pool, 2 gyms, a jacuzzi spa
• Conveniently located near 280 and 101 freeways and 4th and King Caltrain station
• Close to the Financial District, the Ferry Building, AT&T Park

The Home:
* Corner unit
* Private balcony with deluxe BBQ grill, new Teek wood tile flooring, Patio furniture (natural slate stone tile)
* 2 Queen beds, 2 beautiful bathrooms
* Master Bedroom with walk-in custom closet by California Closets and en suite Master Bathroom
* All other closets also by California Closets
* Beautiful Maple Hardwood Floors
* Carpeted Bedrooms
* Fully equipped Gourmet Kitchen
* Newly updated stainless steel appliances
* Washer/Dryer in unit

PARKING: Secured underground parking for one car included, which is conveniently located right by the elevator.

Corporate rentals are welcome.

Non-smoking. No Pets.

name: JR 1B/R TURN KEY, FURNISHED & ACCESSORIZED – JUST MOVE IN!
body:
HOW EASY IS THIS:-
Bring in your own bag of personal belongings, sit down, put your feet up, have a beer/wine.

ALL THIS ON YOUR FIRST MOVE-IN DAY.

No movers, no shopping for accessories, no waiting for furniture to arrive, no connecting the electricity or internet. 

WELL THIS IS IT ---- Everything is included and connected for you! This is a "Junior 1b/r", but you have to see it to believe it! 

This awesome top floor condo (serviced by elevator) has a granite kitchen, new re-painted hard-wood floors, sleeping alcove which separates it from the main living area, separate dining room and original 1930’s themed bathroom. The high cathedral ceilings give this place a cozy sentiment of a much bigger space. Just been totally re-painted throughout. 

The space comes fully furnished and accessorized --- basically all you need is your personal belongings and nothing else as it includes everything. 10 steps takes you up to a beautiful out-door deck with views of the Golden Gate Bridge and the Marina District.  

Wi-fi and Electricity already connected, Water, Heating and Garbage included. The Muni 47 and 49 stops at and Muni 30 are two blocks away. No steep hills to walk, all level streets to Fisherman’s Wharf, Union and Chestnut St’s shopping districts, Marina Green and Safeway a nice walk around the corner. 

Available to move in today.

Address: 2701 Van Ness Ave @ Greenwich St.  Call  
 Dawn.

name: Natural light in this Studio home $100 deposit and $500 Look & Lease
body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.WELCOME TO THE WILSON In a city with more than its share of beautiful, historic landmarks, there is one building that combines modern conveniences with a Landmark Life on the center of Market Street – The Wilson. Built in 1904, then a survivor of the 1906 earthquake, The Wilson has been completely re-imagined and re-established for the 21st century resident seeking a home with a story to share for generations to come. Having seen the city grow-up and transform around it, The Wilson is now the premiere address for residents looking to do more than just rent an apartment; The Wilson is for those looking to live the Landmark Life.The Wilson's unique architectural flair joins modern luxury finishes with historic architectural detail. The apartments and lofts feature natural light, oversized rooms, and are wired for high-speed internet and cable. The gourmet kitchens include custom-designed cabinets, quartz countertops, gas cooking, and stainless steel appliances  Call Now:  show contact info

PROPERTY DESCRIPTION:

Watch the video walkthrough: https://youtu.be/eRna3h4gohE  

Make your next home in this updated Flower Market Loft! The loft has contemporary updates and is located over two-floors. Features include:
- Light filled, grand open floor plan living/dining/kitchen space with double height ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows. Oak wide-plank hardwood flooring in living areas.
- Enjoy views out to SF Skyline and Potrero Hill.
- Chef’s kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and breakfast bar.
- Master suite has attached bath and walk-in closet with custom-built California closet shelving storage.
- 2nd bedroom features plenty of light and generous closet space.
- The third bedroom is a loft that is open to the living space below.
- Two full bathrooms feature European porcelain tiled floor, Cambria Marble Series quartz stone counter-tops, shower-over-tubs and polished nickel Watermark fixtures.
- Unit is available unfurnished, partially furnished or fully furnished (furniture for an additional price)
- For your convenience, there is an in-unit washer/dryer, central air-conditioning and Hunter Douglas window treatments.
- 1 car garage parking and storage unit
- Building designed by renowned architects Sternberg Benjamin Architects.
- Enjoy the outdoors in the shared building patio.
- With a Walkscore of 91, you have easy access to the numerous shopping, dining and nightlife options in the vibrant SOMA district.
- A perfect TransitScore of 100 puts BART, Caltrain and multiple MUNI lines within reach.
- Access to Hwy 101 & 280 within blocks.

body:
Quiet 1 Bed / 1 Bath condo with partial Bay Views & garage parking! PET FRIENDLY + VIDEO TOUR!!




Property Address

5330 Diamond Heights Blvd # J-105 | San Francisco, CA 94131


  Available: Now



Offered By

Five Star Property Management |  




Description

    **WATCH THE VIDEO TOUR AND CLICK "APPLY NOW" IF YOU LIKE WHAT YOU SEE!!**

Great 1 Bed / 1 Bath condo with awesome views in a central location!

Enjoy partial views of the San Francisco Bay & Mt. Diablo from the comfort of your living room!

Must see video walk through: https://youtu.be/W19A1aPWvHA

Additional features include:
- Real hardwood flooring
- Fully renovated bath with tile flooring and beautiful subway tile shower
- Fully renovated kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances included refrigerator, dishwasher, electric range, range hood and disposal
- On-site laundry in the garage
- Includes one garage parking space, and tons of non-metered street parking
- Open space with hiking trails nearby!
- Lots of great dog parks nearby including Upper Douglass Dog Park!


Dimensions (approximate):
- Living-room, dining room & kitchen 30' x 19' Sq Ft
- Bedroom 15' x 11' Sq Ft


Walk to the shops on 24th St in Noe Valley, or great food in the Castro, Cole Valley, Glen Park or downtown!

Mollie Stones, Walgreens and the Diamond Heights Safeway & Shopping center are located right next door!

- Water, garbage and garage parking spot included in the rent!
- Easy Access to downtown or 280 freeway
- MUNI Line # 52 picks up in front of building!
- 5 minute MUNI ride to glen park BART!




Application information:
- Please note that all properties require each applicant to have a minimum FICO score of 700 and a combined minimum verifiable gross income of at least (3) three times the monthly rent.
- Each resident over the age of 18 must submit a separate rental application.
- Each applicant must complete a PET, NO PET, and/or an ASSISTANCE ANIMAL profile at https://gofivestarpm.petscreening.com
- Minimum 12 month lease term
- No co-signers
- No pets considered
- Tenant pays all utilities (except water & garbage)
- Renter's Insurance required



Professionally managed by:

Five Star Property Management
 show contact info
 Ext. 2 Leasing Line
Speak with a live agent Mon-Fri 9am - 8pm & Sat-Sun 9am - 5pm PST!!

Additional listings: http://gofivestarpm.com/rentals

Five Star Property Management offers all residents the ability to pay rent and security deposits online 24/7 via Check, Debit or Credit card, thus eliminating the need to mail in or drop off payments!

You can also view account information and create & track maintenance requests online from the comfort of your home or on the go with your mobile device!



Equal Housing Opportunity




About Us: Five Star Property Management is the Bay Area’s premier boutique property management company. Our property management professionals help real estate owners and investors like you manage your properties throughout the Bay Area by handling all facets of the day-to-day management of your properties and partnering with you to develop long-term investment management strategies.

For more information about our property management services, please visit our educational blog page: https://gofivestarpm.com/burlingame-property-management-blog/

name: PR.SHOW TUE 4:45PM-5PM  2-1BR/1BA, Sh Laundry, Sh.Yard, (780 Guerrero)
body:
* $3,495/month annual lease
* Eat-in kitchen
* Shared yard
* Shared laundry
* Pet considered at an add'l fee
* Available:Now 

PRIVATE SHOWING :Tuesday (4/7) from 4:45PM-5PM. We will keep a safe distance. 

Virtual Tour : https://youtu.be/neIlzCi5b2A
Location: 780 Guerrero #8

Newly remodeled 2-1 BR/1BA second floor apartment in the Mission Dolores district. Floors are dark hardwood except in tile bath. Heat is via steam radiators. Very large open kitchen serves as the common space. Kitchen has new stainless gas stove, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator and granite counters. It could fit a couch and table or full dining arrangement. Small room connected to kitchen can be used as storage space. One bedroom is at the back of the building overlooking the yard and has a huge walk-in closet. The other room can be used as a living room or as a second bedroom and it has a closet with sliding mirror doors. Elegant bath has glass shower stall. There is a large closet near the apartment's entrance. Shared yard is concrete with bike rack, potted plants. Building has coin operated washer and dryer.

Building is on Guerrero, four blocks equidistant from shopping and dining on 16th and 24th Streets. It's just one block to the south end of Dolores Park. Walk Score is 97, Transit Score is 92. Lots of transportation options within easy walking distance include 16th and 24th Street BART stations, J-Church MUNI, and bus lines 14, 22, 33, 49.

Pictures are from a similar unit in the same building.

Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.

Everest Mwamba
Kenney & Everest Real Estate
BRE# 01984640

 office

 cell
Apply at everestmwamba . com

body:
Coveted corner 1 bedroom Axis SF

1299 Bush Street - #602 | San Francisco, CA 94109


  Available: Now

Description

    Enjoy this modern 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo at Axis SF, a
modern boutique building conveniently located at Bush and
Larkin. The spacious open floor plan features floor-to-ceiling
windows, extra-height ceilings and mahogany flooring. A chef’s
kitchen offers a breakfast bar, Italian stainless steel appliances
including a gas stove, high-gloss cabinetry and quartz
countertops. The well-lit bedroom offers two large closets with
custom organizers and an adjoining bathroom with
shower-over-tub and modern vanity. Axis SF amenities include a
scenic roof deck with barbecue and gorgeous city views. The
building has a great Walk Score of 99 and a Transit score of
100.

appliances including gas oven/range and dishwasher

and the Embarcadero
