name: Top Floor Arden 2 Bedroom Condo
body:
Top Floor Arden  2 Bedroom Condo




Property Address

708 Long Bridge Street - #1611 | San Francisco, CA 94158


  Available: Now



Offered By

Elizabeth Kim




Description

    Welcome home to Arden: the height of modern luxury in the heart o f Mission Bay, close
to the water and SF’s best shops, restaurants, and entertainment. This top-floor unit at
708 Long Bridge Street is a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo with a sizable terrace. Enjoy
the open-plan living room/dining room/kitchen with gorgeous hardwood floors and an
expansive wall of windows creating a bright and inviting living area. This home's highly
desirable floor plan is complemented by Arden's world-renowned finishes and features.
The chef-grade kitchen is well-appointed and includes a premium Thermador appliance
package. The bedrooms both feature plush carpeting and views via large picture
windows with great light. The master bedroom offers a spa-like en-suite bathroom with
a glass-enclosed shower; dual vanities with ample counter space; Caesarstone
countertops; and Grohe faucets and fixtures. A full-sized washer and dryer and air
conditioning are also included in this premium Arden penthouse.

With prime waterfront trails, a double-height fitness studio, quick access to sailing and
kayaking facilities, and a rooftop junior Olympic-sized lap pool and spa, Arden offers
residents an active resort-style lifestyle rarely found downtown. Common areas like the
game room, open-air grilling/dining area, and social lounge are all luxuriously appointed,
and residents are always welcome to reserve time for the perfect entertaining venue.
Mission Bay’s continuously developing waterfront makes for the ideal neighborhood to
call home with a wide selection of shopping and daily conveniences, close proximity to
Giants ballpark, Warriors stadium, UCSF Mission Bay campus, Whole Foods, a gourmet
Safeway, and a selection of San Francisco’s best coffee and juice shops.

Features:
* 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
* 1,018 sq. ft. per county records
* Top-floor unit
* Open-plan living/dining room and kitchen
* Terrace
* Chef's kitchen with Caesarstone countertops, sleek modern cabinetry, mosaic tile
backsplash, Thermador appliance package, and designer Grohe fixtures
* Hardwood floors in living areas, plush carpet in bedrooms
* Full-sized Whirlpool washer and dryer in unit
* Pre-wired with USB ports and fiber optic cable, Webpass high-speed internet
* 1-car parking and 1 storage available for an additional fee
BUILDING FEATURES:
* Hotel-inspired fireside lounge
* 75-foot rooftop lap pool and spa
* Double-height fitness studio with changing rooms
* Expansive outdoor wood deck with views of the city
* Social lounge with entertaining kitchen and billiards
* Beautifully landscaped fifth-floor terrace
* Open-air grilling and dining area
* Outdoor fireplace gathering area

name: Furnished Mint Plaza Studio
body:
Furnished Mint Plaza Studio




Property Address

2 Mint Plaza - #305 | San Francisco, CA 94107


  Available: Now



Offered By

Elizabeth Kim




Description

    Available either furnished or unfurnished. Enjoy this modern loft-style studio that is sophisticated
yet simple and offers city views. The high-gloss acid stained concrete flooring is gorgeous, and
the full-size kitchen is complete with a gas range, granite countertops, and stainless steel
appliances. There's a custom Murphy bed that can easily be hidden if you have guests over. It's
super-convenient with a washer and dryer in the unit and a great SOMA location.
Martin Building Company and Lundberg Design collaborated to renovate and design four
historic buildings on Mint Plaza, including 2 Mint Plaza; 6 Mint Plaza, once a San Francisco Fire
Department firehouse; 8 Mint Plaza; and 10 Mint Plaza. Residents have access to amenities
such as 24-hour concierge service; a rooftop deck with a barbecue; and fitness room. Enjoy
Blue Bottle Coffee, Burma Club and other fine restaurants right in Mint Plaza. Across the street
is the Westfield Mall.

Unit features:
* Spacious studio with high ceilings and Acid stained concrete flooring with high-gloss finish
* 433 sq. ft. per tax records
* Queen size Murphy bed
* Modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances including gas oven/range
and dishwasher
* Modern bathroom with shower over deep, stainless steel bathtub
* All-in-one washer and dryer in unit
* Air conditioning and forced-air central heating
* Water, garbage, gas, and internet (webpass) included for furnished rental. Water and garbage
included for unfurnished

BUILDING FEATURES:

name: Stylish Urban Condo with Patio in the Dogpatch
body:
Stylish Urban Condo with Patio in the Dogpatch




Property Address

1280 Minnesota Street #103 | San Francisco, CA 94107


  Available: Now



Offered By

Elizabeth Kim




Description

    Relax in this modern 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo that offers a convenient location, especially to anyone traveling between the Peninsula and downtown SF. The spacious patio is perfect for entertaining or just relaxing with a glass of wine.

Millwheel is a premiere pair of buildings in the heart of San Francisco's Dogpatch/Central Waterfront district. This unit is in Millwheel South, one of the newer buildings in the Dogpatch, a 32-unit community completed in 2012 with a courtyard and high-speed Webpass internet. This neighborhood changes each day with a growing number of commercial businesses ­ocking here. Esprit Park and trendy
restaurants are within easy reach, and Mission Bay's new UCSF Medical Center is close by.

Enjoy a commuter's dream location close to the Third Street light rail and the 22nd Street Caltrain station. This is the perfect location for those working in San Francisco or commuting down the Peninsula. Don't miss this incredible opportunity.

Unit Features:
• 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
• 1,125 sq. ft. per owner
• High ceilings
• Living room features Heat and Glo gas ¬replace
• Gourmet kitchen with Caesarstone countertops, oversized breakfast bar, Belmont cabinetry, and Frigidaire stainless steel appliances including gas oven/range
• Master suite features spa-like bathroom with separate shower and soaking tub
• Rich and beautiful hardwood ­ooring in living areas, plush carpet in bedrooms
• Built-in Elfa closet organizers in bedroom closets and pantry
• Huge patio accessible from both the living room and master bedroom offers direct access to courtyard
• Bosch washer and dryer in unit
• Large storage closet included
• 1 or 2 parking spaces in building garage available for an additional fee
• Sorry, no pets

Building Features:
• Common courtyard
• High-speed Webpass internet available
• Next door to Philz Coffee plus new commercial businesses each day
• Great Dogpatch/Central Waterfront neighborhood close to shops, parks, and other amenities
• 2 blocks to 22nd Street Caltrain, 3 block to T-Line and easy access to downtown San Francisco or the 101 and 280 freeways

name: Remodeled, Pink Granite, InSuite W/D & D/W, Wood Floors
body:
***This is a real apartment available for rent. Not a scam. We own the apartment and the whole building. Looking for nice tenants. We can meet and show you the apartment. It has come to my attention that some scammer has been copying my ads. Please make sure you are dealing directly with me. I never rent to someone that I haven't met or spoken with over the phone / skype. If you aren't in the city, then let me know if you have someone local that I can meet. The security deposit and first month's rent is due on the first day of the lease. Anyone asking for large sums of money up front from you is probably a scammer. Please be aware.***

Avail long or short term. One month minimum lease.

Excellent location. Scores 96 on Walkscore. Lots of great restaurants and shops nearby. Easy to get downtown, or on the 101. Walk to Baker Beach. Close to Presidio, the Marina, Ocean Beach and Golden Gate park, Legion of Honor, golf course, VA Hospital, CPMC. 8 minute drive to Kaiser and USF or easy bike ride through the park. UCSF is about a 10-15 minute drive or easy bike ride through the park. 

Huge apartment that can be used as a 3 bedroom or four bedroom since the living room has a sofa that pulls down into a queen size sofa bed. Wood floors were just refinished. Everything was just painted. Fully finished. Everything brand new. Be the first to live in this beauty. 

Living room has black leather sofa, gold butterfly cocktail table, purple velvet chairs, dining table that can seat 4, fireplace, desk, 40" flat Smart TV. Big bay window. Hall closet off the living room. Internet router for direct connect or WiFi

Master bedroom has California King bed, two night stands, dresser and closet. 

Front bedroom has bay window, full size bed, night stand, dresser and closet

Back bedroom has queen bed, night stand and big mirrored closet. 

Large eat-in kitchen with gorgeous granite counter tops that are purple. Pink, blue and gold. Plus a dishwasher, gas stove, big split fridge that dispenses water and ice cubes, tons of cabinets. Marble dining table with bronze croc dining chairs. 

In-suite washer and dryer. 

Some pets permitted.

Extra monthly charge for all utilities including internet and Comcast cable tv.

If interested, then please email or text me with your dates. Then we can figure out when to chat. I can send you a video tour and I can also do a FaceTime tour.

body:

Fantastic Location! Top Floor Penthouse Unit. This is a beautiful 1 bedroom 1 bath with den which is finely appointed with granite counter tops and top-of-the-line Bosch stainless steel appliances in the kitchen and marble throughout the bathroom.

24 hour Doorman and Security, lovely lobby, professionally managed building and a great common roof deck with 360' Panoramic Views.

199 New Montgomery stands proudly on the corner of New Montgomery and Howard Streets, a bustling intersection between the world of culture, art and business. Local restaurants serve office workers and serious gourmets. Towards Union Square you'll find vibrant boutiques and specialty retailers, as well as the City's famed department stores. You'll find all the benefits of big city living here, beginning in the immediate neighborhood.

name: 1 bedroom with parking included.  Video link in post.
body:
One bedroom/one bath apartment in 6 unit building located on corner of Market and Eureka St. in the Castro. 2 blocks to Castro St. Muni.
Unit is on street side corner so there is noise from street.
Unit is on 2nd fl, up one flight of stairs. Garage is below unit. There is a unit on one side and a unit above.
One parking space for average size car included (no SUVs or trucks)
Storage locker closet in garage included. 
Coin operated laundry in building.
New carpet, paint and blinds. Double paned windows.
Electric range. Dishwasher. Garbage disposal.
Sorry, no pets.
Rent is $2600 per month. 
Security deposit is $5300
Total to move in is $7900
Water, garbage and parking included in rent
One year lease converts to month to month on anniversary.
Due to shelter in place, if you are interested we can start online. Take a look at the pics and video and email me for an application. Once it is safe to do show, we will show by appointment. As the unit is ready now, we will decide a move in date, again when it is safe to do so. Thank you for your patience! Please email with any questions.
Link to video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yI5LFcPNiz4&feature=youtu.be

body: One bedroom, one bath flat with one garage parking space in Hayes Valley/Civic Center location.  Seven-year-old, 50-unit building with amenities and conveniences, including roof top deck, workout room, on-site building manager, secure bike storage, nearby public transportation, and great local eating and shopping.  This unfurnished sunny corner flat on the seventh floor has approximately 850 square feet of modern, well-designed living space with upgraded kitchen appliances and in-unit washer/dryer.  Small dogs and cats are acceptable with owner’s approval and pet deposit.  $4300/month plus one month’s rent for security deposit.  Available April 6th.  Six-month to one-year agreement preferred, but month-to-month and furnished/fully equipped options are possible.

name: Yerba Buena Lofts! Views, Patio, Highly Upgraded & Location! *pics!
body:
AMAZING MODERN TERRACE LOFT: Stunning 2 bed / 1.5 full bath Yerba Buena Loft with a huge 14 x 7 ft private terrace offering panoramic open views! High-end upgrades, soaring ceilings, amenities, deeded parking and a great location!

HIGH-END UPGRADES: Awarded architectural design, quiet, spacious and bright. upgraded kitchen and bathrooms, wide-plank hardwood floors, tailored roller shades, custom track lighting, designer Nelson lights, custom bedroom built-in wood cabinets, custom upgraded frosted glass sliding doors, upgraded carpet, walk-in California Closets, front loading washer/dryer, ceiling fan and Trex decking!

SERVICES: On-site professional management. 24-hour security which oversees concierge key service, package delivery, dry cleaning, and cabs.  Full-time maintenance staff and chief engineers.

MODERN ARCHITECTURE: Designed by renowned architect Stanley Saitowitz who has been featured in New York Times, American Institute of Architects, and Architectural Record. San Francisco Magazine called YBL "by far the best building South of Market". San Francisco's "Best of the Best"

GREAT LOCATION: Walk Score of 97! Folsom @ 4th Street across from ZeroZero, Oola, Jamber and Bistro Mitilthe. One block from Whole Foods & Yerba Buena Gardens. Nearby Moscone Center, Target and Westfield Mall. Walking distance from Union Square, Financial District, South Beach, Mission Bay & AT&T Park and connector station coming soon at 4th Street!

name: Large cozy 1 bedroom and 1 bath close to USF and Golden Gate Park
body:
* Nice apartment unit in a 3 unit building in great shape
* Virtual tour of the apartment available
* Close to Laundromat, restaurants, grocery store, library, schools, USF, golf course, beach, museums, and public transportation. Right next to MUNI bus line that will take you anywhere in the city.
* Unit has a living room, 1 bedroom, kitchen and a bathroom
* Plenty of street parking in the neighborhood.  
* Close to DeYoung Museum.  Next to USF and walk to Golden Gate Park.
* Access to a shared nice backyard with 2 other units.
* Quiet neighborhood in an excellent location
* Short walk to bus stop
* Laundry next door to the building
* Street parking available. Extended parking available with a parking permit from the city.
* Walking distance to Golden Gate Park and University of San Francisco
* Lots of Windows
* Approximately 800 SF
* Rent is $2300 per month.  Minimal 1 month deposit depending on credit.
* Included in the rent is gas, water and garbage (Estimated $250 value per month)
* Cats are ok.

Update due to Covid-19 virus

* Virtual tour of the unit is available - please contact us for the link to the tour.
* We plan to have an open house on the afternoon of April 9th from 4PM to 7PM.  Please email us if you plan to attend so we can give you the address.

Our building is in a highly desirable location on the corner of 7th Ave. and Hugo, only half a block from Golden Gate Park/Lincoln Street and half a block from Irvine Street restaurants, shops, and the N Judah line. UCSF Medical is only a 13 minute walk. Laundry machines are located in the building. Each unit comes with a storage locker located in the garage. 

APARTMENT FEATURES:
Views looking out over Golden Gate park and to the West
Modern Kitchen with eat in area
Hardwood floors throughout
Ample Sunlight
Large Closet space
Laundry in building
Attentive on-site management
Storage locker
Water and Garbage paid
1 private parking space with it's own door available for additional $300

Please contact Laura for viewing times.

name: Two-Room Studio in Edwardian
body:
This two-plus-room studio of about 440 square feet has much of the Edwardian. The bath has hex tile floor with a tile surrounding the shower/tub. The hall and bedroom are carpeted in wool berber. Bedroom has large closet, and plate rails. The large eat-in kitchen has custom cabinets with granite tile counters, linoleum flooring and a custom chopping block countertop next to the stove. There are white brick tiles behind sink and stove, and traditional wainscotting in the open area. There's a small rear porch perfect for an office set-up.

This unit is a 2nd floor, rear unit in a building of 12 units, with lots of light. There is a coin-op laundry in the building. Separate indoor, ground-level bicycle parking for one bicycle is available with a lease addendum. Street parking with city permit only. 

This is a non-smoking unit. 100% indoor cat OK with a lease addendum. Owner pays gas, water (including hot water), garbage. Tenant pays electricity, phone, cable. 1 year lease required, with 1.5 times rent in security deposit. 

The biker's score is 99, walk score is 91, transit score is 88. Nearby transportation includes 12 Folsom, 14 Mission, 33 Ashbury, 49 Van Ness and 27 Bryant. It's a 12 minute walk to BART. Nearby car share locations include Zipcar, Getaround.

We are trying to help existing leaseholders move to their new dream job. 

Call Ed at  
 to arrange a showing, and for further information. Please reference the Shotwell apartment.

Bay windows all around give great light and a wonderful open feeling. New Stainless Steel appliances, cabinets, and marble counter tops.  

This apartment is located in a stately old world San Francisco building centrally located on the corner of Bush and Taylor Streets, in the coveted Nob Hill neighborhood. From the secure private entrance, grand lobby design and well appointed units this is a fantastic building that is central to all things San Francisco. 

Building amenities include Onsite Manager, Coin-Op Laundry, Secure Building & Elevator. There is no parking onsite but with a walk score of 100, Transit Score of 100 and a bike score of 65 (it is Nob Hill...) this is a pedestrian's paradise.

name: Single Family Home ~ 3BD+Office/3BA/2-Car Gar ~ Pacific Heights
body:
IF YOU ARE INQUIRING ABOUT THIS PROPERTY, PLEASE PROVIDE YOUR CELL PHONE # IN THE BODY OF YOUR MESSAGE SO THAT AGENT CAN CONTACT YOU, OR CALL  show contact info

2509 SACRAMENTO ST
Summary:
      Rent: $9,900
      Bed/Bath: 3bd+ office / 3ba
      Type: SFH - Unfurnished
      Parking:  2-car gar prk + wine cellar in garage
      Terms:  1 Year Lease Terms
      Available: Now
_____________________________________________________________
Lovely Pacific Heights Single Family Home
This charming Victorian single family home is located in the highly desirable Pacific Heights neighborhood, just a stone’s throw from Fillmore Street restaurants, boutiques, nightlife and excellent public transportation. Alta Plaza Park is  just a block away!
Features:

3 bedrooms + office / 3 full baths
Soaring ceilings and decorative moldings add to its charm
Double parlor living room upstairs
Family room downstairs
2 vintage decorative fireplaces
Formal dining room off kitchen
Light-filled eat-in kitchen offers spacious countertops, double oven, an abundance of storage & pantry space, and deck to yard
Master bath water closet with toilet and bidet
Washer/dryer in unit
Small solarium leading to bricked terrace
Bricked two level backyard perfect for dining al fresco or kids to play hide & seek
Dog and cat friendly

Neighborhood:
When it comes to Pacific Heights, stately historic homes, manicured lawns, and postcard-perfect views are just the tip of the iceberg. Also on hand are fine dining and entertainment, shopping, and plenty of exercise opportunities, including:

Explore a wide array of cuisines including JANE BAKERY, SALT & STRAW, THE GROVE, LA MEDITERRANEE, TEN-ICHI RESTAURANT & SUSHI BAR, PALMER'S TAVERN, JACKSON FILLMORE TRATTORIA, JOE & THE JUICE, and many more
Stay entertained at the FILLMORE JAZZ FESTIVAL, or the infamous concert venue, THE FILLMORE.
Grab a workout at ALTA PLAZA PARK, LAFAYETTE PARK
Nearby MUNI bus lines; 1-California, 22-Fillmore, 3-Jackson

name: Furnished 1 bedroom cottage in the mission
body:
AVAILABLE FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN!! COMES FURNISHED

Our Mission Cottage is a unique and special one bedroom home in San Francisco’s dynamic Mission District. Extreme care has been taken to renovate the unit and no detail has been overlooked. Every cabinet, color, and appliance has been thoughtfully considered. The result is a magical home in a private compound.
As you enter the unit, you will find the spacious kitchen with vivid colors throughout and a full dining area. Ascend the stairs and there is a full living room. As you enter the hallway you will find the bathroom with a clawfoot tub and shower. Adjacent to the bathroom is the generous bedroom. The cottage has very comfortable hydronic heat throughout.
The Cottage is in the middle of a vibrant commercial area with many restaurant and shopping options. There is very good access to public transport, including BART.
Make your next stay a memorable one at our Mission Cottage.

name: Private Room
body:
Hi! We’re looking for a roommate to live with us in The Sunset. One guy and one girl in their 20s, young professionals looking for someone to live with! We know it’s a unprecedented time for everyone and are willing to FaceTime before a face to face tour. We are friendly, like to watch sports, sail, eat tacos and occasionally doing this all with each other when we’re home! 

We’re close to the N Judah, L Taraval and several express buses to get you downtown under 20 minutes. 

Our house was renovated recently and is just a really nice place, and if you think you’re a good fit, please reply with the subject line “Why I Want to Live in the Sunset” to weed out spam. My name is Mandy and I look forward to chatting with you. Talk soon! :)

body:

Summary:
      Rent: $3,800
      Bed/Bath: 1 enclosed BR + Open loft office / 1BA
      Type: Condo - Unfurnished
      Parking:  1-car private garage prk included
      Terms:  1 Year Lease Terms
      Available: Now
_____________________________________________________________
Tri-Level Loft with One Enclosed BR, Separate Level Loft & 4th Level Private  Garage.
This charming downtown tri-level loft-style condo features dramatic 16 foot ceiling and a fireplace in living room. Chef’s kitchen with large skylight, a wood-burning fireplace and a balcony off of bedroom. This unique 3 level floor plan offers multiple living arrangement options, with an enclosed bedroom on the first level, living room and kitchen on the second level, and loft area on the third level that can be an office or guest room.
FEATURES:

Tri-level loft in great SOMA location, perfect if you work downtown or easy access to Caltrain
Living room includes wood-burning fireplace and beautiful hardwood floors
Open floorplan to dining & kitchen
Open kitchen features maple cabinetry, engineered stone countertops, large refrigerator, gas oven/range with microwave, dishwasher, garbage disposal
First floor includes entryway, closet space, full bathroom and enclosed bedroom
Third floor mezzanine can be used as office or guest bedroom
Maple hardwood floors in living area, dining/kitchen, and carpet in enclosed bedroom and loft
Overhead lighting throughout
1-car secure private garage parking included
Washer/dryer in garage
Secure building with intercom/telephone entry system
Walk Score of 97; Excellent location in the heart of SOMA, walk to everything! Easy access to the Embarcadero, downtown SF, Financial District, Oracle Park, Whole Foods, Trader Joe’s, and Westfield Shopping Centre.  
Transit Score of 100; Easy access to all modes of transportation including 101 & 280 freeways, Caltrain, the 12-Folsom/Pacific and 27-Bryant muni bus lines, and the Powell Street Bart & MUNI station are all in walking distance
Nearby restaurants/pubs include Mathilde French Bistro, Tin, Zero Zero, The Chieftain Irish Pub & Restaurant, and Jamber Wine Pub
Nearby bakeries/coffee shops include Les Gourmands Bakery, Contraband Coffee, and Peet’s Coffee
For recreation visit the Museum of Modern Art (MOMA), Yerba Buena Gardens which includes the Children’s Garden, and the Yerba Buena Ice Skating & Bowling center, or visit Victoria Manalo Draves Park
SORRY NO PETS

name: Studio available in Cow Hollow, perfect location!
body:
4/6/2020 Update: Still Available! 

Small studio available May 1st in Cow Hollow for $1725.00. The building has 10 units total, all studios and one bedrooms. There are two floors, 5 units each. This is Unit 9 on the second floor. It is a pretty quiet apartment complex because most people are living alone. Water and electric are included in rent. Garbage is $28/mo. Coin-operated laundry is in the building for $2.25 per load. There is currently one parking space open in the garage as well for an additional $250/mo if interested. It is a one year lease and then month to month thereafter. The security deposit is $2400. Credit score of >/= 700 required.

name: furnished 3 bedroom 2 bath house near SFSU
body:
Our Sunset Charmer is a classic San Francisco home in a quiet and pleasant neighborhood.  The home which has been very well cared for offers lovely common areas with very comfortable bedrooms.  The location is very convenient to the Stonestown shopping area and is within walking distance of San Francisco State and Lowell High School.  The M Line of the Muni Metro is a five minute walk from the home.

As you enter the home, you will find a charming living room, suitable for relaxing and for entertaining.  The room exudes Old World charm.  Adjacent to the living room is a small but pleasant dining room.  The kitchen is tidy and includes all modern conveniences with extensive storage.

There are two bedrooms located on the first floor and both have ample natural light.  There is also a full bathroom.  The second floor boasts a very large master bedroom with a bathroom en suite.  There is a large garage which also contains the washer/dryer.

Our Sunset Charmer is perfect for a family or group of friends.  You can make yourself at home in the property but still access much of what San Francisco has to offer.  Make your next stay a great one at our Sunset Charmer.

name: Furnished short term studio in the Haight-Ashbury
body:
Discounted and clean homes for the COVID-19 pandemic

For those displaced by COVID-19, browse casauenavistarentals.com for Good rental properties so you can focus on work, feel comfortable in your home, and prevent the spread.

The Ashbury Garden Studio is an oasis of calm located in the middle of the very dynamic and exciting Haight Ashbury neighborhood. Located next to the famous Grateful Dead home, the studio is just a block and a half from the intersection of Haight and Ashbury Streets. This is a garden apartment beneath a historic Victorian home, built from a Sears and Roebuck kit in 1896. The apartment has been completely remodeled but still retains a great deal of charm.

Ashbury Garden Studio has been thoughtfully renovated to provide maximum comfort in a small space. The studio has a spacious living space with a gas fireplace and a full kitchen. There is an eating area and small desk. The bathroom is fairly large and has a bathtub. The bed lies in a sleeping alcove. There is a full bank of windows in the living room, providing ample natural light. Just outside the unit there is a large patio and BBQ available.

It’s an easy walk to charming Cole Valley or the eastern edge Golden Gate Park, and public transportation is just a block away. Enjoy your next visit in an exciting San Francisco neighborhood at our Ashbury Garden Studio.

name: ☆ FIRST MONTH IS FREE ☆ + Free Utilities, Internet & Cable
body:
Newly renovated move-in ready 1 BD / 1 BA apartment located two blocks from Golden Gate Park, within easy access to multiple public transportation stops to SF Downtown, and minutes to the beach, parks, and museums.  

FIRST MONTH IS FREE TO HELP YOU HANDLE THE MOVE IN THESE UNCERTAIN TIMES

*Monthly Rent: $2,200 (All-Inclusive: Utilities: PG&E, Water/Garbage, Cable TV and Gigabit Internet connection) 
*Security Deposit: $1,000
*Move-In Cost (1st month's rent + security deposit): 
*No Pets Allowed

This is an opportunity to live right around the corner from the Balboa Street district filled with multiple cafes, restaurants, produce shops, salons, laundromats, and various service business as well as a local hardware store and a historic Balboa Theater. 
There are three Express MUNI bus options within a couple of blocks that will have you in the heart of downtown in 20 minutes. Imagine living and just a mile from the beach, right next door to the Golden Gate Park, Lincoln Park, and Park Presidio.

The apartment has an open layout with a separate private entrance on the ground floor. A spacious entry area houses a full-size stainless steel fridge, a pantry closet and entry to a large full remodeled bathroom with shower over tub. The large living area has built-in cabinets, granite countertop and a cooktop that blends seamlessly without being too obstructive. Convection / Microwave oven that and bakes the best cookies or pie while popping perfect popcorn. A bright separate bedroom has a large closet and private access to a huge shared backyard and exercise room.      

The following will be required for Rental Application
•Copy of recent pay stubs 
•Valid Photo I.D. 
•Current credit report 
•Rental History and References

The apartment is move-in ready, if you are interested, please contact via e-mail to set up an appointment.

body:
Discounted and clean homes for the COVID-19 pandemic... from $3850 down to $3250

For those displaced by COVID-19, browse CasaBuenaVistaRentals.com for Good rental properties so you can focus on work, feel comfortable in your home, and prevent the spread.

Our Civic Center Vista offers visitors the opportunity to stay near many of San Francisco’s urban attractions while experiencing all of the comforts of home. The centrally located apartment is within walking distance of San Francisco’s City Hall, Opera House, Main Library, Asian Art Museum and Symphony Hall. There are numerous restaurants, entertainment and shopping opportunities nearby. Public transportation is less than one block away.

Civic Center Vista is a short walk away from Alamo Square Park, with its famous row of Victorian “Painted Ladies.” Upscale Hayes Valley is a few blocks east, and the hip, edgy Lower Haight neighborhood is a few blocks south.

Civic Center Vista is on the upper floor of a building built in the Victorian style around the turn of the 20th century. The flat has been renovated, and has a modern, fully equipped kitchen with an eating area. The living room has fantastic views of downtown San Francisco. There is a pull out couch and a desk, and the kitchen can be closed off so as not to disturb those in the living room. The master bedroom also has great views and a Queen sized bed. There is another small bedroom with two single beds. The bathroom has a shower and bathtub.

Rental of Civic Center Vista includes a small garage parking space. There is a stairway accessing the garage from the kitchen.

name: Furnished Inner Sunset Studio available May 1st
body:
Our newly remodeled Inner Sunset Studio provides an economical alternative for your stay in San Francisco. The studio, located near UC San Francisco and Golden Gate Park is a private apartment with a full kitchen and separate bedroom area. The kitchen has granite counter tops and a full range and refrigerator. The sleeping area has a Queen sized bed and a large flat screen television.

The location is perfect for those needing to be near UC San Francisco which is only four blocks from the property. Public transport on the Muni Railway N Judah line is just outside your door. There are numerous shopping and dining options within a four block walk from the property. Well appointed and reasonably priced, our Inner Sunset Studio is a great choice for your next visit to San Francisco.

Pets Policy: Pet Friendly 
Property Type: Elevator Building - Condominium Building

DESCRIPTION


VELA is built around the details. We have gone to great lengths to outfit our brand new apartment homes with the highest-end finishes, latest technology, and contemporary design, in a location that can't be matched. Bordering both the Marina District and Cow Hollow, VELA puts everything within walking distance. Whether you're grabbing a quick cup of coffee, going to the market or hanging out with friends at the local pub, it's all within one block from VELA. Located at 2353 Lombard Street, VELA is just steps from Chestnut Street, which offers hundreds of the best boutique shops, great restaurants, movie theaters, and yes, the Apple Store. VELA apartments offers brand new modern apartment homes for lease. Inside our beautifully designed boutique apartment community, you'll find contemporary and sophisticated 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom, and 2 bedroom + den apartment rentals. Our apartment homes have been generously designed to give you the space that you need. Picture entertaining friends and family in your modern chef's kitchen, while enjoying views of Palace of Fine Arts, the Golden Gate Bridge and the Marina District. Live your life in style with amenities that include a beautifully landscaped rooftop terrace with abundant outdoor seating, a linear fireplace and an outdoor kitchen. All of this is offered in one of San Francisco's most desirable neighborhoods filled with local boutiques, top rated restaurants, the Presidio, the Marina Green and some of the best nightlife in the city. The Marina District is conveniently located close to Downtown, the Financial District, SOMA, and the rest of the San Francisco Bay Area. Contact us today to get started.

Perched on a hillside on legendary Telegraph Hill in San Francisco, our Calhoun Terrace offers cozy charm to go along with fantastic views and features. You can easily stroll down to the Embarcadero or North Beach. The Financial District is also within walking distance. The unit is sunny throughout.
As you enter the property, you will find the kitchen and dining area. Off to the right, of the entrance is a bedroom and bathroom. As you continue to the right, you will find the living room. Head back to the kitchen area and ascend the stairs to the master bedroom which is in a loft along with a master bathroom. The entire home exudes comfort.
Calhoun Terrace includes parking and is in walking distance to public transport and various tourist attractions. There are ample shopping and restaurant options nearby. Make your next stay a great one at Calhoun Terrace.

name: Furnished 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment
body:
Available for immediate move in. My next guest arrives May 1st. 

Perched on a hillside on legendary Telegraph Hill in San Francisco, our Calhoun Terrace offers cozy charm to go along with fantastic views and features. You can easily stroll down to the Embarcadero or North Beach. The Financial District is also within walking distance. The unit is sunny throughout.
As you enter the property, you will find the kitchen and dining area. Off to the right, of the entrance is a bedroom and bathroom. As you continue to the right, you will find the living room. Head back to the kitchen area and ascend the stairs to the master bedroom which is in a loft along with a master bathroom. The entire home exudes comfort.
Calhoun Terrace includes parking and is in walking distance to public transport and various tourist attractions. There are ample shopping and restaurant options nearby. Make your next stay a great one at Calhoun Terrace.

name: Furnished 1 bedroom 1 bath garden in law apartment
body:
Discounted and clean homes for the COVID-19 pandemic

For those displaced by COVID-19, browse CasaBuenaVistaRentals.com for Good rental properties so you can focus on work, feel comfortable in your home, and prevent the spread.

Furnished apartment available for a minimum of 30 nights. You can view more options at Casabuenavistarentals.com or call  


Our Bernal Heights Garden is a pleasant suite located on a lush garden. The apartment is conveniently located on the South side of Bernal with great access to Silicon Valley. The cute apartment provides everything a couple or small family could need. There is a nice living room which features sliding glass doors that lead right to the garden. The unit has bamboo floors and tile throughout lending a sleek look to the apartment. There is a small but fully equipped kitchen. Additionally, there is a small office.
The apartment has full access to the washer and dryer. BART is about a 25 minute walk from the apartment. The lively Alemany Farmers Market is a short walk away and there are numerous restaurant options nearby. Parking is very easy. Make your next stay or business trip a good one at our Bernal Heights Garden.

name: Furnished 1 bedroom 1 bath Cole Valley Apartment
body:
Discounted and clean homes for the COVID-19 pandemic

For those displaced by COVID-19, browse CasaBuenaVistaRentals.com for Good rental properties so you can focus on work, feel comfortable in your home, and prevent the spread.

Our Cole Valley Lower is a pleasant and spacious one bedroom apartment located near the East end of Golden Gate Park at Historic Kezar Stadium. Several Golden Gate Park attractions are in the East end. The apartment is located a half block from Cole Street’s commercial village.

Located on a small private patio, Cole Valley Lower offers a serene environment near a lively area. There is a large living room and full sized kitchen with an eat in area. The apartment has a charming abience.

Cole Valley is an exciting neighborhood and provides numerous options for dining, shopping and entertainment. The studio is within walking distance of these options as well as the UCSF Hospital. The N Judah line which delivers riders to the center of the City is two blocks from the property. If you are visiting for pleasure, business, or a medical need, let us assist you at our Cole Valley Suite.

*

Luxury new 2 Bed, 2 Bath Condo with 1 Parking (Parking Fits A Porsche SUV or smaller).

*

1598 Bay Street is a stately and timeless addition to the Marina neighborhood, seamlessly integrated into its classic surroundings, and uniquely built of concrete and steel on stable ground. The residences are accentuated by designer finishes including custom kitchens and lavish bath suites. Many homes feature bay and park outlooks, patios, or private rooftop terraces. The freshly classic building features a showcase lobby and rooftop lounge with panoramic views for fireside gatherings and outdoor dining.

name: Bay View Top of the World Flat w Deck
body:
COMING AVAILABLE MAY 1:  Rarely available TOP floor flat in unique Telegraph Hill building on the east cliff face. It is one floor above the street at the end of a remote cul de sac as the very top of the east side of the hill.  Fantastic views of the Bay, Bay Bridge and downtown and of the surrounding wooded cliff face. Tremendous privacy with surrounding open space such that no window coverings are needed except for the bedroom.  Home to the wild parrots and doves of Tel Hill. One bedroom plus Bay-facing deck plus modern kitchen, wood-burning fireplace, washer & dryer, hardwood floors, tub/shower. 
Hot water and heating included and free laundry in unit included.
A fair amount of storage in unit (4 closets+) and a vestibule at top of stairs which can serve as office or sitting area and for extra storage. No parking is in the building due to the steep cliff but there is on street cul de sac parking just outside essentially used by building residents only; there are only two buildings on the street and the other has a garage. There are buildings nearby offering parking for rent also.
Pets are ok at $50/mo.
Please email to see but only after being sure you have a keen interest because the Covid-19 situation necessitates minimizing intrusion on the existing tenant and excessive contacts.  While  this is an unusual time this is a very unusual building in which vacancies almost never occur, and especially for this unit at the very top of the building.
No application fee but no applications taken without a deposit.

name: Stunning Studio with Views of City Hall/Rooftop Terrac
body:
Gorgeous new development on Fulton and Gough. Delighting fashionistas everywhere, my place sits in the trendy boutique-paradise that is Hayes Valley, and is a short walk from the high end shopping of Union Square too! You'll also find a cornucopia of culture (SF Symphony and Opera!), hip bars, and incredible restaurants, with Smuggler's Cove, Brenda's Meat & Three, and Absynthe just being the tip of the iceberg! The space is particularly well-suited for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids, too).

My home is nestled in San Francisco's Hayes Valley neighborhood, a thriving hotbed of the art, fashion, and fine dining. Those looking to take in a bit of culture will love the proximity to SF Jazz Center, the Nourse Theatre, the San Francisco Symphony, the War Memorial Opera House, the Rickshaw Stop, San Francisco Conservatory of Music, and the New Conservatory Theatre Center. 

* Property Highlights:
- Everything is brand new!
- Large Studio floor plan
- Spectacular Courtyard and City Hall views

Live in one of SF's most vibrant, diverse and evolving neighborhoods - Silver Terrace- in this high quality, newly remodeled home. 

The home:
* open kitchen features new granite counters, beautiful wood cabinets
* all new stainless steel GE/Whirlpool appliances: gas range/hood, dishwasher, fridge + disposal
* open plan living room and kitchen, with dining area
* private patio plus a shared yard with fruit trees!
* freshly painted with custom colors
* beautiful wood like plank flooring, tile in bath
* large master bedroom, 14' x 10.5'
* spacious bathroom with storage cabinets
* remodeled in 2019
* unit ~ 515 square feet and very well laid out
* well maintained, secure 3 unit building with respectful professional tenants
* washer and dryer in building
* quiet and friendly street
* 1 off street parking pad available for $125 per month
* secure storage space available for $50 per month
* sorry no pets/animals; non-smokers only, pleased
* available now

VIDEO TOUR: https://youtu.be/q6Z8ZlrRZMw

About Silver Terrace:
* rapidly evolving neighborhood with hip cafes, new restaurants, cultural and nature based amenities
* 1 block to the 3rd Street T-Line which takes you straight to Downtown, Dogpatch nightlife/dining, UCSF Mission Bay Bio-Medical Campus, CalTrain Station at 4th/Townsend. S.F. Bus lines 23, 24, 44, 54 very close by. 
* easy access to 101 and 280 freeways, and SFO airport
* walking distance to: Starbucks coffee, Flora Grubb Gardens/Ritual Coffee, All Good Pizza, Roadhouse coffee, Bayview Opera House, Tato, Radio Africa Kitchen, several cool Microbreweries, Walgreens, supermarkets, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, post office, the new Bayview Library, etc., etc.
* one of SF's sunniest neighborhoods!
* awesome parks and green spaces nearby like: Heron Head Eco Park, Bayview Park, Candlestick Point Rec Area, India Basin Shoreline Park.
* massive new high end developments coming online nearby in The Shipyard, Candlestick Park, Warriors new stadium and Pier 70, which will make the southern area of SF vibrant with new retail, housing and fantastic parks reaching the bay.
* Bayview won CurbedSF 2016 and last year's 2015 neighborhood of the year awards!
2016: http://sf.curbed.com/2017/1/3/14154404/san-francisco-neighborhood-year-bayview
2015: http://sf.curbed.com/archives/2016/01/04/all_hail_bayview_the_curbed_cup_neighborhood_of_the_year.php
-------------

when responding please include a short note stating the total number of people in your party, their relationship to you, and your employment situation/source of income. we are seeking tenants with good credit and references. thanks.

Type: Furnished Only Condo 
Parking: 1-car pkg included 
Terms: 6-12 Month lease terms 
______________________________________________________________
Brand New FURNISHED 1BD Condo in the Heart of Historic Jackson Square 
This brand new 1 bedroom furnished unit is located in the heart of the historic Jackson Square District. You are steps from fine dining, the Financial District, boutiques as well as local gyms. This brand new unit comes FURNISHED only with 1-car parking, views onto Battery Street and TransAmerica building, and also includes two shared roof deck terraces perfectly equipped with breathtaking Bay views and outdoor dining and entertaining. 
Features: 

Furnished Only unit
Available 6-12 months
Approximately 1100 sq ft
1 bedroom
1 bathroom Italian marble with brass fixtures
Hardwood oak flooring
Kitchen with Sub Zero fridge, Bosch Dishwasher, Wolf Range, un-lacquered brass hardware and a Taj Mahal leathered quartzite countertop and backsplash
11 ft ceilings
Private outdoor 35 sq ft balcony off dining room
1-car parking included
Washer/dryer
Two shared roof deck terraces with views of the Bay barbequing and outdoor kitchen & dining perfect for entertaining, and lastly a fire pit
Front desk concierge
Bicycle parking
Sorry no pets

Building:
288 Pacific Avenue is a newly constructed residence in one of the most coveted and sophisticated historical neighborhoods. The attended lobby is designed as an extension of one’s home with an elegant ornamental ceiling and richly upholstered seating areas accented with original artwork, framed mirrors, and decorative screens crafted from blackened steel and smoked glass. A signature Calacatta Turquoise marble wall surrounds a custom oversized fireplace. 288 Pacific offers secured indoor parking for each residence.

body:

Spacious Nob Hill studio is bright, quiet and located at the back of one of San Francisco's iconic buildings. Wonderfully updated and located on California Street within the heart of Nob Hill with a Walk Score of 98! The studio has easy access to public transportation, highway access and easy walking distance to numerous shops and Trader Joes. The kitchen has plenty of cabinet and counter space, including gas range, refrigerator and a large eating area. The main living has elegant hardwood floors and classic crown moldings. The bathroom has full shower over tub. Enjoy a large walk-in closet and an additional hall closet providing excellent storage. This BEAUTIFUL building features an elevator and on-site manager. Parking available $$ if needed. Owner pays water, refuse and heat. No application fee. Sorry no pets. No fee broker. Rent controlled. This studio can be SELF-SHOWN. Contact Valerie agt. name: Stunning Home - Panoramic Views ~ J.Wavro
body:
San Francisco - Anzavista - House for rent
Stunning Home - Panoramic Views
 Link to mobile layout:   http://www.jwavro.com/rental_details.php?id=33012573-0
Summary:
Rent: $9995
Bed / Bath: 3 / 3.5
Type: House
Term: 6 Month
Please contact:
Shane Nugent   |    show contact info
    |   www.jwavro.com

Description:

	***Flexible 6-12 months leas terms available. Home is also available furnished. Please call Shane @ show contact info
 for more information***


	Enter 40 Encanto Avenue and be mesmerized by the spectacular unobstructed views of downtown and beyond of this mid-century, extra-wide parcel 3,268 sq ft entertainer's dream home. Literally people's jaws drop when they walk in and see the view. It is one of the most impressive views in the city and at the same time close to everything which is extremely rare. The main entry of this home leads to a very spacious living room & adjoining dining with new hardwood floors and double sided wood-burning fireplace. The open living/dining concept allows for a perfect place to entertain which is about 40 feet wide instead of 25 feet wide like most sf homes. Adjacent to the living room is a spacious den with original period details, including a wet bar & wood-paneled walls. Directly off the den is a wonderful sun-drenched deck to soak in the out of this world views. Down the hall is a powder room, a large master bedroom with a dressing room/closet & a large bathroom and stand alone tub. Another bedroom with an en suite bath completes this level. The lower level boasts a massive family room with a wet bar and fireplace. Car enthusiasts 
	enjoy a 4 car garage and space for two additional cars in the driveway. 5 min drive to the bustling Divisadero Corridor, Nopa, Alamo Square, Japantown, and Laurel Heights. 4 min walk to Target, Starbucks, and soon to be Whole Foods Market. 7 min walk to Trader Joe's. Property can be delivered furnished or unfurnished. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to live in one of the most coveted neighborhoods in one of the most rare homes in San Francisco.

	 

	 
This is a non-smoking unit. Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed. 
Details:
Floors: Hardwood
Kitchen: Upgraded
Laundry: In Unit
Outside area: Balcony

Parking: Garage
Parking Fee: $0
Pets:   Cat & Dog Negotiable    OK 
View: Panoramic
Location:
Encanto  & Anzavista Avenue, San Francisco, CA 

Meet the J.Wavro Team:
http://www.jwavro.com/us.php
Please contact:
Shane Nugent   |    show contact info
    |   www.jwavro.com

Where you live is where you come alive. In one of San Francisco’s most eclectic and vibrant neighborhoods, Avalon Dogpatch connects you to everything needed to upgrade your lifestyle. Within our community of courtyard-connected homes, you'll find thoughtfully designed studio, one-, two- and three bedroom apartments and townhomes. name: ReadyNowLuxury2Bed2bath1ParkingRoofTopDeckHayesValley
body:
Ready April 6, 2020

*

Hayes Valley Neighborhood.   Minutes to Financial District.   Tech Shuttles Near by.  Bart is walking distance.  Union Square is within walking distance.   Freeway is less than 2 minutes away.  

*

8 Octavia St (cross is Market St).  Condo 506


*

Beautiful Modern 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom with one parking space Condo.   All wood floors.  

*

8 Octavia is a new condo building in the vibrant Hayes Valley neighborhood at the corner of Market Street and Octavia Boulevard. This high-rise building houses 47units over ground floor retail. 

Amenities include a rooftop deck and common courtyards. Entry into the home is by smartphone. Flex space floor plans offer multiple rooms with sliding wall panels to maximize space. Units have energy efficient lighting and appliances, as well as user controlled window louvers to regulate solar heat. Interiors have wood flooring, European cabinetry, and floor to ceiling windows.

*

Features • 7.5”-wide Austrian grey oak plank floors • Automated individual louver system to modulate sunlight, views and privacy • Floor-to-ceiling glass windows • Exposed architectural concrete ceilings • VisiOnline keyless entry • Forced-air heating system • Sematic kitchen cabinets, Glacier White Corian countertops with integrated sink, fully integrated Liebherr refrigerator, Stainless Steel Bosch appliances and fully integrated dishwasher • Master and secondary bathrooms featuring Duravit features and Hansgrohe faucet • Secondary bathroom featuring a Saitowitz-designed Japanese soaking tub 

*

Louvers 8 Octavia’s louvered façade reinterprets a feature of early modern architecture for contemporary San Francisco. The slim, vertical louvers reach the full height of each floor and work to modulate natural light, views, and interior comfort while improving energy efficiency. Residents can adjust their experience throughout the day from floor-to-ceiling views to soft afternoon sun to evening privacy. 


 Landscape Stanley Saitowitz | Natoma Architects and Marta Fry Landscape Associates have blended architecture and landscape to compose a spacious urban retreat. A jewel-box viewing garden—a sculptural basalt stone, set in glass—imbues the entry lobby with a tranquil presence. At the rooftop terrace, finely detailed materials, plantings and furnishings create an open air lounge with commanding city views. 


Kitchens Beautiful, flexible and functional, the SieMatic handle-free kitchens— finished in Titan pine wood laminate and glacier white Corian countertops—are an essential component of 8 Octavia’s next-generation residential concept. Smart design features, developed over 40 years, include patented systems that maximize storage. 


Wood Refined yet warm, the wide-plank oak flooring, finished with natural oil, complements the modern interior. The sustainable, FSC-certified wood comes from the Benedictine monastery of Admont, Austria, which has cultivated wood products since its founding in 1074. 


Keyless Entry The innovative Visionline keyless entry system provides advanced security and enhanced control. Residents can access their home with a key fob as well as grant and monitor visitor access from anywhere in the world. The streamlined components and reader sit concealed within the door, seamlessly integrating with 8 Octavia’s clean design. 


Virtual Doorman State-of-the-art remote doorman service, the first of its kind offered in San Francisco, further enhances 8 Octavia’s security and convenience. Virtual Doorman’s professional operators are available 24/7 to greet guests, receive deliveries and assist residents. Using the integrated web portal and smartphone app, residents can grant access for visitors and services on the go. 

Temperature Control With Nest Thermostats residents enjoy optimal comfort while saving energy. Responsive technology learns individual preferences and patterns to provide just the right amount of warmth when it’s needed. The clear dial interface and mobile app enable easy control from any location. 

Connectivity A Webpass building-wide network supports 8 Octavia’s technology enhanced lifestyle. Residences come connected with premium, synchronous 200 Mbps internet service. A roof-terrace hot spot brings service outdoors. 

*

Sorry no pets.

*

1 parking Included in the rent.

*

You pay gas, electric, cable and wifi.

*

Condo move in fee paid by the Renter is $300 and must place a $500 refundable deposit after the move in is complete.

name: Striking Loft with Views in SOMA
body:
Move in Bonus! *1-month FREE rent! 

The price listed is the average rent over a 12-month period; 30 days will be $0 and the remaining rent will be $4,200/mo

52 Rausch Unit #201 is a spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom multi-level loft has an open living/room and kitchen layout with tall windows that let in lots of light. 

The bedrooms are situated on separate levels. The main-floor living areas and bedroom have stained and polished concrete and the upper-level bedroom has carpet.  The bedroom on the lower level has outside access that overlooks a lush garden oasis. 

This unique unit has sealed concrete countertops; stainless steel sink basins; birch veneer cabinets and drawers; stainless steel appliances including a 5-burner gas range; and in-unit laundry. 

Situated on a peaceful tree-lined street in SoMa and part of the historic Mullen Building complex that was built in 1920 and boasts a Walk Score of 97. 

Surrounded by trendy restaurants, clubs, and tech companies, conveniently located near downtown and close to Caltrain and BART with easy access to the freeways. Enjoy all the new cafes, breweries  and small eateries that are popping up in this vibrant neighborhood of SOMA. 

UNIT FEATURES:

• 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
• 850 sq. ft. per owner
• Kitchen features sealed concrete countertops; birch veneer cabinets and drawers; stainless steel appliances including 5-burner gas range
• Bathrooms with stainless steel sink basins; Kohler fixtures; showers over tubs with natural stone surrounds; mirrored medicine cabinets; upper-level bathroom also features natural stone floors
• Polished concrete floors on lower level, carpet in upper bedroom
• Radiant floor heating
• Washer/dryer in unit
• WebPass high-speed internet available for $50 per month
• Street parking; leased parking may be available nearby, inquire for options
• Pets considered on an individual basis with pet rent and additional deposit

body:
Description
Remodeled modern home above Portola's coveted University Mound. Open concept living, dining & kitchen great room full of natural light from 4 skylights & wide patio doors, which leads to a balcony with spectacular SF Bay views. The gourmet kitchen offers designer Walnut cabinetry, Thor Kitchen appliances, a stunning waterfall natural stone kitchen island & wide-plank European Oak floors. A Mahogany double barn door with Capiz Shells divides the living room & a large Bedroom with Marina-style windows at the front of the house. Spacious Master Bedroom & Bathroom with a shower & a soaking bathtub.  The master and the second bedroom include private access to the deck and backyard.

body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.

 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. On-site retail, including Chase Bank and Bark Avenue Doggy Daycare, along with nearby Safeway, Bluxome Street Winery, Lucky Strike, and Alexander's Steakhouse, puts shopping, dining, and entertainment within reach.

name: SCHEDULE A LIVE VIDEO TOUR TODAY
body:
Woodmont Real Estate Services is committed to help you find your new home from wherever you are. We strive to create communities where people feel at home and invite you to virtually experience a tour of our modern living interiors and life-enriching amenities you can enjoy every day. Our simple leasing process will save you time by choosing the home that feels right for you-all from the comfort of where you are, 24/7. For more information about apartment communities available in Northern California, visit www.woodmontrentals.com

O & M Apartments 680 Indiana Street | San Francisco, CA 94107

Dogpatch is one of San Francisco's most vibrant and diverse neighborhoods, filled with a mix of galleries, brew pubs and wine bars, artisanal cafe's and restaurants, working factories and one of a kind shops-plus, it’s one of the sunniest locations in San Francisco! Living here, you’re close to Potrero Hill, Mission Bay and Downtown San Francisco. Call or text us today to book your private tour!

OFFICE HOURS:
Monday- Friday 9:30 am to 5:00 pm (Live Video & Virtual Tours)
Saturday 10:30 am to 4:00 pm (Live Video & Virtual Tours)
Sunday 12:30 pm to 4:45 pm (Live Video & Virtual Tours)
Please call or text us at  
 to self-schedule from your phone!
Online Leasing Available 24/7

FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES: • Beautiful white quartz countertops • Stainless steel appliances in all homes • Energy efficient LED lighting throughout • Designer wood cabinetry with soft close drawers • Wood flooring throughout all homes • In-home Bosch washer & dryer • Soaking tubs • Ceramic tile backsplash in bathrooms • Grohe kitchen & bath fixtures

PROPERTY AMENITIES: • 2 rooftop decks with 360 bay & city views • Outdoor lounges with fire pits • 3 BBQ stations with Viking grills & outdoor dining • Package receiving • On-site cafe - Noon All Day - from the owners of Piccino • Available garage parking with EV charging stations • Bicycle friendly with on-site bike storage • Pet families welcome • Adjacent to Dogpatch Arts Plaza • 100% smoke free community

~NEW Community Rewards Resident Program!

• Major employers: Dropbox, Pinterest, UCSF, UBER, Lyft & Kaiser
• Nearby dog parks, restaurants & nightlife
• Nearby Zip Cars & Ford Bike station

name: Furnished room- utilities & internet included, short term available!
body:
Now available in NoPa! A new coliving community from Starcity- intentionally designed with brand new interiors, our NoPa community could soon be your new home. So, what’s coliving? Coliving is helping to bring community back to the city. Our NoPa home was designed with community at the forefront. From the cozy media lounge to the  beautifully landscaped backyard, you and your new housemates will be set up with the perfect space for building new memories. Monthly rent covers:- Your private room furnished with a queen or full-sized bed, nightstand, lamp, and rug - Well-equipped communal kitchen and dining area- Weekly housekeeping of all communal areas (including cleaning and stocking all shared bathrooms!)- All utilities, including high-speed internet!- Washer and dryer- Sponsored community events and/or dinnersThe building features 10 bedrooms in total with 4 on the first floor and 6 on the second. There are two shared bathrooms on each floor with one bedroom containing an additional private bathroom. The neighborhood has something to offer for everyone- from historic music venues like the Independent, to swanky new arcades like Emporium, to Michelin Guide restaurants like Bar Crudo or Barvale. Stop by Bi-rite to pick up your groceries before heading home or just take them for a picnic in Alamo Square. Need to get downtown? Hop on the 5 or 21 Muni lines and you’ll be there in no time! Plus to make things easier, extra help like private room cleanings and additional furniture rentals are also available.----------Starcity’s mission is to make great cities more accessible to everyone by creating comfortable community homes.Learn more about Starcity here: starcity.com

Miraloma Neighborhood.    Muni bus is 3 minutes away via walking and then takes you to Forrest Hill Station to take you to the Financial District.  Freeway near by.  

*

Please read and agree to all ad terms and conditions including total move in cost paid by the Renter or Company.    

*

Nice and quiet neighborhood

*

Beautiful 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath home.  Upgraded kitchen with dishwasher, gas stove, wine refrigerator, and much more.    Dining room directly from the kitchen and extends out to a very large deck with amazing viesws.  Large living room with views and with a fireplace.  

You walk into the first floor with a half bathroom, large living room, dining room, kitchen and large deck. 

Then you walk upstairs to two large bedrooms.   Master fits a California King and second bedroom fits a king size and bathroom with a Shower.

Then you walk down to the living room floor and go through the garage that fits a mid size SUV and has plenty of storage and washer and dryer and then you take stairs down from the garage to a very large media room or third bedroom or family room and or large office.   This floor extends out to a large deck and backyard.  Jacuzzi is on the deck floor.  

Quiet and peaceful neighborhoods and great for walking and hiking areas near by.   Recreation park is near by.

You pay all utilities; water, garbage, gas, electric, cable and wifi

Pet yes with $500 pet deposit

body:
This one bedroom, one bath apartment (in a Victorian building with 3 units) with private deck and access to a lovely backyard filled with palms and a lemon tree is available for the month of December. name: 1542 Hayes St #C, San Francisco
body:
Upgraded and Furnished 2 BR Flat Like Apt in North Panhandle!

Nicely upgraded and spacious 2 BR 1 BA flat-like apt located near Panhandle. Unit is on the 2nd floor and is a quiet unit. Freshly painted apartment. Lots of natural light throughout. Kitchen space was recently remodeled and upgraded with granite countertops, spacious wooden cabinets, and stainless steel appliances i.e. gas stove/oven, range hood, refrigerator, and sink with disposal. Nice hardwood flooring throughout unit. Open kitchen space adjacent to dining nook and living room. Nice sized living room opens up to private patio deck. Bedrooms of good size with closet space. Recently upgraded full sized bathroom with like new fixtures and tub. Additional closet space/storage space throughout apt as well. Shared laundry room with W/D. Option to be fully furnished/unfurnished. Located in North Panhandle and few blocks away from Golden Gate Park. Divisadero St shops, restaurants, and banks are near. Haight Asbury shops and restaurants also near. Bi-Rite, Falleti's, Luckys, Trader Joes, Target and Whole Foods are close by. SF Muni Lines (7, 21,24,33 and 43) within short distance. Easy freeway access to 101/Bay Bridge and Golden Gate Bridge. St Marys Hospital and CPMC Davies Hospital within 1 mile.

To schedule a showing, please contact Janis Brown  
.

For more available listings, please contact us at  
 or visit us at www.FADCAL.com

Hardwood floors throughout. Private patio terrace off of the living room. Small Dining space for table and chairs. Bedrooms located on the Second Floor and are of Good Size with Lots of Closet Space. body:
Beautiful view from the living room, conveniently located in the sunny Potrero Hill, has a great access to both SF financial district and South Bay. 

Unit
- 2 level unit - 1,400 sqft
- 2 indoor parking spaces in the complex w/ elevator access
- Hardwood floors
- Main level – 2 complete bedrooms, bathroom (shower over tub, toilet & sink), kitchen, living/dining space 
- Upper level – Master bedroom with a large walk-in closet and a bathroom (standalone shower, shower over tub, toilet & sink) , W/D and a storage
- Spacious gourmet kitchen with frigidaire stainless steel appliances, granite counter top & modern cabinets
- Bosch washer/dryer in unit 
- Gas fire place 
- Storage unit available in front of the parking
- 1 bicycle storage available
- On site security
- No smoking
- No pets
- New carpets(not yet reflected in photos herein)

Building Amenities
- Security guard on site
- Key pad entries 
- Courtyard
- Club house 
- Mail room

Location 
- Great sunny neighborhood with convenient access 
- Near Whole Foods, restaurants, coffee shops and stores 
- One minute walk to 22nd St Cal Train Station 
- Easy transportation to Downtown/Financial District. 10min to drive. Muni T-line stop is only 5 min away. 
- Near Esprit Park 
- Easy 101& 280 access. Two minute drive to Cesar Chavez exit/entrance.

Rent / Term 
- $5250 per month 
- Security Deposit $5250
- 12 months lease
- Available now

name: 601 Van Ness Avenue #1044, San Francisco
body:
Fully Furnished 1BR 1BA Top Floor Condo at The Opera Plaza! 

Kitchen with Granite Countertops, Electric Stove, Dishwasher, Microwave, French Refrigerator, and Sink. Living room with Sofa, TV, Coffee Table, Chair and Half, and Bookshelf. Private patio terrace off of the living room. Small Dining space with table and chairs. Bedroom of Good Size with Queen Bed and Closet Space. Carpeting Throughout the Unit. Full sized bathroom with Tub. Parking Space is Available. Swimming Pool, Jacuzzi, Sauna, and Gym Facilities. Modern Laundry Room located on same level. Located at the end of the Fillmore District, close to Civic Center. City Hall, Downtown SF and FiDi are nearby. SF Muni Lines within short distance (5,7,47,49). Civic Center BART also close. Easy freeway access to 101/280 and Bay Bridge. CPMC Van Ness Ave Campus and SF General Zuckerberg Hospital within 2 miles. 

To schedule a showing, please contact Oud Sapprasert  
.

Owner pays Water, Garbage, Basic TV, and Wifi. Tenant pays PG&E and other services incurred. Must have good credit, and 3x rent income. No Smoking and No Pets please.

name: 1124 Sutter St, San Francisco
body:
Great Commercial Space in Prime Lower Nob Hill near Polk St!

750 square feet of great commercial space in Prime Lower Nob Hill. Bright and spacious throughout. Lower basement level has 1882 square feet of storage space, per architectural drawings. Main floor level has bathroom with shower quarters, toilet, and sink. Street Parking.

Located in Prime Lower Nob Hill. Near Polk Gulch and three blocks from Van Ness Avenue. French Bakery, Subway and local market right next door. Downtown SF, Financial District, North Beach and Chinatown are close by. Trader Joes and Whole Food grocery stores are up the street. SF Muni Lines (2,3,19,47, and 49) nearby. name: 1542 Hayes St #B, San Francisco
body:
Remodeled 2BR Apt In North Panhandle!

Recently remodeled 2BR 1BA apt in the heart of North Panhandle. Upgraded modern kitchen with beautiful and spacious white cabinets, granite countertops, along with upgraded Stainless Steel appliances, i.e. Gas Stove/oven, Range Hood, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, and Sink with disposal. Built in eat-in nook adjacent to the living room and kitchen space. Nice open Living room with lots of natural light and opens up to private patio deck. Both bedrooms of good size with closets. Lots of natural light and windows throughout the unit. Remodeled full sized bathroom with like new fixtures and tub. Nice large and shared backyard. Shared coin laundry room in building. Lots of street parking. Conveniently located near Haight Ashbury shops, restaurants and banks. Divisadero St shops and restaurants are also close by. Golden Gate Park is just down the street. Lucky's, Trader Joes, and Target are near. SF Muni Lines (21,24, and 43) within a few blocks. Easy freeway access to 101/Bay Bridge and 19th Ave/Golden Gate Bridge. St Marys and UCSF Hospitals are within 1 mile.

name: 733 Garfield St, San Francisco
body:
Newly Remodeled SFH w/Hardwood Flrs Throughout, New Appliances, and More!

Beautifully remodeled house with hardwood floors throughout and open kitchen. Upstairs features spacious and bright living room with a decorative electric fireplace. Two good size bedrooms. A bathroom has skylight, lighted mirror, and motion sensor light. Kitchen with new stainless steel appliances: dishwasher, garbage disposal, gas stove/oven, and double-door refrigerator plus stood island with granite countertops and a skylight. Downstairs features a nice family room plus a office space that can be used as a 3rd bedroom plus full bath. Extra space in laundry area which can be used for workout/painting/video game space. Located in the Ingleside District, close to Stonestown Galleria Mall and Serramonte and Westlake Shopping Centers. Easy freeway access to 101/Golden Gate Bridge and 19th Ave to 280. SF Muni Lines (29 and M Car Train) within few blocks. UCSF Parnassus and SF General Zuckerberg Hospitals within 2 miles.

.

name: HUGE 2 bedrooms/2 baths Pac Hghts PRIVATE PATIO + FIREPLACE +BAY VIEWS
body:
This gorgeous HUGE 2 bedrooms with 2 large bathrooms apartment home is located at 2140 Pacific Avenue in prime Pacific Heights...steps to all Fillmore Street shopping!

As you walk into your apartment you enter a large foyer which leads to the living room and separate spacious dining room. The dining room has gorgeous French Doors which lead to the units PRIVATE outdoor PATIO!!

The foyer and dining room have designer lighting fixtures in keeping with the buildings style and grace. The master bedroom has a large en-suite bathroom with separate bathtub and shower. This unit also has lots of closet space (including a large walk-in closet in the master bedroom) and telecom system to allow guests to enter the building lobby. 

Enormous picture windows allow for tons of light. With 10' ceilings throughout, original crown moldings, newly refinished hardwood floors and an enormous wood-burning FIREPLACE, this apartment has the grace of the 1920's style. 

This unit features a fabulous and large kitchen with BRAND-NEW all full size and STAINLESS appliances including: Including Bosch Refrigerator, stove/oven, garbage disposal and dishwasher!

In addition, this apartment home has STUNNING views of the BAY and Pacific Heights!

2140 Pacific Avenue includes both a resident elevator, as well as a service elevator. In addition, the buildings roof deck has lounge chairs, with stunning San Francisco and Golden Gate Bridge Views!

To view this unit please contact the on-site manager, Kathleen, at  

For more building information please visit our website at www.copelandparkproperties.com
No pets please. 

2140 Pacific Avenue received a 92% on walking score! Please visit http://www.walkscore.com/score/2140-pacific-ave-san-francisco-ca-94109

*In building parking available for $250.00 
*Included in Rent: Heat, Water, Trash, Sewer, Free Bike Storage 
*Please note: This unit is dedicated as smoke-free
*Pictures below of building, actual apartment home and actual views from the unit

name: Remodeled studio w/ Bay View in prime Pacific Heights HARDWOOD FLOORS
body:
This completely REMODELED and spacious studio is located at the Broadway Crown Towers Apartments in prime Pacific Heights (on Broadway Street). This unit features gorgeous hardwood floors throughout, a fully REMODELED kitchen including all full-size appliances: maple wood cabinetry, refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, garbage disposal and DISHWASHER! In addition, this apartment home has a dinette room attached to the kitchen (tons of cabinetry in the kitchen) and a large bathroom. Huge bay window in the main living room give lots of light to the entire apartment. Lovely Bay Views can be seen from the main living room. In addition, this unit has a huge walk-in closet (with window) which residents often use as their bedroom due to its large size. This unit is on the north side of the building making it very private and picturesque. This unit also looks upon the gorgeous gardens of Pacific Heights. 

To view this unit please contact the on-site manager Egan at  

For more building information please visit our website at copelandparkproperties.com
No pets please. 

Located in Prime Pacific Heights, 1770 Broadway is a one of a kind, stately 1920's building. Boasting a large marble entrance, 1770 Broadway is located between Gough and Franklin Street. 1770 Broadway is within walking distance of many of San Francisco's finest restaurants, coffee shops, and public transportation accessing the entire Bay Area (available on Van Ness...one block to the east.

name: 1860 Golden Gate Ave - All New Renovated 3BD! Available Now!
body:
1860 Golden Gate Avenue is located in the Alamo Square District of San Francisco with convenient access to restaurants, shopping, and good transportation. This unit has three (3) bedrooms and one (1) full bath. It is newly remodeled with new paint, new hardwood floors, and new kitchen with stainless steel appliances that includes refrigerator, oven/range, microwave and dishwasher. Washer/dyer hook-ups are available in the laundry room inside the unit. Pets like a dog or a cat are welcome with an additional deposit plus $75 per month pet rent. Water, sewer, and garbage are included in the rent. No parking and no access to backyard. Property Management Systems (Agent) believes all information contained herein to be correct but assumes no legal responsibility for the accuracy, any errors, or any omissions. name: 1BD/1BA Top Floor in a Classic Richmond Bldg - Available Now!
body:
600 33rd Avenue is a classic Richmond building with moderately sized units located at the corner of Anza Street and 33rd Avenue in the Richmond District of San Francisco with convenient access to restaurants, shopping, and public transportation. Unit #6 is on the top floor of two (2) floors of a seven (7) unit building and features hardwood floors, window blinds throughout the unit. With a long entrance hallway, several closets and a large living room with views of the Richmond district, this versatile, top floor apartment features an eat-in kitchen with tiled counters, built-in shelving and newer appliances. Water, sewer, garbage and one (1) assigned garage parking space is included in the rent; there is coin operated laundry on the premises and we are sorry, but this property does not allow pets. Garage parking is subject to actual verification by testing the vehicle prior to initiation of tenancy. To be eligible for garage parking, the vehicle must fit completely in the garage parking space without hindering other vehicles access.

name: Charming 1 BR Garden Apt in Hayes Valley
body:
In these uncertain times, you have found a retreat! This is a one-of-a-kind 1BR apt with eat-in kitchen, huge closet in bedroom, full bath, living room and additional study/desk area plus separate private laundry room and an exclusive patio (120 sqft - plenty of room to bbq!) off a quiet one-way alley in a super convenient and desirable Hayes Valley location. 

This downstairs unit in a private home has two private entrances and is bathed in lots of light through the windows and glass doors leading to its own private patio. While it's the downstairs unit in a two unit building, because of the configuration and privacy, it is much more like your very own cottage in the city. Quiet owners seek very responsible, QUIET tenants only -- no big parties, no loud music. 

An easy walk to Civic Center, 2 blocks to Hayes and Haight Street bus lines and a short walk to MUNI Metro. Permit street parking only, but plenty of safe space for bikes on private patio or in laundry room. Octavia Blvd and 101 freeway access two blocks away. A short walk to Patricia's Green and Hayes Street shops and restaurants - a true foodie's paradise.

Separate utilities. No pets. No smoking. Available now! 1st month's rent and one month security deposit. Excellent credit required. One year lease. This unit has a history of being cherished by long term tenants. Freshly painted now, and available for only the second time in 6 years.

Email owner for private showings.

name: New offers available for 1 bedroom at Avalon Mission Bay
body:
We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive.

 In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon at Mission Bay offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and townhomes. Imagine entertaining in gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and Energy Star appliances. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include two multi-level state-of-the-art fitness centers, resident lounge areas, and courtyards with barbecue grills and bocce ball court. Our community is conveniently located in vibrant SoMa, just a block from AT&T Park, home of the San Francisco Giants. On-site retail, including Chase Bank and Bark Avenue Doggy Daycare, along with nearby Safeway, Bluxome Street Winery, Lucky Strike, and Alexander's Steakhouse, puts shopping, dining, and entertainment within reach.

-Green Community
-Wood Floors
-Washer/ Dryer
-24 hour Maintenance
-Stainless Appliances
-Lounge
-Patio/ Balcony
-Fitness Center
-Public Transportation
-Package Acceptance
-High-speed Internet
-Pet Friendly

Call:  

Visit www.avalon-communities.com/avalon-mission-bay to learn more.

Prices and availability are subject to change.
