name: Quiet 1 bedroom - Top Floor, Natural Light - Available Now
body:
Lower Nob Hill location. This is the best unit in the building. Located on the top floor, this is a wonderful 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom corner unit that receives great natural light. The kitchen was recently updated with a new gas range appliance, new floors and freshly painted cabinets. Refinished hardwood floors throughout, new vanity and cabinet in the bathroom. There is plenty of closet storage space, plus, built in shelving that compliments that classic, crown molded interior living spaces. This is a beautiful apartment.
Extremely desirable neighborhood with many great shops, bars and restaurants. Walk or ride to anywhere in the City from this central and convenient location.
Highlights:
•	Beautiful one-bedroom/one-bathroom apartment
•	Recently remodeled kitchen with new gas range and flooring 
•	Updated bathroom
•	Extra hallway closet
•	Refinished hardwood floors throughout and freshly painted walls
•	Secure access-controlled entry gate
•	Rental rate includes water and garbage utility 
Walk score of 99 – walker’s paradise to restaurants, shops, grocer and open space parks.
Transit score of 100 – close to public transportation, corporate buses, light rail and rideshare.
The building is well maintained with an on-site manager. No smoking & no pets. 1-year lease required.

name: Large Multi-level Loft in SOMA
body:
Move in Bonus!

*1-month FREE rent! The price listed is the average rent over a 12-month period; 30 days will be $0 and the remaining rent will be $5,200/mo

52 Rausch #202 is a spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom multi-level loft with an open living area and kitchen and tall windows that capture tons of natural light. 

Two bedrooms situated on the upper level and one bedroom on the lower floor. 

This unique unit has radiant floor heating, sealed concrete countertops; stainless steel sink basins, birch veneer cabinets and drawers, stainless steel appliances including a 5-burner gas range. 

Complete with an outside space and in-unit laundry.

Situated on a peaceful tree-lined street in SoMa and part of the historic Mullen Building complex that was built in 1920 and boasts a Walk Score of 97. 

Surrounded by trendy restaurants, clubs, and tech companies, conveniently located near downtown and close to Caltrain and BART with easy access to the freeways. 

Enjoy all the new cafes, breweries and small eateries that are popping up in this vibrant neighborhood of SoMa. 

Photos are of a similar unit. 

UNIT FEATURES:

• 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
• Kitchen features sealed concrete countertops, birch veneer cabinets and drawers, stainless steel appliances including 5-burner gas range
• Bathrooms with stainless steel sink basins; Kohler fixtures; showers over tubs with natural stone surrounds, mirrored medicine cabinets, upper-level bathroom also features natural stone floors
• Polished concrete floors on the lower level, carpet in the upper bedroom
• Radiant floor heating
• Washer/dryer in unit
• WebPass high-speed internet available for $50 per month
• Parking available for $350 per month
• Pets considered on an individual basis with pet rent and additional deposit

BUILDING FEATURES:

• Part of the historic Mullen Buildings complex
• Intercom entry system
• Located on desirable and peaceful tree-lined side street
• Walk Score of 97, Transit Score 100, Bike Score 97
• Close to Mid-Market, BART, and Muni
• Immediate neighborhood includes Spyglass Coffee, Deli Board, Harvest Urban
• Market, Twitter, and Square
• 3 blocks to Yerba Buena

name: This home is currently available for long or short term rental
body: You will find this warm and cozy single level home a gem in the neighborhood called Lakewood Hills. This bright and cheery home has been updated and offers unique features, including a custom walk-in closet and remodeled master bath. The master bedroom also provides access to the backyard with its Heavenly Greens lawn and outdoor living area. Perfect for the next family reunion. The country yellow exterior and the manicured front yard adds to the curb appeal of this home. Multiple walking paths meander through a park-like setting with tree-lined streets, tennis courts, a community swimming pool, and two lakes that are home to teams of wildlife year-round. Swans, Egrets, Cormorants, ducks, deer, and an occasional blue fox visit this fantastic setting. The nearby Windsor Town Green offers locals a variety of entertainment from music to movies and a farmers market.

name: Furnished swanky Alamo Sq Studio facing Park, walk to Tech Shuttle
body:
Price varies by duration of stay:

12+ month lease: $3,990* / mo
6 to 12 month lease: $3,990* / mo
2 to 6 month lease: $3,190* / mo
1 to 2 month lease: $2,790/ mo

Prices quoted are applicable only if billed upfront for the entire duration of the contract. Rates are up to 9% higher if billed monthly. Prices are exclusive of any taxes or utilities.

Follow the link to book online!
https://www.theblueground.com/furnished-apartments-san-francisco-bay-area-usa/san-francisco-alamo-square-114?utm_source=classified-8

Show up and start living from day one in San Francisco with this stylish studio Blueground
apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and
fully-equipped Alamo Square home. (ID #SFO114)

Designed With You In Mind

Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your comfortable living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Alamo Square apartment has to offer. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Sleeping Arrangements

-Queen Bed, 63in/160cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio apartment include an on-site:

  - Pet Friendly
  - Elevator

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.
Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.
We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished rental is located on Alamo Square, famously known for its iconic Victorian architecture and amazing park views. Centered on its namesake park, it offers a variety of restaurants and shops that local enjoy on a daily basis. On weekends, picnickers spend their mornings on the slope of the park, relaxing alongside the famous “Painted Ladies”. Divisadero Street is only minutes away and serves the neighborhood with a great mix of dining, grocery, and merchant fronts. San Francisco Airport is only a 30-minute car drive away.

A Few Things To Note

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.

name: Roommate Needed in 3 Bedroom House
body:
Hi apartment viewers! We have a room available in our 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom house starting May 1st. 
The room is 12x8 feet; with a built in cabinet that can be used as a dresser. Personal closet is available right outside the room.  
The house is fully furnished with plenty of storage space available. Common spaces include a living room right next to the available bedroom and a very large kitchen with a stainless steel fridge, brand new gas oven/stove, and new dishwasher. The kitchen has plenty of counter space for cooking and several spacious cabinets. The bathroom is shared by all tenants and features dual sinks and tub with brand new showerhead. There is a washer/dryer and garbage/recycling/compost on site.

Rent for the room is $1,092.69 per month; security deposit is $1,131.67. Utilities average about $45-85 each month. Internet speed is over 100 megabits, and is $20/month per person. 

About your future roommates: We are two young professionals (one M, one F) in our mid-20s. One works for a tech company, and the other works for a luxury retail brand. Our house is pretty chill. We all have our own lives, but are always down to hang out at home on any given night.
The house is a quiet and relaxing retreat for us once we get off work or have had a busy weekend out with friends. We are people that keep things clean and would like someone who will take initiative to help out around the house (such as taking out the trash, emptying the dishwasher, cleaning the common spaces). Our landlord lives a few houses down from us and is always available to help with maintenance issues or any other problems we may have.

About the neighborhood: the house is located in Silver Terrace (near Portola), close to bus routes 8, 9, 24, & 44. The 44 will take you to the Glen Park BART station. There are a few grocery stores, restaurants, and gas stations within walking distance of the house. Street parking is available throughout the neighborhood, and the house is easily accessible to the 101 & 280 freeways.

If you have any questions about the room, the house, or the roommates please feel free to reach out. Since the Bay Area is going through a very difficult time right now, if you are interested in the room, we can schedule a virtual (Skype/Zoom/Facetime) apartment showing. We would love to get to know you and share more about ourselves.

*Disclaimer: No pets are allowed and this room is for single occupancy only!

name: Huge Penthouse Near UCSF/Mission Bay, Video Tour, 2 View Decks, More!
body:
VIDEO TOUR:  https://youtu.be/vXvqHY44iuY 

** PLEASE NOTE **
Private viewing available, email us for details:
when responding please include a short note stating the total number of people in your party, their relationship to you, and your employment situation/source of income. we are seeking tenants with good credit and references. thanks.
--------------

Live in one of SF's most vibrant, diverse and evolving neighborhoods - Bayview - in this high quality, newly remodeled home. 

The home:
* huge bright and open living/dining/kitchen area, 24' x 16' is perfect for entertaining! 
* large and open kitchen features granite counters, beautiful white cabinets, gas range/hood, dishwasher, disposal, new stainless steel fridge 
* massive master bedroom suite upstairs, 550 square feet, with in suite bathroom incl. large jacuzzi tub and separate shower, office area and 2 view decks! 
* 2 additional large bedrooms with spacious closets and good light, 15.5' x 12' and 13.5' x 12'
* freshly painted with custom colors 
* beautiful refinished white washed oak wood floors, tile in baths 
* second full size bathroom with tub off hallway 
* 2 large private decks with downtown and bay views! 
* recently built in 2001, including central/forced heat 
* in unit washer/dryer 
* unit ~ 1700 square feet and very well laid out 
* well maintained, secure 3 unit building 
* quiet and friendly street 
* secure storage room available for $80
* sorry no pets/animals; non-smokers only, pleased 
* available May 1 

VIDEO TOUR:  https://youtu.be/vXvqHY44iuY 

About Bayview:
* rapidly evolving neighborhood with hip cafes, new restaurants, cultural and nature based amenities
* 1 block to the 3rd Street T-Line which takes you straight to Downtown, Dogpatch nightlife/dining, UCSF Mission Bay Bio-Medical Campus, CalTrain Station at 4th/Townsend. S.F. Bus lines 23, 24, 44, 54 very close by. 
* easy access to 101 and 280 freeways, and SFO airport
* walking distance to: Starbucks coffee, Flora Grubb Gardens/Ritual Coffee, All Good Pizza, Roadhouse coffee, Bayview Opera House, Tato, Radio Africa Kitchen, several cool Microbreweries, Walgreens, supermarkets, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, post office, the new Bayview Library, etc., etc.
* one of SF's sunniest neighborhoods!
* awesome parks and green spaces nearby like: Heron Head Eco Park, Bayview Park, Candlestick Point Rec Area, India Basin Shoreline Park.
* massive new high end developments coming online nearby in The Shipyard, Candlestick Park, Warriors new stadium and Pier 70, which will make the southern area of SF vibrant with new retail, housing and fantastic parks reaching the bay.
* Bayview won CurbedSF 2016 and last year's 2015 neighborhood of the year awards!
2016: http://sf.curbed.com/2017/1/3/14154404/san-francisco-neighborhood-year-bayview
2015: http://sf.curbed.com/archives/2016/01/04/all_hail_bayview_the_curbed_cup_neighborhood_of_the_year.php
-------------

** PLEASE NOTE **
Private viewing available, email us for details:
when responding please include a short note stating the total number of people in your party, their relationship to you, and your employment situation/source of income. we are seeking tenants with good credit and references. thanks.

As you enter the home you are greeted by an open floor plan living room and dining room combination with hardwood floors.  The kitchen is also open to the living area and has high-end stainless steel appliances including four-burner gas range, dishwasher, and new refrigerator. The kitchen has counters, a tile backsplash, a deep sink and high end cabinets. Has GE washer/dryer in unit. Building amenities include a beautiful rooftop terrace which spans the length of the whole building, giving residents breathtaking city views as well as access to a communal barbecue area, outdoor fire pit and patio furniture.Enjoy all that San Francisco has to offer and the vibrant Mission at your doorstep. BART, Muni, tech shuttles, and freeways are all very accessible. Close to shops, parks, restaurants, and coffee shops, the location has a Walk Score of 97, a Transit Score of 100, and a Bike Score of 98. name: 2bd/1ba Lots of natural light, private balcony
body:
Enjoy the sunny side of San Francisco!  Modern upgrades and interior design throughout.
•	Bright, renovated apartment with modern upgrades and tasteful interior design.
•	2 bedrooms: hardwood floors, closets, large windows with natural light.
•	1 bath: recently remodeled, tub and shower, natural stone, large space.
•	Gourmet kitchen: gas stove, granite countertops, custom cabinetry, dishwasher, garbage disposal, refrigerator. 
•	Hardwood floors with detailed inlay and angelic accents in the archways.
•	Sun drenched living room
•	Wood burning fireplace with gas starter
•	Private outdoor balcony overlooking Jackson Park is the perfect place for a evening glass of wine
•	Semi-private back deck overlooking enclosed courtyard is the perfect place for morning coffee (common space)
•	Common laundry room within the building
•	Walk score: 94
•	Rent: $4,975 per month.  Deposit: $9,000 
•	Available: March 1 for 1 year lease
•	Application: recent credit report, proof of income, driver's license, and two references plus $50 application fee for background check.

Showings by appointment.

Outstanding Neighborhood
•	View of Jackson Park across the street: 2 baseball diamonds
•	Close to community garden.
•	Walking distance to Whole Foods, Safeway, and Rainbow Grocery Cooperative.  Less than a mile to Trader Joe’s and Costco.
•	Walking distance to great Zagat-rated restaurants:  Plow for brunch, Chez Maman (French), Mochica (Peruvian), Papito (Mexican), Parker (Californian), Umi (Japanese), Goat Hill Pizza, Sunflower Vietnamese, JB’s Place, Skool, Sally’s, Rocketfish, Ganim’s Market, and Live Sushi Bar. (Select list.)
•	Walking distance to coffee shops:  Starbucks, Philz Coffee, Chatz Roasting Company, Linea Caffe Roastery, Steep Brew…
•	Walking distance to fun neighborhood bars:  Bottom of the Hill (live music), Thee Parkside (live music), Blooms saloon (sports bar), and Project One (gallery). (Select list.)
•	Close to public transportation: 16th St. Mission Station (~1 mile), Cal Train Station (~1 mile), Muni routes (10, 19, 22) and light rail (KT).
•	Easy access to freeways (101 and 280 at Mariposa) to drive to the South Bay, Peninsula, or Stanford.
•	Easy access to Google Bus within 1 block walk (Jackson Playground: Muni Bus Stop at Thee Parkside Bar).
•	Quick walk/drive to great employers: Adobe, Zynga, Sega, USCF Medical Center / Mission Bay, California Institute for Quantitative Biosciences, Design Center, and California Culinary Academy.
•	~1 mile to AT&T Park.  Close enough to walk, but far from the traffic.

Description

    Preview a custom video walk through of this property: https://youtu.be/Bxn6tJGgwrA

(UPDATE: Our team is delighted to hear from prospective new residents and we are making every (safe!) effort to virtually or remotely show our properties.)

Upscale 1bd/1ba Marina condo is pet friendly and includes parking. Unit offers a open concept floor plan with updated finishes throughout. Centrally located a half block from Moscone field park - with tennis courts and public library and only a few blocks from renown Chestnut St shops, restaurants, cafes, Union St, Crissy Field and Fort Mason. Close to nearby public transportation and just minutes to the Golden Gate Bridge. 

Unit Includes:

•	Laminate hardwood floor through out
•	Updated kitchen with Electric Range/Oven, SS Fridge, Dishwasher, Plenty of     cabinet space
•	Light and airy open Living/Dining room area with fireplace looks over shared yard.
•	Large bedroom with 2 closet area with built-ins
•	Bathroom has stand up shower & single vanity 
•	Garage parking with deeded space
•	Shared Laundry room area in building
•	Roof Deck w Bay and GGB Views
•	Shared Yard - With space to lounge and BBQ

Property is available NOW for minimum 12 month lease.  Please expect a $300 move-in and move-out coordination fee required by the HOA.

Pet may be considered on a case-by-case basis for qualified applicants, unless otherwise noted. Separate Pet Profile/Pet Application is required for each pet. (Assistive animals are always permitted with legal documentation.) No smoking. Please expect a $47.50 application processing fee per adult. Renter's Liability Insurance required.

With full appliances, beautiful city views, cable and high- speed Internet accessible, we have everything you could possibly want from a modern apartment community! name: Modern Open-Concept 4-Bedroom Alamo Square Flat
body:
Available May 1st: 

The apartment is an "owners-unit" with high end finishes and appliances - open concept, modern, and no expense spared upon renovation.  4 bedroom, 2 bath flat on the top floor of a two unit building. 

The flat features high ceilings, new windows with original trim, new wood floors, open concept great room with a chef's kitchen/living/dining space, four bedrooms, two modern baths, laundry room and a great yard. The flat has plenty of space and lots of natural light.

Located in NOPA, one of the most centrally located and hottest neighborhoods in the city. Only a couple blocks from Alamo Square and the famous painted ladies, and walking distance to Golden Gate Park. There are countless restaurants, bars, coffee shops and buses right outside the door, including: 
https://www.chefico.com/
https://emporiumsf.com/
https://www.littlestarpizza.com/
http://www.themillsf.com/
http://www.biritemarket.com/
http://nopasf.com/


One garage parking spot available for an additional $250. 

* Smoking not allowed.

*** Storage unit available in the basement

body: Stunning Top Floor unit in 2 unit building in prime Pacific Heights.  Recent major renovation of unit and building.  Large 2 Bedroom one Bath @ 1,200 sq.ft. +. Bay views, Fireplace , Hardwood Floors, Solid Maple Cabinets, Vermont Slate Tile Kitchens, Hand made Italian & Subway Tile Bathrooms including full walls and tile floors, Double Pane sound proof windows, updated heat and electrical. name: Prime Russian Hill Charming Edwardian Remodel
body:
Prime Russian Hill Charming Edwardian style Remodeled One-bedroom unit for rent on 1St. floor in 3-floor building.  Some views of North Beach and the bay.  Walking distance to the Financial District & North Beach with all that has to offer.  Unit is small only 550 + sq.ft.) but very nice and consists of Master Bedroom w/ walk in closet, good size Living Room.   Complete remodel of unit and lots of upgrades to building.  Brand new bathroom w/ Subway tile shower over tub, glass doors, nice floor tile, living room, all new gourmet kitchen w/ bar, laundry one floor below.  Lots of period detail including, hardwood floors, crown molding and period trim. New stainless Steel fixtures and appliances through out.  Unit is virtually Brand New!  Gourmet Kitchen w/gas burner stove, oven, fridge + wine cooler, microwave, dishwasher, icemaker and filtered water plus dining island/bar.  Tons of storage in unit and basement.  Brand new Washer and Dryer in basement.   Tenant pays all utilities. First month and Last month plus small deposit required to occupy. Prefer longer-term lease. Available March 15Th! body:
Our leasing office has gone virtual. As the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation has evolved, we have made changes to our business practices based on the latest public health recommendations. Our management office will remain open to serve our residents. However, we are temporarily ceasing all in-person property tours and meetings with prospective residents. Instead, we invite you to use our website to explore our community virtually. You may also call or email our leasing office to set up a virtual visit with one of our leasing professionals.

name: RENTED! Two-level Townhouse with large private deck! ~ J.Wavro
body:
San Francisco - Telegraph Hill - Townhouse for rent
RENTED! Two-level Townhouse with large private deck!
 Link to mobile layout:   http://www.jwavro.com/rental_details.php?id=33012518-0
Summary:
Rent: $4575
Bed / Bath: 2 / 2.5
Type: Townhouse
Term: 1 Year
Please contact:
Joanne Fazzino   |    show contact info
    |   www.jwavro.com

Description:

	RENTED!

	Beautifully remodeled 2 level townhouse with a large private deck -- great for entertaining -- a grill is allowed.

	Located on the N. Waterfront, near Hillstone's, Fog City Diner and the Embarcadero. Walk to the Financial District.

	The main level has a spacious living room with a fireplace, separate dining area and a remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances (stove, microwave and dishwasher) with granite counter tops. The appliances include a refrigerator, microwave, electric stove, dishwasher and disposal.

	There is a half bathroom (powder room) on the main level. The washer and dryer are in the laundry closet and there is a large 2nd hall closet for storage.

	There are two bedrooms upstairs and 2 bathrooms. One bedroom is the master suite with a private bathroom and walk through closet to the bathroom. In addition, there is a walk in closet in the hall plus a 2nd storage closet. 

	Refinished hardwood floors on the main level and recently installed carpet in the bedrooms. 

	Amenities in the building are 24 hour door person, a gym and roof deck. 

	Parking is available in the garage for $275/month. A storage locker comes with the garage.

	Available now. A dog will be considered (no cats please).

	 

	 
This is a non-smoking unit. Service or support animals which are necessary due to disability will be allowed.

Floors: Hardwood & Carpet
Kitchen: Gourmet
Laundry: In Unit
Outside area: Deck

Parking: Garage

Pets:   Dog    OK

DESCRIPTION: 
•REMODELED VICTORIAN TWO-STORY SINGLE FAMILY HOME WITH HUGE DECK! 
•Victorian Architecture with high ceilings 
•Large living room with wood-burning fireplace 
•New Hardwood (pergo) floors throughout the house 
•Remodeled eat-in, granite, gas kitchen with Center Island, X-large refrigerator, dishwasher and disposal

•Three large and remodeled tiled baths 
•Six bedrooms with generous closet spaces (living room can be  7th bedroom)

•Double pane windows and blinds 
•Recessed and custom lighting throughout the home 
•Telephone jacks and cable hookup in every room 
•Large and sunny shared outdoor space 
•Storage 
•Optional one or two-car, off-street, uncovered parking


LOCATION: 
A renovated Victorian, two-story home in one of the city's most delightful neighborhoods; Lower Pacific Heights. Trendy restaurants, shopping, and nightlife of Divisadero and Fillmore Streets are within walking distance from your new home. Public transportation is everywhere. A short, ten-minute drive to 280 or 101 freeways for a quick commute to the valley. The financial district is fifteen minutes away, and there are many private tech bus routes nearby. Walk Score: 96 
 

LEASE TERMS: 
1. Clean credit. 
2. First-month rent and a security deposit of one month's rent. 
3. The lease is for one year. 
4. The move-in date is anytime in April or May 1st.

name: MODERN 1X1 AT A NEW LOW PRICE!! SELF GUIDED TOURS AVAILABLE NOW!!
body:
Looking for the perfect location? Look no further! Park West offers it all!

We currently have apartment home #B309 available immediately! This one bedroom, one bath beauty is located on the third floor and consists of 644 square feet of living space. Your new home comes with an updated kitchen, stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, and a patio/balcony! No need to run to the Laundromat! Your new home comes with a washer and dryer in unit, saving you precious time for other things - like enjoying the neighborhood!

Park West is perfectly located with the Golden Gate Park in our backyard and downtown San Francisco just a bus ride away! Here you will enjoy the perfect blend of charm, comfort, a great location and outstanding service. You'll be just steps away from restaurants, shopping, public transportation, and the best sights of San Francisco.

Our office hours are Mon - Fri: 9:00AM - 6:00PM. Feel free to call at us at any time to make an appointment, or walk right in so we may show you our beautiful homes! Our leasing office can be accessed on the sidewalk fro, Funston St. Parking can also be found in the neighborhood or on Lincoln Ave. adjacent to Golden Gate Park!

That's not all - your new community offers you top amenities!

**Swimming pool
**Large sundeck and grilling area
**Pet friendly
**Dog park
**Fully-equipped fitness center
**And so much more!

DUE TO CURRENT CIRCUMSTANCES WE ARE CURRENTLY ONLY OFFERING SELF GUIDED TOURS TUES-THURS! PLEASE CONTACT USING INFORMATION FOUND BELOW IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO SCHEDULE A TOUR!

name: Charming 3bd House located across from the Presidio
body:
Video Tour:  https://youtu.be/zXD4Se51gl8
(cut and paste)

Charming 3bd/2.5bth, 2500 square foot house located directly across from the Presidio just below the Lyon Street stairs. 

Main Living Space:
-Located on the middle floor is a spacious living and dining room with fireplace, built in shelving and a deck with garden views. A half bathroom is also on this floor.

-The kitchen features plenty of counter and cabinet space and is fully equipped with full sized fridge, dishwasher and gas range.

Top Floor-2 beds 1/bth
-The upstairs includes two attic style bedrooms, each with great closet space.  The larger of the two rooms features a walk in closet and private deck.  A full bathroom sits between each bedroom.  Front loader washer and dryer is also located on this level.

Lower Floor-1bed/1bth
-The lower basement level includes one full bedroom with a full bathroom and direct access to the garage. Great as a guest bedroom, playroom or office.

There is not a garden or yard, but plenty of greenery views from the living room, decks and bedrooms.

Available now. NO PETS PLEASE.

Hill and Co. Leasing
Lisa Kim Jones

body:
Stunning  2BR, 1BA furnished flat in a four unit boutique building with courtyard. Hardwood floors, updated kitchen with granite counter, master bedroom, ensuite bathroom with tub and separate shower, private setting. Walk to high-end Fillmore retail / restaurants; near Cow Hollow, Union Street, Hayes Valley, all public transportation,   walk score 99, near Japantown, Cal Pacific Medical Center, UCSF Med Center, Mt Zion, Kaiser Hospital, private girls/ boys schools near, Marin day care , onsite parking available. Wifi ready

$4300/mo rent, security deposit one month rent , enter into a lovely foyer which opens into an expansive living room with a dining area. There are two generous sized bedrooms that are both on the sunny west side of the building. The guest bedroom/office has a full wall of mirrored closets and the opposite side is a full wall of classic windows. The master bedroom has French doors opening on a small outdoor balcony. The kitchen features granite countertops and a sleek, built-in breakfast nook. The brand new marble bathroom has both a stall shower and a separate bathtub. Hardwood floors and stylish furnishings all add to this wonderful property. There is a laundry room in the building and a washer dryer hook up in the apt.  Parking available at $325 per month. Pets considered with $400 deposit. Owner pays water/garbage

Available immediately

name: Bright one bedroom in Mission District
body:
Street Parking. Laundry off site. 

Live in the heart of the Mission. The flat is located on Lexington Street between Valencia & 19th street. You are on a quieter street in the Mission but still right in the middle of all the action. Excellent restaurants, bars, shops and nightlife just a few steps away.
Hardwood floors. Bedroom flows with natural light- excellent sun through out the day.  It has a heater and display nook. 

Bathroom has nickel brushed faucet and a dark wood medicine cabinet. 

The large kitchen has granite counter top stretching across the entire kitchen. Lots of cabinet and storage space. The unit comes with a stove/oven and large refrigerator/freezer. 

The building has a communal back yard. Currently there's a jasmine bush, a lime tree, and a few other plants. For those who have a green thumb you are more than welcome to create a garden of your own.

The Mission District is a hot and coming neighborhood. Indulge yourself to tons of eateries and fine restaurants. There are movie theaters, yoga & dance classes, shops, stores, community centers, and multiple Muni lines. 

BART is only 2 blocks away. Have a bicycle? You can leave it in the basement. If you work for tech companies such as Apple or Google, the employee bus pick up is just a few blocks away.

name: Quite-Light & Bright Suitcase Ready SOMA Exec-Corporate Full 1-Bedroom
body:
Sought after location in SOMA is our Fully Furnished & Equipped Light and Bright 1 Bedroom Condo.
It will come available as of April 15th.
Just a Short walk to Bart, Muni & Caltrain lines.
½ a block to Whole Foods, and 2 blocks to Target.

We usually go with a 12-month agreement, but especially catering to Doctors and other Medical Professionals we will consider even a 3, 4, or 6 month shorter-term stay.

Right on Folsom near 4th Street.
Easy walking to everywhere downtown.

*High-Speed Internet WiFi is set and Included.
*All cookware, dishware, and even starter condiments are there upon arrival.
*Microwave, Coffee Maker, Hot Water Pot, Iron, Ironing board and more are here.
*Stainless Steel with a Granite Top Kitchen awaits with an in-unit washer & dryer!
*Beautiful wood flooring and a Carpeted Queen Size Bedroom with a Walk-In Closet.
*Larger than normal, nicely tiled full bathroom with shower over tub.
*Light and bright with walls of windows to let in lots of natural light and fresh air.
*The building and the unit are only approximately 12 years old.
*You will find it Suitcase Ready with style and comfort, as an inclusive rate of $ 3700
*There is an Amazing Tropical Outdoor Center Courtyard to enjoy steps from your door.

For consideration, If interested and qualified, please reply with one very detailed email.  Due to current health care considerations viewings will not take place until April 15th.  This is a great condo in the perfect SOMA location and for those reasons, in the past, it has been easy for me to lease it out sight unseen when necessary. The photos attached have not been touched up at all, so what you see is what you get.

There are lots of scams here on Craigslist as we all know and this is not one of those.  After one email and one phone/video chat with me, you will see that easily and clearly.  This unit when it comes available always moves quickly.  UNIQUE: Because of how this unit sits in the back corner of the building overlooking a narrow side street, it is an extremely quiet unit the likes of what is hard to find anywhere in San Francisco. Stay Safe and be Well, like most problems, this too shall pass..  Enjoy Always!,    Rob

Cat OK, no dogs please.

AN EARTHQUAKE RETRO FIT BUILDING UPSTAIRS / DOWNSTAIRS APARTMENT COMBINATION WITH ELECTRIC CAR CHARGING CAPABILITY THAT HAS A 110 VOLT ELECTRICAL OULET IN THE ATTACHED GARAGE. BRAND NEW NEVER BEFORE USED SOLID OAK REFINISHED FLOORS, A SKYLIGHT, AND A BRAND NEW NEVER BEFORE USED NEW GENERAL ELECTRIC 4.8 CUBIC FOOT STAINLESS STEEL KITCHEN STOVE!

VERY LARGE, TOP FLOOR, 1100 SQUARE FOOT +, 1 - 2 BEDROOM FLAT WITH FANTASTIC VIEWS OF GOLDEN GATE PARK, DOWNTOWN, GOLDEN GATE BRIDGE, THE SAN FRANCISCO BAY AND MARIN HEADLANDS!

FREE STORAGE SPACE INCLUDED, NO COINS REQUIRED UNLIMITED WASHER + DRYER USE, ONE BLOCK FROM "GRAND VIEW" PARK. THERMOSTATED FURNACE HEATING DUCTS IN EVERY ROOM NOT "SPACE HEATERS."

AN ATTACHED GARAGE IS AVAILABLE WITH GENNIE REMOTE CONTROL AUTOMATIC DOOR OPENER FOR ONLY $100 PER MONTH. 110 ELECTRIC OUTLET TO CHARGE ELECTRIC CARS ALREADY IN PLACE IN THE GARAGE!

FIRST MONTHS RENT + 1.5 MONTHS DEPOSIT. NO APPLICATION FEE REQUIRED!

WALK TO GOLDEN GATE PARK, UCSF MEDICAL CENTER, 9TH + IRVING RESTAURANTS + SHOPS, THE "N" JUDHA STREET CAR LINE, ANDRONICO'S GOURMET SUPER MARKET, THE DE YOUNG MUSEUM AND THE CALIFORNIA ACADEMY OF SCIENCE. THIS IS THE VERY BEST INNER SUNSET LOCATION; NESTLED BETWEEN “GRAND VIEW PARK” ON ONE SIDE, AND A MOUNTAIN OF EUCALYPTUS TREES ON THE OTHER; SOLID HARD WOOD FLOORS NEWLY REFINISHED THROUGH OUT, TILED BATHROOM, A TILED KITCHEN. IT’S LIGHT AND BRIGHT WITH MORE THAN 14 WINDOWS; 360 DEGREES AROUND THE APARTMENT WITH WINDOWS ON ALL 4 SIDES; NORTH, SOUTH, EAST AND WEST, CABLE READY, 2 WALK IN CLOSETS AND TOO NUMEROUS TO MENTION; UTILITY AND TOILETRY SMALLER CLOSETS, FREE STORAGE SPACE AND NO COINS REQUIRED UNLIMITED CLOTHES WASHER + DRYER USE, WITH BEAUTIFUL VISTA VIEWS OF GOLDEN GATE PARK, THE MARIN HEADLANDS, THE SAN FRANCISCO BAY AND DOWNTOWN SAN FRANCISCO…

Applicants are required to have a picture I.D., 2 months' of bank statements, two months' of pay stubs, a recent credit report that indicates their credit scores and a filled out generic rental application.

name: BRIGHT, SUNNY STUDIO APARTMENT IN CENTRAL HAYES VALLEY
body:
HI! We are looking to sublease our lovely, FURNISHED studio apartment. It is available May 1 (or sooner) with a minimum four month lease until August 31 with option to extend. 

About the apartment : Bright, sunny studio on the 2nd floor with big bay windows and wood floors. Kitchen is separate, it has a big window and plenty of cabinet space for kitchenware and utensils. Bathroom has natural light from frosted window, clawfoot tub with shower head. It has been kept very clean and well taken care of. Other building tenants are quiet and friendly. 

The apartment is located 2 blocks away from the Van Ness and Market Muni stop and a 2 blocks away from downtown Hayes Valley, filled with awesome bars, restaurants, and shops. It's a great spot for a fast and easy commute downtown. Street parking is usually available and easy to find. It is a safe and lively neighborhood with multiple parks and gyms within walking distance. 

Apartment features:
- Full kitchen with gas stove, oven, fridge 
- Laundry in apartment
- Room fits a queen bed
- 2 Large closets

Furniture includes: 
-Full, 7 month new mattress and new white metal Ikea bed frame 
-2 new, white Ikea bedside tables 
-A petite dining table with matching chairs 
-A metal storage cabinet 
-2 foldable, new ikea chairs for guest seating 
-Kitchenware - new Ikea white plates, new Ikea silverware and cooking utensils, new ikea glasses (4)  
-Gorgeous plants if you decide to keep them 

Other: 
-No pets 
-No smoking 
-Elevator in building 
- Gas and electric average - 25$ a month 

SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY - DO NOT WASTE MY TIME.
